date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with gentle winter sunlight but low temperatures.

2025-01.daily_overview: During the New Year's holiday, Yin Hao utilized the final day of rest to kickstart his plans for the new year at home. Combining his holiday experiences with his aspirations for the upcoming year, he systematically crafted a detailed blueprint for both career development and personal health, making it a day of clear goals and a positive mindset.

events.name: Resume Morning Runs with Running Buddies
events.description: On the last morning of the New Year holiday, Yin Hao and his running partner Chen Jie met up to resume their morning jogging routine around the Guangfulin Cultural Heritage Site, which had been briefly interrupted by the holiday. The winter morning air was crisp and fresh, and the two jogged at their usual pace, sharing stories from their holiday break and discussing their hopes for the new year. This run was not just about exercise—it felt more like a ritual, marking the end of the holiday and the return to the rhythm of everyday life.

events.name: Develop an annual career development blueprint
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao, in the study of his rented home, conducted a systematic review of his development in Shanghai, drawing on the relaxation and reflection from the New Year's holiday. Guided by the rigorous habits he developed during his military service, he created a detailed 2025 career development blueprint on his computer. The core goal of the blueprint was to obtain an advanced CNC machine tool operator technician certificate, which was further broken down into phased tasks such as improving machining precision stability, participating in the learning of new equipment debugging, and beginning to understand the basics of mechatronics maintenance. He saved and printed the blueprint, then pinned it on the wall in front of his desk.

events.name: Study on Half Marathon Events
events.description: In the evening, while looking up half marathon events, Yin Hao realized that his fitness goals aligned perfectly with this challenge. Using his phone and computer, he conducted detailed searches for half marathon events scheduled throughout 2025 in Shanghai and nearby cities (Suzhou, Hangzhou). He focused on key details such as the event dates (particularly in spring and autumn), registration requirements, course difficulty, and feedback from fellow runners. He then noted down the names and key dates of several suitable events in his memo app, preparing for the next step of selecting his target race.

events.name: Evening Leisure and Information Organization
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao habitually opened "Honor of Kings" and noticed his gaming friend Zhang Fei was online, so he invited him to play two rounds to unwind after a tense day. Afterward, he organized the blueprint and event information he had planned for the day and briefly recorded his daily expenses. This is his standard way of ending the day as an ISTJ personality type, ensuring everything is in order.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight reluctance at the end of the holiday and anticipation for a new beginning.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and purposeful, I feel reassured having a clear plan for the new year.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first workday of the new year, Yin Hao put yesterday's plan into action. In his spare time, he created a detailed roadmap for professional learning and took the first step toward his half-marathon goal by conducting a physical fitness assessment. The rhythm of his life quickly shifted from the relaxation of the holidays to a structured and intense state of planning.

events.name: Refine the Career Learning Plan
events.description: During lunch breaks and after work, Yin Hao referred to the career blueprint posted on the wall and created a more detailed learning schedule and skill improvement checklist on his computer. For each targeted knowledge module (such as the principles of CNC systems and advanced programming techniques), he assigned learning materials, practical projects, and estimated completion milestones. He also synchronized the plan to his phone calendar and set up regular reminders. This approach aligns with his ISTJ personality traits, which emphasize planning and order.

events.name: Assess current running fitness
events.description: After work, Yin Hao changed into his running shoes and went for an 8-kilometer long-distance assessment run, based on his weekly running routine. He deliberately chose a route he didn’t usually run and used a fitness app to record his pace, heart rate, and perceived exertion throughout the run. After finishing, he felt some soreness in his leg muscles, and the data showed a drop in pace during the last two kilometers. This gave him a clear understanding of the gap between his current endurance and the ability to complete a half marathon (21 kilometers).

events.name: Preliminary Development of a Half Marathon Training Plan
events.description: After taking a shower and having dinner, Yin Hao combined the afternoon's evaluation run data with the previously researched race information to begin drafting a preliminary half-marathon training plan. He planned to start with a base running volume of three times a week, covering 5-6 kilometers each time, and gradually increase the distance by about 10% per week. He recorded this draft in both a running app and a paper notebook, intending to discuss and refine it with his running partner, Chen Jie, over the weekend.

events.name: Brief call with family
events.description: Around nine in the evening, his mother, Wang Xiuying, sent a WeChat voice message asking how his New Year's Day had been and whether work had gone smoothly that day. While organizing his training plan, Yin Hao replied with a voice message, briefly saying he was doing well and reassuring his parents. This kind of routine, brief communication was an important way for him to maintain an emotional connection with his hometown.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle urgent orders
events.description: Due to the company receiving a temporary high-precision order, Yin Hao worked extra hours until 21:00 in the evening, which caused a delay in his study plan and left him feeling somewhat stressed.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Full of energy and ready to put the plan into action.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study room at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Slightly fatigued and under pressure, but the initial implementation of multiple plans has been completed.

2025-01.daily_overview: On weekdays, Yin Hao's life revolves around work and personal matters. He sought advice from his mentor on career planning and handled the fixed monthly living expenses at the beginning of the month. Today's events reflect his pragmatic approach to tasks and his emphasis on responsibility, while also highlighting his fatigue from working overtime the previous day.

events.name: Seek career planning advice from a mentor.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao intentionally sat at the same table in the company cafeteria as his mentor, Sun Jianguo. He took out his phone and showed Sun the annual career development blueprint he had drafted, specifically seeking advice on the key learning points for obtaining the senior technician certification and the potential resources the company might provide. Sun carefully reviewed the plan, praised Yin Hao’s thoughtful planning, and, drawing from his own experience, pointed out several practical exam points that are often overlooked but crucial. He also promised to keep an eye out for internal technical training opportunities within the company for him.

events.name: Process monthly bills
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao received a notification from his landlord Li Xiuying via WeChat regarding the rent bill for this quarter (January to March). At the same time, Alipay also sent a notification for last month's water, electricity, and gas bills. Taking advantage of a break in his work, he opened his budgeting app to check this month's budget and account balance. After confirming that paying these fixed expenses would still keep his living costs within a manageable range, he proceeded with the payments.

events.name: Paying rent and utility bills
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao immediately transferred the rent to the landlord's account via mobile banking. He then proceeded to pay the water, electricity, and gas bills in sequence on the Alipay life expenses page. Once the payments were completed, he habitually sent a screenshot of the rent transfer to the landlord, Li Xiuying, along with a message to inform her. He then updated the expense records in his budgeting app. The entire process was efficient and well-organized.

events.name: Online Course Pre-class Preparation
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao received the course commencement notice and preview materials for the advanced technician online theoretical intensive course he had registered for. He downloaded the materials in advance and prepared a dedicated notebook and pens of different colors, making thorough preparations for the first class the next day. He understood well that systematic learning requires a solid start.

events.name: Adjusting to an Early Bedtime Due to Fatigue
events.description: Due to fatigue from working overtime the day before, Yin Hao decided to rest early tonight and cancel the planned light exercise to regain energy.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Smooth but slightly fatigued, focusing on daily affairs.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Relaxed, completed the monthly fixed tasks, prepared for studying, and got some rest for the body.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, good weather for the weekend.

2025-01.daily_overview: On a weekend morning, Yin Hao publicly announced his half-marathon goal during his morning run, receiving professional support from fellow runners. He then efficiently handled financial matters and began preparing for the weekend fishing trip, making his day a blend of disciplined exercise and leisurely anticipation.

events.name: Morning run and publicly set a half-marathon goal.
events.description: Early in the morning, Yin Hao and Chen Jie were jogging along Guangfulin Road. During the latter part of their run, Yin Hao proactively shared with Chen Jie his goal of completing a half marathon within the next two years. As a fitness coach, Chen Jie was very supportive upon hearing this. Not only did he share basic knowledge about heart rate zones, running posture, and nutrition for long-distance running training, but he also offered to set aside time each week to guide Yin Hao through targeted core strength training to enhance his running stability. This conversation transformed Yin Hao’s goal from a "personal secret" into a "public commitment," and he gained professional support along the way.

events.name: Confirm the fishing and barbecue appointment.
events.description: After returning home from his morning run, Yin Hao contacted his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang (Brother Wu) on WeChat and finalized their plan to go fishing and have a barbecue at Dianshan Lake the next day (Sunday). The two discussed the meeting time and location on WeChat and divided the tasks: Yin Hao was responsible for preparing the barbecue grill, charcoal, and some of the ingredients, while Brother Wu would take care of the bait and more professional fishing gear.

events.name: Purchase fishing and barbecue supplies
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove to a nearby supermarket and fishing tackle shop. He purchased pre-marinated meat skewers, vegetables, seasonings, and charcoal, and checked his commonly used fishing rods and line sets, replenishing his winter fishing supplies with bloodworm bait. After completing his purchases, he neatly arranged all the items in the trunk of his car.

events.name: Attend the first online theoretical course.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sat at his desk on time and attended the first live session of the advanced technician online theoretical intensive course. The content of the lesson was a review of the basic structure and principles of CNC machine tools. He listened attentively throughout the session and, following Master Sun's advice, meticulously recorded the key points of the lesson and the common pitfalls emphasized by the instructor in his notebook, establishing a systematic note-taking framework for the first time.

events.name: Returned late after a casual chat with the neighbor.
events.description: On the way home, I ran into my neighbor Aunt Chen. We chatted for a while in the hallway, and Yin Hao helped her repair an old radio, which caused him to return home half an hour later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Anticipation brings joy because of the weekend and outdoor activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, looking forward to tomorrow's activities, but feeling a bit tired from staying up late.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to sunny, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-01.daily_overview: Sunday is Yin Hao's outdoor social day. He enjoyed fishing and barbecuing with his fishing friend Brother Wu at Dianshan Lake, chatting about everything from car maintenance to life plans. In the evening, his interactions with gaming friends helped spread awareness and encouragement for his half-marathon goal within a wider circle.

events.name: Dianshan Lake Fishing and Barbecue
events.description: Yin Hao drove early in the morning to meet Brother Wu at Dianshan Lake. The two chose a secluded spot by the lake as their fishing location. Although the fish were less active in winter, they waited patiently, and Yin Hao managed to catch several crucian carp. In the afternoon, they set up a grill in the designated barbecue area and cooked some of their catch along with the ingredients they had brought. As they ate and chatted, Brother Wu shared a case about a transmission failure he encountered at his auto repair shop. Yin Hao listened with great interest, gaining a more concrete understanding of the practical value of automotive repair knowledge.

events.name: Share goals with gaming friends
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, as usual, teamed up with his online gaming friend Zhang Fei, who lives far away in Shenzhen, to play "Honor of Kings." During the break while waiting for the game to match, Yin Hao casually mentioned his plan to run a half marathon over voice chat. Zhang Fei was quite surprised upon hearing this, as he often stays up late working on designs and deeply admires such a regular and healthy lifestyle. The two briefly discussed the importance of maintaining good health, and although the conversation soon shifted back to the game, Yin Hao could feel his friend's support.

events.name: Integrate suggestions and optimize the training plan.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao reviewed the various feedback he had received today from Chen Jie, Brother Wu, and even Zhang Fei. He integrated the professional advice from Chen Jie into his drafted half-marathon training plan, specifically adding a weekly strength training session. He then updated the plan outline in his phone’s memo to make it more actionable.

events.name: Organizing Fishing Gear and Sharing Updates
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao carefully cleaned the fishing gear and processed the remaining catch before storing it in the refrigerator. He selected a few photos of the lake scenery and barbecue from the day and posted them on his social media feed with the caption, "Winter sunshine, fishing fun." Soon, he received a wave of likes and comments from family, colleagues, and friends.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to barbecue diet.
events.description: Today's barbecue gathering involved a high intake of food, and Yin Hao noticed a possible slight weight gain, deciding to adjust his diet tomorrow.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and joyful, ready to enjoy a day outdoors.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Content and comfortable, the body feels slightly tired but the mind is relaxed, with a hint of drowsiness from staying up late.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-01.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yin Hao officially began his systematic study to prepare for the advanced technician certification and received valuable material support from his mentor. Meanwhile, he formally recorded his training plan in the app, marking the orderly execution phase of his two major annual goals.

events.name: Officially commenced exam preparation with the support of the master.
events.description: During the lunch break at work, Yin Hao once again approached his mentor, Sun Jianguo, formally and solemnly expressing his determination to obtain the senior technician certificate. Master Sun was very pleased and, the next day, brought several theoretical review notes he had treasured for years, along with an out-of-print exercise book, to lend to Yin Hao. He also highlighted several key chapters that had undergone significant changes according to the latest national standards, urging him to thoroughly understand them. Taking the materials, Yin Hao felt a greater sense of responsibility and motivation on his shoulders.

events.name: Develop a detailed exam preparation schedule.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, taking into account the online course schedule, the key points highlighted by Master Sun, and the borrowed materials, created a detailed study plan for the next few months on his computer. He broke down the learning tasks week by week, specifying the textbook reading, exercise practice, and online course content to be completed each week, while also setting aside time for review and mock exams.

events.name: Create a first-week training plan on the running app.
events.description: Based on the optimized plan outline from the weekend, Yin Hao officially created the first week's training plan on his frequently used running app: a 5-kilometer basic run on Tuesday and Thursday, and a 6-kilometer slow run on Saturday. He set pace intervals for each training session and included the warm-up and stretching tutorials recommended by the app.

events.name: Communicating Goals with Colleagues During Lunch Break
events.description: During lunch, Yin Hao sat with his close colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. Wang Lei, who has an outgoing personality, made a few good-natured jokes upon hearing that Yin Hao was planning to run a half marathon, but he also openly expressed admiration for his perseverance. Liu Zhiqiang, on the other hand, offered gentle encouragement. This casual conversation made Yin Hao’s goal known within his work circle, subtly adding a layer of accountability from his colleagues.

events.name: Mild cold symptoms rest
events.description: Due to catching a chill during outdoor activities the day before, Yin Hao has developed mild symptoms of a runny nose and has decided to rest today without exercising, drink more hot water, and go to bed early.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Serious and dedicated but feeling slightly unwell, ready to embrace the challenges of the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Goals are clear, actions are resolute, feeling that everything is falling into place, and health is slightly improving.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with frost in the morning.

2025-01.daily_overview: Yin Hao strictly adhered to the plan he had set for himself. He completed his first training run of the week on a cold winter morning, and in the evening, he devoted himself wholeheartedly to online course studies. Discipline and perseverance were the themes of his day.

events.name: Execute the first training run of the first week.
events.description: At 6 a.m., the alarm clock rang. Despite the still-dark sky outside and the chilly air, Yin Hao got up as planned. After completing a thorough 10-minute dynamic warm-up at home, he headed out to Guangfulin Road for a 5-kilometer jog. He deliberately controlled his breathing and pace, keeping his speed within the planned range. After finishing the run, he performed a full static stretch under the streetlights to prevent muscle injuries from the cold.

events.name: Focus on technical details in work.
events.description: At work today, while operating the machine tool to process a batch of routine parts, Yin Hao paid more attention than usual to the subtle changes in cutting parameters and the surface finish of the machined parts. He connected the theoretical points mentioned by Master Sun with practical operations, attempting to understand the underlying principles. This state of "working with questions in mind" is a positive change brought about by his exam preparation and learning.

events.name: Participate in online theoretical intensive lecture courses
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao attended the second online class on time, which focused on the application of macro programs in CNC programming. He took notes while listening and paused to replay sections that were particularly complex. After the class, he reviewed the textbook and Master Sun's notes, re-deriving the examples covered in the lecture to ensure he fully understood the material.

events.name: Staying up late due to studying.
events.description: In order to complete course review and exercises, Yin Hao stayed up later than usual, which may lead to fatigue the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: It takes a bit of willpower to overcome the warmth of the bed, but the goal is clear.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling, completed the planned training and study tasks, but felt slightly sleep-deprived.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, the weather is damp and cold.

2025-01.daily_overview: The rainy weather affected outdoor activities, but Yin Hao's learning progress continued steadily. He listened attentively and organized his notes, systematically consolidating the knowledge from online courses. Meanwhile, at work, he encountered new challenges that required him to contribute technical ideas for team meetings.

events.name: Establish a fixed learning corner
events.description: Yin Hao set up a dedicated study area on one corner of his desk, arranging borrowed materials, textbooks, notebooks, and stationery neatly. This fixed space helps him quickly get into a learning mindset and reflects his ISTJ personality's emphasis on order and environment.

events.name: Online Courses and Note Organization
events.description: The online evening course covered the basics of electrical control systems for machine tools. Yin Hao remained fully focused throughout the session, not only jotting down the key points emphasized by the instructor but also adding notes on similar fault phenomena and potential causes he had encountered in his practical work. After the course ended, he spent an additional half-hour organizing his notes from the day with different colored pens, creating a clear and structured knowledge framework tailored to his own understanding.

events.name: Prepare technical ideas for work meetings
events.description: Before leaving work, team leader Wang Lei announced that a monthly summary meeting would be held tomorrow to discuss the recent issue of unstable processing precision with the new alloy material. Yin Hao reflected on his recent experience operating this material, reviewed the technical manual, and preliminarily organized his thoughts on adjusting cutting speed, feed rate, and coolant ratio, preparing to present them at the meeting.

events.name: Evening arrangements adjusted due to rain.
events.description: The originally planned outdoor run was canceled due to light rain. Yin Hao used this time to preview the content of tomorrow's online class in advance and tidy up the fishing tools that had not been fully put back in place.

events.name: Begin emergency work project
events.description: Due to the launch of a new company project, Yin Hao has been assigned to participate in a three-day technical breakthrough task, requiring additional time commitment starting today, which has led to increased stress.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, adapted to the rhythm of the workday, but with a slight work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Study corner in the home study room
结束状态.心情: Focused and under increasing pressure, it is necessary to simultaneously tackle the challenges of studying, working, and new projects.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today was a day of strong execution. Yin Hao not only completed his second training run but also made valuable technical suggestions during the work meeting, earning recognition. The achievements at work and progress in personal training complemented each other, boosting his confidence.

events.name: Second training run and attempt at variable speed.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao went to the Songjiang University Town track to complete his second 5-kilometer run of the week. He consciously tried to slightly increase his pace during the final kilometer, paying attention to how his heart, lungs, and muscles responded to the higher intensity. After finishing, he felt good, with the normal post-workout muscle soreness.

events.name: Monthly Summary Meeting Proposes Technical Recommendations
events.description: At the team's monthly work summary meeting, when discussing the challenges in processing new alloy materials, Yin Hao took the initiative to speak up. Drawing on his practical experience and preparations from the previous day, he proposed the idea of fine-tuning cutting parameters and optimizing the coolant ratio. His suggestion was logically clear and earned a nod of approval from his mentor, Sun Jianguo, as well as adoption by team leader Wang Lei. The meeting decided to establish a temporary technical task force, with Yin Hao assisting programmer Liu Zhiqiang in fine-tuning the parameters and taking responsibility for recording data during subsequent trial processing.

events.name: Refine the plan with technical partners.
events.description: After the meeting, Yin Hao immediately communicated with Liu Zhiqiang. Based on the discussion results from the meeting, the two refined the specific steps for adjusting programming parameters and identified key data indicators (such as spindle vibration, cutting temperature, workpiece surface roughness, etc.) that need to be monitored and recorded during trial processing.

events.name: Online Course Learning and Review
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao attended an online course on "Accuracy Detection and Compensation of CNC Machine Tools." After the class, he not only organized his lecture notes but also specifically pulled out the old notes lent to him by Master Sun, focusing on the sections about accuracy calibration for comparative study. He discovered some common principles and different emphases, gaining substantial insights from the experience.

events.name: Continue working overtime on the urgent project.
events.description: Due to the demands of a technical breakthrough project, Yin Hao worked extra hours until 22:00 in the evening, which compressed his study time and left him feeling slightly anxious.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: A steady mindset on regular workdays, but with persistent pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Excited and fulfilled, he felt greatly encouraged by his active participation at work and the adoption of his technical suggestions, but fatigue had accumulated.

state.今日运动: Night run 5 kilometers (including the last 1 kilometer speed increase)

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with moderate to strong winds.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Friday, Yin Hao embarked on the practical application of technical breakthroughs at work, conducting the first trial processing of new materials. Simultaneously, to broaden his skill set, he began studying for a low-voltage electrician certification and started selecting a gift to express gratitude to his mentor. Throughout the day, his thoughts and actions revolved around the themes of "self-improvement" and "gratitude."

events.name: Perform the first trial processing and record the data.
events.description: According to the plan formulated yesterday, after Liu Zhiqiang adjusted the program, Yin Hao personally operated the machine tool to conduct the first trial processing of the new alloy material. He maintained a high level of concentration throughout the process, carefully observed the machining conditions, and strictly recorded the spindle speed, feed rate, cutting temperature, as well as the preliminary measurement data of the workpiece after processing in accordance with the checklist.

events.name: Received high-precision urgent order.
events.description: In the afternoon, team leader Wang Lei assigned Yin Hao an urgent task to process a part with a precision requirement of ±0.01mm, emphasizing the importance of the client. Yin Hao carefully reviewed the process card and realized that this was a severe test of his operational stability and the calibration level of the machine tool. He solemnly accepted the task.

events.name: Research on the Low Voltage Electrician Operation Certificate
events.description: During his evening study sessions, Yin Hao recalled his career goal of "understanding mechatronics" and the automotive circuit issues discussed with Wu Ge. He began searching online and consulting experienced mentors to learn about the application requirements, exam content, and training duration for the low-voltage electrician operation certificate. After preliminary consideration, he concluded that mastering some foundational knowledge of electrical engineering would be beneficial for his future development and thus included it as part of his long-term learning plan.

events.name: Selecting a New Year's gift for the master.
events.description: Yin Hao reflected on Master Sun's selfless assistance over the past year, especially during his recent exam preparations, and decided to express his gratitude before the Spring Festival. He began contemplating gift options and, recalling that Master Sun often brewed tea during his lunch breaks, initially planned to give a high-quality tea set and a thermos cup. This choice was both practical and a thoughtful gesture.

events.name: Relax after completing the urgent project.
events.description: The technical research project concluded today, and Yin Hao felt the pressure lift off his shoulders. He decided to unwind by playing online games with friends in the evening, which led to him staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Focused, ready to tackle technical challenges at work, yet feeling somewhat relaxed.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Slightly stressed but full of drive, work challenges coexist with learning and exploration, and the mood is improving.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, good weather for the weekend.

2025-01.daily_overview: Saturday morning was dedicated to a regular running session, while the afternoon was filled with the lively activities of shopping and household chores. Yin Hao selected a thoughtful gift for his master and prepared for the upcoming gathering, showcasing his practical and loyal nature.

events.name: Weekend long-distance run
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and Chen Jie met up as planned to increase their weekly running distance to 6 kilometers, extending their route from Guangfulin Road to the area around Chenshan Botanical Garden. As they ran, they exchanged thoughts on their training experiences from the week, with Yin Hao sharing insights from his final sprint. After the run, they replenished their energy by having soy milk and fried dough sticks at a familiar breakfast shop by the roadside.

events.name: Buying New Year gifts for the master.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove to Songjiang Wanda Plaza. He carefully selected a beautifully packaged and well-reviewed Longjing tea gift set at a tea shop in the mall, and also purchased a branded insulated cup at a home goods store. He believed this combination was both dignified and practical, perfectly matching his master's taste and daily needs.

events.name: Reserve a table for the next day's gathering.
events.description: On his way home, Yin Hao confirmed the dinner arrangements for tomorrow (Sunday) after work with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang via WeChat. He called ahead to a local Shanghainese restaurant he often visits and reserved a small private room to ensure a quiet environment for conversation.

events.name: Home Repair Practice
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao noticed that an old exhaust fan in the bathroom was not rotating smoothly and was making unusual noises. Drawing on his hobby of amateur repairs, he disassembled it for inspection and discovered that the bearings lacked lubrication and the fan blades were covered in dust. He cleaned off the dust, applied some lubricating oil to the bearings, and reassembled the fan, after which it ran as smoothly as new. This small repair gave him an immediate sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Challenge your first 10-kilometer run.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao completed a 10-kilometer long-distance run alone as part of his half-marathon training. He used a fitness app to record the session, maintaining a steady pace throughout. However, after finishing, he experienced noticeable soreness in his calf muscles and expects to need rest for recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, enjoy the weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, having completed shopping and chores, but feeling slightly fatigued from the long run.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with light rain in the evening.

2025-01.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yin Hao had an in-depth dinner conversation with two close colleagues, sharing their respective career goals and elevating their colleague relationship into a professional support partnership. The post-meal game time further lightened and harmonized this bond.

events.name: Colleagues share career goals during a dinner gathering.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang arrived at the local cuisine restaurant as planned. At the table, Yin Hao took the initiative to discuss his specific plans for obtaining the senior technician certificate and the online courses he was currently taking. To his surprise, Wang Lei also mentioned his intention to pursue a relevant management certificate this year. The two immediately exchanged information on study materials and online course platforms. From a programmer's perspective, Liu Zhiqiang reminded Yin Hao to pay attention to potential new exam topics in the theoretical test due to recent updates in CNC system versions. This conversation deepened their relationship from casual friends and colleagues to mutual support partners who could share career development information.

events.name: Team games after the meal.
events.description: After the meal, the three of them still wanted to spend more time together. Since it was raining and outdoor activities were inconvenient, they found a quiet milk tea shop nearby and sat down to play *Honor of Kings* as a team. Thanks to their earlier in-depth conversation, the atmosphere during the game was more relaxed and harmonious than usual, filled with laughter and joy.

events.name: Organize the information obtained from exchanges
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao added the exam preparation advice and information he had gathered from Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang during the gathering to the study schedule he had previously created. In particular, he highlighted the point mentioned by Liu Zhiqiang about paying attention to system updates, marking it as a key area requiring additional research.

events.name: Video call with parents to schedule the return date.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao sent a message to his parents on WeChat, agreeing to have a video call the next evening to discuss the specific date and train schedule for returning home during the Spring Festival. His mother quickly replied with an "okay" and reminded him to rest early.

events.name: Slight weight gain due to dining out.
events.description: Today's gathering involved a lot of food intake, and Yin Hao noticed a possible slight weight gain, deciding to return to a light diet tomorrow.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to, waiting for the gathering with friends after work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warm and joyful, friendship is consolidated and elevated through in-depth communication.

2025-01.daily_overview: In the new week, Yin Hao fine-tuned his training plan based on last week's physical feedback and laid the technical groundwork for the upcoming precision machining tasks during work breaks. His life reflects a state of dynamic adjustment and continuous progress.

events.name: Fine-tune the second week running plan.
events.description: Based on the positive feedback from his body after the first week of training, Yin Hao made slight adjustments to the second week's plan on his running app, setting the distances for the three runs at 5 kilometers, 5 kilometers, and 7 kilometers (the weekend long-distance run). He also purchased several pairs of professional running socks online to cope with the gradually increasing running volume and reduce friction.

events.name: Analyze the initial trial processing data
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao, along with Master Sun and Liu Zhiqiang, analyzed the initial trial processing data of the new alloy material from last Friday. They found that the surface finish had improved, but the dimensional stability was still not ideal. After discussion, they identified the direction for the next round of parameter adjustments and planned to conduct the second trial processing this Wednesday.

events.name: Prepare the machine tool for high-precision orders.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao began preparing for the urgent order with the ±0.01mm precision requirement. He spent a considerable amount of time meticulously preheating the CNC machine, calibrating its precision, and performing origin resetting. He even used standard gauge blocks to repeatedly verify the positioning accuracy of several key axes, ensuring that the equipment itself was in theoretically optimal condition. This laid a solid foundation for the actual machining scheduled for the next day.

events.name: Persist in online course learning
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao attended the online class as usual. After the class, he systematically reviewed the content from the previous week by referring to the official textbook and completed some of the practice exercises to reinforce his memory.

events.name: Persistent soreness in the calf muscles.
events.description: Due to the muscle soreness in his calves from the 10-kilometer run the day before, Yin Hao decided to rest today and not exercise, opting instead for light stretching to aid recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Meticulous and earnest, the tasks for work and study in the new week are clear, but there is a slight feeling of physical discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Meticulous and methodical, fully prepared for the upcoming technical challenges, with a slight improvement in physical condition.

2025-01.daily_overview: Today is a crucial day for technical practice. Yin Hao successfully completed the machining of high-precision parts, achieving significant progress in his work. At the same time, he also carried out his running training on schedule, with both his physical fitness and professional skills improving simultaneously.

events.name: Conduct the second trial processing of new materials.
events.description: In the morning, following the adjusted parameters, Yin Hao operated the machine tool to conduct the second trial processing of the new alloy material. He monitored the entire process more meticulously and recorded more comprehensive data, preparing to conduct a comparative analysis with the data from the first trial.

events.name: Challenge and complete high-precision order processing.
events.description: In the afternoon, after ensuring the machine tool was in perfect condition, Yin Hao began processing the batch of high-precision emergency parts. He focused intently, strictly following the process requirements, and aimed for precision in every step. After completing the processing, he used precision measuring tools for self-inspection, with all critical dimensions controlled within ±0.008mm, exceeding customer requirements. Team leader Wang Lei reviewed the work and patted him on the shoulder in approval.

events.name: Second training run of the week
events.description: After work, despite feeling somewhat tired, Yin Hao still insisted on completing the planned 5-kilometer run. He chose a relatively easy pace, with the main goal of moving his body and maintaining his condition. After finishing the run, the fatigue actually dissipated quite a bit, but the soreness in his calves only slightly eased.

events.name: Preparing for a video call with parents
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao checked his phone and internet connection in advance, opened the webpage for checking train schedules for the Spring Festival journey home, and prepared to discuss the details with his parents during the video call. He also planned to share with them his small achievement of successfully completing a high-precision machining task earlier that day.

events.name: Feeling elated due to a sense of achievement.
events.description: The success at work lifted Yin Hao's spirits, so he decided to stay up a bit later to organize his recent progress.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous, focusing on today's important processing tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Proud and relaxed, the sense of accomplishment from successfully overcoming technical challenges alleviated the physical fatigue.

2025-01.daily_overview: In the evening, Yin Hao had a warm video call with his parents, who live in Nantong, Jiangsu. He updated them on his recent life and shared his New Year's goals, and they finalized his travel plans for returning home during the Spring Festival. The emotional support from his family serves as a vital source of strength for him as he works hard alone in Shanghai. After the call, he packed his luggage, preparing to embark on his journey home the next day.

events.name: Video call parents to share good news and confirm return date.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao connected with his parents via WeChat video call. He first updated them on his smooth work progress recently, specifically mentioning that he had successfully completed a high-precision order the day before, which delighted his parents. Next, he shared his New Year goals—obtaining a senior technician certificate and sticking to running to prepare for a half marathon. His mother, Wang Xiuying, as always, reminded him to take care of his health and eat on time, while his father, Yin Jianguo, was more concerned about the depth of his technical learning. Yin Hao also shared a small incident from a few days ago when he helped a neighbor jump-start their car. His parents were both pleased with his helpful nature and practical skills. Finally, they checked the train schedules together on the screen and finalized the date and ticket details for Yin Hao’s return home during the Spring Festival.

events.name: Communicate exam preparation progress with colleagues.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang briefly exchanged updates on their exam preparation progress in a small WeChat group, sharing links to a newly discovered practical technical article with each other. They agreed to continue this information-sharing practice, forming a small study support group.

events.name: Organize trial processing data
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao organized the data from the second trial processing and conducted a preliminary comparison with the data from the first trial. He noted that dimensional stability had improved to some extent but still fell short of the ideal target. He documented the analysis results, planning to discuss them in depth with Master Sun and Liu Zhiqiang the next day.

events.name: Start packing for the trip back home.
events.description: After finishing the video call with his parents, Yin Hao officially began the countdown to his trip home for the Spring Festival. In high spirits, he started packing some of his luggage in advance, setting aside the Shanghai specialties he had prepared for his parents and relatives, as well as the tea gift box and thermos he had bought for his mentor, Sun Jianguo. He planned to give the gifts to his mentor at work the next day.

events.name: Feeling relaxed because the return date is confirmed.
events.description: After finalizing his plans to return home for the Spring Festival, Yin Hao felt at ease and decided to rest on time tonight to prepare for tomorrow's work and travel.

events.description: At 7:15 in the morning, Yin Hao left his home on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District, drove his family car, and arrived at the company after about 20 minutes. He changed into his work clothes, conducted equipment inspections and preheating in advance, and prepared for the day's work.

events.name: High-Precision Order Technology Breakthrough
events.description: Yin Hao dedicated himself to the high-precision order processing with a tolerance of ±0.01mm. He first conducted trial machining and inspected the parts using a coordinate measuring machine. After fine-tuning the parameters, he proceeded with batch processing while continuously monitoring the machine tool parameters throughout the entire process. The first batch of parts passed the self-inspection and is now awaiting the official report.

events.name: Midday Technical Exchange
events.description: During the lunch break, I discussed trial processing data with colleague Liu Zhiqiang to optimize cutting parameters. I also consulted master Sun Jianguo about G-code loop instructions to supplement my study notes.

events.name: Submit for Inspection and Obtain Preliminary Feedback
events.description: Submitted the parts for quality inspection in the afternoon. Initial feedback indicates a high pass rate, and we are looking forward to tomorrow's report.

events.name: Planning and Preparation After Work
events.description: After returning home, confirmed with fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang via WeChat to pick up fishing gear accessories over the weekend. Checked equipment for tomorrow's 10-kilometer run and set the alarm. Practiced phrases to express gratitude to my mentor.

events.description: They chatted about work and shared insights on exam preparation. Master Sun advised maintaining a balance between work and rest, highlighting that their relationship went beyond just professional matters.

events.name: Review and Boost Confidence

events.description: Listen to music after dinner, make plans with colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang for a weekend gaming session, preview the running route, and rest early.

events.description: Clean the kitchen range hood and bathroom in the afternoon, wipe the windows, organize bookshelf clutter, and pack recyclable waste.

events.name: Confirm final itinerary and relax
events.description: Taking a bath in the evening to relieve fatigue, confirming the driving route and weather, and placing important items properly. Watching a movie at night, exchanging blessings with friends, and resting early.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of house No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Tranquility, with the certainty of being fully prepared.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Bedroom at Home
结束状态.心情: Clean, relaxed, and full of anticipation, the home is tidy and the luggage is packed.

2025-01.daily_overview: Homecoming Day. Yin Hao set off early in the morning and drove back to his hometown in Nantong, arriving smoothly at noon. In the afternoon, he chatted with his parents about daily life. In the evening, he helped his father put up Spring Festival couplets and hang lanterns. At night, the whole family gathered to make dumplings, marking the beginning of a warm and joyful reunion for the Chinese New Year.

events.name: Embark on the Journey Home
events.description: At 6:30 in the morning, we loaded the truck and set off on the highway. I called my brother Yin Tao to check on the road conditions and took a break at the service area to stretch my legs.

events.name: Arriving at my hometown to reunite with my family.
events.description: Arrived home around eleven in the morning, greeted by parents who helped with the luggage, enveloped in the familiar scent of hometown and the warmth of family affection.

events.name: A cozy homemade lunch
events.description: Mother prepared lunch, which included steamed perch and stir-fried clams. The family chatted about their recent work while enjoying the meal.

events.name: Afternoon Chats and Tidying Up
events.description: After lunch, we gave our parents gifts and New Year's goods. Mother tried on the scarf, while Father arranged the tea set. Yin Hao tidied up the room and arranged the narcissus flowers.

events.name: Father and Son Work Together to Put Up Spring Festival Couplets
events.description: In the evening, the father brought out the spring couplets and lanterns. Working together, the father and son pasted the couplets and hung the lanterns. As they worked, the father shared amusing stories from the agricultural machinery station to encourage Yin Hao.

events.name: The whole family gets together to make dumplings.
events.description: In the evening, the mother prepared the filling and rolled out the dough, while Yin Hao and his father wrapped the dumplings, chatting about Yin Tao’s job, changes in the village, and their plans to buy a house.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Excitement, anticipation, a heart yearning for home.

结束状态.所处地点: Hometown own room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
结束状态.心情: Warmth, happiness, complete relaxation, wrapped in family love and the festive atmosphere of the New Year.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 0-7°C, with brilliant sunshine, it's a rare fine day in winter.

2025-01.daily_overview: Busy and joyful on New Year's Eve. In the morning, I accompanied my mother to buy New Year's goods and experienced the festive market; in the afternoon, I learned to cook hometown dishes like clams and braised pork; in the evening, my brother returned home, and the whole family gathered for the reunion dinner, watching the Spring Festival Gala and staying up late to welcome the new year, filled with warmth and happiness.

events.name: Accompanying Mother to Purchase New Year's Goods
events.description: In the morning, I drove my mother to the county’s farmers’ market and a large supermarket. She picked out fresh ingredients while sharing tips, and Yin Hao carried the heavy bags, soaking in the festive atmosphere.

events.name: Learn to cook hometown dishes from mother.
events.description: In the afternoon, under my mother's guidance, I cleaned clams, cut meat, and caramelized sugar, successfully making two dishes and feeling satisfied after tasting them.

events.name: Brother Returns and Prepares the New Year's Eve Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Yin Tao returned home, and the whole family mobilized to prepare the New Year's Eve dinner. The father was in charge of cleaning the fish, the mother took the lead in cooking, and the brothers helped out with laughter and joy filling the air.

events.name: Sharing the Reunion Dinner and Staying Up Late on New Year's Eve
events.description: A sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner in the evening, raising glasses to offer blessings while reflecting on the past and looking ahead to the future. Watching the Spring Festival Gala, enjoying candies, and staying up late to welcome the new year. At midnight, the sound of firecrackers heralds happiness and hope.

起始状态.所处地点: Hometown own room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and cheerful, looking forward to the New Year's Eve activities

state.睡觉时间: The next day at 01:00 in the early morning.

结束状态.所处地点: Hometown living room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
结束状态.心情: Happiness, contentment, and warmth, immersed in the joy of family reunion.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the first day of the Lunar New Year, people visit relatives and friends to offer New Year's greetings. Yin Hao, along with his parents, paid respects to the elders, received red envelopes, and exchanged blessings. In the afternoon, relatives from his uncle's family gathered for a meal, where the large family chatted lively about work and life in different places, strengthening the bonds of kinship.

events.name: New Year's Greetings and Family Reunion
events.description: In the morning, I changed into new clothes and went with my parents to pay New Year's visits to the elders in the same village. The elders showed concern about my life in Shanghai and handed me red envelopes, making me feel the warmth of family care.

events.name: Relatives gathering at uncle's house for a meal.
events.description: In the afternoon, Uncle Chen Zhigang and his family, including cousin Chen Xiaowen, came to pay a New Year's visit. The living room was filled with guests and lively atmosphere. Yin Hao and his cousin chatted about interesting stories from the big city and reminisced about their childhood.

events.name: A sumptuous family lunch and a delightful conversation.
events.description: During the lunch, we had a lively conversation about work experiences and future plans in Shanghai, Suzhou, and Hangzhou. My uncle showed interest in mechanical technology, while my cousin shared insights about the internet industry. My father and uncle also enjoyed a few drinks together.

events.name: Evening Leisure and Socializing
events.description: After the relatives left in the evening, I watched the Spring Festival Gala replay on TV with my parents and brother, and sent New Year greetings to my master, colleagues, and comrades via WeChat, receiving their replies.

起始状态.所处地点: My own room in my hometown, Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province.
起始状态.心情: Joy, with the freshness of the New Year and the ease of visiting relatives and friends.

结束状态.所处地点: Hometown living room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
结束状态.心情: Warmth, lively then peaceful contentment, surrounded by family affection.

2025-01.daily_overview: On the second day of the Lunar New Year, I met up with my childhood friends. I had a meal and went singing with childhood companions like Zhang Wei, sharing the ups and downs of our experiences in different places. We reminisced about the bonds of hometown friendship and youthful memories, recharging our energy through camaraderie.

events.name: Annual Gathering with Childhood Friends
events.description: At noon, we gathered in a private room at a restaurant in the county town. Zhang Wei playfully pounded Yin Hao while listening to stories about Shanghai, creating a familiar and warm atmosphere.

events.name: Dinner Gathering with Chatting and KTV Singing
events.description: Lunchtime was filled with amusing student anecdotes and discussions about our current careers, sharing the pressures of big cities versus the stability of small towns, and encouraging each other. After the meal, we went to KTV, where Yin Hao sang military songs and Zhang Wei challenged high notes, as if we were back in our youthful days.

events.name: Savoring the Moments of Friendship and Family Time
events.description: Walking home after the gathering, I reminisced about the conversations, feeling relaxed and comforted. In the evening, I watched TV with my parents, sharing amusing stories from the party and enjoying a leisurely family time.

起始状态.所处地点: Hometown own room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, expectant, excited for the reunion of old friends.

结束状态.所处地点: My own room in my hometown in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province.
结束状态.心情: Refreshing, nostalgic, and slightly weary, friendship recharges and relaxes both body and mind.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain in the evening, temperature 5-8°C.

2025-01.daily_overview: The pace slowed down on the last day of the Spring Festival holiday. In the morning, Yin Hao helped with household chores and packed luggage; in the afternoon, he reviewed fragmented study materials and planned arrangements for after returning; in the evening, he had a farewell dinner with his parents, cherishing the warmth and looking forward to the next reunion. He has already adjusted his mindset to embrace the challenges of the new year.

events.name: Help with household chores and pack luggage
events.description: After sleeping in during the morning, I helped my father sweep up the firecracker debris, assisted my mother in sorting gifts, and organized the suitcase to store local specialties and New Year's money.

events.name: Fragmented Learning and Planning
events.description: In the afternoon, I reviewed my study notes to look up information and understand difficult points, and planned arrangements for the first week after returning to Shanghai, including reporting in, resuming running, and advancing the electrician course.

events.name: The Last Casual Conversation with My Parents
events.description: In the evening, Mother prepared a simple farewell dinner. My parents reminded me to be careful on the road and to eat on time, among other things. Father asked about the exam schedule and requested that I inform them of the results.

events.name: Making final preparations for the return journey.
events.description: After dinner, I checked the vehicle and topped up the tire pressure, then loaded the luggage and New Year goods. I called my brother to arrange contact on the road. Before going to bed, I looked at the night view of my hometown, feeling both reluctant to leave and filled with motivation to strive.

起始状态.所处地点: Hometown own room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
起始状态.心情: Relaxation tinged with the faint melancholy of the approaching end of the holiday, preparing for the return journey.

结束状态.所处地点: Hometown own room in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
结束状态.心情: Calm and fulfilling, the holiday provides emotional nourishment, allowing one to adjust their state and prepare to face challenges.

date_attribute.weather: It's overcast with a low temperature and scattered light rain.

2025-02.daily_overview: Today, Yin Hao spent the last day before the Spring Festival with his parents in his hometown Nantong. From a morning run down memory lane to a farewell dinner, the entire day was immersed in the warmth of family reunion, as he methodically prepared for his drive back to Shanghai tomorrow.

events.name: Morning Run Data Review and Training Plan Adjustment
events.description: After a restorative jog in the park of his hometown in Rudong County in the morning, Yin Hao reviewed his running data for January through a mobile app, totaling about 70 kilometers, and found that his body had fully adapted. In line with his long-term goal of completing a half marathon, he decided to gradually increase his longest single run to 10 kilometers in February and incorporate an interval training session to strengthen his cardiovascular function.

events.name: Farewell Family Feast and Luggage Packing
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao began packing his luggage for his return to Shanghai the next day. His mother, Wang Xiuying, filled his suitcase and car trunk with local specialties she had prepared long in advance and homemade food, repeatedly reminding him to take care of his health while away. In the evening, the family shared a hearty farewell dinner. His father, Yin Jianguo, asked about his recent work situation in Shanghai, while his mother kept serving him dishes. After the meal, the family of three put up Spring Festival couplets and the character "福" (fortune) together, welcoming the upcoming New Year. The home was filled with warmth and reluctance to part.

events.name: Vehicle Inspection and Departure Preparation
events.description: After dinner, Yin Hao went downstairs to inspect his family car. He carefully checked the tire pressure, engine oil, coolant, and lights to ensure the vehicle was in good condition for a long-distance drive, making thorough preparations for the next day's journey from his hometown in Rudong County back to Songjiang District, Shanghai.

events.name: Reunion and staying up late on New Year's Eve
events.description: As night fell, Yin Hao sat with his parents, enjoying a sumptuous New Year's Eve dinner while watching the Spring Festival Gala. The dining table was filled with dishes like his mother's Shanghai-style braised pork and steamed sea bass. The family chatted and stayed up late to welcome the New Year, with Yin Hao sharing updates about his work and certification progress in Shanghai, which brought great joy to his parents. As the clock struck midnight, they exchanged New Year's blessings, savoring the warmth of family and the joy of reunion.

events.name: Temporary Family Board Games
events.description: After staying up late on New Year's Eve, Yin Hao played several rounds of poker with his parents to relax. Due to the lively conversation, they stayed up a bit later than originally planned.

起始状态.所处地点: At the parents' home in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
起始状态.心情: Warm, relaxed, with a slight reluctance to return.

结束状态.所处地点: At the parents' home in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, calm, and filled with anticipation for the new year.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: After the Spring Festival holiday, Yin Hao bid farewell to his parents and drove back to Shanghai. Upon arrival, he spent the entire afternoon organizing and storing the large number of items he had brought from his hometown. He also gave his rented room a thorough cleaning, restoring the small home to a tidy and cozy state, ready to embrace the work and life of the new year.

events.name: Bidding farewell to my parents, I drove back to Shanghai.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao bid farewell to his parents and drove a small car packed with local specialties from his hometown in Rudong County. After a brief rest at a service area along the way, he safely arrived at his rented residence on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District, Shanghai, in the afternoon.

events.name: Classify and organize local specialties from your hometown.
events.description: Yin Hao carried the cured meat, sausages, dried clams, and other local specialties prepared by his mother upstairs in batches from the trunk. In the kitchen, he conducted a preliminary sorting and inspection based on the characteristics of the ingredients: placing the cured meat and sausages that needed to be frozen into the freezer compartment of the refrigerator, and storing dried goods like dried clams properly in storage boxes in the pantry.

events.name: Laundry and Item Placement
events.description: Opening the suitcase, Yin Hao put his change of clothes into the washing machine and placed the books and small items he brought back from his hometown onto the bookshelf. He also carefully rolled up the Spring Festival couplets, "Fu" characters, and other holiday decorations he brought back, storing them in a dedicated box for use next year.

events.name: Post-Holiday Household Cleaning
events.description: Yin Hao took advantage of Sunday to conduct a deep cleaning of his rented apartment. He carefully wiped all the windowpanes and frames, cleaned the kitchen stove and range hood, and organized seasonal clothing, infrequently used tools, books, and other items into storage boxes. After the thorough cleaning, he packed up the generated waste and sorted it for disposal at the community garbage station.

events.name: Share New Year's goods with neighbors.
events.description: After cleaning, Yin Hao took a small portion of the candies and nuts he had brought back from his hometown and knocked on the door of his neighbor, Aunt Chen, across the hall. He shared the New Year treats with her, offered early New Year greetings, and expressed gratitude for her usual care. The two exchanged brief pleasantries at the doorway, with Aunt Chen asking about the smoothness of his journey.

events.name: Record Heartwarming Moments
events.description: In the evening, gazing at the tidy, bright, and festive house, Yin Hao felt immensely satisfied. He took several photos of the living room decorations and the narcissus flowers, posting them to the family WeChat group and his social media circle with the caption, "My little nest in Shanghai, bidding farewell to the old and welcoming the new." He received likes and warm comments from his parents, older brother, and many friends.

events.name: Temporary Dinner Takeout
events.description: Due to fatigue from tidying up, Yin Hao ordered takeout for dinner in the evening, resulting in a slightly irregular diet.

起始状态.所处地点: Parents' home in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province
起始状态.心情: The reluctance before parting and the tranquility on the journey home.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Tired but fulfilled, seeing the tidy home brings comfort and tranquility.

state.今日运动: None, primarily engaged in manual labor such as moving and cleaning.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with dry and cold weather.

2025-02.daily_overview: Today is the first adjusted working day after the Spring Festival holiday. Yin Hao quickly switched from holiday mode to work preparation mode. In the morning, he engaged in restorative running to awaken his body, and in the afternoon, he combined company arrangements with personal goals to create a detailed work and study plan, marking the beginning of a new year of hard work.

events.name: Post-Holiday Recovery Morning Run
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao went for a recovery jog around the Guangfulin Cultural Relics site in Songjiang District. He deliberately slowed his pace, covering a distance of 6 kilometers to awaken his body, which had grown slightly sluggish during the holiday. The focus was on adjusting his breathing and running rhythm, feeling the subtle responses of his muscles, and re-establishing the habit for a return to regular training.

events.name: Develop a post-holiday work plan
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao sat at his desk reviewing the company’s schedule for the following week and potential training arrangements. Aligning with his annual goal of obtaining an advanced technician certificate, he created a detailed weekday routine, dividing his time after work into modules for review, skill development, and relaxation. This helped him quickly and systematically transition back into an efficient state of work and study.

events.name: Replenish daily necessities
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao went to the supermarket near the residential area to purchase daily necessities such as milk, fruit, and frozen food, replenishing the stock consumed during the Spring Festival and preparing for a regular routine in the coming week.

events.name: Evening Mobile Gaming Relaxation
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into "Honor of Kings" and teamed up with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang, who were also online, to play several rounds of ranked matches. Over the game's voice chat, they briefly shared amusing stories from their respective New Year celebrations, bringing a relaxed end to the first workday after the holiday.

events.name: Suddenly received a video call from family.
events.description: Before going to bed, his mother Wang Xiuying called him via video chat to ask about his situation after returning to Shanghai, which made him stay up later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental Residence, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Slightly lazy, but adjusting my mindset to get ready for work.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Goals are clear, filled with motivation for the upcoming new week.

2025-02.daily_overview: Today is the second adjusted day off, and Yin Hao focused on handling personal matters. He officially launched his preparation plan for the advanced technician certification and simultaneously began exploring the possibility of obtaining a low-voltage electrician certificate. This added new skill goals to his career development, showcasing the planning and pragmatism characteristic of the ISTJ personality type.

events.name: Initiate preparation for the Senior Technician examination.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao officially decided to begin preparing for the Advanced CNC Machine Tool Operation Technician certification exam, in line with his annual career goals. He went online to check the official exam syllabus and designated textbooks released by Shanghai authorities, and placed an order for a complete set of study materials and practice question books through an e-commerce platform. While waiting for the materials to arrive, he used the syllabus to draft an initial overall framework and timeline for his review plan over the coming months.

events.name: Research on Low Voltage Electrician Certificate
events.description: In the afternoon, considering that mastering an additional electrical skill would benefit both maintenance work and career development, Yin Hao looked up the application process for the low-voltage electrician operation certificate and information about local training institutions in Shanghai. He selected an online theoretical course platform with good reviews, completed the registration, and paid the tuition fee. Subsequently, he downloaded electronic textbooks such as "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering" and "Safety Regulations for Electricity Use," and purchased basic practical tools like a multimeter, electrical tape, and wire strippers online, making preliminary preparations for the subsequent systematic study and practice.

events.name: Calling family to report safe arrival.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao had a video call with his parents via WeChat, informing them that he had safely returned to Shanghai and had started working and studying again. His mother, Wang Xiuying, reminded him once more to take care of his health, while his father expressed approval of his proactive attitude toward obtaining professional certifications.

events.name: Temporarily studying until late at night.
events.description: Due to his strong interest in new knowledge, Yin Hao spent an extra hour studying electrical engineering courses in the evening, staying up later than planned.

起始状态.心情: Focused and well-planned

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Enriching, full of anticipation for future learning.
