date_attribute.weather: Overcast with light rain in the evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day of officially returning to work, Yin Hao quickly got into the work mode and, together with the team, took on a new task of processing precision parts. After work, he began implementing his study plan for the upcoming exams and carefully calculated all the expenses during the Spring Festival, demonstrating a strong sense of financial responsibility.

events.name: Receive new processing tasks
events.description: After resuming work in the morning, Yin Hao held a meeting with team leader Wang Lei and programmer Liu Zhiqiang to receive a batch of new processing orders for precision medical device components. The three of them discussed in detail the technical requirements of the drawings, the difficulties in processing, and the strict tolerance standard of ±0.01mm. After the meeting, Yin Hao and Liu Zhiqiang worked together at the console of the CNC machine tool to preliminarily set the processing parameters and tool paths.

events.name: Machine Tool Calibration and First Article Trial Machining
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao performed precise calibration on the CNC machine under his responsibility, including spindle concentricity and tool length compensation. After Liu Zhiqiang completed the preliminary programming, he conducted the first trial machining using substitute materials. Upon measurement, minor dimensional deviations were discovered. He recorded the data and prepared to further optimize the program with Engineer Liu.

events.name: Develop a detailed study plan.
events.description: In the evening, after receiving the preparation materials for the senior technician exam, Yin Hao carefully reviewed the table of contents and content overview. Based on his work experience and areas of knowledge weakness, he formulated a detailed weekly study plan. The plan clearly outlined the core modules to be reviewed each week (such as CNC programming and precision machining processes) and the fixed daily study duration, ensuring the systematic and continuous nature of his review.

events.name: Calculate Spring Festival expenses
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao took out his phone and paper receipts at the desk, carefully checking each expense during the Spring Festival. This included fuel and toll fees for the round trip to Nantong, red envelopes for his parents and relatives, as well as dining and KTV costs from gatherings with childhood friends. He then entered the data into his phone's expense-tracking app, calculating a total of approximately 4,500 yuan, which exceeded his budget set at the beginning of the month.

events.name: Work pressure leads to emotional fluctuations.
events.description: Due to the high precision requirements of the new task, Yin Hao felt somewhat stressed, and his efficiency during evening study sessions was slightly lower.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental Residence at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to embrace new challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but content, realizing the need to strengthen financial planning.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the second workday, Yin Hao continued to optimize the processing program and began formal processing. After work, he started theoretical learning for the low-voltage electrician certificate for the first time and adjusted the remaining budget for the month due to overspending during the Spring Festival. The pace of life became more intense under the dual tasks of work and study.

events.name: Optimizing Programs and Batch Processing
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and his colleague Liu Zhiqiang worked together in front of the workshop computer, making precise adjustments and optimizations to the CNC machine's processing program parameters (such as cutting speed and feed rate) based on the trial processing data from the previous day. In the afternoon, he imported the optimized program into the machine, securely clamped the first batch of stainless steel raw materials, started the machine to commence formal batch processing, and periodically conducted random inspections of the part dimensions.

events.name: Theoretical Learning for Low-Voltage Electrician Certification Begins
events.description: After work, Yin Hao turned on his computer at home, logged into the vocational skills training online platform, and began studying the first chapter of the "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering" course, titled 'Basic Concepts and Laws of Circuits.' While watching the instructional videos, he took notes on key points and formulas in his notebook and completed the chapter's post-lesson exercises.

events.name: Adjust monthly budget
events.description: After completing his study, Yin Hao checked the executed budget and remaining budget for February in his accounting software. Considering the overspending during the Spring Festival and the notice from his landlord, Sister Li, that the rent would slightly increase starting next month, he decided to moderately reduce the budget for dining out, takeout, and entertainment shopping (such as cutting down on unnecessary online shopping and reducing the frequency of dining out with friends) for the remainder of February. This adjustment was made to ensure the successful completion of his monthly savings plan. He then synchronized the revised budget to the reminder app on his phone.

events.name: Temporarily working overtime with colleagues to discuss.
events.description: Due to processing issues, I had an online discussion with Liu Zhiqiang about technical details in the evening, which caused me to sleep later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental Residence at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Steady, focused on work tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Learning new knowledge brings a slight sense of achievement while also making one more vigilant about finances.

2025-02.daily_overview: Friday's work was spent on focused parts processing. After work, Yin Hao resumed his morning runs with his running buddies and continued his electrical studies in the evening. Meanwhile, he proactively sought advice from his mentor on technical challenges, further deepening their master-apprentice relationship through communication.

events.name: Monitor batch processing procedures.
events.description: Yin Hao continued operating the machine tool throughout the day for the batch processing of stainless steel parts. Following the established process flow, he periodically sampled parts from the production line to inspect their dimensions and surface quality, recorded the data, and ensured the stability of the machining process and the consistency of the products.

events.name: Resume morning runs with running buddies.
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao and his running partner Chen Jie went for their first official joint training session after the holiday around the Guangfulin Cultural Relics site. As they ran, they chatted, sharing their holiday experiences and training plans for the new year. With Chen Jie’s company and encouragement, Yin Hao completed a relaxed 7-kilometer run, feeling that his physical condition had significantly improved compared to the previous few days.

events.name: Deeply study the safety electricity usage regulations.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao switched his study focus and began learning the first part of the "Safety Electricity Regulations" course, titled "Basic Requirements for Safe Electricity Use and Personal Protection." He carefully studied the specifications regarding insulation, grounding, safe distances, and other aspects, taking detailed notes. He recognized the importance of this knowledge for his machine operation and future maintenance practices.

events.name: Ask the master for advice on technical issues.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao took the initiative to approach his mentor, Sun Jianguo, to seek advice on a clamping stability issue encountered in the processing of precision parts. Drawing from his years of experience, Master Sun explained the approach and key considerations for designing a simple auxiliary fixture, leaving Yin Hao greatly enlightened.

events.name: Temporary Friends Gathering Invitation
events.description: After work, Gao Zhiyuan extended an invitation to a gathering, but Yin Hao politely declined due to his study plans and chose to go to bed early instead.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental Residence, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, both exercise and learning have brought positive feedback.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day of the weekend, Yin Hao engaged in a long-distance endurance run in the morning, followed by a systematic review for the senior technician exam in the afternoon. In the evening, he relaxed by playing online games with colleagues, striking a perfect balance between work and leisure.

events.name: Weekend long-distance endurance running
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao arrived at the plastic track of the Songjiang Sports Center for his endurance training this week. As planned, he completed an 8-kilometer slow run, focusing on maintaining a steady pace and heart rate throughout to avoid injuries caused by rushing for results. After the training, he performed systematic stretches to relieve muscle tension and prepare for increasing the training intensity in the following week.

events.name: Senior Technician Exam Preparation Review
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao opened the advanced technician exam preparation materials in his home study and began systematically reviewing the basic instructions of CNC programming, focusing on reinforcing the meanings and application scenarios of G-codes and M-codes. While referring to the textbook, he silently wrote down the key code formats on scratch paper and completed the post-lesson exercises to solidify his theoretical foundation.

events.name: Online gathering with colleagues
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao teamed up with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang, along with a few other friends, to play "Honor of Kings" together. They enthusiastically discussed tactics over in-game voice chat, occasionally mixing in some workplace gossip and weekend plans, creating a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.

events.name: Temporarily trying a new recipe
events.description: At lunch, Yin Hao tried to make a simple hometown dish using ingredients brought back from his hometown. Due to his lack of cooking skills, he ended up ordering takeout for dinner.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the freedom of the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Pleasure, exercise, and learning goals all achieved.

2025-02.daily_overview: Sunday continued with the theme of personal improvement. In the morning, Yin Hao consolidated his knowledge of electrical engineering, and in the afternoon, he prepared for the upcoming workshop meeting and tried a new interval running training. His life was fulfilling and well-structured.

events.name: Electrical Theory Learning and Testing
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao continued studying the second chapter of "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering," titled "Analysis of Direct Current Circuits," at home. He attentively watched video lectures on the application of series and parallel resistors and Ohm's law, and completed a large number of practice exercises. Following that, he took the stage test provided by the training platform online to assess his learning outcomes from the first week and analyzed the questions he answered incorrectly.

events.name: Prepare for the Monthly Workshop Meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao received an email from the workshop supervisor regarding the monthly meeting notification. He reviewed the technical issues he had encountered in his recent work, such as the optimization of cutting fluid usage, as well as safety observation points. After briefly preparing the key points for his speech, he hoped to put forward valuable suggestions during the meeting.

events.name: First Interval Running Training
events.description: In the evening at the Songjiang University Town track, Yin Hao attempted interval running training for the first time: after a 2-kilometer warm-up, he alternated between four sets of 800-meter fast runs (at a pace of approximately 5 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer) and 400-meter slow walks, finishing with a 1-kilometer cool-down jog. The training intensity was significantly higher than steady-paced running, leaving him drenched in sweat afterward. However, he felt his cardiovascular system was effectively stimulated and completed the session relatively smoothly.

events.name: Temporary minor physical discomfort
events.description: After training, he felt a slight headache, so Yin Hao went to bed early to rest.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai

2025-02.daily_overview: A new week begins with tackling work challenges. Under the guidance of his mentor, Yin Hao optimized the processing techniques, and the afternoon workshop meeting provided him with an opportunity to showcase and exchange ideas. In the evening, he continued to delve into electrical engineering knowledge and began exploring the field of electromagnetism.

events.name: Addressing the issue of machining chatter.
events.description: In the morning, during the formal processing of stainless steel parts, Yin Hao noticed that the tool exhibited slight vibrations at a specific rotational speed, which affected the surface finish. He immediately paused the machining process and consulted his mentor, Sun Jianguo. After an on-site inspection, Master Sun determined that the issue was related to the clamping force of the tool holder and the matching of cutting parameters. He recommended adjusting the cutting speed and feed rate and replacing the tool holder with a more suitable hydraulic one. Following these instructions, Yin Hao made the adjustments, and the vibrations disappeared.

events.name: Attend the monthly workshop meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao attended the workshop's monthly meeting on time. The meeting reported on the previous month's safety production situation and analyzed a case of operational negligence. During the technical discussion session, drawing from his experience in processing precision parts, Yin Hao proposed a suggestion to optimize the frequency of using cutting fluid for specific materials. After being reviewed by the online training instructor Liu Jianjun, the suggestion sparked active discussions among his colleagues. Yin Hao felt that his thoughts were being taken seriously.

events.name: Learn about electromagnetic induction knowledge.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued studying the third chapter of "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering," titled "Electromagnetic Induction and Transformers." This section was closely related to the principles of the motor equipment he encountered in his work, so he studied it with particular diligence. He grasped the principles of electromagnetic induction and the calculation methods for transformer ratios, and he connected these concepts with the motors on the machine tools for deeper reflection.

events.name: Work overtime temporarily to complete the report.
events.description: Due to the regular meeting, Yin Hao worked overtime in the evening to organize the key points report, staying up later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
起始状态.心情: Focus, prepare to tackle work challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Encouraged, speaking up in professional settings boosts confidence.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yin Hao successfully completed the processing and delivery of the first batch of parts today. While running, he accepted a fellow runner's advice on strength training and decided to incorporate it into his plan. In the evening, he systematically reviewed what he had learned recently, maintaining a steady and consistent pace in his studies.

events.name: Completed the first batch of parts delivery.
events.description: After completing the processing of the first batch of stainless steel parts, Yin Hao accompanied the quality inspector for the final inspection. All critical dimensions were within the tolerance range of ±0.01mm, and the surface finish met the required standards. He counted the qualified parts and delivered them to the next process, then reported the completion of the task to the team leader Wang Lei, receiving positive feedback.

events.name: Adopt training suggestions from fellow runners
events.description: During a conversation after a morning run with his running partner Chen Jie, Chen Jie suggested that he incorporate core strength training to improve running efficiency and reduce the risk of injury. Yin Hao took the advice and, that same evening, looked up relevant tutorials at home. He then drafted an initial plan to perform basic strength exercises such as planks, squats, and push-ups twice a week (e.g., on Tuesdays and Thursdays).

events.name: Systematic Review and Overcoming Difficulties
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a systematic review of the electrical engineering and CNC knowledge he had learned in the previous days. He revisited his notes and worked on additional circuit calculation exercises to reinforce his understanding. When he encountered a challenging problem involving complex series-parallel circuit calculations, he searched for relevant instructional videos online and watched them repeatedly until he fully grasped the concept.

events.name: Casual friends gathering for a meal.
events.description: After work, I had a small gathering with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng for some barbecue. The socializing was enjoyable, but I gained a little weight as a result.

起始状态.心情: Calm and confident in completing work tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
结束状态.心情: Steadfast, the completion of tasks and the mastery of knowledge bring dual satisfaction.

2025-02.daily_overview: In the middle of the workweek, Yin Hao actively observed and learned on the job, and implemented his optimization suggestions on a small scale. As his exam preparation entered a critical stage, he consulted his mentor on more advanced technical challenges. After work, he began his first strength training session.

events.name: Observational Learning and Pilot Program Implementation
events.description: During a work break, Yin Hao carefully observed his mentor Sun Jianguo designing a specialized fixture for a complex component, taking notes on the key steps. Meanwhile, with his mentor's approval, he conducted a small-scale trial of the cutting fluid optimization plan proposed during the meeting on the machine he was responsible for, and recorded the initial operational data and equipment status for subsequent analysis.

events.name: Seeking Advice on Difficulties in Preparing for the Senior Technician Examination
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao took the initiative to approach his mentor, Sun Jianguo, with difficult questions about "five-axis simultaneous machining programming" from his review materials. Master Sun combined the actual equipment in the workshop to provide him with a detailed explanation of the principles and a virtual demonstration, addressing his doubts and making the abstract theory tangible and comprehensible.

events.name: First Home Strength Training Session
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao began his first home strength training session as planned. Following the fitness app on his phone, he completed three sets of planks (45 seconds each), three sets of squats (15 reps each), and two sets of push-ups (10 reps each). Although his form wasn’t perfect and he felt muscle soreness, he persevered and completed the entire routine, adding a new dimension to his running training.

events.name: Studying temporarily until late at night.
events.description: After solving the difficult problem in his exam preparation, Yin Hao was in high spirits and studied for an extra hour, staying up late.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence

2025-02.daily_overview: The rain limited outdoor activities. Yin Hao focused on new production tasks throughout the day and discussed technical issues with colleagues online. In the evening, he studied safety operation knowledge for electrical equipment, which was highly practical.

events.name: Receive new orders and program preparation
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and Liu Zhiqiang jointly received a batch of new parts processing orders. The two of them analyzed the drawings in front of the computer and discussed the processing techniques. Liu Zhiqiang took the lead in the preliminary work of CNC programming, while Yin Hao offered suggestions from an operational perspective regarding clamping and tool selection.

events.name: Learn Electrical Safety Operations
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued studying the second part of the "Safety Electricity Regulations," titled "Safe Operation and Maintenance of Electrical Equipment." He learned about the operational standards for machine tool electrical cabinets, daily inspection procedures, and safety steps for handling common faults. He also noted key operational processes such as "power outage, electrical testing, and hanging warning signs" in a prominent section of his notebook, as this knowledge is closely related to his daily work safety.

events.name: Online technical exchange with colleagues
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao discussed a detail about tool compensation value setting encountered during the day's programming with his colleague Liu Zhiqiang on WeChat. They exchanged views and reached a consensus. This kind of daily technical exchange has become part of their work collaboration.

events.name: The morning run was temporarily canceled due to rain.
events.description: The originally planned morning run was canceled due to rain and replaced with light indoor stretching.

2025-02.daily_overview: Friday's work was spent on programming debugging and machine tool preparation. After work, Yin Hao stumbled upon an interesting hand-brewed coffee experience class and decided to sign up, adding a new sense of anticipation to his weekend life. In the evening, he followed his usual routine of strength training and planned his weekend schedule.

events.name: New Program Debugging and Machine Tool Preparation
events.description: Throughout the day, Yin Hao and Liu Zhiqiang worked closely together, simulating and debugging the new processing program. Yin Hao was responsible for the actual clamping and trial cutting on the machine tool to verify the correctness of the program. Based on the trial cutting results, he provided feedback to Liu Zhiqiang for fine-tuning, ensuring preparations were in place for next week's batch production.

events.name: Discover and sign up for new interest courses
events.description: While browsing his phone during the lunch break, Yin Hao happened to see an advertisement for a weekend hand-brewed coffee experience class offered by a boutique coffee shop in Songjiang Impression City. Out of curiosity about the meticulous operation (similar to machine tool control) and a desire to find a relaxing and rewarding new activity for the weekend, he almost didn’t hesitate to pay online and sign up for the Saturday afternoon class.

events.name: Second strength training session
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao completed his second strength training session of the week at home. Compared to the first session, he felt an improvement in his control over the movements. Although it was still challenging, he managed to finish the planned sets. After the training, he performed thorough stretching exercises.

events.name: Temporarily video chatting with comrades-in-arms.
events.description: Video chatted with comrade-in-arms Zhang Jianguo to discuss camping plans, ended up staying up later than planned due to chatting.

2025-02.daily_overview: A Colorful Weekend. In the morning, Yin Hao completed a 10-kilometer long-distance run, achieving his monthly goal. In the afternoon, he attended a hand-brewed coffee experience class, mastering a new skill. In the evening, he met up with his fishing friend, Brother Wu, bringing him local specialties from his hometown and exchanging knowledge about car maintenance, balancing socializing and learning perfectly.

events.name: Complete the 10-kilometer long-distance running goal
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao conducted a long-distance training session at the Songjiang University Town track, successfully completing a 10-kilometer slow run. This achievement met the goal set at the beginning of the month to increase the longest single-distance run. Throughout the run, he focused on maintaining a steady pace and proper running form. Although the last two kilometers were challenging, the sense of accomplishment afterward was immense, boosting his confidence for the upcoming half-marathon goal.

events.name: First Experience with Hand-Drip Coffee
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao arrived punctually at the coffee shop in Songjiang Impression City to attend a hand-brewed coffee experience class. Under the guidance of the barista, he learned about the flavor characteristics of different coffee beans, mastered techniques for controlling water temperature, pouring methods, and extraction time, and personally brewed his first cup of hand-brewed coffee. The patience and precise control required throughout the process made him find it quite interesting.

events.name: Gathering and exchanging with fellow anglers
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao drove to Wu Zhiqiang's auto repair shop in Qingpu District, bringing some dried clams and pastries he had brought back from Nantong. He presented the local specialties to Brother Wu as a token of gratitude for the vehicle maintenance advice he had given before the New Year. The two shared a simple cup of tea in the shop, chatting about their respective amusing experiences during the holiday. Seizing the opportunity, Yin Hao asked Brother Wu for some basic knowledge on daily car maintenance. Brother Wu patiently explained and suggested that he start by carefully reading the vehicle maintenance manual.

events.name: Weekly Learning Summary
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao summarized the learning progress for the Advanced Technician and Electrician Certificate courses this week and planned the key learning points for the next week. He found that although studying both simultaneously was time-consuming, the knowledge of electrical engineering sometimes provided new perspectives for understanding the electrical principles of machine tools, and this cross-disciplinary learning felt quite rewarding.

events.name: Evening Core Strength Training
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao performed 20 minutes of core strength training, including planks and squats, to maintain his training rhythm.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Rental Residence
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to the diverse activities of the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and exhilarating, breakthroughs in exercise and the acquisition of new skills bring immense satisfaction.

state.今日运动: Long-distance slow run of 10 kilometers, core strength training for 20 minutes.

2025-02.daily_overview: On his first day off after returning to Shanghai from his hometown Nantong following the Spring Festival holiday, Yin Hao chose to adjust his state with a quiet and focused hobby activity, planning his training and life for the new week. This reflects the ISTJ personality traits of being organized and curious about new skills.

events.name: Hand Drip Coffee Beginner Experience Course
events.description: On a Sunday afternoon, Yin Hao arrived punctually at an independent specialty coffee shop in Songjiang Impression City, which he had looked up online beforehand. The shop was quiet and peaceful, and the barista introduced him to the origin, processing methods, and flavor characteristics of the coffee beans. Yin Hao resonated with the pour-over process, which required precise control—from accurately weighing the beans and grinding them evenly to maintaining a steady pouring technique. This reminded him of the exacting demands for precision in parameters and movements when operating CNC machine tools. He tried his hand at it twice. Although the first attempt resulted in uneven extraction due to unstable water flow, his second attempt showed significant improvement under the barista’s guidance. The entire experience felt both novel and familiar to him.

events.name: Procurement of coffee equipment
events.description: After the trial class, Yin Hao developed a strong interest in this hobby that requires patience and control. Following the barista's recommendation, he purchased a beginner's kit that included a pour-over kettle, filter cup, filter paper, and an electronic scale, and selected a bag of Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee beans described as having notes of citrus and jasmine. At checkout, he habitually estimated the cost and recorded the expense in his phone's memo app, marking it as his first investment in this new hobby.

events.name: Plan this week's exercise and study schedule.
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao opened his phone calendar and planned his morning runs and strength training sessions for the upcoming week. He decided to resume his post-holiday training starting tomorrow, scheduling morning runs on Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, and strength training on Tuesday and Thursday. At the same time, he also set aside study time each evening to ensure steady progress in preparing for the advanced technician certification exam.

events.name: Packing luggage and adjusting sleep schedule.
events.description: Yin Hao organized the specialties he brought back for the Spring Festival—the braised pork made by his mother, Wang Xiuying, and the dried fish sent by his uncle, Chen Zhigang—and placed them in the refrigerator. He also washed his change of clothes. To ensure a smooth transition from holiday mode to the routine of workdays, he prepared his work uniform and other necessary items for the next day in advance and set his alarm clock.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation of returning to the daily rhythm.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled and peaceful, ready for the new week ahead.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, cooler in the morning and evening.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the first day back to work after the Spring Festival holiday, Yin Hao quickly immersed himself in a tense yet orderly routine of work and study. He resumed his morning running routine for the first time after the holiday, demonstrated diligence in the workshop during the day, and continued his exam preparation plan in the evening, showcasing the dedication of a career-oriented personality to their goals.

events.name: Morning Run Recovery Training
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao followed his plan for his first post-holiday morning run. He jogged 8 kilometers along Guangfulin Road, maintaining a pace of around 6 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer. He felt his body gradually recovering from the holiday mode, though his legs were slightly sore and stiff. After the run, he did some stretching and reminded himself to take it step by step.

events.name: Assist colleagues in processing high-precision parts.
events.description: At work, a batch of medical device parts with high precision requirements needed to be processed. Yin Hao proactively assisted his colleague Wang Lei in the operation, carefully observing how Wang Lei fine-tuned cutting parameters, such as feed rate and coolant flow, based on the material hardness and the real-time condition of the machine tool, to optimize the surface finish of the parts. While helping, he silently memorized these practical experiences in his mind, as such details could not be learned from textbooks.

events.name: Catching up with colleagues during the lunch break
events.description: At lunch, Yin Hao sat at the same table with his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. Everyone shared their experiences from the Spring Festival holiday. Yin Hao briefly mentioned his trip back to his hometown in Nantong, while Wang Lei excitedly recounted the fun moments from his road trip. The relaxed atmosphere at the table helped ease the tension of the first day back at work after the holiday.

events.name: Study Chapter 4 of "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering"
events.description: In the evening, following his study plan, Yin Hao began studying Chapter 4, "AC Circuits," from the book *Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering*. The theoretical aspects, such as the three elements of sinusoidal alternating current and phasor representation, were quite challenging. He slowed down his pace, repeatedly watched online course videos, and took notes until he grasped the core concepts. His meticulous ISTJ personality ensured he didn’t overlook any doubts.

events.name: Study the first lecture of "Fundamentals of Electrical Control for CNC Machine Tools"
events.description: After completing the theoretical study of electrical engineering, Yin Hao began learning the supplementary course "Fundamentals of Electrical Control for CNC Machine Tools," which is more closely related to his work. The first lecture introduced the symbols, functions, and applications of common low-voltage electrical devices, such as contactors and relays, in machine tool control circuits. This knowledge is directly relevant to the equipment he operates daily, making his learning more motivated. He also recorded key points in a dedicated technical notebook.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to embrace the new week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but fulfilled, with gains from exercise and study.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, warm during the day

2025-02.daily_overview: The mundane workday was interrupted by a sudden neighborhood incident. After work, Yin Hao learned that his neighbor, Aunt Chen, had been hospitalized, and a sense of duty prompted him to offer his help. At the same time, he began a new core strength training regimen, showcasing his traditional and loyal nature.

events.name: First Attempt at Core Strength Training
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao performed a 30-minute core strength training session at home, which included planks, squats, and lunges. He followed the instructions from a fitness app, and although his movements were a bit clumsy, he persisted and completed the workout. He felt his core muscles being activated, laying a solid foundation for his upcoming running training.

events.name: First attempt at brewing pour-over coffee independently.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao eagerly took out his newly purchased equipment and attempted to make a pour-over coffee on his own. He followed the steps he remembered, but the water flow varied in intensity, and he struggled to control the extraction time. The resulting coffee tasted somewhat weak and had a slight astringent aftertaste. Undeterred, he noted down the issues—"unstable water flow, too fast extraction time"—in his phone's memo app, planning to make improvements next time.

events.name: Encountered a neighbor and learned that Aunt Chen was hospitalized.
events.description: When Yin Hao was about to go out to take out the trash, he ran into the son of Aunt Chen from across the hall in the corridor. The young man had just returned from the hospital to fetch some items and looked exhausted. After Yin Hao took the initiative to inquire, he learned that Aunt Chen had been urgently admitted to the hospital the previous day (February 17) due to a sudden acute appendicitis and had already undergone surgery. She is currently recovering at Songjiang District Central Hospital. Aunt Chen’s son was worried because he was busy with work during the day and there was a shortage of caregivers.

events.name: Decide to offer assistance
events.description: Upon hearing this news, Yin Hao was deeply moved. He recalled Aunt Chen's usual care for him, such as sharing home-cooked dishes and offering warm words of concern. Reflecting on his own journey of working alone in Shanghai, with his parents far away in their hometown, the sentiment that "a close neighbor is better than a distant relative" welled up in his heart. Without much hesitation, he decided to offer some assistance within his means.

events.name: Contact Aunt Chen's son and propose caregiving support.
events.description: Yin Hao contacted Aunt Chen's son via WeChat to express his concern. Considering his flexible lunch breaks and after-work hours on weekdays, he proactively offered to help at the hospital during these times over the next few days. He suggested tasks like fetching water, buying meals, and keeping Aunt Chen company through conversation, aiming to ease the daytime caregiving burden. Aunt Chen's son gratefully accepted the offer.

events.name: Plan the visitation arrangements for the next few days.
events.description: After communicating with Aunt Chen's son, Yin Hao checked his work schedule. He planned to start from February 19th and visit Aunt Chen at Songjiang District Central Hospital during his lunch breaks for several consecutive days. He checked the distance and travel time from the company to the hospital on a map app to ensure the plan was feasible and would not affect his normal work in the afternoon.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Ordinary Mind

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Concerned and with a sense of responsibility, thinking about how to properly help the neighbor.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yin Hao began to put his plan to help his neighbors into action, making his first hospital visit during his lunch break. At the same time, he engaged in endurance training through morning runs and decided to seek in-depth advice from his mentor. On this day, his emotions were intertwined between caring for others and contemplating his own future.

events.name: Improving Endurance for Morning Runs
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a 9-kilometer morning run, maintaining a steady pace of around 6 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer. He felt an improvement in his aerobic endurance, with reduced post-run fatigue, which he attributed to the strength training he recently incorporated.

events.name: First Lunch Break Hospital Visit
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao rode his electric bike to the Central Hospital in Songjiang District. He first went downstairs to buy a fruit basket, then found Aunt Chen’s ward. Aunt Chen had just undergone surgery and was still somewhat listless. She was both surprised and touched to see Yin Hao. He stayed with her for a while, mostly listening to her talk, and helped pour water and peel an apple for her. After about 40 minutes, he realized Aunt Chen needed rest, so he said goodbye and hurried back to work.

events.name: Decided to consult Master Sun Jianguo for career planning advice.
events.description: During the day at work, Yin Hao was somewhat distracted while handling a minor programming issue, repeatedly pondering the bottlenecks in his career development, the pressure of obtaining an advanced technician certificate, and the practical difficulties of settling down in Shanghai. He felt the need for guidance from someone with experience. On his way home from work, he decided to seek advice from his most trusted mentor, Sun Jianguo, during the next day's lunch break. In his mind, he outlined several specific questions: How to balance work with intensive exam preparation? What are the career ceilings for technical workers? How realistic is it to purchase a home in the surrounding areas of Shanghai?

events.name: Preparing for meal delivery
events.description: Considering that Aunt Chen needs nutrition after her surgery and the hospital meals might not suit her taste, Yin Hao decided to start making soup himself and bring it to her tomorrow. After work, he made a special detour to the fresh supermarket near his residential area, purchasing ingredients suitable for making soup, such as pork ribs, corn, and carrots, as well as some easily digestible fruits. In the evening, he cleaned and prepared the ingredients, planning to start making the soup early the next morning.

events.name: Late return from a casual friend gathering
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao received a WeChat message from his childhood friend Zhang Wei, inviting him to play online games. They played several rounds of "Honor of Kings" and got so engrossed in their conversation that Yin Hao stayed up later than usual, which affected his plan to wake up early the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: With a clear plan and a hint of apprehension.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Feeling grounded for having helped others, yet somewhat burdened by thoughts of my own future.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a slightly stronger wind in the afternoon.

2025-02.daily_overview: For Yin Hao, this day marked a significant milestone in terms of emotional support and professional inspiration. The profound conversation with his mentor resolved some of the confusion in his mind and provided him with invaluable life lessons. Meanwhile, he persisted with strength training and theoretical study, and officially began preparing and delivering nutritious meals for his neighbors.

events.name: Stew and deliver pork rib soup for Aunt Chen.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao got up half an hour earlier than usual and began simmering the ingredients for the pork rib soup he had prepared the night before in a clay pot. At noon, he hurried to the hospital with the rib soup and rice packed in a thermal container. When Aunt Chen saw the steaming homemade soup, her eyes grew slightly moist. Yin Hao helped her set up the small table, watched her drink the soup, and conveyed greetings from other neighbors. This visit felt more relaxed than yesterday's, and he had a clearer sense of what to do.

events.name: In-depth discussion on career planning with Master Sun Jianguo.
events.description: During the latter half of the lunch break, Yin Hao and his mentor, Sun Jianguo, sat down in a corner of the cafeteria. Yin Hao candidly shared his stress and confusion about the future. Drawing from his own experience of coming to Shanghai from Anhui and working hard for twenty years, Master Sun Jianguo offered thoughtful advice. He affirmed Yin Hao’s goal of obtaining an advanced technician certificate, emphasizing that deepening technical expertise is the foundation for a stable career. Regarding buying a home, he advised Yin Hao not to rush but to focus on steadily improving his skills and income while making long-term savings plans. He also shared how he had stood out by participating in skill competitions in the past. This conversation left Yin Hao feeling enlightened, and their mentor-apprentice relationship transcended the professional level.

events.name: Evening Strength Training
events.description: After work, Yin Hao engaged in 40 minutes of strength training, focusing on strengthening his lower body and core. He tried heavier bodyweight exercises, such as squats and lunges, and felt his muscle strength steadily improving.

events.name: Study the "Safety Electricity Regulations" and conduct a comprehensive review.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao studied the final section of the "Safe Electricity Usage Regulations" as planned, titled "Electric Shock First Aid and Fire Prevention," carefully noting down the cardiopulmonary resuscitation method and the principles for extinguishing electrical fires. Afterward, he reviewed and summarized the theoretical courses of both "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering" and the "Safe Electricity Usage Regulations," connecting the key points to construct a preliminary knowledge framework.

events.name: Record the master's suggestions and make preliminary plans.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao reviewed the conversation with his mentor and noted down the key advice in his notebook: "Technology as the foundation, competitions as opportunities, and patience in buying a house." He began to consider adjusting his savings plan and pondered the skills competition his mentor mentioned, deciding to look into relevant information later.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Busy but with clear goals

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Suddenly enlightened, filled with gratitude and renewed motivation

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with light rain at night.

2025-02.daily_overview: Friday marked the concluding phase of theoretical learning. Yin Hao completed his morning running rhythm training and comprehensive assessment, and began conducting more specific research for his next-stage career goals. At the same time, recent additional expenses prompted him to seriously contemplate the importance of systematic financial management.

events.name: Morning Run Rhythm Training
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a 10-kilometer tempo run, increasing his pace to around 6 minutes and 10 seconds per kilometer. He felt an improvement in his running economy, which he attributed to strength training, and experienced reduced muscle soreness after the run.

events.name: Complete the "Comprehensive Test on Electrical Engineering and Safety"
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao spent two hours seriously and meticulously completing the "Electrical and Safety Comprehensive Test" released by the online training platform. He carefully reviewed the questions and answered them using the knowledge he had acquired over the past two weeks. After submitting the test, he immediately checked his score (86 points) and the detailed explanations. He analyzed the incorrect answers to prepare himself theoretically for potential hands-on learning in the future.

events.name: Query information on applying for the Senior Technician Certificate.
events.description: After the test, Yin Hao turned to inquire about his primary career goal. He logged onto the website of the Shanghai Vocational Skills Appraisal and Guidance Center to check in detail the application requirements for the Advanced CNC Machine Tool Operation Technician Certificate, the annual exam schedules, designated training institutions, and approximate costs. He also saved useful webpage links and took screenshots of the information.

events.name: Realizing the need for systematic financial management
events.description: While keeping accounts, Yin Hao summarized the additional expenses incurred this week, including purchasing ingredients for Aunt Chen and transportation costs for trips to and from the hospital, totaling approximately 300 yuan. At the same time, he remembered that the rental contract was about to expire. These unexpected expenses and the potential increase in fixed costs made him realize that his current fragmented method of bookkeeping was no longer sufficient to address future major goals, such as buying a house or obtaining certifications. He decided that it was necessary to establish a more systematic and proactive financial planning tool.

events.name: Contact with fellow angler Wu Zhiqiang
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao sent a WeChat message to his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang: "Brother Wu, the weather looks decent this weekend. How about heading to Dianshan Lake for a couple of casts? Same spot as usual?" He soon received a positive reply. He planned to use the weekend fishing trip to unwind from the stress that had built up over the week.

events.name: Brief emotional downturn due to work pressure.
events.description: During the day at work, a small error occurred in a precision parts processing task, requiring Yin Hao to work overtime to make adjustments. This left him feeling somewhat frustrated and stressed, but he managed to alleviate these feelings by taking deep breaths and communicating with his colleagues.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, while also carrying the relief of completing the study phase.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: I am satisfied with the completion of the theoretical study phase and am beginning to mentally prepare for financial planning.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny to cloudy, suitable for outdoor activities

2025-02.daily_overview: Saturday followed the typical rhythm of a rest day, with socializing, hobbies, and long-distance running training interspersed throughout. Yin Hao strengthened his bond with comrades through online gaming, invited colleagues to share new hobbies, and gained practical knowledge through work observations, making his life both fulfilling and relaxed.

events.name: Weekend Long-Distance Training Run
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao attempted his first 12-kilometer long-distance run, completing it along the greenway of Songjiang New City. He maintained a pace of around 6 minutes and 25 seconds per kilometer. After finishing, he felt a significant improvement in his endurance, though his legs were slightly fatigued. He plans to focus on proper recovery.

events.name: Observe Machine Tool Fault Troubleshooting
events.description: In the morning (the company had some equipment maintenance and inspection tasks scheduled for Saturday), a CNC machine in the workshop triggered an alarm and shut down. Yin Hao voluntarily stayed behind to observe, following the entire troubleshooting process alongside his mentor Sun Jianguo and Liu Zhiqiang, who was responsible for programming. He carefully observed how they combined the alarm code, listened for abnormal noises during machine operation, and inspected electrical circuits and mechanical components to gradually pinpoint the issue (ultimately discovering a loose sensor wire). This experience gave him a firsthand understanding of the theoretical concept of "fault diagnosis."

events.name: I communicated with the master again during the lunch break.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao and his mentor had a simple meal in the cafeteria. He once again expressed gratitude for his mentor's guidance a few days ago and shared the information he had found about the certification exam. Master Sun encouraged him to sign up early and reminded him to practice more for the hands-on part. The exchange between the mentor and apprentice became more natural and in-depth.

events.name: Invite colleague Wang Lei to your home to taste hand-brewed coffee.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao invited his close colleague Wang Lei to his home. He operated his newly purchased coffee equipment with a somewhat clumsy but earnest effort, brewing a cup of Yirgacheffe for Wang Lei. Though his technique was still unrefined, resulting in a slightly over-extracted coffee, Wang Lei’s encouragement and the relaxed atmosphere—chatting about amusing work stories and sharing gaming tips over their drinks—made the experience enjoyable. Wang Lei jokingly suggested that next time he would bring some high-quality beans to "challenge" Yin Hao’s brewing skills.

events.name: Playing online games with comrade Zhang Jianguo.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into "Honor of Kings" as promised with his comrade-in-arms Zhang Jianguo, who was in Hangzhou, and played several rounds of ranked matches together. They communicated tactics through in-game voice chat, coordinated seamlessly, and won more games than they lost. After the game, they chatted for over twenty minutes on WeChat voice call. Zhang Jianguo shared new insights from the fitness industry, while Yin Hao talked about helping his neighbor and having a deep conversation with his mentor. They teased each other and encouraged one another.

events.name: Organize fishing gear and plan financial templates.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao checked and organized his fishing gear for the next day. Afterward, he turned on his computer and began searching for Excel templates for personal financial management. Considering his ISTJ personality, which favors structure and control, he initially decided to draw inspiration from the templates but customize them to his needs. He also briefly outlined several major expense categories and savings goal frameworks.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relax and look forward to a day of leisure and socializing.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and content, with social needs fully satisfied.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with gentle sunshine and light winds.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yin Hao enjoyed a perfect day of outdoor leisure. He shared the early spring fishing fun with his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang at Dianshan Lake, and efficiently completed his exam preparation tasks in the evening. On the eve of the Lantern Festival, he also specially prepared tangyuan for a video call with his brother, reflecting his emphasis on family bonds.

events.name: Fishing at Dianshan Lake with Angler Wu Zhiqiang
events.description: On Saturday morning, Yin Hao drove his family car to the agreed meeting point by the shore of Dianshan Lake, where he was to meet Wu Zhiqiang. The weather was warming up, and the fish were becoming more active. The two chose a sheltered, sunny cove to cast their lines, chatting as they fished. Brother Wu shared updates about his recent auto repair shop business, while Yin Hao talked about his work and plans to obtain certifications. The afternoon was quite fruitful—they caught several crucian carp and bream, signaling a promising start to the new fishing season.

events.name: Complete the first senior technician mock exam.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao logged into the vocational skills training online platform and completed the first set of theoretical simulation exams for senior technicians in CNC machine tools. He strictly timed his answers and felt that the questions were quite challenging, especially the sections on complex process planning. After submission, the system scored him 78 points and generated a detailed error report. He quickly reviewed it and found that "precision compensation" and "complex part programming" were his weak areas.

events.name: Purchase Tangyuan for the Lantern Festival
events.description: Tomorrow is the Lantern Festival. After work, Yin Hao made a special trip to the supermarket. He stood in front of the freezer for a while, carefully selecting, and finally bought black sesame tangyuan, which both he and his older brother Yin Tao enjoy, as well as a pack of peanut-filled ones. He plans to cook them tomorrow evening and share the moment with his brother over a video call.

events.name: Having lunch with fishing buddies and organizing fishing gear.
events.description: After the fishing activity, Yin Hao and Wu Zhiqiang had lunch at a frequently visited farmhouse restaurant by the lake, enjoying fresh lake delicacies. After the meal, they each returned home. Upon arriving home, Yin Hao carefully cleaned and air-dried the fishing gear, checked the fishing line for any signs of wear, and put all the items back in their proper places.

events.name: Returned late from fishing and went to bed early.
events.description: Since fishing took a considerable amount of time, Yin Hao returned home quite late. However, to adjust his daily routine, he chose to go to bed early to ensure he would be in good working condition the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Filled with anticipation for outdoor activities.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and slightly weary, the tranquility of fishing intertwines with the sense of fulfillment from learning.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a visible full moon at night.

2025-02.daily_overview: The Lantern Festival fell on a workday. Yin Hao started his day with a morning run, focusing on work and exam preparation during the day. In the evening, he gained important emotional support from his family through a video call with his brother. He engaged in targeted study to address the issues revealed in the mock exams and formulated a final sprint plan. The festive atmosphere infused him with renewed motivation.

events.name: Morning Run on the Lantern Festival
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed an 11-kilometer morning run, exploring the greenway of Songjiang Central Park. He felt the tranquility of the holiday morning, maintaining a steady pace of 6 minutes and 15 seconds per kilometer, and felt refreshed after the run.

events.name: Analyze the mistakes in the mock exam and conduct targeted review.
events.description: Yin Hao carefully studied the error report from yesterday's mock exam. He pulled out the official textbook and training notes, focusing specifically on the two error-prone modules: "complex part programming" and "precision compensation." He revisited the programming logic for several typical parts and organized the key points for setting compensation parameters.

events.name: Independently complete the full process simulation exercise for part programming.
events.description: Utilizing his evening time, Yin Hao independently completed a full-process simulation exercise on paper, based on a typical stepped shaft part drawing from the textbook. This exercise spanned from process analysis and tool selection to manually writing CNC G-code. He documented his thoughts at each step and marked areas of uncertainty, planning to consult Master Sun during tomorrow's lunch break.

events.name: Video call with elder brother Yin Tao during the Lantern Festival.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao cooked tangyuan at home and set the table. He took the initiative to video call his older brother, Yin Tao. On both ends of the screen, the two brothers chatted about their plans for the new year while enjoying tangyuan. Yin Tao shared the latest developments in the car sales industry at the start of the year and inquired about his younger brother’s progress in preparing for the senior technician certification exam. Yin Hao, in turn, mentioned his experience of taking care of their neighbor, Aunt Chen. His brother praised him, saying, "You did the right thing. When you’re away from home, it’s important to look out for one another." Although the call lasted only half an hour, it was filled with emotional support and encouragement.

events.name: Develop a pre-exam intensive review plan.
events.description: After the video call, Yin Hao felt warm and empowered. Seizing the moment, he assessed the remaining study materials and time, and created a detailed one-month sprint review plan on his calendar, spanning from after the Lantern Festival until the day before the exam. The plan clearly outlined the daily theoretical review targets and key practical exercises to be completed.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a faint joy of the festival.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warm, steadfast, and full of motivation for exam preparation.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, with damp and cold weather.

2025-02.daily_overview: This day was filled with real-life challenges and decisions. Yin Hao received a rent increase notice from his landlord, which directly triggered his determination to establish a systematic financial management system. At the same time, he engaged in strength training, officially registered for the advanced technician examination, and provided his neighbor with one last meal delivery. The pressure of living costs and the pursuit of career goals simultaneously acted upon him, prompting him to become more pragmatic and organized.

events.name: Core and Lower Body Strength Training
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao completed a 45-minute strength training session, focusing on enhancing his squats and core stability. He feels that strength training has become a habit, and its supportive effect on running is evident.

events.name: Received notice of rent increase from the landlord.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao officially received a message on WeChat from his landlord Li Xiuying (Sister Li), notifying him that the monthly rent would increase from 3,000 yuan to 3,200 yuan after the lease expired and inquiring about his intention to renew the lease. Although he had anticipated it, seeing the specific figure still brought a wave of pressure to Yin Hao. He did not reply immediately but instead began to quickly calculate the additional expense in his mind.

events.name: Query market rental rates and assess moving costs.
events.description: Yin Hao opened several rental apps and carefully checked the rental prices for properties in the same area around Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District, with similar layouts and renovations. He confirmed that 3,200 yuan per month fell within the current reasonable market range. Next, he calculated the potential costs of moving in detail: a one-month rent as an agency fee, the deposit for the new rental, the cost of hiring a moving company, as well as the time and effort he would have to spend taking time off work. In comparison, the economic and time costs of moving were higher.

events.name: Review the finances and make a decision on lease renewal.
events.description: Yin Hao took out his ledger and reviewed his current savings progress (target for down payment on a house) and monthly income and expenses. He assessed the impact of an additional 200 yuan in monthly rent on his savings plan (an extra 2,400 yuan per year). After some practical consideration, he concluded that renewing the lease was a more stable and cost-effective choice. Although his expenses increased, it helped him avoid uncertainties and larger short-term expenditures.

events.name: Complete the registration for the Senior Technician Examination.
events.description: In the midst of handling rent-related matters, Yin Hao logged into the vocational skill certification website. Following the process he had researched a few days earlier, he completed the formal registration for the advanced CNC machine tool operator technician certificate exam, paid the exam fee online, and downloaded and printed his admission ticket. Looking at his information and the exam date on the ticket, he felt his goal had become more concrete and urgent.

events.name: The last meal delivery for Aunt Chen and understanding the discharge arrangements.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao visited the hospital as usual. He learned that Aunt Chen was recovering well and would be discharged tomorrow. As this was the last day of his planned meal deliveries, he had prepared a particularly hearty meal and inquired in detail about the precautions to take after discharge. He also mentioned that she could contact him anytime if she needed help moving her belongings.

events.name: Develop and begin implementing a half marathon training plan.
events.description: In the evening, to alleviate the slight frustration caused by the rent issue, Yin Hao decided to take action. Based on his half-marathon goal and his current running foundation, he created a detailed training plan for March on a running app, which included three tempo runs per week and one long, slow distance run on weekends. At the same time, he checked his running shoes and noticed they were quite worn out, so he placed an online order for a new pair of professional running shoes.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Ordinary mind

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Feeling the pressure of reality, but after making a decision, the mindset tends to become pragmatic and resolute.

date_attribute.weather: It's cloudy with a low temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yin Hao efficiently handled multiple tasks: he properly helped his neighbor with hospital discharge, finalized the lease renewal with the landlord and resolved housing maintenance issues, while also going for a morning run to explore new routes and receiving an important new goal from his mentor to participate in a vocational skills competition. In the evening, he began building the long-planned personal financial management system.

events.name: Morning Run Exploring New Routes
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao tried a new running route, jogging from Guangfulin Road to the outskirts of Thames Town, completing a 13-kilometer morning run. He enjoyed the thrill of exploration, maintaining a steady pace of 6 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer, feeling his endurance had further improved.

events.name: Help Aunt Chen with the discharge procedures and escort her home.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao specifically took half a day off to go to the hospital and help Aunt Chen with her discharge procedures. He then drove her and her belongings safely back home. He helped carry her things upstairs, settled her in, and only left after confirming that Aunt Chen had family members to take care of her. Aunt Chen was deeply moved and held his hand, expressing her gratitude with many heartfelt words.

events.name: Proactively contact the landlord to confirm lease renewal and report maintenance issues.
events.description: After a night of consideration, Yin Hao took the initiative to contact the landlord, Sister Li, via WeChat voice call. He clearly expressed his acceptance of the new rent and willingness to renew the lease for another year, while politely inquiring whether the rent could remain stable for the upcoming year. Taking this opportunity, he also reported the issue of unstable water flow from the showerhead in the bathroom, hoping that the landlord could arrange for repairs. Sister Li readily agreed to the request for stable rent and immediately contacted a repair technician.

events.name: Follow up on house maintenance.
events.description: In the afternoon, the repairman arrived at the scheduled time, and Yin Hao waited at home. The repairman quickly replaced the valve core of the showerhead, resolving the issue. Yin Hao observed and learned from the process. After the repair was completed, Yin Hao paid the small fee in advance and provided feedback to Sister Li via WeChat. They agreed to sign the new contract over the weekend.

events.name: Record expenses for helping neighbors
events.description: Yin Hao organized the receipts from the past week for purchasing ingredients for Aunt Chen and the additional fuel expenses. He entered the total cost of approximately 300 yuan into his mobile accounting app, categorizing it as "Social Interactions/Assistance." Realizing this unexpected expenditure, he became even more determined to establish an emergency reserve fund.

events.name: Learned about the vocational skills competition information from the master.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao had a conversation with his mentor, Sun Jianguo, and learned for the first time that a manufacturing vocational skills competition would be held in Shanghai in the second half of the year, with the CNC milling group being particularly suitable for him. Master Sun encouraged him to sign up, believing it was a great opportunity to learn through competition and broaden his horizons. Yin Hao inquired in detail about the competition content and previous years’ question types, and Master Sun agreed to help him find some training materials.

events.name: Start building the framework for a personal financial management system.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao opened Excel on his computer and began formally building the financial template. He divided it into core sections such as "Income," "Fixed Expenses (rent, utilities, commuting)," "Variable Expenses (dining, social activities, hobbies)," "Emergency Fund," and "Special Savings (home purchase, certification exams, travel)," and set preliminary monthly budget limits.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Methodical and prepared to handle multiple tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: A sense of accomplishment, multiple tasks have been implemented, and excitement about the new goal (skills competition).

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with strong winds and a cold feel.

2025-02.daily_overview: Yin Hao's life returned to a stable rhythm centered around exam preparation and training. He completed the final stages of theoretical review and achieved a breakthrough in his running, significantly boosting his confidence in his physical fitness. At the same time, he also focused on new interpersonal relationships and career goals, with a clear main direction in life and rich side pursuits.

events.name: Jog 12 kilometers, experience the improvement of aerobic endurance.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao completed a 12-kilometer slow run along his familiar route of Guangfulin Road - Chenhua Road - Longteng Road. He deliberately controlled his pace at around 6 minutes and 15 seconds per kilometer. After finishing, his breathing was even, and he felt that his aerobic endurance had significantly improved compared to the beginning of the month. This has built his confidence for increasing his running volume in the next phase.

events.name: Complete the comprehensive review of advanced technician theory and the final mock exam.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao made a final push in the theoretical review phase of preparing for the senior technician exam. He quickly reviewed all his notes and the key points marked in the textbooks, then compiled the mistakes from several mock exams taken during the week into an electronic document. Finally, he completed a comprehensive mock exam, achieving a stable score of around 80 points, which met his expectations and laid a theoretical foundation for the subsequent practical preparation.

events.name: Visiting Aunt Chen During Her Recovery
events.description: After running home and taking a shower, Yin Hao brought some fruits to visit Aunt Chen next door. Aunt Chen was in much better spirits and could already get out of bed and move around slowly. She insisted on giving Yin Hao a bag of red dates she had brought from her hometown, reminding him to take good care of himself while living alone. The neighborly relationship became especially warm because of this incident.

events.name: Plan for emergency reserve funds
events.description: Reflecting on this experience of helping his neighbor, Yin Hao particularly emphasized the importance of an "emergency fund" account in the financial template he was building. He decided that after receiving his monthly salary, he would first transfer a fixed amount of 500 yuan to this account to handle unexpected expenses such as social obligations, minor emergency repairs, or medical costs.

events.name: Receive the skills competition materials provided by the master.
events.description: During a break in the day, Master Sun handed a USB drive to Yin Hao, which contained some training questions and scoring criteria for the CNC milling group from recent manufacturing vocational skills competitions. Master Sun briefly pointed out a few of the challenges. Yin Hao felt as if he had found a treasure and decided to start studying these materials during his spare time while preparing for the senior technician certification.

events.name: Staying up late due to intense focus on studying
events.description: During the evening review, Yin Hao spent too much time delving into a particular technical difficulty, which led to staying up later than planned, but the gains were substantial.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, with a clear plan

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and confident, the dual progress in physical fitness and learning brings a sense of satisfaction.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-02.daily_overview: On the last day of February, Yin Hao conducted summaries and plans across multiple areas. He achieved a breakthrough in his morning run and completed strength training, refined the newly established financial management system, and took the first step toward new hobbies and professional challenges. This day was filled with a sense of continuity and transition, reflecting his proactive control and systematic planning of life.

events.name: Morning run breaks through 14 kilometers.
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao met up with his running partner Chen Jie outside the Songjiang Sports Center and completed a 14-kilometer long-distance run, which was his longest single run to date. As they ran, they exchanged training experiences. Yin Hao shared the benefits he had gained from strength training, while Chen Jie suggested he continue to improve his endurance. After the run, he felt a significant improvement in his physical fitness, laying a solid foundation for his half-marathon training.

events.name: Systematic strength training
events.description: After work, Yin Hao performed a 30-minute systematic strength training session at home, including core, lower body, and upper body exercises. He focused on the quality of his movements, supplemented with protein after the workout, and felt an overall improvement in his posture.

events.name: Review February training and adjust the plan for next month
events.description: Yin Hao reviewed his running logs for the entire month of February and compared the data. He confirmed that his longest single run had steadily increased from 8 kilometers before the Spring Festival to 14 kilometers, with no physical injuries. Based on his current progress and suggestions from fellow runners, he made slight adjustments to his March training plan on the running app, adding a weekly interval running session. He also decided to continue with his twice-weekly strength training sessions.

events.name: Improve and test the personal financial management system.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao entered all the income and expenditure data for February into an Excel financial template, testing the classification summary and formula calculation functions. He researched and set up automatic transfer rules for online banking: on the 10th of each month, which is payday, priority is given to transferring fixed amounts for housing savings, certification exam savings, and emergency funds into their respective accounts. He also wrote a simple operational guide for himself and decided to conduct a financial review every Sunday evening.

events.name: Encouraged by fellow anglers, I signed up for the fishing competition.
events.description: While chatting on WeChat with his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang, Brother Wu mentioned that there would be a casual fishing competition at Dianshan Lake next month and encouraged Yin Hao to join. Finding it interesting, Yin Hao officially registered through the link shared by Brother Wu and carefully reviewed the competition rules, target fish species, as well as the time and location. This added a touch of competitive fun to his regular fishing hobby.

events.name: Preliminary Research Skills Competition Topics
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao opened the USB drive given by Master Sun and browsed some of the programming and technical competition questions from the skills competition. The difficulty of the questions was indeed higher than that of the senior technician exam, placing greater emphasis on innovation and efficiency optimization. He selected a relatively simple question and attempted to outline a technical solution on paper, finding it both challenging and intriguing.

events.name: Prepare for March Matters
events.description: Yin Hao marked several key dates on his phone calendar: March 1st (weekend fishing), March 10th (payday, initiate automatic savings), mid-March (advanced technician practical training course begins), as well as his fixed weekly schedule for running, studying, and gaming. He now has a clear framework for the upcoming month of March.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of vitality, ready to embrace the summary and planning at the end of the month.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Systematic and organized, with a strong sense of control and anticipation for the rhythm of future life.

state.今日运动: Morning run 14 kilometers, strength training 30 minutes.

date_attribute.weather: Clear skies, temperatures are rising, and there is still a chill in the early spring morning.

2025-03.daily_overview: Yin Hao ushered in the first Sunday of March, with his life centered around his interests and future plans. He not only made a final sprint in preparation for the upcoming fishing competition but also took the first step in learning foundational skills. Additionally, he completed the online registration for a half marathon, making his day both fulfilling and well-organized.

events.name: Select the target event and follow the registration.
events.description: After consistent training in the earlier stages, Yin Hao felt that his endurance had improved. Taking advantage of the morning hours, he once again checked the race calendars for the Shanghai International Marathon and several half-marathons in nearby cities. Ultimately, he decided to make this year’s autumn Shanghai International Marathon his primary goal. He noted the registration opening time announced on the official website and set a reminder on his phone to ensure he wouldn’t miss it.

events.name: Purchase upgraded fishing tackle accessories
events.description: Following the advice from seasoned angler Brother Wu last week, Yin Hao drove to a familiar fishing tackle shop in Songjiang District in the afternoon. He explained to the shop owner about the upcoming competition and the target fish species (crucian carp and carp). Based on the owner’s recommendations, he purchased several types of commercial bait specifically designed for these fish, a few additives to adjust the bait’s texture, and a set of more sensitive date pit-shaped floats. He carefully checked the concentricity of the floats to ensure their quality.

events.name: Organize and inspect the tackle box.
events.description: After returning home with his purchases, Yin Hao spread out his fishing gear box on the living room floor. He meticulously checked each fishing line for any damage, ensured the hooks were sharp, and verified that the space beans and lead seat were intact. He then sorted the newly bought bait and additives into separate compartments of his bait box. He even took extra care to individually package several spare line sets that might be needed during the competition, showcasing the meticulousness and organization characteristic of his ISTJ personality.
