events.name: Exchanging Cross-Border Techniques with Fishing Enthusiast Brother Wu
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took the initiative to invite Brother Wu to meet at a teahouse near the residential area. As they sipped tea, the conversation naturally shifted from fishing to their respective professions. Brother Wu talked about the complex circuit issues he recently encountered while repairing new energy vehicles. Listening intently, Yin Hao suddenly drew an analogy to the control logic of servo systems in CNC machine tools, suggesting, "Perhaps we could apply PID adjustment principles to analyze circuit stability." Brother Wu’s eyes lit up, finding this perspective refreshing, and he mentioned that many precision automotive components, such as steering knuckles, are also manufactured using CNC machine tools, highlighting the underlying technical similarities between the two fields. This conversation made Yin Hao realize that his professional knowledge had broader associative potential.

events.name: Sign up for the fishing competition
events.description: After parting ways with Brother Wu, Yin Hao returned home and immediately opened WeChat. Brother Wu had already sent over the official registration link and detailed rules for the Dianshan Lake Spring Leisure Fishing Competition. Yin Hao carefully read through the competition schedule, location, rules, and fees, and after confirming everything was correct, he completed the online registration and payment through the link. He then thanked Brother Wu on WeChat, and the two agreed to refine their strategy together before the competition.

events.name: Complete the registration for the Low Voltage Electrician Certificate.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao organized his ID card, academic certificates, and other materials, then visited the website of the Shanghai Vocational Skill Appraisal Center to complete the online registration and payment for the Low-Voltage Electrician Operation Certificate. The system indicated that the study materials and exam syllabus would be mailed to his address later. The successful registration made him feel that another plan to enhance his professional safety boundaries had been realized.

events.name: Daily Running and Communication
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao still insisted on his 6-kilometer morning run, following the route from Guangfulin Road to the outer perimeter of the Guangfulin Archaeological Site Park. After stretching post-run, he briefly chatted with Chen Jie via WeChat about the idea of adding strength training next week. Before going to bed, he had a short video call with his mother, Wang Xiuying, to reassure her of his well-being and listened to her nagging about adding clothes in the morning and evening.

events.name: Temporarily working overtime to handle work documents.
events.description: In the evening, I received a notification from the company requiring the urgent compilation of a batch of equipment maintenance reports. Yin Hao stayed up until 23:30 to complete the task, disrupting his original plan to go to bed early.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight anticipation for the start of planning for the new month.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and slightly rewarding, but feeling a bit tired due to staying up late.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast with a light breeze in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: This Sunday was dedicated to intense training and deep recovery. Yin Hao challenged himself to his longest run ever, and the resulting muscle soreness became an opportunity for him to learn scientific recovery methods. At the same time, he also began preliminary planning and preparation for the vocational skills competition.

events.name: Learn basic vehicle maintenance knowledge
events.description: Inspired by his conversation with Wu Ge about cars yesterday, Yin Hao, while waiting for his body to fully wake up before his morning run, pulled out the maintenance manual from the glove compartment and searched online for "key points of spring maintenance for family cars." He gained a basic understanding of topics such as oil specifications and replacement mileage, how to check tire wear and pressure, and the replacement cycle for air filters. He felt that these practical skills aligned well with his personality, which enjoys delving into details.

events.name: First 12-kilometer long-distance training session
events.description: At nine in the morning, after warming up, Yin Hao set off from Guangfulin Road to begin his planned 12-kilometer endurance run. He maintained a strict pace of approximately 5 minutes and 45 seconds per kilometer, passing through the university town and several ecological parks along the route. The first half of the run felt manageable, but during the final three kilometers, his thigh and glute muscles began to feel heavy and sore, and his breathing grew labored. Gritting his teeth, he pushed through to the finish. When he finally stopped, his workout clothes were soaked with sweat, and the soreness in his thigh muscles was particularly pronounced.

events.name: Learn Professional Recovery Techniques from Fellow Runners
events.description: After the run, Yin Hao arranged to meet his running buddy and fitness coach, Chen Jie, at a convenience store next to the sports center. After listening to Yin Hao describe his symptoms, Chen Jie had him perform a few simple movement tests and concluded that it was typical muscle micro-damage and tension after long-distance running. Chen Jie then taught him a set of dynamic stretches targeting the hamstrings, quadriceps, and calves, along with several key static stretching exercises. He also highly recommended using a foam roller for myofascial release.

events.name: Purchase and use a foam roller.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao placed an online order for a medium-firm foam roller and opted for same-day delivery. When it arrived that evening, he immediately followed the instructional video sent by Chen Jie and gave it a try. As he rolled his body weight over it, the sore, aching sensation in the front of his thighs made him grimace. However, after a few minutes of rolling, the stiffness in his muscles did ease somewhat. He realized that recovery is just as important as training.

events.name: Try alternating between hot and cold showers.
events.description: During his shower, Yin Hao tried the recovery method introduced by Chen Jie for the first time: first, he rinsed his entire body with warm water, then adjusted the water to a hot temperature (as much as he could tolerate) and focused the stream on his legs for about 30 seconds. Immediately after, he switched to slightly cooler water (not ice-cold) and rinsed for 20 seconds. He repeated this cycle three times. Under the alternating hot and cold stimulation, the skin on his legs turned red, but after stepping out of the bathroom, the deep-seated soreness seemed to be replaced by a sense of relaxed fatigue.

events.name: Preliminary Planning for Skills Competition Preparation
events.description: In the evening, after his physical discomfort had slightly eased, Yin Hao sat at his desk. He simultaneously spread out the exam syllabus for the senior technician certificate and the technical documents from last year's vocational skills competition, beginning to compare their overlaps and differences. In his notebook, he initially divided the content into sections such as "common theoretical parts," "programming challenges unique to the competition," and "precision challenges in practical operations." He also drafted a preliminary plan for time allocation over the next three months, feeling that the path for tackling both tasks simultaneously had become somewhat clearer.

events.name: Discuss competition ideas with the master.
events.description: Using WeChat, Yin Hao briefly reported his feelings after today's long-distance run to his mentor Sun Jianguo and took the opportunity to express his desire to sign up for the annual vocational skills competition, seeking his mentor's opinion. Sun Jianguo quickly replied, his voice filled with approval. He analyzed in detail the benefits of the competition for Yin Hao's technical improvement and industry visibility, shared the experiences and lessons of two previous participants, and clearly expressed his support, promising to provide more targeted guidance in practical work. This response strengthened Yin Hao's determination to participate in the competition.

events.name: Friends gathering and returning late.
events.description: Gao Zhiyuan spontaneously invited people to go to KTV to sing in the evening. Yin Hao relaxed and participated, returning home as late as 23:45, which resulted in insufficient sleep.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, ready to embrace the training challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted but mentally sharp, I've learned new things and feel both pressure and excitement about the upcoming challenges (the competition, the half marathon).

state.今日运动: 12-kilometer long-distance running, foam roller fascia relaxation

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with scattered light rain in the evening.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Monday, Yin Hao returned to work and took on a challenging precision machining task. Meanwhile, he used his after-work hours to make final desk preparations and technical adjustments for the weekend fishing competition.

events.name: Pre-fishing preparations after work.
events.description: Returning home from work, Yin Hao didn't even take a moment to rest. He immediately spread open his notebook on the desk, which contained several competition bait formulas shared by Wu Ge. Drawing on his past fishing experience at Dianshan Lake, he made slight adjustments to one of the formulas—"primarily grain-scented with a hint of fishy aroma"—by increasing the proportion of local fermented rice grains slightly. He meticulously recorded the ratios of all the ingredients. Next, he took out his fishing rod, checked the guides for any signs of wear, wiped down the rod body, and replaced the mainline and leader on his competition rod with brand-new ones that had higher tensile strength. He also tied several sets of spare hooks.

events.name: Receive precision bearing housing machining task.
events.description: As soon as the morning shift began, team leader Wang Lei handed a batch of nearly a hundred precision bearing housing machining drawings to Yin Hao. These were critical components for high-precision transmission equipment, with extremely stringent requirements for coaxiality of the inner bore and end face runout. Yin Hao carefully reviewed the process cards and technical specifications before seeking out programmer Liu Zhiqiang (Engineer Liu). The two of them leaned over the drawings, discussing for nearly half an hour, focusing on analyzing machining challenges such as root clearance at the stepped inner bore and deformation prevention in thin-walled sections, as well as control methods for key dimensions. Once everything was confirmed, Yin Hao went to the tool library to collect a new fine boring tool head and a series of measuring instruments.

events.name: First Trial Processing and Problem Troubleshooting
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao clamped the blank on the machine tool, called up the preliminary program compiled by Engineer Liu, and began the first trial machining. Engineer Liu also stood by to observe. After the machining was completed, Yin Hao removed the part, and the two used a dial indicator and a roughness tester for inspection. The results showed that the coaxiality of the inner hole was 0.005 millimeters off from the drawing requirements. "It might be due to insufficient spindle preheating or tiny chips on the fixture base," Yin Hao analyzed. They cleaned the fixture, let the machine idle for ten minutes to preheat, while Engineer Liu made slight adjustments and optimizations to the tool path for the fine boring operation in the program. After the second trial machining, the inspection results fully met the requirements. The two exchanged a smile and finalized the machining plan.

events.name: Adjusting to an Early Bedtime Due to Fatigue
events.description: Staying up late the previous night left him feeling unwell, so Yin Hao canceled his original study plan for the evening and went to bed early at 22:00 to regain his energy.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: The weariness from the weekend hasn't fully dissipated, but thoughts of the new week's work and competition preparations still lift my spirits.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Calm yet focused, work challenges are resolved, and fishing preparations are steadily advancing.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yin Hao put his efforts into practice across multiple areas: he personally prepared competition bait, formally submitted the application form for the vocational skills competition, and initiated the batch processing of high-precision parts. Each step was taken with solidity and determination.

events.name: First-time preparation of competition bait
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao cleared a space in the kitchen and, like conducting a chemical experiment, precisely measured various commercial baits, conditioners, and additives using a measuring cup and an electronic scale according to the adjusted formula from the previous day. He slowly added an appropriate amount of water, carefully stirring and kneading by hand to feel the bait's transformation from dry powder to a cohesive mass, eventually forming a ball of bait with moderate softness and excellent hook adhesion. He also performed several simulated casting and lifting actions in a bucket in the bathroom, observing the new float's standing speed and signal response in the water.

events.name: Formal registration for the annual vocational skills competition
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao logged onto the official website of the Shanghai Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau's Vocational Skills Competition using his phone. He found the CNC machine tool operator (CNC milling) competition category, carefully filled in his personal information, work experience, and contact details, and uploaded photos of his academic credentials and vocational qualification certificates. The moment he clicked submit, he felt his heart beat a little faster—this was no longer just an internal plan but a public commitment to compete.

events.name: Initiate batch processing of precision parts.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao began the formal batch processing of bearing housing parts according to the optimized procedures and techniques. He started the machine tool, set up the protective door, and then focused intently on the parameters and tool path displayed on the control panel. After every 25 parts were processed, he paused the machine, randomly selected one, measured the inner bore dimensions with a micrometer, inspected the surface with a roughness tester, and meticulously recorded the data on the process control sheet. The rhythmic sound of cutting in the workshop and his focused demeanor together formed a scene of stable production.

events.name: Temporary work overtime to catch up on the schedule.
events.description: Due to a minor malfunction during batch processing, Yin Hao worked overtime until 20:30 before leaving work, which compressed his personal time in the evening.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Clear goals, ready to embrace a fulfilling day.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Steady and full of action, several 'hands-on' tasks have been initially attempted, but the overtime work has left me feeling a bit tired.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, with a slight drop in temperature.

2025-03.daily_overview: Wednesday was a typical workday of multitasking. Yin Hao handled the sudden issue of tool wear during work breaks, and after work, he dedicated himself to refining his theoretical knowledge, financial management, and fishing techniques, demonstrating strong time management skills.

events.name: Learn the Basics of Electrical Schematic Diagrams
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao began his theoretical study for the low-voltage electrician certification. He opened the textbook and started with the most basic graphic symbols of common electrical components, such as switches, fuses, and contactor coils. He then attempted to read a few simple motor start-stop control schematic diagrams, sketching them on paper while studying, striving to understand the flow of current and the logical relationships between the components. For someone with military experience who was accustomed to reading mechanical drawings, this was a new form of abstract thinking training.

events.name: Review and Conclusion of Low Voltage Electrician Theory
events.description: After studying the new material, Yin Hao quickly reviewed his previous notes on safety regulations, electric shock first aid, and other topics. He closed his notebook, feeling that the entire knowledge framework had been constructed in his mind. Although some specific details, such as safety distances and current thresholds, still required repeated memorization, he felt about 60-70% confident about passing the theoretical exam.

events.name: Conduct the first financial review of March.
events.description: As a routine task at the beginning of the month, Yin Hao opened the Excel budget spreadsheet on his computer after dinner. He recorded all the expenses incurred in the first five days of March (including the fishing competition registration fee, the cost of newly purchased bait and floats, and the purchase of a foam roller) into their corresponding categories. Comparing it with February, he noticed a significant increase in spending under the "Hobby Development" category this month, but he had managed to save on "Dining" by cooking more meals at home. Based on the actual situation, he slightly increased the budget for "Hobbies" and decided to transfer the surplus from dining into savings to balance the overall expenses.

events.name: Communicating with Angkor about bait adjustments
events.description: Yin Hao took photos of his first experience mixing bait and the simulation test, sending them to Brother Wu. Brother Wu quickly replied with a voice message, pointing out that the bait might "dissolve a bit too quickly" and suggesting adding a little more gluten powder next time to improve its hook adhesion. He also recommended reducing the proportion of fishy ingredients based on the weather forecast, which predicted a possible temperature rise on the day of the competition. Yin Hao carefully noted down these suggestions.

events.name: Report the competition preparation plan to Master Sun Jianguo.
events.description: Yin Hao sent the preliminary draft of the preparation plan for the skills competition via WeChat to his mentor Sun Jianguo, along with a message seeking advice. Master Sun replied with a lengthy voice message in the evening. He first affirmed the systematic nature and feasibility of the plan, then highlighted several practical aspects that needed strengthening (such as emergency troubleshooting and unconventional clamping methods). He also suggested that Yin Hao designate one hour after work every Tuesday and Thursday as "special competition practice time," during which he could provide on-site guidance. This suggestion immediately brought much clarity to Yin Hao's competition preparation schedule.

events.name: Handling Tool Wear in Batch Processing
events.description: In the afternoon, while continuing with batch processing, Yin Hao noticed from the sampling inspection records that the inner bore dimensions of the latest five processed parts showed a gradually increasing trend. Although they were still within the tolerance range, the trend was concerning. "The tool has experienced initial wear," he immediately stopped the machine and called for Engineer Liu. The two of them removed the fine boring tool head for inspection and indeed found minor wear marks at the tool tip. Engineer Liu made slight adjustments to the tool radius compensation parameters on the computer, while Yin Hao retrieved another brand-new tool head of the same model from the tool magazine and replaced it. After restarting the machining process, the sampling inspection data stabilized once again. This minor incident demonstrated his keen monitoring and quick response capabilities during the machining process.

events.name: Weight gain due to party dining.
events.description: I had a greasy lunch with colleagues, which caused a slight increase in my weight by evening.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to handle various situations at work.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home
结束状态.心情: Slightly weary but mentally enriched, having resolved issues and advanced several personal plans.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Thursday, Yin Hao made final preparations for the weekend fishing competition while also developing a detailed plan for the upcoming vocational skills competition. The precision machining tasks at work also progressed smoothly into the final stages, with everything advancing according to plan.

events.name: Determine the final bait and fishing tackle final inspection
events.description: In the evening, following Wu Ge's advice, Yin Hao conducted his second and final bait preparation before the competition. He meticulously controlled the amount of gluten powder added and reduced the proportion of fishy-scented bait. After mixing, he took a sniff—it emitted a pure, clean aroma of grains. He then laid out all his fishing gear in the living room in a neat row: checking whether each section of the fishing rod was tightly screwed, whether the fishing reel released the line smoothly, whether the fish net was damaged, whether the landing net head was secure, and whether the fishing chair’s height adjustment function worked properly… Only after confirming that all equipment was in optimal condition did he feel at ease, carefully packing them into the fishing box and rod bag by category.

events.name: Develop a detailed competition preparation plan.
events.description: Combining the advice from his mentor Sun Jianguo, Yin Hao formulated a detailed weekly preparation plan covering the next three months (until the preliminary competition in June). The plan clearly stipulates: studying theory (competition rules, new process knowledge) every Monday and Wednesday evening; staying in the workshop for 1.5 hours of practical training after work every Tuesday and Thursday (guided by Master Sun); conducting programming simulation exercises every Saturday morning; and handling other life matters during the day on Sunday, with review and summary in the evening. He printed out this plan and posted it on the wall of his study.

events.name: Complete precision parts processing and final inspection.
events.description: Today, Yin Hao completed the machining of the final batch of bearing housing parts. After finishing, instead of rushing off work, he wheeled over the precision coordinate measuring machine to conduct a full inspection of all critical dimensions for the last batch of parts and randomly sampled parts from previous batches. All data perfectly met the drawing requirements. He meticulously filled out the machining process record sheet and the final inspection report, and before leaving work, he handed over the entire batch of qualified parts along with the documents to the team leader, Wang Lei. Wang Lei patted him on the shoulder and said, "Well done. This batch had high requirements, and you handled it very steadily."

events.name: Regular Contact and Relaxation
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao and his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Gong discussed the hero adjustments in the new version of "Honor of Kings" while having lunch in the cafeteria. Before going to bed, he put on his headphones and listened to half an hour of his favorite pop music, relaxing his nerves that had been tense all day.

events.name: Temporarily change the exercise plan
events.description: Feeling physically fatigued, Yin Hao canceled his scheduled morning run and opted for light stretching at home instead.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, thinking about today's wrap-up work and competition preparation.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: The ease after completing work intertwines with the slight excitement of preparing for the competition.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with spring in full bloom.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, Yin Hao made final preparations for the upcoming fishing competition with eager anticipation, while a seed for a new hobby was quietly planted during a shopping trip. His work tasks were successfully completed, and his mentor also provided crucial guidance for his competition preparations.

events.name: Final Pre-Game Preparation and Mental Adjustment
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao loaded the fully packed fishing box, rod bag, bait container, and folding chair from the previous day into the car, arranging them neatly in the trunk. He double-checked the assembly time, location, and list of essential items on the competition notice. In the evening, he showered and went to bed half an hour earlier than usual. With his eyes closed, he mentally reviewed the competition process and the precautions Brother Wu had reminded him of, telling himself, "Enjoy the process and gain experience." Gradually, his mindset calmed down.

events.name: Carefully inspect the condition of the fishing gear.
events.description: Actually, the final inspection was completed last night, but due to his ISTJ cautious nature, Yin Hao quickly spot-checked a few key pieces of equipment before heading out in the evening: the fishing rod connections, the main line attachments, and the paint on the float. Only after confirming everything was in order did he finally zip up the tackle box.

events.name: Purchase manual coffee brewing equipment
events.description: During a break from work in the afternoon, Yin Hao was drawn to a short video titled "Beginner's Guide to Pour-Over Coffee." It made him think about his groggy weekend mornings and how he could cultivate a quiet morning ritual. So, he spent some time researching and comparing products on an e-commerce platform, eventually ordering a basic pour-over coffee set—which included a gooseneck kettle, a V60 dripper, filter papers, a digital scale, and an entry-level hand grinder. He also added a well-reviewed bag of Ethiopian Yirgacheffe coffee beans to his purchase. The sense of anticipation helped ease his pre-race nerves.

events.name: Confirm the competition preparation details with the master.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao took the printed detailed competition preparation plan to find his mentor, Sun Jianguo. Master Sun carefully reviewed it and circled a few sections with a pen: "Here, the practical operation time can be extended by another half hour; here, we need to add a weekly timed programming test to simulate competition pressure." The two stood by the machine tool and discussed for over ten minutes, finally finalizing the ultimate version of the plan. Master Sun said, "Starting next week, I’ll practice with you on Tuesday and Thursday evenings."

events.name: Submit processing tasks and report.
events.description: In the morning, after handing over the final inspection report and parts to Wang Lei, Yin Hao provided an oral summary of the overall situation regarding this batch processing. He specifically mentioned the tool wear issue that arose during the process and how it was addressed. Wang Lei praised his process control and problem feedback awareness, which made him feel that his professional value was recognized.

events.name: Staying up late due to excitement.
events.description: Anticipation for the match caused insomnia, and Yin Hao didn't fall asleep until 00:15.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the upcoming weekend activities.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Calmness carries a hint of anticipation for the unknown competition, along with curiosity about trying a new hobby, yet there is a sense of sleep deprivation.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, sunny, and breezy, perfect for outdoor activities.

2025-03.daily_overview: Saturday was a day filled with a competitive atmosphere and profound experiences. Yin Hao participated in his first formal fishing competition, and although his performance was average, the entire process led to a fundamental shift in his understanding of the hobby—from leisurely relaxation to technical exploration.

events.name: Discussing Skill Crossover with Fellow Anglers
events.description: On the way to pick up Brother Wu early in the morning, the two continued their previous discussion on cross-disciplinary technology. Yin Hao proactively asked about the difficulties in maintaining the three core systems of new energy vehicles—battery, motor, and electronic control. Brother Wu mentioned that with the increasing prevalence of high-precision sensors and controllers, the demand for repair technicians’ knowledge in electronics and numerical control is also rising. Lost in thought, Yin Hao felt that his professional background might indeed have broader application prospects in the future.

events.name: Depart for the competition venue.
events.description: At six in the morning, just as the sky was beginning to lighten, Yin Hao drove his car to the agreed meeting spot to pick up Brother Wu. Together, they headed toward the competition venue by Dianshan Lake. With the car window open, the cool air of the early spring morning refreshed their spirits. Soft music played in the car as they chatted about the weather and the possible fishing conditions, the atmosphere relaxed yet tinged with the excitement of the impending challenge.

events.name: Registration, Draw, and Pre-competition Preparation
events.description: When they arrived at the competition venue, it was already bustling with people. They smoothly completed the registration, receiving their competitor passes and commemorative caps. In the draw area, Yin Hao picked a relatively open fishing spot located in the middle section of the lake area. The two quickly carried their equipment to the spot and began racing against time to set up their fishing chairs, assemble their rods, and prepare the bait. The professional movements of the other competitors around them and the dazzling array of equipment made Yin Hao feel a completely different atmosphere compared to his usual casual fishing trips.

events.name: The tense process of the competition
events.description: The match whistle blew, and Yin Hao followed his planned strategy by first using bait to create a fishing spot. However, the expected school of fish did not quickly gather. He noticed that anglers on his left and right were starting to catch fish one after another, which made him a bit anxious. He tried changing the flavor of the bait and adjusting the float's depth, but the bites remained sparse, mostly from small, unwanted fish. Throughout the entire morning, he worked hard to observe, think, and adjust, but with little success. The level of focus and tension he experienced was something he had never felt during casual fishing before.

events.name: End of the Competition and Announcement of Results
events.description: The four-hour competition quickly passed. Yin Hao's fish basket held only a few small crucian carp. During the weigh-in, his results placed him in the lower-middle range, earning him a "participation award"—a commemorative towel. Watching the dozens of pounds of catch from some of the skilled anglers nearby, he felt a bit disheartened, but even more curious: how did they manage it?

events.name: Post-match Dinner and Experience Sharing
events.description: At noon, Yin Hao, Brother Wu, and a few other familiar fishing buddies gathered for a meal at a lakeside farmhouse. Everyone drank beer and chatted freely about the various amusing incidents and regrets from the competition. Yin Hao humbly sought advice from the experienced anglers, who pointed out some of his issues: his baiting spots were not concentrated enough, his rigging might have been a bit too blunt, and his judgment of the fish layer that day was inaccurate. Brother Wu also comforted him, saying, "Everyone’s first competition is like this—experience is what matters most." Listening intently, Yin Hao nodded frequently, his mindset shifting from disappointment to a strong desire to learn. Suddenly, he realized that fishing, this so-called "leisure activity," held so many intricacies worth delving into.

events.name: Purchase Competition Study Materials
events.description: Returning home in the evening, though physically exhausted, Yin Hao still turned on his computer and placed an online order for several advanced programming textbooks recommended for vocational skill competitions, along with a manual on precision measurement technology. The defeat in the competition had, in fact, ignited his desire to prove himself on the professional stage.

events.name: New cross-day event begins: Weekend camping planning
events.description: After the competition, I contacted my comrade Zhang Jianguo to plan the camping trip for next weekend and started preparing the equipment list.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Excited and slightly nervous, ready for the first competition.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Tired, yet the mind is active. Although the competition results were not ideal, they opened a new door, shifting the mindset from "playing" to "learning."

state.今日运动: Standing and fishing all day, light physical activity.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast, turning to light rain in the afternoon.

2025-03.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for settling down, reflecting, and savoring the rituals of life. Yin Hao meticulously maintained his competition gear and diligently recorded his insights. He tried hand-brewed coffee for the first time, discovering a new weekend delight, and systematically completed his first in-depth financial planning for March, laying another brick toward his goal of buying a home.

events.name: Reflecting on the Bond of Fishing and Future Plans
events.description: While cleaning his fishing gear, Yin Hao recalled the encouragement and support from Brother Wu at the dinner table yesterday. He sent a message to Brother Wu on WeChat: "Brother Wu, thank you for taking me along to the competition yesterday. Although I didn’t fish well, I learned a lot. We should plan carefully for the summer reservoir camping and fishing trip!" Brother Wu quickly replied with an "OK" gesture and a smiling face.

events.name: Post-Game Fishing Tackle Maintenance and Experience Log
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao carefully washed the mud-covered fishing box, fish keeper, and landing net head in the bathroom, drying them with a dry cloth. He disassembled each section of the fishing rod, wiped the inner walls with a soft cloth, and then left them to air in a well-ventilated area. After completing these tasks, he sat at his desk, opened his notebook, and meticulously recorded the events of yesterday's competition: his own actions, the details he observed from skilled anglers, an analysis of the reasons for his failure (including baiting, rigging adjustments, and adaptability), and the areas he needs to focus on practicing in the future. His handwriting was neat, and the content was organized clearly.

events.name: First Hand-Drip Coffee Experience
events.description: In the afternoon, the pour-over coffee set he ordered online arrived. Yin Hao eagerly unpacked it and, following the tutorial video, first weighed out 15 grams of coffee beans using an electronic scale. He then slowly ground them into a powder with a consistency similar to granulated sugar using a hand-crank coffee grinder. After boiling water, warming the cup, folding the filter paper, and allowing the coffee to bloom for 30 seconds, he carefully poured the water in a circular motion. Watching the coffee drip slowly into the pot, he noticed a floral and fruity aroma filling the air. Once the brewing was complete, he took a sip—the acidity was prominent, but there was a sweet aftertaste. He noted in his journal: "First attempt—water flow control was unstable, possibly due to a coarser grind. Acidity was noticeable, but the process was quite therapeutic."

events.name: Share the joy of coffee with friends.
events.description: After tasting the coffee, Yin Hao couldn’t help but take a photo of the coffee pot and cup, posting it in the "Songjiang Trio" WeChat group with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng. "A new weekend experiment—feels like I’ve opened the door to a whole new world." Gao Zhiyuan quickly replied, "Nice one, Hao! Bring some beans to try next time we hang out!" Ma Xiaofeng sent a "thumbs-up" emoji. A simple share brought about a pleasant social interaction.

events.name: Collection and Entry of Financial Data for March
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao began his mid-month in-depth financial review. He logged into various banking and payment apps, exported all transaction records from March 1st to the present (including salary deposits, automatic deductions for rent and utilities, daily expenses, competition registration fees, purchases like foam rollers and coffee equipment), and systematically entered them into the "Actual Expenditure" column of his Excel budget sheet.

events.name: Analyze expenditures and assess the future.
events.description: After completing the entry, he carefully reviewed the comparison chart. Fixed expenses remained stable; dining costs were below budget due to cooking at home more often. However, "hobby development" was severely over budget because of a fishing competition and coffee equipment purchases. He assessed these overspends: the competition was a planned and rewarding experiential expense, while the coffee equipment was a one-time investment that could reduce future coffee shop spending. At the same time, he considered the upcoming birthday celebration for his mentor at the end of the month and the potential upgrade of his coffee grinder, factoring these potential expenses into his considerations.

events.name: Adjust the budget and increase savings.
events.description: After careful consideration, Yin Hao decided to increase his originally planned savings for this month by 5% to more firmly advance toward his goal of purchasing a home. He adjusted his savings target in the table and accordingly reduced the budget allocations for some non-essential items under "Social Entertainment" and "Flexible Shopping." Looking at the new, stricter budget sheet, he didn’t feel constrained. Instead, he experienced a stronger sense of control over his life and a clearer path toward achieving his goal.

events.name: Complete review and set reminders
events.description: With all the work completed, he saved the document as "2025-03-Budget_Execution_v2." Finally, he set reminders on his phone calendar for March 20th and 31st to review the budget execution. Closing his laptop, he let out a long sigh, feeling that this weekend had been both relaxing and productive.

events.name: Cross-day Event Continues: Camping Equipment Procurement
events.description: Start browsing online for camping tents and sleeping bags to prepare for next week's event.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relax, with a touch of weariness from yesterday's match and thoughts of reflection.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Calm, content, and in control. Completed the entire process from experience to reflection, and then to planning.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, with humid weather.

2025-03.daily_overview: As the new week begins, Yin Hao prepares for the next phase in multiple aspects: organizing knowledge for the upcoming theoretical exam, researching equipment to enhance the coffee experience, developing a detailed training plan, and addressing unexpected minor housing issues in daily life. At work, he also participated in equipment reviews where his voice carried weight.

events.name: Preparation for the Low-Voltage Electrician Theory Exam on the Eve
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao made a final check of his admission ticket (electronic version) and ID card for the theoretical exam of the low-voltage electrician certification, confirming that the exam location was at the Songjiang District Vocational Training Center, which was not far away. Instead of burying himself in intensive studying, he quickly reviewed the mind map notes he had organized, allowing the knowledge framework to run through his mind once more. He told himself, "I’ve learned everything I needed to learn, just perform normally." His mindset remained calm and steady.

events.name: Research and upgrade manual coffee grinders.
events.description: Based on his first hand-brewing experience over the weekend, Yin Hao found that while the hand grinder was fun, the consistency of grind uniformity and efficiency might affect the flavor. He began to research several entry-level electric grinders online, such as the "Baratza Encore" and some domestic brands. After comparing factors like burr type, grind settings, noise levels, and price, he tentatively set his budget between 800 and 1,200 yuan, planning to decide whether to make the purchase after receiving his salary at the end of the month.

events.name: Develop a weekly training plan for the competition.
events.description: Based on the framework agreed upon with his mentor Sun Jianguo, Yin Hao formulated the first detailed "Weekly Competition Preparation Plan." The plan specified exactly what to do from which hour to which hour each day: theory (metal materials) on Monday evenings, practical training (high-precision milling of flat surfaces) on Tuesday evenings, strength training on Wednesday evenings, practical training (complex contour programming) on Thursday evenings, rest/socializing on Friday evenings, programming simulations on Saturday mornings, and long-distance running/personal matters on Sunday mornings. He set this plan as part of his phone wallpaper to remind himself constantly.

events.name: Discover and report faucet leaks.
events.description: While washing up in the morning, Yin Hao noticed that after turning off the faucet at the sink, water continued to drip slowly from the valve core. Although the dripping wasn’t fast, a small puddle had formed on the countertop overnight. He checked the connections and confirmed that it wasn’t due to loose fittings but rather an aging internal valve core. After cleaning the countertop, he took clear videos and photos of the leak and sent them via WeChat to his landlord, Li Xiuying: "Good morning, Ms. Li. The faucet in the bathroom sink is leaking a bit, and it seems the valve core is faulty. Would it be possible for you to arrange for a repair person to take a look?"

events.name: Attend the new equipment review meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the company's technical department organized a review meeting for the proposed new five-axis CNC machine tool and invited several experienced operators to participate. Yin Hao, drawing from issues he encountered in daily operations such as inconvenient clamping and poor chip removal, proposed several improvement suggestions during the meeting regarding the user-friendly design of the operation panel, machine tool lighting, and the opening and closing method of the cutting fluid protective cover. The engineers from the technical department took careful notes. This made Yin Hao feel that his experience was being valued.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work pressure.
events.description: Faced with the tight schedule of preparing for the competition and work tasks, Yin Hao felt slightly anxious and relieved the stress by listening to music at night.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Monday blues, a bit reluctant to get up, but thinking about the week's plans, I still manage to perk up.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: There are many tasks, but they are handled in an orderly manner. I have a clear plan for this week's arrangements, though I feel a bit of pressure.

state.今日运动: Morning run 5 kilometers (jogging in the rain)

2025-03.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yin Hao began the theoretical study for his low-voltage electrician certificate. At the same time, to address the shortcomings exposed during the fishing competition, he proactively sought advice from experienced anglers, demonstrating his pragmatic approach of "applying what he learns and filling in the gaps." In his personal life, he also successfully coordinated housing maintenance matters.

events.name: Start learning low-voltage electrical theory.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao officially began his systematic study for the low-voltage electrician certificate. The first lesson covered the fundamentals of circuit principles. He opened the online course video and followed the instructor to revisit concepts that seemed basic but required precise mastery, such as current, voltage, resistance, and Ohm's law. While listening, he sketched circuit diagrams in his notebook and completed the post-lesson exercises on simple series and parallel circuit calculations, rekindling the feeling of studying diligently from his student days.

events.name: Post-match reflection and seeking advice on fishing techniques.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao took the initiative to send a long WeChat message to Brother Wu, detailing the fish conditions he had observed during the competition (light bites, fish rising to the surface), his responses, and his analysis after the failure. He specifically asked, "Brother Wu, in situations like this where the weather suddenly clears up and the fish rise to the surface, aside from switching to float fishing, how should I adjust the bait's state and flavor to lure the fish back down more quickly?" Brother Wu quickly shared a few practical tips and invited him to go for another practical session over the weekend if he had time.

events.name: The landlord contacts regarding repair matters.
events.description: Landlord Li Xiuying responded to Yin Hao in the afternoon, stating that she had contacted a familiar maintenance technician who would be available to visit tomorrow (Wednesday) around 2 p.m. She provided the technician's contact information to Yin Hao and asked him to confirm whether he would be available to wait at home at that time.

events.name: Request for Leave Adjustment to Coordinate with Maintenance
events.description: After receiving the landlord's message, Yin Hao immediately went to find his team leader, Wang Lei, explained the situation, and requested a two-hour leave on Wednesday afternoon. Wang Lei readily agreed. Yin Hao then replied to the landlord and the maintenance worker, confirming that he would be waiting at home at two o'clock the next afternoon. The arrangements were handled swiftly and efficiently.

events.name: New Event: Impromptu Friend Gathering
events.description: After work, I had a hotpot dinner with colleagues Wang Lei and Engineer Liu, chatting about interesting work stories, and didn't get home until 23:30.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Plain and ordinary, starting a new day in a routine manner.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Enriching, learned new knowledge, and resolved minor life troubles, relaxed after the gathering.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a noticeable rise in temperature.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Wednesday afternoon, Yin Hao experienced two "firsts": the first time he took a day off from work to accommodate repairs at home, and the first time he underwent systematic core strength training at a fitness center. Although the process was challenging, both were necessary steps toward a more scientific and healthier lifestyle.

events.name: Continue learning about electrical safety knowledge.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao studied a crucial part of the low-voltage electrician course—electrical safety. He carefully noted down various safety operating procedures, technical and organizational measures to prevent electric shock, as well as the steps for electric shock first aid (disconnecting the power source, assessing consciousness, performing CPR). He also learned about the inspection and usage methods of safety equipment such as voltage testers and insulating gloves. He felt this part of the content was highly practical and closely related to workplace safety.

events.name: Go to the fitness center after work.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao drove directly to the Vitality Fitness Center near Songjiang University Town to meet his running partner, Chen Jie, who had already started working there.

events.name: First Core Strength Training Session
events.description: On the mats in the fitness area, Chen Jie conducted a one-on-one basic core training session for Yin Hao. The session included exercises like planks, side planks, bird-dogs, and dead bugs—seemingly simple movements that actually demand high levels of core stability. It was Yin Hao’s first time attempting these exercises, and his body kept shaking, with his abdominal and back muscles trembling intensely. Especially during Russian twists, he felt an intense soreness in his obliques. Chen Jie constantly corrected his form from the side, saying, "Tighten your abs, don’t let your lower back sag!"

events.name: Post-Training Communication and Plan Adjustment
events.description: After the training session, both of them were drenched in sweat. Yin Hao wiped his sweat and said, "I didn’t expect it to be this exhausting—it’s even tougher on the core than running ten kilometers." Chen Jie laughed and replied, "The core is the engine for running. Strengthening it not only helps you run faster but also reduces the risk of injury." Yin Hao agreed wholeheartedly and immediately decided to make the Wednesday post-work strength training a regular part of his half-marathon preparation plan.

events.name: Wait at home and complete the repairs.
events.description: In the afternoon, the repairman arrived on time. Yin Hao explained the situation, and after inspecting it, the repairman confirmed that the valve core had aged. The replacement was completed in just ten minutes. Yin Hao tested it, and the dripping stopped. Following the landlord's prior instructions, he paid an advance of 80 yuan for the repair fee and requested a receipt.

events.name: Provide feedback to the landlord on the repair results.
events.description: After the repairman left, Yin Hao took photos of the fixed faucet and the repair receipt, then sent them via WeChat to the landlord Li Xiuying: "Ms. Li, the faucet has been fixed. It was a valve core issue, and it has been replaced. The cost is 80 yuan, and the receipt is attached." Ms. Li replied quickly: "Okay, Xiao Yin, thank you for your effort. I'll transfer the money to you via WeChat."

events.name: Record knee discomfort
events.description: After strength training, Yin Hao felt a slight soreness and swelling in his right knee, which subsided after rest and did not affect subsequent activities.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: With a calm mindset, I know that there are adjusted breaks and training sessions in the afternoon, so the rhythm is slightly different.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Physically exhausted (especially the core muscles and knees), but mentally content, having completed two planned tasks.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Thursday, Yin Hao's fishing hobby took a crucial step toward specialization—he registered on a professional forum to begin systematic learning. At the same time, he experienced delayed-onset muscle soreness from his first strength training session and completed a financial settlement with his landlord during their daily communication.

events.name: Register a professional fishing forum account
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao searched for and opened the "Fishing Home" forum on his computer. He completed the registration using his usual nickname and email, briefly filled out his personal profile, and noted that he was from "Shanghai, mainly into platform fishing." From then on, he had a professional platform for systematic learning and exchange.

events.name: Browse and study the essence posts on spring fishing conditions.
events.description: After registering, he couldn't wait to search for keywords like "spring," "Dianshan Lake," and "crucian carp" in the "East China Fishing Spots" section of the forum. He found several long, well-curated posts written by experienced anglers, which provided detailed analyses of the migration patterns of crucian carp and carp from deep to shallow waters as temperatures rise in spring, as well as strategies for selecting bait under different weather conditions. He felt as if he had stumbled upon a treasure trove, taking notes in his phone's memo app while reading, and felt his perspective broadening.

events.name: Muscle soreness after strength training.
events.description: When he woke up in the morning, Yin Hao felt waves of soreness deep in his abdomen and back, especially when laughing or coughing, where his abdominal muscles hurt noticeably. This is typical delayed onset muscle soreness (DOMS). During his morning run, he deliberately slowed down and paid more attention to maintaining a stable running posture, using the run to promote blood circulation and alleviate the discomfort. He decided to only engage in light aerobic activities for the next two days to allow his muscles to recover properly.

events.name: Received the reimbursement for repair costs from the landlord.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao received an 80-yuan repair fee transferred via WeChat from his landlord, Li Xiuying. He clicked to accept the payment and replied, "Received, thank you, Sister Li." The landlord responded with an "OK" emoji. With that, a routine housing repair matter was smoothly concluded—efficient, clear, and in line with their usual businesslike yet friendly dynamic.

events.name: Cross-day event ends: Camping equipment arrives.
events.description: The camping tent and sleeping bag purchased online arrived, and Yin Hao checked and tested them in the evening to prepare for the weekend activities.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Body aches make getting up a bit difficult, and the mood is slightly low.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: The soreness persists, but the satisfaction of learning new knowledge has alleviated the physical discomfort.

2025-03.daily_overview: On Friday, work proceeded as usual. On his way home from work, Yin Hao received a warm dinner invitation from his neighbor, Aunt Chen, adding a touch of warm community spirit to the special occasion of the following day—the anniversary of their move.

events.name: Accept the neighbor's dinner invitation
events.description: After work, on his way home, Yin Hao happened to meet Aunt Chen, his neighbor, who had just returned from grocery shopping in the hallway. Aunt Chen warmly called out to him, "Xiao Yin, it's the weekend tomorrow. Come over to my place for dinner in the evening! I bought a lot of groceries, and I can't finish them all by myself. It’ll be nice to have some company." Remembering that tomorrow was March 15th, marking his fifth anniversary in Shanghai, Yin Hao thought it would be nice to share a meal with his neighbor and happily agreed, "Sure, thank you, Aunt Chen! I’ll come over tomorrow evening. Is there anything I should bring?" "No need, just come yourself!" Aunt Chen waved her hand and smiled as she headed upstairs. This unexpected invitation filled Yin Hao with a warm feeling.

events.name: Overtime work due to project rush.
events.description: There was an urgent order to handle at work, so Yin Hao worked overtime until 21:00 before leaving, which compressed his personal time.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend, the body aches have mostly subsided.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Happy, looking forward to tomorrow's anniversary and dinner with neighbors, but feeling a bit tired from working overtime.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 6 kilometers, condition restored.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with the bright spring sunshine.

2025-03.daily_overview: March 15, 2025, was a day of deep emotional significance for Yin Hao. He marked the fifth anniversary of his move to Shanghai with a private ritual that reinforced his sense of belonging through hard work—cooking a carefully prepared hometown dish and video-calling his parents. That evening, a dinner with his neighbors added a warm, communal touch to this feeling of connection.

events.name: Plan an anniversary dinner and make purchases.
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao kept this date in mind. During breaks at work, he used his phone's memo app to list a few hometown dishes he wanted to cook: scallion-braised clams, Shanghainese-style braised pork, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables. After work, instead of heading straight home, he drove to a large fresh food supermarket in Songjiang District, where he carefully selected fresh clams that had been cleaned of sand, skin-on pork belly with a good balance of fat and lean meat, scallions, ginger, and a handful of tender greens. While shopping, he was already planning the cooking sequence in his mind.

events.name: Cooking Hometown Dishes and Emotional Retrospection
events.description: Returning to his home on Guangfulin Road, Yin Hao tied on an apron and busied himself in the kitchen. He patiently blanched the clams to extract the meat, then stir-fried them quickly after sautéing with scallions and ginger. For the braised pork, he first blanched it, then simmered it over low heat until it turned a glossy red and became tender and flavorful. The familiar aroma filling the kitchen made him feel as though he had returned to his home in Nantong. He looked around the small kitchen he had rented for nearly five years, from its initial emptiness and simplicity to its current state, fully equipped with cooking utensils and seasonings, and was filled with deep emotion.

events.name: Video Chat with Parents to Share Growth
events.description: The dishes were served, and Yin Hao deliberately set out two sets of bowls and chopsticks—one for himself and one symbolically for his "past self" or "future family." After adjusting his phone stand, he dialed a video call to his parents, Yin Jianguo and Wang Xiuying. When they saw the authentic hometown dishes on the screen and their son’s slightly more mature yet beaming face, they were both surprised and comforted. Yin Hao showed them his "achievements," sharing the little details of his life over the past five years—from the military camp to the workshop, from being a stranger to gradually integrating into his new environment. His father said little, only nodding and saying, "Good," while his mother’s eyes welled up with tears as she reminded him to eat well even when alone. Through the screen, the family of three shared a "cloud dinner," their emotions flowing through the electronic waves.

events.name: After-Meal Cleanup and Future Aspirations
events.description: After the video ended, Yin Hao slowly finished the dinner he had prepared, then carefully washed the dishes and tidied the kitchen until it was spotless. As he cleaned, scenes from the past five years flashed through his mind: the nervousness of operating a machine tool for the first time, the joy of catching his first fish in Dianshan Lake, the sense of security when he received his first year-end bonus... Gazing at the night view of Songjiang outside the window, his longing for "having a home of his own in Shanghai" became more concrete and intense than ever before.

events.name: Prepare gifts for the neighbor's dinner party.
events.description: Feeling it was inappropriate to visit the neighbor empty-handed, Yin Hao took some time in the afternoon to go to the fruit shop at the entrance of the community. He bought a beautifully packaged box of imported oranges and a carton of pure milk as gifts for Aunt Chen.

events.name: Dinner at neighbor Aunt Chen's house
events.description: At half past six in the evening, Yin Hao knocked on the door of Aunt Chen’s home across the hall, carrying fruits and milk. The dining table was already filled with a variety of hearty homemade dishes, including steamed fish, braised pork ribs, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables, their aroma filling the air. Aunt Chen warmly invited him to sit down, constantly serving him food while asking about his work and whether he was used to living alone in Shanghai. As Yin Hao ate, he answered her questions and listened to Aunt Chen talk about her son working in another city and the changes in the neighborhood. This dinner, filled with the taste of home-cooked food and the care of an elder, allowed him to experience a rare warmth in his solitary life and the mutual support among neighbors.

events.name: Complete half marathon training run
events.description: A 13-kilometer long-distance run was conducted in the morning as part of the half-marathon improvement phase training, focusing on recovery and pace control.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calmness tinged with a faint sense of sentimentality for the special day.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warm, fulfilling, and full of strength. The emotional bonds with family, the heartfelt interactions with neighbors, and a clear vision for the future together form the backdrop of this commemorative day.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with moderate temperatures, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-03.daily_overview: A fulfilling rest day kicked off with exercise. After completing a long-distance run in the early morning, I spent the morning reflecting on and sharing yesterday's exhibition experience. In the afternoon, I explored personal interests and engaged with the neighborhood, followed by a warm dinner with neighbors in the evening.

events.name: Morning Run Training
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao followed the half-marathon training plan and completed a 12-kilometer long-distance run on Guangfulin Road, focusing on pace control and scientific recovery. After the run, he used a foam roller for stretching.

events.name: Review the exhibition and share your thoughts
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao recalled the art exhibition he visited yesterday at home. He sent a message to his mother, Wang Xiuying, via WeChat to describe his experience and mentioned it while chatting with his childhood friend Zhang Wei.

events.name: Explore the Interest in Car Maintenance
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao followed an account about automotive mechanical principles on a short video platform, sharing interesting videos with his childhood friend Zhang Wei and fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang, seeking their professional opinions.

events.name: Having dinner with Aunt Chen, the neighbor.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao brought a fruit gift box to Aunt Chen's house, where they enjoyed homemade dishes such as braised pork and steamed sea bass. They chatted about neighborhood life, work, and exam preparations, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Casual conversation and farewell after dinner.
events.description: After dinner, Yin Hao offered to help clean up but was declined. They drank tea and chatted about the customs and traditions of their hometown. Around eight o’clock, he thanked them and headed home, with Aunt Chen inviting him to visit often.

events.name: Personal Evening Relaxation
events.description: After returning home, I freshened up, listened to music while browsing mobile game updates, and adjusted my mood.

events.name: Upon learning of the master's birthday, a celebration was proposed.

events.name: Slight indigestion in the evening.
events.description: After returning home, I felt slightly bloated due to eating a bit more during the gathering, so I rested early to adjust.

2025-03.daily_overview: On a regular workday, I continued studying electrical engineering after work. Due to the rain, I switched to indoor tempo running, and my mood was slightly affected by the weather.

2025-03.daily_overview: Advancing multiple tasks simultaneously, seeking advice on competition strategies, signing up for a running race, delving into fishing techniques, and staying up late to organize plans due to the large amount of information.

events.name: Discuss competition preparation strategies with the master.
events.description: During the lunch break, I had an in-depth discussion with Master Sun about the challenging aspects of the competition assessment and the specialized training plan, and received book recommendations, which clarified the direction.

events.name: Delve into the study of spring wild fishing bait.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the first working day of April, Yin Hao started his day with a morning run, diving into a new project with high energy and launching training for the advanced worker certificate competition. During the day, he worked closely with his mentor in the workshop, while in the evenings, he focused on theoretical studies—fully embodying the meticulous planning traits of an ISTJ personality.

events.name: Morning Running Training
events.description: After waking up at 6:15 a.m., I went for a 5-kilometer morning run on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District, maintaining a pace of about 5 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer. This routine energizes me for the day's work and strictly adheres to my training plan.

events.name: Receive new project task
events.description: At the morning meeting, team leader Wang Lei distributed the drawings and process documents for a new key connector to Yin Hao and his master, Sun Jianguo. Yin Hao carefully checked the part's dimensional annotations, tolerance requirements (especially the precision requirements for several key mating surfaces), and the characteristics of the stainless steel material used. He quietly discussed potential machining challenges with Master Sun, who was sitting beside him, such as the milling of a deep groove and the drilling and reaming of several high-precision holes.

events.name: Start Preparatory Competition Training (Theoretical Study)
events.description: After work, Yin Hao returned home, had dinner, and began his first week of competition preparation training. He didn't rush into practical exercises but followed his own plan, starting by reviewing the theoretical question bank for the CNC Machine Operator (Advanced) certification. He opened his notebook and systematically organized the key points from several important chapters, including "Principles of CNC Systems," "Process Planning for Complex Parts Machining," and "Precision Inspection and Error Analysis." He also marked the crucial sections to lay a solid theoretical foundation for the practical training scheduled for the rest of the week.

events.name: Temporary Overtime Discussion
events.description: During his evening study session, Yin Hao received a phone call from his mentor, Sun Jianguo, to discuss a potential fixture issue in a new project. This impromptu discussion extended his study time, but the problem was preliminarily resolved.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with anticipation for the work and training of the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, but with a slight sense of fatigue.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao conducted the first trial production of the new project. Under the guidance of his mentor, he identified potential quality issues. The competition preparation training has now entered the programming and practical operation phase. In the evening, he had to work overtime to process data, which led to staying up late. His weight has slightly decreased due to the training.

events.name: First Trial Processing of New Project and Initial Emergence of Issues
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao independently conducted the first trial machining of a new connector on the CNC milling machine, following the process documentation. He meticulously set the tool parameters, spindle speed, and feed rate, while Master Sun Jianguo observed the entire process. After the machining was completed, the two used a micrometer and a coordinate measuring machine to conduct a full-dimensional inspection of the first piece. Although all dimensions were within the tolerance range, Master Sun keenly pointed out that the measured values of two shaft diameters were already close to the upper tolerance limit, [just a little larger and they would be out of specification], reminding Yin Hao to pay attention to the stability of the machining process.

events.name: Programming Practice for Competition Preparation (Tackling Irregular Surfaces)
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao practiced programming on the simulation software of his personal computer, focusing on tackling the programming challenges of irregular curved surfaces and thin-walled parts that might appear in the competition syllabus. He repeatedly adjusted the tool paths, calculated cutting parameters, and attempted to improve machining efficiency while ensuring precision. He also recorded the advantages and disadvantages of several different strategies.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Midday Communication with Colleagues
events.description: During lunch, Yin Hao ran into his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang in the cafeteria, and the three of them sat together. Yin Hao mentioned the issue of dimensions approaching the upper limit that he had discovered during the first-piece processing in the morning. Wang Lei joked, "It's time to test your 'stability' mantra again," while Liu Zhiqiang suggested paying attention to whether the machine's warm-up time was sufficient. The relaxed atmosphere eased Yin Hao's concerns about the problem.

events.name: Temporary Overtime Work Record Data
events.description: After work, Yin Hao was required to work an extra hour to record detailed data of the daytime processing process, in order to analyze the reasons for dimensional fluctuations, which resulted in him staying up late.

起始状态.心情: Focus

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Slightly weary, yet alert to technical issues.

2025-04.daily_overview: On the last day before the Qingming Festival holiday, Yin Hao had a packed schedule. He participated in a simulated electrician certification exam, went for a light run, and made preparations for a holiday outing. At work, he began documenting fluctuations in batch processing dimensions. In the evening, he experienced slight emotional fluctuations due to stress.

events.name: Participate in the Low-Voltage Electrician Certificate Simulation Exam
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took leave to go to the training center and participated in a simulated exam for the low-voltage electrician certificate. The two-hour exam tested his recent learning outcomes. After submitting the paper, he conducted a preliminary review by comparing his answers with the correct ones, discovering several knowledge gaps in circuit design and safety regulations. He immediately marked these areas with a red pen in his textbook, planning to focus on them intensively after the holiday.

events.name: The last tempo run before the race.
events.description: After work, with two days left until the 10-kilometer test race, Yin Hao followed the adjusted plan and went for an easy run aimed at activating his body. He jogged lightly for 3 kilometers on the greenway near his residential area, maintaining his target race pace (approximately 5 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer) with a steady heart rate throughout. After the run, he spent more time than usual on stretching and fascia relaxation to ensure his muscles were in optimal condition for the upcoming race.

events.name: Preparing for the Qingming Outing
events.description: In the evening, thinking that tomorrow is the Qingming Festival holiday, Yin Hao decided to take a walk in the Chenshan Botanical Garden. He checked the battery levels of his phone and camera, placed a bottle of water, two pieces of bread, and a few chocolates into his backpack, and confirmed the botanical garden's opening hours online. The weather forecast indicated that tomorrow would be cloudy, and he felt it would be a good day for outdoor activities.

events.name: Record Batch Processing Size Fluctuations
events.description: During the day in the workshop, after completing the first-piece confirmation, Yin Hao began a small batch processing of about 20 pieces. When he reached around the 10th piece, he keenly noticed an extremely slight fluctuation in the micrometer reading for a key aperture used for inspection. Although each reading was still within the tolerance range, the values were no longer as stable as those of the previous pieces. He paused the equipment, recorded this observation, and informed Master Sun.

events.name: Mood swings due to work pressure.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao felt increasing pressure due to multiple tasks running in parallel. After venting his emotions by chatting with friends on WeChat, his mood eased slightly, and he decided to rest early to adjust.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Slightly stressed due to multiple tasks running concurrently.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: All set, but looking forward to the holiday and competition tomorrow.

2025-04.daily_overview: During the Qingming Festival holiday, Yin Hao stayed in Shanghai. In the morning, he made final preparations for the competition, and in the afternoon, he went to the Chenshan Botanical Garden to relax and reflect on life in tranquility. In the evening, he felt somewhat down due to missing his hometown.

events.name: Final preparations and rest before the competition.
events.description: Today is the day before the race, and Yin Hao strictly follows his plan, completely stopping his running training. In the morning, he only took a half-hour walk and performed a full set of dynamic stretches. In the afternoon, he carefully checked and prepared all his gear for the next day: running shoes, moisture-wicking sportswear, a sports watch, two energy gels, and a bottle of sports drink, neatly arranged by his bedside. In the evening, he went to bed an hour earlier than usual, listening to soothing music to conserve his energy for the race.

events.name: Collect the 10km Race Kit
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao drove himself to the designated location (Songjiang Sports Center) specified by the event organizing committee to collect his race kit. He checked his bib number (starting from Zone B) and timing chip, tried on the race T-shirt, and carefully read the race instructions, particularly focusing on the start time and bag drop procedures.

events.name: Spring Stroll at Chenshan Botanical Garden
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove his own car to the Chenshan Botanical Garden. The holiday traffic was smooth, and his favorite pop music played inside the car. After entering the garden, he strolled along the Cherry Blossom Avenue and the greenhouse exhibition area, using his phone and camera to capture the blooming cherry blossoms, tulips, and various fresh green plants. The vitality of spring made him feel relaxed and joyful.

events.name: Light Meals and Quiet Reflection in the Garden
events.description: At noon, he sat down on a bench in a lakeside resting area within the park, taking out his own bread and snacks for lunch. While enjoying the simple meal, he observed the families and couples relaxing around him, savoring the leisurely holiday atmosphere. After the meal, he found a quieter corner and sat there quietly for a while. On this special traditional festival of Qingming, despite being unable to return to his hometown to pay respects to his ancestors, he still silently cherished the memories of his family in his heart. He reflected on his growth and plans over the years from Nantong to Shanghai, feeling a clearer sense of direction for his future life goals.

events.name: Return and Organize
events.description: In the late afternoon, Yin Hao finished his sightseeing and drove home. After arriving, he imported the spring scenery photos he had taken today into his computer, performed a simple classification and backup. He also double-checked his alarm clock and transportation route for the next morning before going to bed early.

events.name: Brief call with family
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao made a brief phone call to his parents, expressing his longing for them. He felt a bit down, but his mood improved after receiving comfort.
