起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a slight pre-competition excitement.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Tranquil, peaceful, yet tinged with a hint of nostalgia.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao successfully completed his first official 10-kilometer race, achieving a breakthrough in his health goals and deepening his relationships with fellow runners. A series of evening game losses prompted a shift in his strategy research, while a dinner gathering led to a slight increase in weight.

events.name: Participate in the 10K Health Run at Chenshan Botanical Garden and complete the race.
events.description: On the morning of the race day, Yin Hao woke up early, had a simple oatmeal breakfast, and drove himself to Chenshan Botanical Garden. At the starting area, he met up with his running friend Chen Jie (A Jie), and the two warmed up together, cheering each other on. After the starting gun fired, Yin Hao ran steadily at his own pace, enjoying the beautiful scenery along the way while carefully controlling his breathing and speed. In the end, he crossed the finish line with a time of 53 minutes, receiving his first-ever running completion medal and souvenir. His heart was filled with a sense of accomplishment.

events.name: In-depth post-race exchange and professional guidance with running buddy Ajie.
events.description: After finishing the race, Yin Hao and A Jie met up in the rest area and shared a warm embrace. As they performed post-run stretches, they discussed the race in detail. Yin Hao asked A Jie for advice on managing energy levels during the mid-section of the race. As a fitness coach, A Jie praised Yin Hao’s performance while offering specific core strength training suggestions (such as plank variations and glute bridges) tailored to Yin Hao’s goal of participating in a half marathon in the future. He also emphasized the importance of post-run nutrition and recovery. The conversation proved highly beneficial for Yin Hao, and the two agreed to train together for more races in the future.

events.name: Having a post-race meal with running buddies, taking the relationship to the next level.
events.description: After stretching and chatting, the two of them still felt like they hadn't had enough, so they decided to find a local cuisine restaurant near the botanical garden for lunch. At the table, the conversation shifted from running to their respective work, lives, and future plans. A Jie shared his professional insights as a fitness coach, while Yin Hao talked about his job as a CNC machine operator and his goal of obtaining an advanced technician certification. This candid exchange made both of them feel that they were not just training partners but also close friends who could share more life experiences and aspirations.

events.name: Evening "Honor of Kings" Losing Streak and Post-Match Review
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, still immersed in the joy of his successful competition, teamed up with his gaming friend Zhang Fei for a ranked match, hoping to unwind. However, things did not go as planned. They suffered multiple consecutive defeats, and Yin Hao's mood gradually shifted from relaxation to frustration and disappointment.

events.name: Inspired by gaming friends, a shift in perception.
events.description: After the losing streak ended, Yin Hao and Zhang Fei didn’t disperse immediately. Instead, they conducted an in-depth post-game review through the in-game voice chat. Drawing on his experience in game design, Zhang Fei analyzed the balance adjustments for several commonly used heroes in the current version update and shared some [industry insights] regarding the matchmaking system and underlying numerical logic. This conversation was an eye-opener for Yin Hao, as he realized that winning or losing in the game was far more than just about individual skill—it was deeply influenced by the game’s system design and version strategies.

events.name: Decide to systematically study game strategies.
events.description: After the call with Zhang Fei, Yin Hao spent a long time thinking alone. The aspect of his ISTJ personality that emphasizes [systematic learning] was ignited. He decided not to view the game as mere entertainment anymore but to approach it with strategic research, just as he would with work and running training. He immediately opened Bilibili and Douyin, started searching for and following several well-known "Honor of Kings" technical teaching streamers and strategy bloggers, and began compiling a preliminary list in his phone's memo for in-depth learning of hero mechanics, equipment setups, runes, and match strategies.

events.name: Routine video call with parents.
events.description: Saturday evening was the unwavering family video call time. Yin Hao excitedly showed his parents the completion medal from today's race, detailing the competition process and his 53-minute finish time. On the other end of the video, his parents couldn't stop smiling and repeatedly praised him. As usual, his mother, Wang Xiuying, reminded him to pay attention to his nutrition, while his father, Yin Jianguo, inquired with concern about whether he had encountered any new technical challenges at work. Yin Hao also asked about his parents' well-being back home and was relieved to hear that everything was fine. The heartwarming call lasted nearly an hour, and the support of his family remained his greatest motivation.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Theoretical Study of Thin-Walled Component Machining
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon and before playing games in the evening, Yin Hao took some time to systematically study the theoretical knowledge related to controlling deformation, focusing on the vibration issues encountered during thin-walled part machining in the preparation for competition training. He also briefly discussed the feasibility of several solutions with his mentor, Sun Jianguo, online.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Excited, slightly nervous

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Complex, encompassing both the immense joy and fulfillment of achieving goals, as well as the reflection after setbacks in the game and a steadfast commitment to new learning directions.

state.今日运动: Participate in a 10-kilometer running race and complete it, followed by post-race stretching.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao visited the Shanghai International Industry Expo, broadening his professional horizons and feeling deeply inspired, which injected new motivation into his goal of becoming a senior technician. In the evening, he discussed game mechanics with colleagues, feeling highly enthusiastic.

events.name: Visit the Shanghai International Industrial Expo
events.description: Yin Hao got up early and took the subway to the National Exhibition and Convention Center. After entering the exhibition hall, he headed straight for the CNC machine tools and metal processing exhibition area. In front of the booths of several leading domestic and international companies, he lingered for a long time, carefully observing the live demonstration of a five-axis machining center processing a complex aerospace component. The precision and efficiency left a deep impression on him.

events.name: Communicate with booth technicians
events.description: Yin Hao mustered up his courage and took the initiative to communicate with the technical staff at a German brand booth. He inquired about the upgrade features of the new generation CNC system programming software and sought advice on parameter optimization for machining titanium alloys. The staff patiently answered his questions and provided him with some technical materials and business cards. Yin Hao gained a wealth of knowledge and felt as though he had glimpsed the pinnacle of industry technology.

events.name: Understand the trends of industry intelligence.
events.description: Subsequently, Yin Hao visited the exhibition areas for automated robots, intelligent logistics, and comprehensive digital factory solutions. Seeing robotic arms working together with precision and AGVs automatically transporting materials, he deeply felt the wave of intelligent transformation in the manufacturing industry. He began to contemplate how these new technologies could integrate with his current work and what knowledge he would need to acquire in the future.

events.name: Organize the harvest and share it
events.description: After the visit, on the subway ride back, Yin Hao couldn't wait to organize the photos and notes he had taken on his phone. Upon returning home in the evening, he shared his experiences from the exhibition, photos of the advanced equipment he had captured, and his reflections with his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleague Wang Lei via WeChat. The three of them even engaged in a lively discussion in the group chat.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Fine-tuning the Half Marathon Training Plan with Running Buddies
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Yin Hao briefly communicated with A Jie via WeChat about his reflections on yesterday's 10-kilometer race. Based on the successful test and the identified endurance shortcomings, both agreed to make slight adjustments to the original half-marathon training plan by appropriately adding an LSD (Long Slow Distance) run over the weekend. Yin Hao felt even more confident about achieving his goal of completing the half marathon.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Casual Discussion with Colleagues about Game Mechanics
events.description: In the evening, while chatting with Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang on WeChat, Yin Hao mentioned the consecutive losses in last night's game and the insights he heard from Zhang Fei regarding the game mechanics. This topic immediately sparked the interest of his colleagues, and the three of them engaged in a lively discussion, exchanging thoughts on the dominant heroes of the current version and the matchmaking system.

events.name: Random Event: Impromptu Decision to Order Takeout for Dinner
events.description: Due to sightseeing fatigue, Yin Hao was too tired to cook in the evening, so he ordered takeout of local Shanghai cuisine to enjoy a relaxing moment.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of curiosity and a desire to explore.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Inspired, broadened horizons, and gained a more concrete vision for future career development.

state.今日运动: Walk through the exhibition, with approximately 12,000 steps.

2025-04.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yin Hao organized materials for the expo. During work, the team collaborated to investigate fluctuations in processing dimensions. In the evening, he tried new gaming strategies but felt slightly frustrated as the issues remained unresolved.

events.name: Organize Industrial Expo Materials
events.description: Yin Hao sorted the product manuals, technical white papers, and other materials he brought back from the industrial expo over the weekend into different categories. He placed the most interesting documents about five-axis programming and intelligent tool management systems in a prominent position on his desk, planning to focus on them for further in-depth study.

events.name: Try new game strategies and mindsets.
events.description: Based on reflections over the weekend, while playing games in the evening, Yin Hao no longer blindly chose heroes he was familiar with. Instead, he began consciously observing the enemy lineup and trying out recommended builds for the current version. Although he was a bit rusty at first, he made an effort to control his emotions, treating each game as a learning process, which helped him maintain a much calmer mindset.

events.name: Having lunch with the master and colleagues to discuss technical issues.
events.description: During lunch, Yin Hao sat with Master Sun and Wang Lei in the cafeteria. He brought up the issue of the fluctuating aperture size in last week's batch processing. Master Sun believed more data was needed, while Wang Lei speculated that uneven coolant spraying might have caused localized thermal deformation. The three of them discussed the matter as they ate and decided to go observe the machine tool together in the afternoon.

events.name: The system records processing data to identify patterns of fluctuation.
events.description: In the afternoon, following Master Sun's suggestion, Yin Hao halted the production of that batch of parts. Instead, he stopped the machine after every five pieces were processed, using the same pneumatic internal micrometer to measure the critical bore diameter. He meticulously recorded the data in a pre-prepared table, along with the machine's continuous operating time and spindle temperature. He aimed to identify the pattern of dimensional fluctuations through the data.

events.name: Supplementary Event: Review of Running Training Data from the First Week
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took time to review the training data from the first week before the Qingming Festival on his running app, assessing his physical responses and the completion of his plan. He noticed a slight decrease in his resting heart rate, which was a positive sign. He shared his insights with A Jie via WeChat and, based on this, made minor adjustments to the training intensity for the upcoming week, increasing the proportion of strength training.

events.name: Mood swings due to work issues.
events.description: Due to slow progress caused by technical issues, Yin Hao felt a bit irritable, but his mood improved after a brief chat with his neighbor, Aunt Chen.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Smooth, ready to face the challenges of the new week.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Focused, yet slightly agitated, immersed in the process of solving problems.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yin Hao completed a high-quality interval running training, verified tool change issues at work, initiated the second week of competition preparation training in the evening, received a recommendation for a time management app during a call with his cousin, and went to bed late due to training fatigue.

events.name: Interval Running Training (Training with Running Buddies)
events.description: After work, Yin Hao and A Jie met at the Songjiang Sports Center track for interval running training. Under A Jie’s guidance, they completed multiple sets of [800-meter fast runs followed by 400-meter slow runs]. With the encouragement and motivation from his companion, Yin Hao pushed through the challenge, gaining a more intuitive sense of speed variation and physical limits. The training session proved highly effective.

events.name: Troubleshooting: Replace the tool for verification.
events.description: During the day in the workshop, based on the data records from the previous few days, Yin Hao and Master Sun preliminarily determined that slight wear on the finishing tool might be one of the causes. Yin Hao replaced the original fine boring tool with a brand-new one of the same model and reprocessed 10 parts for verification. The measurement results showed that the dimensions of the first five pieces were very stable, but the latter five began to exhibit the familiar slight fluctuation trend again, indicating that the issue might be more complex than simple tool wear.

events.name: Start the second week of competition preparation training.
events.description: After returning from the evening training session, Yin Hao began his second week of competition preparation. He first reviewed the vibration issues encountered with thin-walled components during last week's practical simulation, briefly discussed the feasibility of several improvement plans with Master Sun via WeChat, and then designated [optimizing clamping solutions] and [practicing multi-axis programming] as the key training focuses for the week.

events.name: Video calling with my cousin, I got recommended a time management app.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao had a video call with his cousin Chen Xiaowen, who works in Hangzhou. When discussing his recent preparation for the advanced worker certificate and his commitment to running training, he mentioned feeling stressed due to time constraints. His cousin enthusiastically recommended the [Time Block] management app she was using and shared her experience, saying it was particularly helpful for visualizing time allocation and reducing waste. Yin Hao was very interested after hearing this.

events.name: Random Event: Muscle Soreness Due to Overtraining
events.description: The intensity of interval running training was high, and Yin Hao felt soreness in his leg muscles in the evening, deciding to adjust his training plan for the next day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Energetic

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but fulfilled, full of curiosity about new methods of time management.

state.今日运动: Intermittent running training (800 meters fast + 400 meters slow) for multiple sets, with a total distance of approximately 6 kilometers.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao downloaded and studied time management apps, shifted technical troubleshooting at work to the thermal stability of machine tools, engaged in high-precision simulation and multi-axis programming for competition training, and canceled outdoor sports plans due to rain.

events.name: Download and research time management apps.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao downloaded the time-block management app recommended by his cousin. He spent a few minutes familiarizing himself with the interface and basic operations, such as creating time blocks in different colors to represent work, study, exercise, entertainment, and more. He found this visual approach truly intuitive.

events.name: Evening online discussion of technical issues with colleagues
events.description: At home in the evening, Yin Hao continued discussing the unresolved precision issue from the day with Wang Lei via WeChat. Wang Lei shared his experience from a similar case he had handled before, suspecting that thermal deformation of the spindle after prolonged operation of the machine tool, combined with insufficient coolant concentration or poor spray angle, might be the cause. The two agreed to focus on checking the cooling system and the [thermal state] of the machine tool after work tomorrow.

events.name: Preparation Training: High-Precision Machining Practical Simulation
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted his first high-precision machining simulation of the week. On the computer, he strictly followed the competition requirements to set the parameters of the virtual machine tool, [machining] a standard test piece with complex hole systems and stepped surfaces. He then used the measurement tools within the software to perform a virtual inspection, recording the precision error values.

events.name: Preparation for Competition Training: Multi-axis Linkage Programming Practice
events.description: After completing the precision simulation, Yin Hao continued practicing multi-axis linkage programming. He attempted to write a four-axis machining path for an impeller model, focusing on optimizing the tool trajectory to avoid interference while reducing idle travel, thereby enhancing both programming and machining efficiency.

events.name: Noise Event: Morning Run Canceled Due to Weather
events.description: Due to the rainy weather in the morning, Yin Hao temporarily canceled his planned morning run and switched to indoor stretching to maintain flexibility.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: The freshness of trying new things.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Focus, steadily advancing through technical challenges and skill enhancement.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao began using a time management app to schedule his days, received guidance on core strength from running friends, signed up for industry seminars, organized technical reports, was recommended a car museum by fishing friends, developed a core training plan, and stayed up late due to the large amount of information.

events.name: Start using the Time Block APP to plan your schedule.
events.description: On his morning commute, Yin Hao opened the newly downloaded Time Block app and attempted to plan out his day. He roughly divided his post-work time into several large blocks: [CNC theory study], [running/strength training], and [rest/gaming], setting reminders for each. This gave him a clearer expectation for how he would spend his evening.

events.name: Accept professional guidance on core strength training for runners.
events.description: After his morning run, Yin Hao asked A Jie for advice on how to prevent running injuries. A Jie immediately invited him to visit the gym where he worked during the lunch break. At noon, Yin Hao arrived as promised. A Jie designed and demonstrated a set of core strength training exercises specifically for runners, including planks, side bridges, glute bridges, and bird-dogs. He explained the key points of force application and common mistakes for each exercise. Yin Hao followed along attentively and took notes on his phone's memo app.

events.name: Fishing enthusiast recommends Shanghai Auto Museum.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao received a WeChat message from his fishing buddy, Brother Wu (Wu Zhiqiang), strongly recommending him to visit the Shanghai Auto Museum. Brother Wu mentioned that the museum houses many classic vintage cars and engine dissection models, [which are absolutely up your alley as a mechanical enthusiast]. He also thoughtfully shared visiting tips and transportation routes, and Yin Hao was genuinely intrigued by the suggestion.

events.name: Register for the Industry Online Thematic Seminar
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao saw a notice on the company’s internal bulletin board about an online seminar with the theme [Efficient Programming Strategies and Common Problem Analysis for Five-Axis CNC Machine Tools]. This was exactly the direction he had been interested in at the industrial expo and a challenging aspect of his competition preparation. Without hesitation, he completed the online registration through the provided link.

events.name: Organize and submit the technical issue identification report.
events.description: Yin Hao compiled all the data records from the past few days regarding aperture size fluctuations, observed phenomena (such as the relationship between machine tool operation time and size variations), and key points discussed with Master Sun and Wang Lei into a concise and clear problem identification report. In the report, he preliminarily analyzed that the issue might be a combined effect of [thermal deformation of the machine tool spindle] and [micro-vibrations of the tool under specific parameters]. He also recommended applying for a precision calibration of the equipment and conducting a trial with fine-tuned cutting parameters. Before leaving work, he submitted the report to his mentor, Sun Jianguo, for review.

events.name: Develop a personal core strength training plan.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao followed the guidance provided by A Jie at noon and formally created a core strength training plan for himself, consisting of two sessions per week, each lasting 15 minutes. He then integrated this plan into his existing running training schedule. He intends to start implementing it from this Sunday.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Organized, ready to embrace an efficient day.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: A fruitful experience, with both new knowledge gained and new plans successfully implemented.

state.今日运动: Run 5 kilometers in the morning and receive guidance on core strength training.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Friday, Yin Hao used an app to plan his evening review, conducted complex competition preparation simulations, and smoothly launched small-scale production for a new project. Due to adjustments in weekend gathering plans, his exercise routine was modified, resulting in a slight weight gain.

events.name: Use the APP to plan your evening review.
events.description: During the morning rush hour on the subway, Yin Hao utilized his fragmented time to refine his schedule on the Time Block app: he set a time block from 19:30 to 21:00 in the evening for [Numerical Control Theory Review] and linked it to the chapters he needed to review. This advance planning strengthened his motivation to follow through with his evening study session.

events.name: Use the APP for daily recording and adjustments.
events.description: Before going to bed at night, Yin Hao reviewed his day on the APP. He marked his study tasks as completed, but because he spent extra time discussing work with colleagues in the evening, his originally planned gaming time was shortened, and his exercise plan was not carried out. Based on the actual situation, he moved the unfinished exercise block to the next morning in the APP and adjusted the arrangements for other time blocks accordingly.

events.name: Competition Preparation Training: Simulation of Complex Component Machining
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a second high-precision machining simulation, this time processing a more complex assembly component that included thin-walled and deep-cavity structures. He focused on practicing how to design clamping solutions to reduce machining deformation and experimented with different support point configurations during the simulation to compare the post-machining results.

events.name: New Project Small Batch Production Launch
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao's new key connector project entered the small-batch production phase. Following the optimized procedures and clamping plan, he initiated the machine tool to process the first piece. Upon completion, he immediately used a three-coordinate measuring instrument for full-dimensional inspection, and the results fully met the drawing requirements. Master Sun also nodded in approval after reviewing the data, indicating that preparations could be made for the official batch production scheduled for next week.

events.name: Cross-day event: Start planning weekend fishing activities
events.description: Yin Hao and his fishing buddy, Brother Wu, have tentatively agreed to go night fishing at Dianshan Lake next weekend, and they are starting to prepare their gear and check the weather.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, the week's work has been successfully concluded, and all plans are progressing as scheduled.

2025-04.daily_overview: On his day off, Yin Hao studied fishing techniques, planned a gathering for his comrades, strictly followed an app for learning, organized a trip to the automobile museum, called his parents, completed core strength training, and stayed up late due to social activities.

events.name: Research on the Optimization of Fishing Tackle and Fishing Techniques
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao sat at his desk, opened the [Fishing Home] forum and several fishing video bloggers' channels, and systematically studied the line setups, float selection, and adjustment techniques corresponding to different fishing methods (such as Taiwan fishing). He compared his own set of beginner fishing gear, thought about which components could be prioritized for upgrades, and took simple notes.

events.name: Initiate a discussion on night fishing topics in the forum.
events.description: As the weather warms up, Yin Hao has developed an interest in night fishing. He posted a thread in the Shanghai section of the [Fishing Home] forum titled: [Night Fishing Tips for Dianshan Lake in Late Spring and Early Summer], asking about precautions for night fishing during this season, recommended target fish species, and necessary equipment. After posting, local fishing enthusiasts gradually replied, offering him plenty of practical advice.

events.name: Initiating a Proposal for an Annual Gathering of Comrades-in-Arms
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took the initiative to speak in a WeChat group named [Iron Triangle] (which includes Zhang Jianguo in Hangzhou and Zhou Xiaofeng in Shenzhen), suggesting that they find time to get together this summer. He first threw out the idea and asked for everyone's opinions. Zhang Jianguo responded immediately, and Zhou Xiaofeng also expressed that he would try to arrange it. The three began preliminary discussions about the approximate time (such as August) and location preferences (Zhang Jianguo suggested camping in Anji, Zhejiang), and the atmosphere became lively.

events.name: Use the APP to strictly plan the Saturday study day.
events.description: Today, Yin Hao decided to use the time-blocking app to plan his entire day. He divided Saturday morning into [theoretical review] and [organizing practical points], the afternoon into [rest/handling miscellaneous tasks] and [exercise], and the evening into [family calls]. He set alarm reminders for each time block and tried to strictly follow the plan, finding that his efficiency had indeed improved.

events.name: Plan a visit to the automobile museum tomorrow.
events.description: After the lunch break, Yin Hao looked up the specific address, opening hours, and ticket prices (with discounts available for online purchases) of the Shanghai Auto Museum. He also meticulously planned the route from his home in Songjiang, which involved taking Metro Line 9, transferring to Line 11, and then taking a short bus ride. The entire journey was expected to take about an hour and a half. He decided to go tomorrow afternoon.

events.name: Routine video call with parents.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao video-called his parents right on time. He reported that his work had earned praise from his mentor and shared his progress in preparing for the senior technician certification. His mother, Wang Xiuying, was delighted to hear the news and mentioned that she would send him some cured meat and clams from their hometown. His father, Yin Jianguo, shared a story about how he had cleverly used a discarded part to fix an old tractor he was repairing recently. Yin Hao listened with great interest, and the two even discussed a few points about mechanical principles.

events.name: Completed the first independent core strength training session.
events.description: According to the plan made on Wednesday, Yin Hao independently completed a 15-minute core strength training session during his afternoon exercise block for the first time. Recalling the key points of the movements taught by Ajie, he diligently performed exercises like planks and glute bridges. Although his muscles felt a bit sore, he felt great, as it provided a more stable foundation for his running.

events.name: Random Event: Impromptu gathering with friends in the evening
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao was invited by his friend Gao Zhiyuan to sing at a KTV, and the gathering lasted until late, resulting in him staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the freedom of the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, it encompasses both the exploration of personal interests and the bonds of family and friendship.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yin Hao visited the Shanghai Auto Museum, immersing himself in the beauty of machinery, exchanging real-time updates with fishing friends, reviewing electrical safety knowledge, analyzing running data, and going to bed early due to fatigue from the visit.

events.name: Immersive Tour of the Shanghai Auto Museum
events.description: After lunch, Yin Hao followed the planned route and arrived at the Shanghai Auto Museum in Anting, Jiading, in about an hour and a half. After purchasing a ticket and entering the museum, he started his visit from the antique car hall on the first floor and gradually made his way upward. He was deeply captivated by the classic car models that still shone brilliantly despite the passage of time. In particular, he lingered for a long time in front of a Hongqi CA770 sedan, carefully observing its body craftsmanship and interior details.

events.name: Study the structure of the engine and real-time communication.
events.description: In the engine dissection model exhibition area, Yin Hao saw a fully dissected V8 engine, with its intricate internal components—crankshaft, connecting rods, and pistons—clearly visible. As he observed, he communicated in real-time via WeChat with Brother Wu, the fishing enthusiast who had recommended the visit, sharing photos and engaging in lively discussions about the challenges of restoring vintage cars and the working principles of engines.

events.name: Return Journey and Sharing Experiences
events.description: Before the museum closed, Yin Hao concluded his visit and set off for home. That evening, he carefully selected a few photos of classic car models and engine details he had taken and posted them on his social media feed, captioning them with, "Machinery is frozen art." Wu Ge quickly commented below, and the two chatted privately for quite a while, agreeing to discuss today's experiences in detail during their next fishing trip. This visit greatly satisfied his interest in machinery and deepened his friendship with his fishing buddy.

events.name: Review Electrical Safety Knowledge
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Yin Hao took some time to focus on reviewing the sections of the low-voltage electrician certification exam related to safety operating procedures and electric shock first aid. He also watched several cautionary videos of accident cases, reinforcing the principle of "safety first."

events.name: Supplementary Event: Analyze Running Data for the Second Week
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao checked the data from the past week (including the 10-kilometer race) on his running app. He was delighted to find that, at the same pace, his heart rate during running had significantly decreased compared to previous weeks, indicating an improvement in cardiovascular function and running economy. He shared this positive change with A Jie, and the two confirmed that the training strategy for the third week was to [maintain intensity and consolidate results].

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Filled with the anticipation of exploration.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Pleasure, deeply moved, immersed in the beauty of machinery and the satisfaction of resonating with friends.

state.今日运动: Visiting the museum on foot, with approximately 10,000 steps taken.

2025-04.daily_overview: In the new week, Yin Hao provided feedback to his cousin about his experience using the app. At work, the team investigated accuracy issues, but the program optimization was not entirely successful. Due to stress, he experienced weight loss and felt slightly down.

events.name: Provide feedback to cousin about APP usage experience
events.description: On his way to work, Yin Hao sent a long WeChat message to his cousin Chen Xiaowen, sharing his initial thoughts on using the Time Block app over the past few days. He felt that [by visualizing time, he could indeed become more aware of where his time was spent, and sometimes he even felt embarrassed about spending too much time on his phone]. He thanked his cousin for the recommendation and expressed his intention to continue trying it out to see if he could develop a habit.

events.name: Team Division of Labor to Investigate Accuracy Issues
events.description: The issue report submitted last week has received due attention. This morning, Sun Jianguo, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang formed a temporary team. Master Sun, along with Yin Hao, used a dial indicator to measure the radial runout and axial movement of the machine tool spindle. Wang Lei was responsible for inventorying and measuring the wear of all relevant tools in the tool magazine. Meanwhile, Liu Zhiqiang sat in front of the computer, meticulously checking the G-code of the machining program line by line, searching for any instructions that might cause vibration.

events.name: First attempt at program optimization
events.description: In the afternoon, based on Liu Zhiqiang's analysis, he suspected that the cutting parameters of the original program (especially the feed rate in the finishing stage) were set too aggressively, causing the tool to experience [tool deflection] during the latter half of the machining process. He optimized the cutting parameters by reducing the feed rate for finishing and slightly increasing the finishing allowance. Yin Hao imported the new program into the machine tool and conducted a small batch trial production of 10 pieces under the supervision of Master Sun. However, measurement results before the end of the workday showed that the precision issue had improved but was not completely resolved, as fluctuations in hole diameter still persisted.

events.name: New Project Small Batch Production and Process Sampling Inspection
events.description: While troubleshooting old issues, the small-batch production of the new project overseen by Yin Hao also continued. He operated the machine tool to process parts and, following the quality control plan, sampled two pieces at 10 a.m. and 3 p.m. each for critical dimension inspections. The recorded data indicated stable processes and qualified product quality.

events.name: Emotional fluctuations due to work bottlenecks.
events.description: Due to unresolved technical issues, Yin Hao felt increasing pressure and listened to music alone at night to relax, feeling somewhat low in spirits.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Steady and prepared to tackle challenges at work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Focused yet slightly confused and downcast, the technical breakthrough has encountered a bottleneck.

2025-04.daily_overview: Yin Hao participated in an online industry seminar and asked questions, received the project bonus and allocated it as planned, injected funds into the home purchase savings, engaged in team technical discussions to brainstorm ideas, performed parameter fine-tuning during production, with the status being completely consistent with the healthy end state.

events.name: Morning Running Training
events.description: After waking up at 6:15 AM, I completed a 5-kilometer morning run on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District, maintaining a pace of approximately 5 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer. I strictly used a running app to track my data and focused on recovery to ensure the effectiveness of my training.

events.name: Participate in online thematic seminars and ask questions
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into the online meeting on time. He attentively listened to the industry expert's sharing on five-axis programming strategies, focusing on taking notes about techniques for optimizing tool paths and suppressing vibrations. During the Q&A session, he mustered the courage to turn on his microphone and described the issue of deformation in thin-walled part machining that he had encountered at work. The expert offered suggestions such as adjusting the cutting sequence and adopting high-speed, light-cutting strategies, which gave Yin Hao a sudden sense of clarity.

events.name: Received project bonus
events.description: While working in the afternoon, Yin Hao's phone vibrated, and he received a bank SMS notification informing him that a bonus of XXXX yuan had been deposited into his salary card, with the remark [New Parts Processing Project Award]. This was a clear acknowledgment of his successful completion of the critical connector project last month, filling him with a sense of joy.

events.name: Plan bonus distribution
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao quickly planned the use of the bonus according to his consistent financial principles in his phone memo: 60% would be deposited into the [Home Fund] fixed-term account, 30% would be kept in a current account as daily emergency funds, and 10% would be used to reward himself by purchasing the professional running shoes he had long had his eye on.

events.name: Perform the bonus distribution operation.
events.description: Upon returning home from work, Yin Hao immediately logged into his mobile banking app. He first transferred 60% of his bonus into the slightly higher-interest [Home Fund] fixed-term account. Watching the savings for his home purchase grow a little more, he felt a deep sense of reassurance. Next, he left 30% in his salary card to ensure ample funds for living expenses and emergencies over the coming months. Finally, he opened the shopping app and used the reserved 10% of his bonus to place an order for the running shoes he had been eyeing.

events.name: Share the joy with your parents.
events.description: After completing all the tasks, Yin Hao contacted his parents via WeChat video call. He happily told them that he had received the project bonus and had already saved a portion of it as planned, while also treating himself a little. His parents were very pleased to hear this. His father praised him for being well-organized, while his mother reminded him not to focus solely on saving money and to take good care of himself by eating well and dressing comfortably.

events.name: Team Technical Discussion Meeting, Brainstorming Session
events.description: During the day in the workshop, the team held a brief meeting to address the unresolved precision issue. Drawing on years of experience, Sun Jianguo raised a previously overlooked possibility: the clamping force of the workpiece fixture might be uneven, causing microscopic displacement of the workpiece during processing. Wang Lei supplemented this with vibration data he had observed at different tool speeds. Yin Hao also shared the faint, abnormal whistling sound he had noticed during his own operations. The team decided to simultaneously verify three aspects the next day: the force distribution of the fixture, the idle travel path of the program, and the dynamic balance of the tool.

events.name: Fine-tuning of parameters during the production process.
events.description: During the production of a new project, Yin Hao noticed that the measurement of an outer diameter dimension showed a gradual increasing trend across three consecutive parts. Without taking it lightly, he immediately paused the machining process and inspected the tool cutting edge and the clamping force of the fixture. After a brief discussion with Liu Zhiqiang, he made a fine adjustment to the tool compensation value of the machine tool (reducing it by 2 micrometers), and the dimensions of the subsequently machined parts returned to stability. This strict control over the process is a reflection of his ISTJ personality.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Smooth

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Double satisfaction, encompassing both the fulfillment of learning gains and the sense of steadiness and accomplishment from steadily advancing financial plans.

2025-04.daily_overview: Wednesday, a workday. During the day, Yin Hao focused his energy primarily on tackling technical challenges and handling daily production tasks in the workshop, successfully resolving a technical issue that had been troubling the team. As the workday neared its end, he learned about ways to relax and maintain well-being through casual conversations with colleagues. In the evening, he systematically organized the knowledge gained from the online training he attended the previous day, showcasing his methodical and professional habits.

events.name: Optimize and adjust to solve processing accuracy issues.
events.description: In response to the unstable machining accuracy issues that arose in recent days, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang formed a temporary task force. In the morning, Yin Hao and Wang Lei redesigned and adjusted the workpiece fixture, adding auxiliary support points to ensure an even distribution of clamping force. In the afternoon, Liu Zhiqiang carefully fine-tuned the tool's approach path to the workpiece based on the new clamping scheme, avoiding excessive cutting force during the first pass. After the adjustments were completed, Yin Hao, with his extensive operational experience, personally conducted the second trial machining. Throughout the process, he remained highly focused, and after finishing each part, he immediately collaborated with the quality inspector to measure it using a coordinate measuring machine. The measurement data showed a significant improvement in accuracy, but there were still slight fluctuations between batches. Yin Hao believed that further observation and verification were needed to ensure stability.

events.name: Complete daily production and sampling inspection.
events.description: While tackling technical challenges, Yin Hao also proceeded with the small-batch production task of another project as planned. He focused on machine operation throughout the day and increased the frequency of random inspections compared to usual, closely monitoring whether the adjusted process parameters were running stably. Before leaving work, he meticulously counted the number of qualified processed products and completed the production records.

events.name: After-Work Chats and Health Awareness
events.description: After work, Yin Hao ran into his colleague Wang Lei in the locker room. During their casual chat, Yin Hao mentioned that he had been working overtime continuously and sticking to his running training lately, feeling some tension and fatigue in his calf muscles. The outgoing Wang Lei immediately recommended a wellness center in Songjiang District that he and his friends often visited and spoke highly of, vividly sharing the benefits of full-body relaxation after a foot massage. After hearing this, Yin Hao thought it was worth a try—not only to relieve fatigue but also as an investment in his health—and decided to find time to experience it.

events.name: Organize online seminar notes
events.description: Upon returning home in the evening, Yin Hao did not immediately rest or engage in leisure activities. He turned on his computer and systematically organized and categorized the scattered notes he had taken during the online CNC technology seminar the previous night, grouping them by topics such as processing techniques, tool selection, and troubleshooting. He highlighted key knowledge points and practical advice provided by the lecturer using different colors and sorted the electronic materials, such as the seminar’s PowerPoint presentations, into dedicated folders for easy access and review in the future. This habit of summarizing and organizing reflects the ISTJ personality trait of valuing structure and efficiency.

events.name: Monthly Financial Record Update
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao remembered the project bonus he had received a few days earlier. He opened the electronic spreadsheet on his personal computer and meticulously updated his income and expense records for the month. Not only did he record the source and amount of the bonus, but he also clearly marked the allocation of the funds according to his predetermined budget ratio—60% for housing savings, 30% for daily expenses, and 10% for self-rewards. After updating the records, he specifically checked the virtual balance of the savings account named "Home Fund" and felt satisfied with his clear financial tracking.

events.name: Evening Routine: Music and Mobile Games
events.description: In between organizing notes and keeping accounts, Yin Hao, as usual, played his favorite playlist on his phone as background music. Before going to bed, he went online and teamed up with his gaming friend Zhang Fei for two rounds of "Honor of Kings," relaxing his tense nerves in the virtual world.

events.name: Added: Mild anxiety due to work pressure
events.description: While organizing his notes in the evening, Yin Hao felt a hint of anxiety, worrying about whether tomorrow's technical verification task could be completely resolved. He took a deep breath to adjust his emotions, reminding himself to focus on the present task.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a focus on today's technology verification task.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study room at home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and somewhat rewarding, progress has been made on technical issues, personal matters have also been handled, but there is indeed a slight sense of physical fatigue.

state.今日运动: There is a significant amount of walking and standing work throughout the day in the workshop, with no dedicated physical exercise.

2025-04.daily_overview: Thursday, a workday. Yin Hao is juggling multiple tasks simultaneously: adjusting plans for weekend overtime, advancing preparations for the fishing activity, while a critical technical breakthrough in the workshop is entering its key validation phase, and daily work is also nearing completion. He demonstrates strong adaptability and task management skills, staying busy yet organized.

events.name: Dealing with Temporary Overtime Adjustment Plans
events.description: During his morning commute, Yin Hao received a notification from his team that due to an earlier client deadline, they would need to work overtime this Saturday to catch up on production. He immediately took out his phone, opened the time management app he used to plan his exam preparation studies, and quickly rescheduled the remaining study tasks for the week to the following week, making room for the overtime work. This kind of flexible adjustment had become routine for him.

events.name: Book a foot massage at the wellness center.
events.description: During his lunch break, Yin Hao used a mobile app to look up the wellness center recommended by Wang Lei the day before. He browsed through user reviews and service descriptions, and ultimately chose a time slot after work on April 18th (Friday) to book a 60-minute classic foot massage. He then completed the online payment.

events.name: Study new project drawings and programming.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took over the preliminary preparations for a new project involving complex surface machining. Holding a thick stack of blueprints, he carefully studied the technical requirements and tolerance ranges in the workshop. Whenever he encountered uncertainties, he proactively sought guidance from his mentor, Sun Jianguo. Together, they reviewed the existing CNC programming plan. The mentor used a pen to circle several key points on the blueprint, pointing out potential bottlenecks that could affect machining efficiency and surface quality. This experience proved highly beneficial for Yin Hao.

events.name: Confirm the weekend fishing activity arrangements.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao confirmed the details of the fishing trip scheduled for this Sunday (April 20) with his fishing buddy, Brother Wu, via WeChat. The two finalized the specific meeting time and location, and reviewed the list of fishing gear and bait to bring. After returning home, Yin Hao checked his tackle box, fishing rod, and outdoor folding chair to ensure all equipment was ready.

events.name: Multi-batch Stability Testing
events.description: To thoroughly verify the stability of the optimized fixture and process plan from yesterday, the team decided to conduct continuous multi-batch processing tests. Yin Hao was responsible for operating the machine tool, strictly following the optimized plan throughout the afternoon. Master Sun and Liu Zhiqiang monitored the entire process, recording data such as processing time and spindle load for each batch, and measuring the machining results. After a full day of intensive testing, the machining accuracy finally stabilized within the acceptable range. The team breathed a sigh of relief and proceeded to finalize and archive the confirmed process parameters and program version.

events.name: Complete the task of small batch production.
events.description: Yin Hao completed the processing of the final batch of parts for another small-scale production project he was handling. He wiped all the finished parts clean, attached identification labels, and organized all the quality records and operation logs from the entire production cycle. He prepared to deliver everything to the quality inspection department the following day for final inspection.

events.name: Detect and preliminarily address abnormal tool wear.
events.description: As the workday was nearing its end, while machining another routine part, Yin Hao noticed that the machining sound had become dull and slight vibration marks had appeared on the workpiece surface. Combined with regular inspections, he observed that the tool wear rate was significantly faster than expected. He immediately halted the machine and inspected the tool's cutting edge and the coolant spray. Drawing from his experience, he preliminarily concluded that the issue might not be a simple tool problem but could be related to programming parameters or the characteristics of the batch material. He promptly contacted programmer Liu Zhiqiang and quality inspector Wang Lei, who was on patrol, via the internal communication system, scheduling a "consultation" for early the next morning.

events.name: New: Temporary overtime to handle urgent orders
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao voluntarily worked overtime for two hours to assist with production due to an urgent order that came in unexpectedly. He focused on operating the machine tools to ensure product quality but felt physically exhausted.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Stay alert and be prepared for the various tasks of the day.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Relaxation after being busy, looking forward to handling the knife issue tomorrow and the technical review dinner, but feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, activities within the workshop throughout the day.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday, a workday. It was a fulfilling and productive day. During the day, Yin Hao successfully diagnosed and resolved a sudden technical issue related to tool wear in the workshop, demonstrating excellent problem-solving skills. After work, he honored his commitment to personal health by experiencing a foot massage for the first time, effectively alleviating the accumulated fatigue from the past few days.

events.name: Organize a post-mortem dinner with colleagues.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao sent a message in the small WeChat group with Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang, confirming the specific time and location for tomorrow's (Saturday) evening dinner—a local cuisine restaurant they all enjoy. He suggested using this gathering to conduct an informal review and discussion of the recently completed [New Parts Processing Project], to which Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang both agreed.

events.name: In-depth analysis of tool wear issues
events.description: As soon as he started work, Yin Hao pulled Liu Zhiqiang and Wang Lei over to the problematic machine tool. He retrieved the recent operational data records of the machine, which showed a significant increase in spindle load during the latter half of the machining process. The three of them carefully reviewed the machining program code, paying close attention to parameters such as cutting speed and feed rate. Based on his years of operational experience, Yin Hao suggested that the current carbide tool might be unable to withstand the higher feed rate set in the program, leading to excessive accumulation of frictional heat. After comparing with the tool manual, Liu Zhiqiang agreed with this assessment.

events.name: Propose and implement solutions
events.description: Based on the analysis, Yin Hao proposed an adjustment plan to reduce the feed rate while increasing the coolant flow and pressure. He compiled the analysis results, data screenshots, and the adjustment plan into a concise report, which he presented to his mentor, Sun Jianguo. After reviewing the report, Sun, drawing on his own experience, confirmed the root cause of the issue and the feasibility of the plan. He patted Yin Hao on the shoulder in approval and authorized them to proceed with the implementation. Following this, Yin Hao collaborated with Liu Zhiqiang to modify the program parameters on the machine tool, adjust the cooling system, and replace the cutting tool for a small-batch trial run. Yin Hao closely monitored the entire machining process.

events.name: Project Closure and Handover of Work
events.description: In the afternoon, the small-batch production phase overseen by Yin Hao officially concluded. He reported the overall situation of this production run to Master Sun and team leader Wang Lei, including the total output, final qualification rate, as well as the abnormal tool issue encountered during the process and its solution. He handed over the organized production records and remaining materials, then began meticulously cleaning the machine tools and work area to prepare for the upcoming week’s tasks.

events.name: First Experience with Foot Massage
events.description: After work, Yin Hao drove his own car from the company to the wellness center located in Songjiang District. The interior of the shop was dimly lit and quiet, accompanied by soothing light music. A professional masseuse performed a 60-minute foot massage for him, demonstrating skilled techniques that specifically alleviated the tension in his calf and plantar muscles caused by prolonged standing at work and running training. During the massage, Yin Hao felt his muscles gradually relax from their initial tightness.

events.name: Rest and Return After Massage
events.description: After the massage, Yin Hao rested briefly on the sofa in the lounge area, sipping a cup of warm health tea provided by the shop. He felt completely relaxed. After completing the payment at the front desk, he left the wellness center and drove back home.

events.name: Optimize the processing procedures for new projects.
events.description: In the evening, drawing on the new knowledge he had acquired from the online seminars over the past few days, Yin Hao sat in front of his home computer and began designing an optimized toolpath for the complex surface project he had seen during the day. He focused on refining the entry point locations, cutting sequence, and stepover, with the goal of reducing idle travel, improving machining efficiency and surface finish, and drafted preliminary cutting parameter settings. Once completed, he saved the document, planning to consult Master Sun about it the next day.

events.name: Online communication with running friends before bedtime.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao chatted with his running buddy Chen Jie (A Jie) on WeChat, sharing the sense of accomplishment from successfully solving a technical problem today, and they agreed to go for their usual morning run tomorrow.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Positive, looking forward to solving technical problems and enjoying the relaxing experience in the evening.

结束状态.所处地点: In the bedroom at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed, the physical fatigue has been greatly alleviated, and I feel content with today's performance.

state.今日运动: No specific sports, but deep relaxation was achieved through foot therapy.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: Saturday, a day off. In the morning, Yin Hao went for his regular morning run and discussed technical solutions with his mentor. In the afternoon, he purchased supplies for the next day's fishing trip. In the evening, he enjoyed a pleasant dinner with his colleagues, where they reviewed the project and shared life experiences in a relaxed atmosphere, further strengthening their camaraderie.

events.name: Weekend Morning Run
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao met up with his running partner, A Jie, as planned near the Guangfulin Archaeological Park for a one-hour relaxed run. The spring morning air was fresh, and as they ran, they chatted. Yin Hao mentioned his ideas for optimizing the tool path design from the previous night. Although A Jie didn’t understand the technical details, he encouraged Yin Hao to keep experimenting.

events.name: Review and optimize the plan with the master.
events.description: After returning home in the morning, Yin Hao printed out the complex surface machining optimization plan he had designed the night before. Carrying the blueprints and his laptop, he went to find his mentor, Sun Jianguo. The two met at a café downstairs from Sun's home, where they discussed every detail of the plan over coffee. Drawing on his years of experience, Sun offered more reliable suggestions for adjusting several key parameters and pointed out a few potential risks. After thorough discussion, they finalized a more refined and optimized machining plan.

events.name: Procurement of Fishing and Barbecue Supplies
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove to a large supermarket near his home to purchase ingredients for tomorrow's fishing and barbecue outing with Brother Wu. He carefully selected marinated beef and lamb skewers, chicken wings, fresh corn, and vegetables. He also bought barbecue seasoning, cumin powder, chili powder, as well as plenty of drinking water and snacks. The shopping cart was filled to the brim.

events.name: Dining with colleagues to review the project
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao drove to a local cuisine restaurant near Songjiang University Town to meet up with Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. The three of them ordered several signature dishes and chatted while eating. The conversation naturally centered on the recently and successfully resolved [New Parts Processing Project]. Yin Hao shared the complete operational experience, from discovering the abnormal cutting tools to finally identifying the parameter mismatch. Liu Zhiqiang explained the key debugging logic and data analysis methods from a programming perspective, while Wang Lei, from the viewpoint of quality inspection and team coordination, emphasized the importance of timely communication in teamwork. The atmosphere was lively and candid.

events.name: Casual Dining, Conversation, and Games
events.description: After the technical discussion came to an end, the three of them started talking about the upcoming company vocational skills competition, with Yin Hao mentioning that he was actively preparing for it. Then, the conversation shifted to their shared hobby, "Honor of Kings," where they discussed the strengths and weaknesses of heroes in the new version and shared interesting gameplay strategies. They also exchanged some amusing stories from their daily lives, filling the room with laughter.

events.name: Share Foot Massage Experience
events.description: During a break in the gathering, Yin Hao mentioned to Wang Lei the foot massage experience from the previous day, noting that it was indeed effective and had greatly relaxed his calves. He expressed his gratitude for the recommendation. Wang Lei proudly replied, [I’ll let you know about other great spots next time.]

events.name: Routine family phone call
events.description: After returning home from the dinner gathering, Yin Hao made his weekly video call to his parents. He told them about successfully fixing a faulty socket in his rented apartment that day, showcasing his practical skills. His father nodded in approval upon hearing this. His mother, on the other hand, focused on asking about his plans for the May Day holiday. When she learned that Yin Hao planned to go camping in the suburbs with friends in Shanghai, although she missed him, she felt reassured that her son was living a fulfilling life. His father reminded him to always follow safety protocols when operating machinery at work and shared some of his own experiences handling emergencies in the factory when he was younger. The call lasted about forty minutes—warm and brief.

events.name: Evening Game Time
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao went online and teamed up with his comrade-in-arms Zhang Jianguo and gaming friend Zhang Fei to play a few rounds of "Honor of Kings," continuing to strengthen their friendship on the virtual battlefield.

events.name: Added: Overeating due to social gatherings
events.description: During the dinner, Yin Hao ate too much braised pork and drank too much beer, which caused him to feel discomfort in his stomach in the evening. He decided to reduce his intake starting tomorrow.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and cheerful, welcome a free day off.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The joy after social satisfaction, better relationships with colleagues, full of anticipation for tomorrow's fishing, but a slight discomfort in the stomach.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a light breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday, a day of rest. Yin Hao indulged in a day fully dedicated to his hobby. From dawn till dusk, he spent time with his fishing buddy, Brother Wu, by the shores of Dianshan Lake. Not only did he experience the joy of fishing and the thrill of success, but he also deepened his friendship through barbecuing and heartfelt conversations. It was a perfect opportunity for both physical and mental relaxation.

events.name: Head to the fishing spot at Dianshan Lake.
events.description: As dawn was just breaking, Yin Hao set off in his car, heading towards a meeting point in Songjiang District that he had arranged with Brother Wu. After they met up, Brother Wu, who was familiar with the route, led the way as they traveled together to a quiet fishing spot they often visited at Dianshan Lake in Qingpu District. Along the way, the two chatted about recent fishing conditions and their respective work.

events.name: Set up the fishing spot and prepare to fish.
events.description: After arriving at the lake, the two chose a spot on the shore with lush aquatic plants, sheltered from the wind and facing the sun. They skillfully set up the fishing platform, put up the sunshade, and adjusted their fishing gear. Brother Wu took out a new bait formula that he had recently tried with great success and shared it with Yin Hao, explaining the techniques for using it. Yin Hao listened carefully, eager to give it a try.

events.name: Enjoy the Fun of Fishing
events.description: With preparations complete, the two cast their lines into the water and began their quiet wait. The lake shimmered with ripples, and occasionally, birds flew overhead. During this time, Brother Wu occasionally shared subtle insights on reading the float and the timing of lifting the rod. Yin Hao tried using the new bait Brother Wu had given him, and sure enough, it wasn’t long before he felt a tug. He successfully reeled in several plump crucian carp, and the joy of the catch brought a broad smile to his face. At midday, the two simply had lunch with the dry provisions and fruit they had brought along, replenished their fluids, and enjoyed a brief rest.

events.name: Lakeside Barbecue and Heart-to-Heart Conversation
events.description: The afternoon fishing was only moderately successful, so the two decided to pack up early. They found a designated safe area by the lake where open flames were allowed and began preparing for a barbecue. Yin Hao brought out the ingredients he had purchased the day before, while Brother Wu demonstrated his skilled grilling techniques. As they grilled and ate, their conversation gradually shifted from fishing techniques to their recent work situations, family lives, and future plans. Brother Wu shared amusing stories from his auto repair shop, while Yin Hao recounted his experiences tackling technical challenges at the company. Amidst delicious food and natural scenery, their friendship deepened further.

events.name: Clearing the Site and Returning
events.description: After the barbecue, the two carefully packed up all the equipment and made sure to clean up all the trash, such as bamboo skewers and packaging bags, placing them into garbage bags to take away, demonstrating the environmental awareness of outdoor enthusiasts. Afterward, they bid farewell and drove back separately. By the time Yin Hao arrived home, it was already evening.

events.name: Handling the Catch and Organizing Equipment
events.description: Upon returning home, Yin Hao placed the freshly caught crucian carp into a basin of water to keep them alive, planning to make soup with them the next day. After that, he moved the fishing gear, barbecue grill, and other items covered in mud and traces of lake water to the balcony. He carefully cleaned and dried them, preparing everything for the next use.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Excited and looking forward to it, getting ready for outdoor activities.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Tired but immensely satisfied, both body and mind have been fully relaxed and delighted.

state.今日运动: Outdoor fishing, walking, and light labor, lasting approximately 10 hours.

date_attribute.weather: It's a cloudy day with a slight chill.

2025-04.daily_overview: Monday, a workday. After a relaxing weekend, Yin Hao returned to work with renewed energy. He successfully applied the optimization plan to the production of the new project, achieving a promising start. At the same time, he did not forget his personal goals, conducting a phase summary of his recent running training and engaging in in-depth discussions with fellow runners to steadily advance toward his half-marathon objective.

events.name: First Trial Processing of the New Project Optimization Plan
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao imported the complex surface machining optimization program, which had been finalized with Master Sun last Friday, into the CNC machine. Under Master Sun's on-site supervision, he conducted a rigorous first-piece trial machining. Throughout the process, he kept his eyes fixed on the machine's operation interface and the workpiece, recording key data such as spindle speed and feed rate. He then compared this data with the pre-optimization figures to verify the actual effectiveness of the new solution in improving efficiency and ensuring quality. The trial machining results met expectations, and Master Sun nodded in approval, indicating that small-batch trial production could proceed.

events.name: Summarize the progress of running training.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao took out his phone and opened the running tracking app, carefully reviewing the data from the past three weeks (since the 10-kilometer test race in early April): running volume, pace, heart rate zone distribution, and more. He was delighted to find that his aerobic endurance foundation had become quite solid, with his average pace steadily improving. He noted down his progress points and the recent bottlenecks he had encountered, such as [inability to increase cadence] and [significant fatigue in the latter half of long-distance runs].

events.name: Engage in in-depth conversations with fellow runners.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao made a rather long phone call to his running buddy and fitness coach, A Jie. He shared his training summary and data, focusing on seeking advice about optimizing stride frequency and managing fatigue during long-distance runs. A Jie patiently offered professional suggestions, such as adjusting arm swing amplitude and incorporating tempo runs, and once again emphasized the importance of core strength training. This conversation gave Yin Hao a clearer direction for his next phase of training.

events.name: Fault Troubleshooting Simulation Training
events.description: In the evening, to prepare for the upcoming vocational skills competition, Yin Hao conducted specialized training at home using simulation software. He focused on simulating several typical scenarios that might occur during the competition, such as machine tool alarms or sudden abnormalities in machining dimensions, practicing how to quickly and accurately diagnose the causes of faults and resolve them. This targeted training effectively enhances his ability to adapt under the high-pressure environment of the competition.

events.name: New project stable mass production
events.description: After completing the first-article verification, the new complex surface project officially adopted the optimized and stable solution for mass production. As the primary operator, Yin Hao maintained a high level of focus throughout the afternoon production shift, closely monitoring the machine's operating status and the surface quality of each workpiece. He strictly followed the process requirements, periodically sampling workpieces for critical dimension measurements. The entire day's production proceeded smoothly, with the product qualification rate meeting the expected target, marking the successful completion of the technical breakthrough from drawing analysis to program optimization.

events.name: New: Dietary adjustments due to weekend eating habits
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao decided to have a light meal to balance out the weekend barbecue, preparing homemade vegetable soup and steamed fish to reduce fat intake.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, the weekend's relaxation has filled him with motivation for the new week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study room at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Steady and slightly accomplished, work is progressing smoothly, and personal training is also clearly planned.

state.今日运动: No specialized physical exercise, routine activities within the workshop.

2025-04.daily_overview: Tuesday, a workday. During the day, Yin Hao underwent a phased skill assessment conducted by his mentor and successfully resolved the lingering issue of tool wear from previous days. He compiled the entire technical problem-solving process into a report and shared it with the team, demonstrating his ability to summarize and impart technical knowledge. In the evening, he engaged in intensive training for the upcoming competition, with his performance steadily improving.

events.name: Accept the master's periodic skill assessment.
events.description: In the morning, Master Sun Jianguo arranged a simulation test for Yin Hao to assess his recent learning progress and competition preparation. He was required to independently complete the programming and simulated machining of a complex part featuring various elements such as holes, grooves, and curved surfaces within a set time frame. Yin Hao calmly tackled the task, focusing intently on the CAD model and programming software on the screen. After the test, the master and apprentice sat together to conduct a detailed review of the simulated machining results and program code. Master Sun pointed out several details that could be optimized for efficiency, which Yin Hao carefully noted down.

events.name: Comprehensive Simulation Training for Competition Preparation
events.description: During the afternoon work break and in the evening, Yin Hao conducted his final high-intensity full-process comprehensive simulation. He strictly simulated the actual competition environment: time limits, an independent operating space, and potential unexpected disruptions. After completing the simulation, he organized all the practice logs from the entire preparation and training phase, systematically summarizing the gains and losses, including his strengths, areas prone to errors, and time allocation strategies, making the final mental and technical preparations for the official competition.

events.name: Write and share technical reports
events.description: Under the guidance of Master Sun, Yin Hao utilized his work breaks to compile the entire process of solving the abnormal tool wear issue from the previous week—from the problem symptoms, data retrieval, joint analysis with Liu Zhiqiang, proposed adjustment plans, implementation results, to the final parameter consolidation—into a detailed technical report. After completing the report, at the pre-shift meeting the next day, Yin Hao, as requested by Master Sun, briefly shared the lessons learned with other team members. He emphasized [the importance of matching fixture accuracy with program parameters] and [the method of tracing problem root causes through data], reminding everyone to prevent similar issues, which earned recognition from his colleagues.

events.name: Fine-tuning parameters to address tool wear.
events.description: Regarding the accelerated tool wear issue caused by another batch of materials discovered last Friday, Yin Hao and Liu Zhiqiang conducted an in-depth analysis and suspected that the standard cutting parameters did not match the hardness or toughness of this batch of materials. Under Liu Zhiqiang's remote guidance, Yin Hao carefully fine-tuned the feed rate and spindle speed on the machine tool and replaced it with a new tool for verification processing. After processing, the parts were inspected by Wang Lei, and the surface quality returned to acceptable standards, proving the effectiveness of the adjustments.

events.name: Reporting the Results of Problem Resolution
events.description: After a full day of production verification with the adjusted parameters, the tool wear rate returned to normal, and the expected tool lifespan increased by approximately 30% compared to before the issue occurred. Before the end of the workday, Yin Hao compiled a brief report detailing the entire process from discovery to resolution, along with the final results. He presented this report at the project progress meeting to team leader Wang Lei and relevant colleagues, bringing the project to a successful conclusion.

events.name: New: Slight soreness and discomfort in the right knee.
events.description: During the evening training session, Yin Hao felt a slight soreness in his right knee, likely caused by the recent increase in training intensity. He decided to rest and apply ice, adjusting his plans for the following day.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai City.
起始状态.心情: Serious and slightly tense, due to the pressure of skill testing and competition preparation.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Relieved and confident, with tests and issues smoothly resolved and preparations for the competition complete, yet knee discomfort brings a hint of concern.

2025-04.daily_overview: Wednesday, a workday. This was the last workday before the vocational skills competition, and Yin Hao’s work pace was relatively steady. He focused his main energy on the final full-process simulation training, striving to adjust his condition to the best. At the same time, the daily production tasks were also completed smoothly.

events.name: Full-Process Simulation Training Review
