events.description: Today, Yin Hao utilized his spare time at work and in the evening to conduct the final pre-competition full-process simulation training, covering everything from reading blueprints and process analysis to programming and simulated machining. He strictly adhered to the competition's time limits, pushing himself to complete all steps under pressure. This training was primarily aimed at testing his comprehensive abilities, time management skills, and psychological stability. After completing it, he felt that his performance was solid and had discovered faster approaches for several time-consuming steps, boosting his confidence even further.

events.name: Daily Parts Processing and Delivery
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao methodically completed the planned parts processing tasks for the day. He cleaned all the qualified processed parts, attached the processing records and self-inspection reports, neatly arranged them on the transfer cart, and handed them over to his colleague in the next process. He gave a brief oral report to his supervisor about the processing task, and the process went smoothly.

events.name: Plan a reunion program for comrades-in-arms.
events.description: In the evening, thinking about the annual gathering he had previously arranged with his comrades, Yin Hao opened his phone's map and travel apps to research the tourist resources in Anji, Zhejiang. He came up with several preliminary activity ideas, such as camping and fishing by the reservoir, hiking and mountain climbing, or finding a unique farmhouse experience. He shared these ideas along with his initial travel plans in the [Iron Triangle] comrades' group chat to seek the opinions of Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng, hoping to finalize an activity framework that everyone would enjoy.

events.name: New: Adjusted exercise due to knee discomfort
events.description: Due to soreness in his right knee yesterday, Yin Hao suspended his running and strength training today, opting instead for light walking. He continued with ice therapy and focused on recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm and focused, with thoughts on tomorrow's match, yet a hint of anxiety lingers due to knee discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The unique pre-race calm and readiness, looking forward to tomorrow's performance, with the knee feeling somewhat improved.

state.今日运动: No specific exercise, light walking for 20 minutes.

2025-04.daily_overview: On Thursday, Yin Hao participated in the company-organized professional skills competition throughout the day. He fully immersed himself in the competition, demonstrating solid technical skills and stable psychological composure. After the competition, he felt somewhat tired, but more than that, he experienced a sense of relief and ease from having completed the challenge.

events.name: Participate in Vocational Skills Competitions
events.description: Today, Yin Hao took a full day off to participate in the Annual Professional Skills Competition (CNC Machine Operator Group) held at the company's training center. The competition included multiple segments such as a theoretical written test, part measurement and process planning, as well as practical machining operations. Relying on his solid accumulation of knowledge and targeted pre-competition training, Yin Hao remained calm and composed throughout the competition. Particularly during the practical operation segment, he encountered a simulated [tool compensation anomaly] fault. However, he quickly recalled a similar scenario from his training and calmly followed the troubleshooting and reset procedures. Ultimately, he successfully machined a part that met the requirements within the allotted time. Although the results will not be announced for a few days, he is satisfied with his overall performance today.

events.name: Post-match relaxation and communication with colleagues.
events.description: After the competition, Yin Hao and several colleagues who also participated had dinner together in the cafeteria. They shared interesting stories and challenges from the competition, creating a relaxed atmosphere. The nerves that had been tense all day finally began to ease.

events.name: Query and register for advanced technician training.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, though a bit tired, Yin Hao still turned on his computer, thinking about his long-term career goals. Through the official website of the Shanghai Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau, he found detailed information about the advanced CNC machine operator technician practical training intensive course for the second half of the year, including the start date, course outline, fees, and registration requirements. After carefully reading through the details, he completed the online registration and paid the deposit. Following that, he sent an email to his department supervisor, explaining his enrollment in the course and attaching the training notice. He also requested the company's support for the training and possible leave arrangements.

events.name: Plan the learning path for the electrician certificate.
events.description: Out of interest in mechatronics maintenance and a desire to expand his skills, Yin Hao decided to include obtaining the [Low-Voltage Electrician Operation Certificate] in his study plan. He compared several institutions offering online training and examination services through online searches and consultations with experienced mentors. Eventually, he selected a platform with a good reputation and a high pass rate, completing the registration and payment for the online theoretical course. Following this, he purchased the official textbook "Low-Voltage Electrician Operations," designated by the Ministry of Emergency Management, on Dangdang. After completing these steps, he marked learning milestones on his calendar, planning to allocate part of his evenings to studying this new skill.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Slightly nervous but full of fighting spirit, ready to take on the challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Exhausted yet relieved, a sense of ease after completing a major task, and filled with anticipation for future learning.

state.今日运动: High-intensity mental exertion with minimal physical activity.

2025-04.daily_overview: Friday, a workday. The first day after the competition, Yin Hao returned to his regular routine, handling some concluding and planning tasks. He began systematically organizing his fishing knowledge base and developed specific practical plans for future learning, bringing his life back to a steady and orderly rhythm.

events.name: Organize the Fishing Knowledge Base
events.description: Having some free time in the evening, Yin Hao turned on his computer and systematically organized the dozens of high-quality posts he had bookmarked over the past month on the [Fishing Home] forum, along with the scattered insights he had recorded after each fishing trip and the techniques he had learned from exchanges with friends like Brother Wu. He created several categorized folders, such as [Bait Recipes], [Seasonal Fishing Methods], [Equipment Maintenance], and [Fishing Spots Around Shanghai], and filed the materials accordingly, gradually building a personal fishing knowledge base. This process of organization helped him develop a more systematic understanding of his hobby.

events.name: Develop a fishing practice plan
events.description: Based on the theoretical knowledge about the spring feeding habits of crucian carp acquired through online learning, Yin Hao combined weather forecasts and weekend schedules to formulate a specific practical plan. He decided to try a [fishy and fragrant combination] bait formula recommended on a forum during his next fishing trip (possibly during the May Day holiday), and adjust the float's tuning to verify the learning outcomes. He recorded the plan and the special bait he needed to bring in his phone's memo app.

events.name: Conduct an electrician certification simulation test
events.description: After enrolling in the online course for low-voltage electricians, Yin Hao took some time tonight to log into the learning platform. He completed the first chapter, "Basic Knowledge of Electrical Engineering," and took a set of simulated test questions that accompanied the chapter. After answering the questions, he used the app's wrong-question notebook feature to record the knowledge points he got wrong, such as "the application of Ohm's Law in parallel circuits," marking them as content that requires focused review.

events.name: End-of-month family video call
events.description: This was the last routine family video call in April. Yin Hao summarized his work and life for the month to his parents: he participated in a skills competition, solved technical challenges, kept up with running, and even went fishing, feeling fulfilled and making progress. He specifically mentioned that he now has a regular morning running routine, laying the foundation for his future half-marathon goal. His mother, Wang Xiuying, happily told Yin Hao that she had received the calcium and vitamin supplements he bought for her online a few days earlier. She repeatedly reminded her son not to spend money carelessly, but her tone was full of joy. His father, Yin Jianguo, engaged in an in-depth discussion with Yin Hao about a professional issue regarding the impact of different tool materials in CNC machines on the precision of machining titanium alloy parts. The two chatted enthusiastically across the screen. At the end of the call, the parents once again expressed their support and longing for their son living away from home, agreeing to have a brief catch-up during the May Day holiday.

events.name: Added: Trying new recipes caused mild diarrhea.
events.description: Tried making spicy soup dumplings at night, but ended up with mild diarrhea due to excessive seasoning, so I decided to adjust my diet.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, recovering from the tension of the competition.

结束状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, I feel especially cozy after connecting with family, and my personal affairs are well-organized, though I'm feeling a bit under the weather physically.

2025-04.daily_overview: Saturday, a day off. Yin Hao engaged in long-distance endurance running training in the morning, while in the afternoon, he immersed himself in organizing and researching his personal hobbies. In the evening, a routine phone call with his mother unexpectedly triggered his heightened concern and sense of responsibility for his parents' home safety, marking an emotional turning point of the day.

events.name: Long-distance endurance running training
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao carried out his LSD (Long Slow Distance) training plan for the week. He ran 15 kilometers alone along the greenway in Songjiang New City, focusing on maintaining a steady pace and a stable heart rate. The spring morning sunlight and gentle breeze made the running process far from monotonous, and as he ran, he sorted through recent thoughts in his mind. After completing the training, he felt that his cardiovascular capacity had improved once again.

events.name: Systematically organize game strategies.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao summarized his systematic study of "Honor of Kings" over the past month. No longer satisfied with scattered notes, he opened a document and earnestly compiled several mature equipment and rune setups for his most proficient heroes (such as Sun Shangxiang and Zhao Yun). He also outlined general laning strategies and key tempo points for different roles (like the development lane and jungle), and organized countermeasures for common team compositions (such as multi-tank lineups and poke-oriented strategies). This document laid the foundation for his personal gaming knowledge system, marking a complete shift in his approach from [casual entertainment] to [strategic study].

events.name: Triggering parental concerns about home safety.
events.description: That evening, during his routine video call with his mother, Wang Xiuying, she casually mentioned that his father, Yin Jianguo, had gotten up to use the bathroom at night recently. Twice, to avoid turning on the main light and disturbing his sleep, he had only switched on a small night light. However, the dim light was insufficient, and he had nearly tripped over a small stool left by the bedroom door. His mother spoke without much thought, merely complaining offhandedly about his father’s habit of leaving things around. But when Yin Hao heard this, his heart immediately [sank], and he felt a genuine sense of worry. He realized that as his parents grew older, there might be unnoticed safety risks in their home environment back in their hometown.

events.name: Preliminary Conceptualization of Solutions
events.description: After ending the call with his mother, Yin Hao didn’t turn on a game or listen to music as he usually did. Feeling somewhat heavy-hearted, he sat at his desk and took out a notebook. He carefully jotted down a few keywords: [insufficient nighttime lighting], [bathroom floor slip resistance], [bedside assistance for getting up]. Centering on these core needs, he began to outline preliminary solutions, such as installing motion-sensor lights in the hallway and adding handrails and anti-slip mats in the bathroom. He decided to keep this matter in mind and implement it as soon as possible.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relax and get ready to enjoy your personal time over the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Worry and a sense of responsibility intertwined, I made up my mind to solve practical problems for my parents.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast with light rain in the evening.

2025-04.daily_overview: Sunday, a day of rest. Yin Hao devoted most of his energy to the [Parental Home Safety Upgrade Plan]. From conducting detailed product research to formulating specific plans, he demonstrated the practical, responsible, and efficient action typical of the ISTJ personality. This endeavor gave him a sense of maturity in taking responsibility for his family.

events.name: Conduct a detailed survey on home safety products.
events.description: For almost the entire day, Yin Hao sat in front of his computer, busy putting into action the ideas he had come up with the night before. He carefully searched and researched home safety products suitable for the elderly on e-commerce platforms such as Taobao and JD.com, as well as some home product review forums. He focused on comparing various motion-sensing night lights (light-sensitive + infrared), L-shaped safety handrails for bathrooms (material, load-bearing capacity), anti-slip mats (silicone material, easy to clean), and bedside assistive frames for getting up. He meticulously read product details and user reviews, paying special attention to whether installation was convenient and whether the products were suitable for the walls of his parents' old house. He then began compiling a detailed shopping list and budget.

events.name: Develop a detailed procurement and installation plan.
events.description: After initial research, Yin Hao felt more confident. He devised a step-by-step plan: the first stage involved purchasing essential items such as motion-sensor night lights, non-slip mats for the bathroom, and simple handrails. He estimated the cost and found it within his budget. At the same time, he began considering the timing, planning to use the upcoming May Day holiday or a weekend in May to personally return to his hometown in Rudong and install these devices for his parents. He noted this preliminary plan in his notebook.

events.name: Summarize April's Running Training
events.description: In the evening, the rain stopped, and Yin Hao went out for a walk. As he strolled, he reviewed his running training data for the entire April on his phone. He confirmed that his aerobic endurance foundation was already very solid, and his monthly running volume had reached the target. Based on this, he began drafting a more challenging training plan for May on his running app, planning to incorporate more interval runs and hill training to better prepare for the half marathon in the second half of the year.

events.name: Provide feedback to runners on the effectiveness of core training.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sent a message to Ajie on WeChat, sharing his experience of consistently doing core strength training over the past few weeks and noting that he felt more stable in his torso while running. He also asked a small question about hitting a plateau in improving his plank hold time. Ajie quickly replied, affirming his persistence and offering suggestions on incorporating dynamic plank variations.

events.name: Received the electrician textbook and activated the course.
events.description: Today, Yin Hao received the textbook "Low Voltage Electrical Work Operations" that he had ordered online a few days ago—a thick volume. At the same time, the training platform sent a text message notifying him that his account had been activated. He logged into the platform, browsed the course catalog and chapter quizzes, and familiarized himself with the learning interface. He placed the new textbook alongside his self-made study schedule in the most prominent spot on his desk, symbolizing the beginning of a new learning journey.

events.name: Plan the direction for game improvement in May.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao combined the gaming knowledge system he had organized in April with the latest version update announcement of "Honor of Kings" to outline a simple plan for improving his gameplay in May. He decided to focus on studying the mechanics of two newly adjusted heroes next month, spend time learning more advanced team composition and strategic thinking, and planned to watch a professional match replay every week for analysis.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: With a clear goal, determined to do something about the safety issues of parents.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and well-organized, progress has been made in the research work, a clear path to solving the problem has been established, and the sense of satisfaction brought by responsibility is strong.

2025-04.daily_overview: Monday, a workday. Yin Hao was busy with work during the day and continued to advance the home security plan after work. He proactively communicated details with his parents and conducted thorough measurements. His actions shifted from personal research to collaboration with family members, making the plan more aligned with practical needs.

events.name: Proactively communicate safety plans with parents.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took the initiative to video call his parents, getting straight to the point this time. He asked in detail about the route from the bedroom to the bathroom at home, which side his father usually walks on at night, whether the bathroom walls are tiled or painted, and the specific space around the bed and toilet. He also shared pictures and functions of several products he found online, such as motion-sensor lights that automatically turn on when someone passes by and off when they leave, seeking his parents' opinions on which ones they found convenient and not too glaring. His mother, Wang Xiuying, hadn't expected her son to be so attentive and repeatedly said, "Alright, alright, you decide." His father, Yin Jianguo, felt a bit embarrassed, thinking his son was making a fuss over nothing, but with Yin Hao's insistence and his mother's support, he eventually agreed.

events.name: Please ask mother to assist in measuring the dimensions.
events.description: To ensure that the selected handrails and non-slip mats were the right size, Yin Hao called his mother and asked her to measure several key areas: the distance from the side of the toilet to the wall in the bathroom, the width of the shower area, and the distance from the bed to the wardrobe. Worried that his mother might not know how to use a tape measure, he even demonstrated it in a video call. His mother earnestly fetched a tape measure, paper, and pen, promising to take the measurements and let him know the next day.

events.name: Plan the study schedule for the May Day holiday.
events.description: On the eve of the May Day holiday, Yin Hao opened his time management app and meticulously planned his schedule for the five-day break. He divided the time into several blocks: mornings were dedicated to intensive review of electrical engineering theory and advanced CNC knowledge; afternoons were reserved for relaxation activities, such as possibly going on a short fishing trip; evenings were set aside for regular family calls and free entertainment time. This structured plan filled him with anticipation for a holiday that balanced both rest and personal growth.

events.name: Added: Temporary adjustments to work projects have resulted in staying up late.
events.description: During the day at work, due to a sudden adjustment in a project, Yin Hao needed to work overtime to process data, resulting in him going to bed later than planned in the evening.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Steady, starting the new week with determination to advance family plans.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The sense of reassurance after communication, coupled with his parents' support, has given him even more motivation, but work fatigue persists.

2025-04.daily_overview: Tuesday, a workday. Yin Hao focused on workshop production during the day with high efficiency. After work, he finalized the purchase of home safety products for his parents based on the accurate measurements provided by his mother. At the same time, he began preparing for the financial review at the end of the month, maintaining an orderly life.

events.name: Place an order for safety supplies according to the dimensions.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao received a WeChat message from his mother, which included several photos of notes with measurements and a few voice messages explaining them. He immediately opened his computer and, based on the measurements, selected the appropriate-sized L-shaped stainless steel grab bar for the bathroom, a thickened non-slip mat, and three sets of rechargeable motion-sensor night lights (planned for installation at the bedroom door, hallway, and bathroom door). He also chose a simple bedside assistive stand with an integrated LED night light. After confirming everything was correct, he added all these items to his shopping cart at once and completed the payment using his own account. For convenience during installation, he deliberately set the delivery address to his own residence in Shanghai, planning to take them back and install them himself during the May Day holiday.

events.name: Organize monthly financial vouchers
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sat in the study of his rented apartment, meticulously organizing all his financial records on the computer. He created categorized folders to archive digital copies of his April payslip, screenshots of mobile banking transfers (including salary, bonus deposits, and transfers to his parents), various electronic payment records, and important receipts (such as those for running shoes and safety equipment). This thorough preparation ensured he had all the necessary data ready for tomorrow’s monthly financial review.

events.name: Added: A friend's unexpected visit caused a late night.
events.description: In the evening, a friend named Gao Zhiyuan dropped by unexpectedly, and the two talked for a long time about mechanical repairs, causing Yin Hao to go to bed later than planned.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Proceed in an orderly manner, knowing that completing the shopping is the major task for today.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study room of the home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The sense of relief and anticipation after completing the task, thinking about how my parents will soon be able to use these safety devices, warms my heart.

2025-04.daily_overview: Wednesday, the last day of April. Yin Hao efficiently completed his work during the day and conducted an in-depth monthly financial review in the evening. He was delighted to find that his savings progress for purchasing a home had exceeded expectations, prompting him to upgrade his goal and begin researching housing policies. Transitioning from mere savings accumulation to more proactive planning marked another step forward in his pursuit of life goals.

events.name: Verify Monthly Revenue
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao officially began his financial review for April. He first opened his mobile banking app to carefully verify whether his salary for the month and the project bonus had been accurately credited, and he recorded the specific after-tax amounts. Seeing that the figures matched his expectations, he nodded in satisfaction.

events.name: Categorize and Summarize Monthly Expenditures
events.description: Next, he opened the sorted electronic bills and ledger on his computer, categorizing all expenses for the month into several major groups: fixed expenses (rent, utilities), dining, transportation (fuel, parking), shopping (mainly running gear), social entertainment, and the newly added category for this month—[filial piety to parents] (specifically, expenses for purchasing home safety supplies). He added up each item one by one, calculating the total expenditure for each category.

events.name: Review the progress of home purchase savings
events.description: After completing the income and expenditure statistics, Yin Hao logged into the dedicated bank card app he used for his home purchase savings to check the current balance. He compared this balance with the target balance for April outlined in his [Annual Savings Plan] set at the beginning of the year. To his delight, due to receiving a project bonus this month and effectively controlling entertainment expenses, his actual savings progress slightly exceeded expectations. This discovery greatly encouraged him.

events.name: Formulate the new budget for May.
events.description: Based on the review results from April, Yin Hao has set a new budget for May in his electronic ledger. He decided to continue depositing the full amount of the month's excess savings into the special home purchase account. At the same time, considering the potential additional expenses during the May Day holiday, he slightly increased the budget for dining and social entertainment this month, but the total amount remains within a reasonable range.

events.name: Action Plan for Upgrading Home Purchase Goals
events.description: At the end of his review notes, Yin Hao solemnly wrote down a new action plan: starting in May, he would use his spare time to conduct preliminary research on the housing provident fund loan policies, application conditions, quota calculation methods, and related procedures in the peripheral areas of Shanghai (such as Songjiang and Jiading). This would be done through the official website of the Shanghai Housing Provident Fund Management Center and by consulting friends and colleagues with home-buying experience. This marked the transition of his home-buying goal from the [savings accumulation] phase to the [policy research and feasibility assessment] phase.

events.name: Summarize April Skill Enhancement
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao briefly reviewed the entire month of April. Solving technical challenges in project practice and testing himself in the vocational skills competition—this dual-track model of [practice + competition preparation] made him feel a significant improvement in his professional skills. He reflected on his gains—primarily the enhancement of problem analysis and collaborative problem-solving abilities—and also realized that he still needed to strengthen his skills in certain complex programming logic. He closed his notebook, filled with anticipation for the upcoming May.

起始状态.所处地点: At home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to draw a meaningful conclusion for April.

结束状态.所处地点: In the study room at home, located at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and full of hope, with financial health and clear goals, the planning and execution for the future have reached a new level.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, the weather is warm and pleasant.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today is the first day of the May Day holiday. Yin Hao enjoyed a typical holiday morning, starting the day with his regular morning run. Later, through his hometown’s online social circle, he unexpectedly reconnected with two childhood friends who are also working in Shanghai, setting the stage for a future gathering. The entire day was immersed in a relaxed, social holiday atmosphere.

events.name: Morning Interval Running Training
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao went to Songjiang Stadium as usual for interval running training. The temperature was comfortable in the early May morning. Following the preset schedule on his fitness app, he completed four sets of 800-meter fast runs combined with 400-meter slow walks. During each fast run, he pushed to increase his pace while monitoring his heart rate to ensure the training remained within the effective range. His goal was to break through his current speed plateau and prepare for the half marathon.

events.name: Reconnecting with a Long-Lost Elementary School Classmate Online
events.description: During a leisurely afternoon, Yin Hao was browsing through his hometown Rudong County's WeChat group on his phone when he saw someone sharing a piece of industry news. Below the post, he noticed comments from two of his elementary school classmates, Li Feng and Zhao Yang, and realized they were also working in Shanghai. Yin Hao found their WeChat profiles through the group chat and added them with a mix of anticipation and a sense of unfamiliarity. After a brief exchange of greetings, the three of them started chatting on WeChat, reminiscing about their childhood memories—flying kites on the ridges of fields and being late for school together. The memories from their youth were instantly rekindled, and they confirmed each other’s identities and current situations—Li Feng was working as a programmer in Pudong, while Zhao Yang was in Xuhui District as a medical device salesperson. The atmosphere quickly shifted from tentative to warm and lively.

events.name: Daily Family Communication and Dinner
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao had a video call with his mother, Wang Xiuying, via WeChat. As usual, his mother expressed concern about his meals during the holiday and reminded him not to rely too much on takeout. Yin Hao shared the amusing story of reconnecting with an old classmate earlier that day, which delighted his mother, who encouraged him to spend more time with fellow townsfolk. After the call, Yin Hao made a simple Shanghai-style braised pork rice bowl using ingredients from his fridge, enjoying it while watching a gaming livestream.

起始状态.所处地点: In the bedroom of the home at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relax, Anticipate (The Start of Vacation)

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai City.
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, Nostalgia (Reconnecting with Old Friends)

state.今日运动: Intermittent running training for approximately 5 kilometers.

2025-05.daily_overview: On the second day of the holiday, Yin Hao shifted his focus to his parents in Nantong. He spent some time worrying about their home safety and completed an online purchase of safety supplies, reflecting his practical nature and concern for his family. The remaining time was devoted to personal relaxation and hobbies, though he felt slightly frustrated by network lag during gaming.

events.name: Purchasing home safety products online for parents.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao carefully studied various home safety products suitable for the elderly at home. Considering the actual conditions of the bathroom in his hometown, he finally selected a motion-sensor night light, a set of anti-slip mats for the bathroom, and an installable handrail for the toilet on JD.com. He carefully filled in the delivery address for his hometown in Nantong and his parents' phone number, opting for next-day delivery service. He specifically left a note on the order: "Please call before delivery, as there are elderly people at home." After completing the payment, he also sent a screenshot of the order to his mother, asking her to keep an eye out for the delivery.

events.name: Mobile Game Team Play and Online Socializing
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao logged into "Honor of Kings" and teamed up with his gaming friend Zhang Fei from Shenzhen for a ranked match. The two cooperated seamlessly, but occasional lag due to network latency left Yin Hao feeling slightly frustrated. During a break, they briefly chatted on WeChat about their recent lives, and Zhang Fei shared updates on the gaming industry in Shenzhen. Later, Yin Hao arranged a weekend fishing trip to the suburbs with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng in the WeChat group "Songjiang Trio."

events.name: Repair the faulty desk lamp
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao noticed that the desk lamp on his table had poor contact. He took out his toolbox, skillfully disassembled the lamp base, and used a multimeter to check, finding that a section of internal wiring had a loose solder joint. He re-soldered it firmly with an electric soldering iron, and after testing, the light was as stable as before. This small repair process gave him a great sense of accomplishment.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calm, pragmatic

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room
结束状态.心情: Fulfilled (completing household tasks and personal hobbies), slightly irritable.

2025-05.daily_overview: With the weekend coinciding with a holiday adjustment, today is a rest day. Yin Hao's desire for learning and exercise habits continued as usual. At the same time, social interactions with newly reconnected elementary school classmates progressed from online greetings to concrete plans for offline gatherings, showcasing the "traditional" aspect of his ISTJ personality and his emphasis on old friendships. Due to his dedication to studying, he stayed up a bit later than usual.

events.name: Learn automotive mechanical knowledge
events.description: It was drizzling outside in the morning, so Yin Hao stayed indoors. He searched for and watched a series of introductory tutorial videos on Bilibili about the basic structure of car engines and the diagnosis of common issues, such as unusual noises and unstable idling. As he watched, he sketched simple structural diagrams in his notebook. He also compared the principles of crankshaft and camshaft transmission mentioned in the videos with the transmission systems of CNC machine tools he was familiar with, finding similarities in precision control and linkage logic between the two.

events.name: Tempo Run Training
events.description: After the rain stopped in the afternoon, the ground was slightly damp. Yin Hao changed into his running shoes and went for a tempo run around the Guangfulin Road neighborhood. He set a target pace slightly faster than an easy run and focused on maintaining it steadily throughout the 5-kilometer distance, aiming to improve his lactate threshold and endurance. The air was fresh after the rain, making the run quite enjoyable.

events.name: Planning a primary school class reunion
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took the initiative to message Li Feng and Zhao Yang on WeChat, suggesting, "Since we're all in Shanghai, why not seize the moment and find a time to meet up?" The proposal was met with enthusiastic responses. The three of them created a small group chat and began discussing their respective availabilities. Considering his shift work schedule, Yin Hao suggested several evenings after his early shifts. After some coordination, they settled on Friday, May 9th, one week later, for the gathering. The location was chosen as "Old Shanghai Taste," a well-regarded local cuisine restaurant in Pudong, recommended and booked by Li Feng, who works in the area.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a slight interest in learning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Joy, anticipation (party confirmed)

2025-05.daily_overview: Today marks the first working day after the May Day holiday adjustments, with life returning to its normal rhythm. Yin Hao has been proactive in both his work and personal development: on one hand, he formally sought advice from his mentor on career advancement plans and received valuable support; on the other hand, he has also started to keep his family informed about significant changes in his life (such as his moving plans), reflecting his independent and responsible character, though he stayed up late due to anxiety about the move.

events.name: Seek advice from the master on the exam preparation plan.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao found his mentor, Sun Jianguo, in the cafeteria and earnestly shared his plan to obtain the Advanced CNC Machine Tool Operator Technician Certificate this year. Master Sun was very pleased upon hearing this and patted him on the shoulder, saying, "You’ve got ambition, kid! I’ve long thought you should aim higher." After the meal, Master Sun returned to his workstation, took out a somewhat aged hardcover notebook from a locked drawer, and handed it to Yin Hao. "These are the notes I compiled while preparing for the exam back then, along with key points from the latest (at that time) national standards. They might be a bit outdated, but the principles still apply. Take them and study." He also highlighted several theoretical modules that required focused review based on the current changes in industry standards. Yin Hao felt as if he had found a treasure. That very evening, following his mentor’s advice and the company’s training arrangements, he drafted a preliminary study schedule for the upcoming months.

events.name: Video call with parents to discuss moving arrangements.
events.description: In the evening, during his weekly routine video call with his parents, Yin Hao elaborated on his plan to move after his contract expires at the end of May. He explained his reasons for wanting to relocate to a place closer to his workplace and with a better residential environment, mentioning several new residential complexes near the Songjiang Industrial Park that he had already looked into. His mother, Wang Xiuying, expressed some concern about the exhaustion of moving and the difficulty of finding a suitable place, urging him to plan ahead and prioritize safety. His father, Yin Jianguo, took a more practical approach, asking about the approximate rent and commute time for the new location and offering advice such as "look at more options and don’t rush into a decision." By the end of the call, both parents expressed their support for his decision, but Yin Hao felt emotionally unsettled due to his anxiety about the future.

events.name: Listening to Music for Sleep Aid Due to Anxiety
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao felt slightly anxious about the moving arrangements. He turned on his phone to play some light music, hoping to relax and fall asleep, but it had limited effect, resulting in him staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus (Switch back to work mode)

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Steady and motivated (with support from the mentor and understanding from the family), but slightly anxious.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today is the rest day of the May Day holiday adjustment. Yin Hao utilized the entire daytime for a long-distance endurance training session, laying a solid foundation for his half-marathon goal. The remaining time was primarily dedicated to handling personal matters and relaxation, reserving energy for the upcoming consecutive workdays, with a regular sleep schedule.

events.name: Long-Distance Slow Running Training
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a 12-kilometer long slow distance (LSD) run. He chose a route around the Guangfulin Cultural Site, which offered pleasant scenery and a flat running path. He strictly controlled his pace, maintaining an intensity that allowed for easy conversation, with a focus on building foundational endurance and fat-burning capacity. After the run, he logged the route, duration, and average heart rate in his app.

events.name: Check the delivered home safety supplies.
events.description: After running home, Yin Hao found that the safety products he had ordered online for his parents the previous day had already been delivered. He opened each box to inspect them: the motion-sensor night light responded sensitively, the anti-slip mat felt thick and sturdy, and the handrail accessories were complete. He read the installation instructions for each product, especially the precautions for installing the handrail, and then repacked all the items, preparing to take them back to his hometown on his next visit.

events.name: Playing online games with colleagues.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao teamed up with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang to play "Honor of Kings." Since they had to work the next day, they only played for a little over an hour. During the game, they chatted about their experiences during the May Day holiday. Wang Lei complained about the crowded tourist attractions, while Liu Zhiqiang shared about a delicious Suzhou-style restaurant he discovered in Kunshan.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relaxation (Last Day of Vacation)

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Satisfy (Complete a long-distance run)

2025-05.daily_overview: Officially returning to a normal work week. Yin Hao encountered an opportunity at work to showcase his skills—independently overseeing the processing of a batch of high-precision components. He demonstrated the meticulous and responsible traits of the ISTJ personality type, carefully considering every step from accepting the task to the preliminary preparations. This thorough groundwork laid a solid foundation for the practical work the next day, though he stayed up late studying the blueprints.

events.name: Accept high-precision machining tasks
events.description: During the morning shift meeting, team leader Wang Lei handed a new part drawing to Yin Hao. These were complex, irregularly shaped components intended for a precision instrument, with extremely tight tolerances (±0.01mm) and made from a difficult-to-process material. Wang Lei explained the technical challenges and delivery deadline in detail, encouraging him by saying, "Haozi, this batch of work is quite demanding, but I believe you can handle it. Give it a try and complete it independently." Yin Hao took the drawing, feeling the pressure but also an eager desire to take on the challenge.

events.name: Seek advice from the master on the processing plan.
events.description: After receiving the task, Yin Hao did not start immediately. During his work breaks, he took the drawings to his mentor, Sun Jianguo, to seek advice on the programming approach for the parts, how to select more suitable cutting tools, design more secure clamping methods, and address potential machining vibrations and other challenges. Master Sun carefully examined the drawings, pointed out the key process points for several critical areas, and recommended a special cutting fluid to improve surface finish. This consultation gave Yin Hao confidence in his approach.

events.name: Study the drawings and plan the processing.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao did not leave immediately. He stayed at his workstation, carefully studying the three-dimensional drawings and process requirements on the computer. Drawing from Master Sun's suggestions, he began planning the machining steps: selecting which finishing tools to use, designing clamping fixtures to ensure repeat positioning accuracy, and optimizing programming paths to reduce idle travel and improve efficiency. He sketched a simple process diagram in his notebook and only went home once he had a clear plan in mind, staying up until the early hours of the morning engrossed in his research.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready to get to work

结束状态.所处地点: Company workstation
结束状态.心情: Focused, slightly tense (when facing challenging tasks), tired.

2025-05.daily_overview: Today was a crucial day for Yin Hao, as his work skills were validated and recognized. He independently and successfully completed a high-difficulty processing task, earning public praise from both his leaders and colleagues, which greatly boosted his professional confidence. While basking in the joy of his achievement, he did not forget to share his success with close friends and maintained his morning running routine. It was a fulfilling and rewarding day, though he stayed up late due to excitement.

events.name: Morning Interval Running Training
events.description: Though mindful of today's processing tasks, Yin Hao still got up early as usual and completed his second interval training session at Songjiang Stadium. He fine-tuned the pace target for the fast running segments based on last week's data, maintaining focus throughout the training, which to some extent alleviated his pre-work tension.

events.name: Independently complete the processing of complex parts.
events.description: Yin Hao arrived at his post early and, following the plan from the previous night, programmed the machine tool. He then installed and calibrated the cutting tools and specialized fixtures with extreme care. During the machining of the first part, he remained by the machine throughout, closely monitoring the cutting sounds, the shape of the metal chips, and the machine load data. Based on the actual conditions, he made several fine adjustments to the feed rate and cutting parameters. Only after confirming that the parameters were perfectly stable did he proceed with batch processing. Throughout the entire morning, he maintained a high level of concentration, monitoring the machine’s operation as if standing guard in the military. After the machining was completed, he used precision measuring tools to conduct self-inspections of the key dimensions of each part, all of which met the required standards. In the afternoon, a report from the quality inspection department arrived: the entire batch of parts passed inspection in one go, with excellent quality.

events.name: Received praise from the team.
events.description: During the afternoon team briefing, team leader Wang Lei held the quality inspection report and publicly praised Yin Hao: "Take a look, everyone. This batch of high-precision parts that Yin Hao completed independently passed the full inspection in one go! This task was quite challenging, and he did an excellent job—meticulous and technically steady. Everyone should learn from him!" Colleagues cast admiring glances one after another, and his mentor, Sun Jianguo, nodded with satisfaction nearby. Though Yin Hao simply replied with "It's what I should do," he was filled with pride and satisfaction inside.

events.name: Share the joy with friends and arrange a celebration.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao was in high spirits. He first sent a message to his childhood friend Zhang Wei on WeChat: "I pulled off something great today—got a batch of super precise parts sorted out!" Zhang Wei immediately replied with a string of "awesome" emojis. Then, in the "Songjiang Trio" group chat, he tagged Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang: "Are you guys free this weekend? My treat, let's celebrate!" Wang Lei responded right away and started suggesting whether to go for barbecue or karaoke.

events.name: Stayed up late playing games due to excitement.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, excited about completing his tasks, played a little more "Honor of Kings" to relax, which caused him to stay up later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Slightly stressed but full of determination.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Pride, excitement, relaxation

state.今日运动: Intermittent running training for about 5 kilometers.

2025-05.daily_overview: An ordinary workday. While working, Yin Hao multitasked on several personal projects: researching half-marathon events, preparing to install safety equipment for his return to his hometown, maintaining his hobby (gaming), and delving into the exam requirements for advanced technicians. His life was fulfilling and well-organized, though he stayed up late studying for the exam.

events.name: Research on Half Marathon Events
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao used his phone to look up the calendar of half-marathon events in Shanghai and surrounding cities (Suzhou, Hangzhou) for the second half of 2025. He focused on the estimated dates, registration requirements, and route features of events such as the Shanghai International Half Marathon (usually held in the second half of the year) and the Suzhou Jinji Lake Half Marathon. He then noted the dates of several preferred events in his phone calendar and set up registration reminders.

events.name: Check and pack safety supplies.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao rechecked the safety equipment he had received earlier to confirm that all accessories were complete and undamaged during shipping. He then carefully packed them into a sturdy shopping bag and placed it in a prominent spot by the entryway shoe cabinet, ensuring he wouldn’t forget to take it back to his hometown during the Dragon Boat Festival holiday.

events.name: Relaxing with Mobile Games in the Evening
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, along with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang, as usual, teamed up to play "Honor of Kings" for about an hour and a half. As they played, they chatted. Wang Lei complained about a bizarre material application process he encountered in the workshop that day, while Liu Zhiqiang shared some insider information about real estate in Huacao, Kunshan. Yin Hao listened thoughtfully.

events.name: Study the Examination Syllabus for Senior Technicians
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao sat at his desk and carefully reviewed the detailed exam outline for the Advanced CNC Machine Tool Operation Technician certificate through the official website of the Shanghai Vocational Skills Appraisal Center. He focused on theoretical assessment modules such as "Complex Process Planning and Simulation" and "Five-Axis Linkage Machining Programming." Comparing these with his own work experience, he realized that he indeed had knowledge gaps in the specific parameter settings of simulation software and the post-processing configuration for multi-axis programming. He noted these weaknesses in his notebook, planning to seek guidance from his training instructor, Liu Jianjun, when the opportunity arose. Due to his deep involvement in the study, he ended up staying up late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Smooth and orderly

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, with a bit of reflection (on the difficulties of the exam)

2025-05.daily_overview: Friday is a day filled with anticipation. The daytime work proceeded as usual, and in the evening, a reunion with long-lost elementary school classmates took place. The gathering was a great success, not only rekindling old friendships but also establishing a new social support circle known as the "Three Musketeers of Shanghai." Yin Hao felt fulfilled both socially and physically, but due to the late-night gathering, he returned home and slept late.

events.name: Elementary School Classmates Offline Reunion Gathering
events.description: After work, Yin Hao took Metro Line 9 from Songjiang, transferred to Line 2, and spent nearly an hour and a half to reach the restaurant in Pudong. Li Feng and Zhao Yang had already arrived. It had been years since they last met, and within just five minutes, they went from slightly awkward handshakes to warm hugs. During dinner, the conversation quickly shifted from changes in their hometown of Rudong and updates about their elementary school teachers to their respective struggles in Shanghai. Yin Hao shared his transition from the military to becoming a machine tool operator, Li Feng vented about the 996 work schedule and hair loss anxiety as a programmer, and Zhao Yang recounted the diverse clients he encountered as a salesperson. They realized that, despite being in different industries, they shared common challenges such as rental pressure, career bottlenecks, and uncertainty about the future. The atmosphere was lively and warm, as if time had turned back.

events.name: Create the "Shanghai Trio" WeChat group
events.description: As the gathering drew to a close, Li Feng suggested, "We three should meet more often in the future. Let's create a group chat!" The three immediately agreed and created a WeChat group on the spot. Zhao Yang came up with a slightly chuunibyou but fitting name: "The Three Musketeers of Shanghai." Everyone scanned the QR code to join the group and agreed to meet at least once every quarter, sharing information and encouraging each other in the chat. Yin Hao felt that in the big city of Shanghai, he had gained another emotional connection and support from his hometown friends.

events.name: Evening Tempo Run
events.description: It was almost ten o'clock when the party ended and he returned home, but Yin Hao didn't cancel his training plan for the night. He changed into his clothes and went for a 30-minute tempo run within the residential area. The cool night breeze helped clear the lingering effects of the alcohol, and as he ran, he reminisced about the joy of the gathering, feeling his steps grow noticeably lighter.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to (there's a party tonight)

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Warmth, joy, and a heightened sense of belonging.

2025-05.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yin Hao's life was filled with two important tasks: one was participating in an advanced technician practical training session, taking a solid step toward his career goals; the other was fulfilling his family responsibilities by guiding his mother in familiarizing herself with safety products. At the same time, online interactions with both old and new friends kept his social circle active, though he went to bed early due to exhaustion from the training.

events.name: Instruct the mother to inspect safety supplies.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao contacted his mother via WeChat video to confirm that the package had been delivered to their hometown. He asked his mother to bring the night light, anti-slip mats, and handrails in front of the camera, explaining one by one what each item was for and roughly where it should be installed. Seeing her son being so thoughtful, his mother, Wang Xiuying, repeatedly said, "Alright, alright, we'll wait for you to come back and install them."

events.name: Participate in the Advanced Technician Practical Training (First Session)
events.description: Yin Hao got up early and hurried to the training center located in Pudong to attend the weekend intensive course taught by Teacher Liu Jianjun. The focus of the first day's course was on the basics of multi-axis programming and process planning for complex parts. Yin Hao conducted preliminary programming exercises for five-axis simultaneous machining on a simulator, experiencing a completely different mindset compared to three-axis machining. During the break, he proactively sought advice from Teacher Liu regarding a problem he encountered at work about optimizing toolpaths for surface finishing, and Teacher Liu provided some guidance.

events.name: Online Interaction with New and Old Classmates
events.description: During breaks in the training and on his way home, Yin Hao occasionally checked his phone. In the "Shanghai Trio" group chat, Li Feng had uploaded several photos from last night’s gathering, and Zhao Yang had captioned them with "Time may pass, but our bond remains." Yin Hao also sent a laughing emoji and added, "Next time, it’s my turn to organize the venue." At the same time, he replied to the confirmation message in the "Songjiang Trio" group chat regarding the specific time for tomorrow’s fishing trip.

events.name: Realizing that the running shoes need to be replaced.
events.description: While organizing his running gear in the evening, Yin Hao picked up his running shoes, which had already covered nearly 800 kilometers. He noticed that the wear-resistant rubber on the heel of the sole was almost completely worn down, and the midsole had lost its bounce. Recalling the slight soreness in his feet after recent long-distance runs, he realized that these shoes had reached the end of their lifespan. To cope with the upcoming increase in training volume and prevent injuries, purchasing a new pair of professional running shoes was now on his agenda.

events.name: Cancelled the evening walk due to fatigue.
events.description: After the training, Yin Hao felt exhausted and decided to cancel his originally planned evening walk, opting to rest directly to regain his energy.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Active (with training tasks)

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling, slightly tired but rewarding.

2025-05.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for relaxation and family bonding. Yin Hao spent a leisurely half-day by the lake with his fishing friends, putting his newly learned techniques into practice. During his routine evening call with his parents, he updated them on his exam preparation progress and received their emotional support. The pressures of work and life were eased through his hobbies and the warmth of family connections.

events.name: Practicing Spring Fishing Techniques with Fellow Anglers
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and his fishing buddy, Brother Wu, made plans to head to Dianshan Lake. He deliberately brought along a newly purchased box of red worms and a well-reputed commercial bait, applying the spring shallow-water fishing techniques for crucian carp he had recently learned from videos. He experimented with different bait combinations and fishing depths, eventually achieving a good catch using red worm bait in a shallow area near aquatic plants. Brother Wu, offering guidance nearby, praised him for having "good intuition." As they fished and chatted, Brother Wu also shared some amusing stories from his auto repair shop in Qingpu.

events.name: Call parents to report progress on exam preparation.
events.description: During the evening video call, Yin Hao proactively updated his parents on his preparations for the senior technician certification exam, mentioning that he had already started attending intensive training classes but found the multi-axis programming section a bit challenging. His mother, Wang Xiuying, said with concern, "Don’t push yourself too hard; take it step by step." His father, Yin Jianguo, encouraged him in his usual steady tone, "It’s normal to face difficulties. When I was learning my craft, it was the same. Stay calm, ask your instructor more questions, and you’ll surely succeed." His father’s affirmation made Yin Hao feel more at ease.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, Anticipating (Going Fishing)

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Relaxed, warm (family support)

2025-05.daily_overview: A new week began, but it brought a significant life change. While Yin Hao was steadily progressing with his work plans and studies, he suddenly received a notice from his landlord about selling the property. This threw a stone into his originally regular and well-planned life, stirring up ripples of pressure from the need to find a new place and move. On this day, his state shifted from calm to one tinged with anxiety and urgency, leading to a late night of restless sleep due to worry.

events.name: Personal Career Review and Planning
events.description: During his lunch break, Yin Hao organized his career development plan on his phone. His core goal remained obtaining the senior technician certification by the end of the year. Centered around this objective, he set several smaller, phased goals: next month, he would attempt to independently write a demo program for five-axis machining; in the third quarter, he would strive to participate in the debugging of the company's newly imported machine tools; simultaneously, he would start paying attention to some online courses on mechatronics maintenance to prepare for potential skill expansion in the future.

events.name: Enroll in the Online Theoretical Intensive Course
events.description: After work, Yin Hao successfully registered for an online intensive theoretical course for the senior technician exam through the official platform of the Shanghai Vocational Skills Training Center, based on his previous research. The classes are held every Wednesday evening and Saturday afternoon, which conveniently fit around his work schedule and weekend training. He completed the payment and registration, and synchronized the course links to both his phone calendar and computer desktop.

events.name: Received notice from the landlord regarding the sale of the property.
events.description: Returning to his rented apartment on Guangfulin Road after work in the evening, Yin Hao found a formal letter from his landlord, Li Xiuying, in the mailbox at the entrance. The letter, written in a polite yet non-negotiable tone, informed him that due to personal asset planning, she had decided to sell the property. As a result, the lease agreement could not be renewed, and he was required to move out by July 31. She also mentioned that she would compensate him with one month's rent (3,000 yuan) as stipulated in the contract. Attached to the letter was a printed "Guidelines for Accommodating Property Viewings," which stated that real estate agents would bring potential buyers to view the apartment during the sales period and required his cooperation. Yin Hao immediately contacted "Sister Li" via WeChat to confirm the matter. She replied, acknowledging the situation and expressing her apologies, but emphasized that the decision to sell the property was final. The sudden news left Yin Hao feeling as though his private space had been invaded and brought uncertainty to the next two months. The pressure of finding a new place to live intensified, leading to anxiety and sleeplessness that night.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Steady and well-planned

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home (staring blankly at the notice)
结束状态.心情: Surprise, anxiety, and a sense of pressure begin to emerge.

2025-05.daily_overview: In the aftermath of the landlord's notice, Yin Hao demonstrated the practical and methodical side of his ISTJ personality. Instead of panicking, he began systematically addressing the crisis: from conducting a financial review to assess the impact, to seeking stability in his work and studies, and finally engaging in calm negotiations with the landlord. It was a day of transforming pressure into concrete action steps, with a slight improvement in sleep.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review and Emergency Plan
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted an in-depth monthly financial review at home. He meticulously categorized his April expenditure records and found that transportation and dining expenses had slightly exceeded the budget due to attending training sessions. More importantly, he added a new category called "Potential Moving Emergency," estimating that if he were to move, he might need an additional expenditure of approximately 8,000 to 10,000 yuan (covering a new deposit, potential agency fees, moving costs, etc.). After assessing his current savings and monthly surplus, he decided to immediately cut back on non-essential expenses (such as postponing the planned purchase of gaming headphones) and began considering whether he could work extra hours in the next two months to cover this unexpected expense.

events.name: Review training notes and share them.
events.description: Using part of his evening, Yin Hao organized the notes from the weekend training, focusing on reviewing the coordinate transformation principles of five-axis programming. The next day, during the team’s small meeting, he briefly shared the "high-pressure cooling optimization" idea mentioned in the training with his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. Everyone discussed the possibility of retrofitting the company’s existing equipment. Immersed in the technical work discussions, he temporarily forgot the troubles of finding a place to live.

events.name: Negotiate the details of the lease termination with the landlord.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao formally communicated with the landlord, Sister Li, via WeChat and phone. He expressed understanding of the landlord's decision to sell the property but also sincerely explained the difficulties of finding a new place on short notice. After negotiation, both parties agreed on the following terms: the final move-out date would be July 31; the landlord would compensate one month's rent of 3,000 yuan; and viewings of the property would require a 24-hour advance notice and would preferably be scheduled on Yin Hao's days off or after work. Sister Li was cooperative and agreed to these conditions. Although the situation remained unchanged, having clear rules in place made Yin Hao feel a little better.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Slightly anxious, but determined to take action.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Calm and methodical (has begun handling the crisis)

2025-05.daily_overview: Efforts to address the rental crisis continue to deepen. Yin Hao made more specific financial adjustments, suspending non-essential spending and transferring the saved money into savings. At the same time, he did not interrupt his study plan, using fragmented time to review. During the evening call with his parents, he chose to share only the good news and not the bad, only briefly mentioning the landlord selling the property to avoid worrying his family, and canceled weekend outings due to a tight budget.

events.name: Fragmented Review and Exam Preparation Formula
events.description: During his subway commute and work breaks, Yin Hao uses a mobile app to review frequently tested formulas, definitions, and national standard codes that he has marked, reinforcing his memory. This fragmented learning approach is well-suited for handling the numerous memorization points in theoretical exams.

events.name: Adjust the Budget and Initiate the Savings Plan
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao executed the financial decisions he had made the previous night. Using his mobile banking app, he transferred 800 yuan, originally intended for purchasing gaming headphones, along with an additional 500 yuan he expected to save by cutting back on entertainment expenses this month, into a dedicated savings account for his future home purchase. At the same time, he updated his May budget in his expense-tracking app, significantly reducing the allocations for "dining out" and "entertainment expenses." He also drafted a more detailed contingency plan in his notebook: if he couldn’t find a suitable apartment by the end of July, he would use this emergency fund to cover the cost of short-term hotel stays or a high-priced monthly rental apartment while making every effort to find a shared apartment or a cheaper single room.

events.name: Calling Parents (Mentioning Changes Casually)
events.description: During the video call with his parents, Yin Hao mainly shared the happy moments from last week's class reunion and the gains from his training. As for the landlord selling the house, he only mentioned it briefly at the end: "By the way, Mom, it seems the landlord is planning to sell the house. When my contract expires, I might have to move somewhere else, but there are still two months left, so no rush." Upon hearing this, his mother naturally grew a bit worried and pressed for details. Yin Hao quickly reassured her with reasons like "renting in Shanghai is very convenient" and "I actually wanted to move closer to the office anyway," promising that he would find a good place before moving. He didn’t want his parents to worry too much about him.

events.name: Cancel weekend dining out due to tight budget.
events.description: Considering the financial pressure of house hunting, Yin Hao decided to cancel his original plan of dining out with friends over the weekend and instead opted for a simple gathering at home to save on expenses.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Pragmatic, slightly tense

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Slightly relaxed (specific measures have been taken, and parents have been reassured)

2025-05.daily_overview: Life continues to progress on multiple tracks. At work, there have been periods of overtime. Socially, he learned about a charity run event through running. On personal matters, he researched new running shoes for half-marathon training and contacted a teacher for exam preparation. At the same time, he began rationally evaluating the option of a rent increase proposed by the landlord for lease renewal and, for the first time, noticed an activity that could combine running with public welfare. Although busy, everything remains under control, and his current state aligns with the conclusion of his health status.

events.name: Received a rent increase notice from the landlord for lease renewal.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao received a WeChat message from his landlady, Sister Li, asking if he would consider continuing to rent instead of selling, with the monthly rent increasing from 3,000 yuan to 3,200 yuan. Yin Hao didn’t reply immediately, quickly weighing the options in his mind: renewing the lease meant no need to move, saving a lot of hassle and potential expenses, but it would cost an extra 200 yuan per month, totaling 2,400 yuan a year. Moving, though troublesome, might lead to finding a cheaper or better place. He decided to do some thorough research after work before making a decision.

events.name: Investigate the rental market conditions
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao spent an hour searching for rental prices in Songjiang District, especially around Guangfulin Road and Xinzhuang Highway near his company, on apps like Beike and Ziroom. He found that for similar one-bedroom apartments or single rooms in the same area, prices generally ranged from 3,200 to 3,500 yuan per month, with 3,200 yuan indeed being the market rate. He also roughly calculated the potential costs of moving (agency fees, moving expenses, time, and effort) and felt that renewing the lease with a rent increase seemed like an acceptable option, but he still needed to weigh the decision further.

events.name: Playing Online Games with Colleagues After Overtime
events.description: Due to an urgent task that needed to be completed that day, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang worked overtime until 8 p.m. before leaving work. Exhausted both physically and mentally, the three agreed to log in and play a couple of games to unwind after returning home. In *Honor of Kings*, they didn’t talk much about work, mostly complaining about the new hero’s strength and playing rather casually.

events.name: Upon learning about the charity run event while jogging.
events.description: Before working overtime in the evening, Yin Hao took some time to run 5 kilometers at the stadium. His running buddy Chen Jie was also there, and while jogging together, Chen Jie recommended an online charity running event called "Run for Love" to Yin Hao. The rule of the event was that for every kilometer completed by a runner, the sponsor would donate a set of school supplies to a primary school in a mountainous area. Yin Hao found the event meaningful, as it allowed him to train while contributing to a good cause, so he asked Chen Jie to send him the event link.

events.name: Research on professional running shoe models.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao started browsing for running shoes on his phone. Considering his foot type (normal arch), weight, and training needs (half-marathon training), he focused on researching cushioned running shoes such as the Asics GT-2000 series and the Nike Pegasus series. He compared prices and user reviews across major e-commerce platforms, set a budget of around 800 yuan, and decided to visit a physical store over the weekend to try them on for comfort.

events.name: Contact the training instructor to schedule a consultation.
events.description: Yin Hao contacted the training instructor Liu Jianjun via WeChat, politely explaining that he was currently preparing for an exam and had encountered theoretical difficulties in "Complex Process Simulation Parameter Setting" and "Multi-Axis Post-Processing Configuration." He expressed a hope to find time for an in-person consultation. Mr. Liu quickly replied, indicating no problem, and suggested they could chat during the lunch break of the second training session this Saturday (May 17) at the training center.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the first day of the Dragon Boat Festival holiday, Yin Hao reunited with his parents in his hometown of Rudong. In the morning, he installed safety equipment at home, and in the afternoon, he created a half-marathon training plan and responded to birthday invitations from friends, enjoying warm family time.

events.name: Develop a half marathon training plan
events.description: Based on his half marathon goal and his own running foundation, Yin Hao searched for information online and consulted with his running friend Chen Jie for advice. He then developed a detailed 20-week training plan, clearly outlining the weekly running frequency, distance, and incremental intensity targets.

events.name: Install home security facilities
events.description: Yin Hao installed anti-slip mats, safety handrails, and motion-activated night lights in his parents' bathroom, hallway, and other areas. He carefully measured the positions, used tools to secure them, and tested the night lights' motion-sensing functionality to ensure they were firmly installed and easy to use.

events.name: Check for safety hazards at home.
events.description: After installing the safety equipment, Yin Hao and his father inspected the home's electrical circuits, gas valves, door and window locks, and other aspects. They replaced the aging power strips they discovered and explained daily safety precautions to his parents.

events.name: Responding to a Friend's Birthday Invitation
events.description: Yin Hao replied via WeChat to the birthday celebration invitations sent in advance by his colleague Wang Lei, his running friend Chen Jie, and his party friend Gao Zhiyuan, among others. He thanked his friends for their warm invitations and explained that he had decided to return to his hometown to celebrate his birthday with his parents, suggesting they could meet up after the holiday. His friends all expressed understanding and sent their best wishes.

events.name: Morning Running Activity
events.description: Yin Hao maintains his habit of morning runs, completing a relaxed 5-kilometer jog near his hometown to stay active and prepare for his half-marathon training.

events.name: Dinner chat with family
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao had dinner with his parents. His mother prepared some hometown dishes, and the family chatted about recent happenings, creating a warm and harmonious atmosphere.

结束状态.心情: Satisfy peacefulness

2025-06.daily_overview: On his 28th birthday, which coincided with the Dragon Boat Festival, Yin Hao spent the day with his parents in his hometown. In the morning, he completed the installation and testing of safety facilities, followed by a family gathering in the afternoon. The evening was filled with a warm birthday celebration, and he shared the joy with his friends in Shanghai online.

events.name: Test safety facilities
events.description: With his father's assistance, Yin Hao repeatedly tested the sensitivity of the induction night light and the sturdiness of the handrail. He also made fine adjustments based on his parents' trial feedback to ensure ease of use and safety.

events.name: Family Dragon Boat Festival Dinner Gathering
events.description: Yin Hao went with his parents to visit his uncle Chen Zhigang's home for a holiday gathering, where he met relatives and friends, including his cousin Chen Xiaowen. Everyone enjoyed lunch together, tasting zongzi and chatting about old times.

events.name: Birthday celebration activities
events.description: Mother Wang Xiuying carefully prepared a birthday dinner, cooking Shanghainese-style braised pork and steamed sea bass, both of which Yin Hao loves. The family of three gathered around the table to enjoy the meal. His parents sang the birthday song for Yin Hao, and he made a wish before blowing out the candles, creating a warm and cozy atmosphere.

events.name: Share Birthday Joy Online
events.description: After dinner, Yin Hao made a video call via WeChat to his friends in Shanghai (such as Wang Lei, Gao Zhiyuan, and Ma Xiaofeng), showing them the birthday cake and the family scene to share the joy. His friends sent their blessings online and informed him that the birthday gifts they had sent had already arrived at his residence in Shanghai.

events.name: Received donation certificate
events.description: Yin Hao received an electronic donation certificate from the charity run organizer in his email. He carefully reviewed the certificate to confirm the running distance and the corresponding details of the donated supplies.

events.name: Organize vehicle maintenance notes
events.description: Yin Hao reviewed and organized his experience of successfully dealing with a sunroof blockage, documenting the inspection steps, required tools, and precautions in his phone's memo to create a personal vehicle maintenance note.

events.name: Temporary Family Board Games
events.description: I played a few rounds of poker with my parents in the evening to relax, but ended up staying up late due to excitement.

He arrived at his rented residence in Songjiang in the afternoon, where he organized the repaired recorder and knowledge base to prepare for work.
