events.description: Yin Hao conducted a 5-kilometer run in light rain to test his running performance under different weather conditions and the stability of the APP's data recording, ensuring accurate data during his half-marathon training.

events.description: After repeated debugging, Yin Hao conducted a final comprehensive test on the tape recorder, using different tapes to check playback and recording effects. It was confirmed that all functions had returned to normal, marking the successful completion of the self-repair project.

events.name: Driving back to Shanghai.
events.description: Yin Hao bid farewell to his parents and relatives, then drove from Rudong back to his rented residence in Songjiang, Shanghai, concluding a brief holiday family reunion.

events.name: Report safety to parents.
events.description: After arriving safely at his home in Shanghai, Yin Hao immediately reported his safe arrival to his parents via WeChat video call. He once again reminded them to use the newly installed safety products and scheduled the next time they would contact each other.

events.name: Organize the knowledge base
events.description: Yin Hao organized the technical posts, video links, and other materials he had collected over the past few days into computer folders and browser bookmarks, categorizing them accordingly. This marked the initial establishment of a knowledge base for repairing retro electronic products.

events.name: Learn craft knowledge
events.description: Yin Hao studied and organized process knowledge such as cutting principles and tool material selection. He deepened his understanding by combining practical cases encountered in his work, preparing for the senior technician examination.

events.name: I went to bed early due to travel fatigue.

2025-06.daily_overview: Returning to the workday, Yin Hao spent the morning inspecting the drainage holes of the car sunroof, consulted with his mentor about the settlement policy during the lunch break, and independently resolved the issue of machine tool vibration in the afternoon, demonstrating his professional skills. However, he felt slightly anxious due to work pressure.

events.name: Check the car sunroof drainage holes
events.description: Yin Hao parked the car in an open space within the community, opened the sunroof, and located the drainage hole at the front end of the guide rail. He carefully cleared the accumulated silt using a thin wire, then poured water to test the drainage flow, ensuring there would be no blockages before the rainy season.

events.name: Please advise on the settlement policy.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao consulted the experienced master Sun Jianguo about Shanghai's new talent introduction policy, inquiring about the assistance it could provide for applying for talent introduction or points-based settlement after obtaining his senior technician certificate.

events.name: Solve the problem of machine tool vibration
events.description: While processing a high-precision transmission shaft, Yin Hao noticed an abnormal vibration in the machine tool. He immediately performed an emergency stop. After troubleshooting, he identified a positioning deviation in the tool change mechanism and resolved the issue by calibrating the parameters, thereby preventing the scrap of the workpiece.

events.name: Record Fault Cases
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao meticulously documented the phenomenon, analytical approach, troubleshooting steps, and solutions for the sudden vibration issue in the workshop lounge, preparing to share them at the team meeting.

events.name: Consult the repair shop technician
events.description: Yin Hao contacted Master Chen Jianguo, who runs a repair shop, through WeChat. They discussed their shared interest in restoring old items, and Yin Hao asked for advice on finding vintage parts and selecting basic welding tools.

events.name: Evening run to relax.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao went for a 5-kilometer evening run near his residential area to relieve work stress and maintain his exercise routine.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle documents.
events.description: Due to work requirements, I had to work overtime at home in the evening to organize technical reports, which resulted in going to bed a bit later than usual.

He carefully compared his age, educational background, and skill certificates against the criteria, calculating his points item by item. After confirming that there was still a significant gap from the required score, he felt somewhat disheartened but ultimately accepted the reality.

He showed Chen Jie his half-marathon training plan and asked for advice on controlling the pace for tempo runs and recovery after long-distance runs.

events.description: Yin Hao selected a faulty domestically produced transistor radio from the 1980s as his restoration target, formulated the repair steps, and completed the online ordering and procurement of most materials through Taobao and local electronics markets.

He carefully removed the casing, used a multimeter to test the circuits, replaced the aged electrolytic capacitors and the faulty band switch, and finally succeeded in powering it on and receiving clear broadcast signals.

events.name: Morning Run with Running Buddies
events.description: As agreed, Yin Hao and Chen Jie went for a morning run at Songjiang Sports Center, completing a 6-kilometer pace run together while sharing their running experiences and breathing techniques.

events.name: Start packing moving items.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao began to inventory the items that needed to be packed and made a list according to the moving plan. He then went to the supermarket and hardware store near the residential area to purchase packing materials such as cardboard boxes, tape, and bubble wrap.

events.name: Communicating with Comrades-in-Arms
events.description: Yin Hao connected with his comrade-in-arms Zhang Jianguo in Hangzhou via WeChat video. After exchanging pleasantries about their recent lives, Zhang Jianguo took the initiative to share the progress of his Xiaohongshu account, which focuses on sharing fitness knowledge. He detailed the process of creating content, building a following, and generating income.

events.name: Late Night Thoughts on Side Hustles
events.description: After the call ended, Yin Hao was deeply moved. He repeatedly pondered the model mentioned by Zhang Jianguo, opened his phone to search for content platforms related to CNC machine tool technology sharing, mechanical maintenance knowledge dissemination, and gained a preliminary understanding of the concept of self-media operation.

events.name: Plan a housewarming party
events.description: Yin Hao and his roommate Chen Jie decided to host a housewarming party on the first weekend after moving into their new home. They finalized the guest list, which included colleagues Wang Lei, running buddies Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng, and sent out invitations via WeChat.

events.name: Learn the Basics of Video Editing
events.description: Begin systematically learning the basic operations of mobile video editing software by watching tutorial videos.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental residence at Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Busy anticipation

结束状态.所处地点: Rental residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Impact Thinking

2025-06.daily_overview: Continue packing moving items, systematically organize personal skills during work breaks, contemplate content creation directions, browse short video platforms after work to understand side business operation models, and persistently learn video editing (Day 2).

events.name: Pack clothes and books
events.description: Yin Hao used the evening hours to sort the clothes in the wardrobe by season, folding them neatly before placing them into storage bags and cardboard boxes. Next, he carefully packed the technical books, novels, and some old photos and souvenirs from the bookshelf, marking each box clearly on the outside.

events.name: Organize Skills and Hobbies
events.description: In his spare time or after work, Yin Hao systematically organizes his skills and hobbies at home alone, including the precise operation of CNC machine tools, experience in repairing small household appliances, insights on fishing spot selection and equipment, and considers whether these areas have the potential to be transformed into valuable content.

events.name: Browse Content Platform
events.description: Yin Hao used his phone or computer to initially browse mainstream content platforms such as Douyin, Bilibili, and Xiaohongshu, observing the presentation formats, popularity, and potential monetization models of similar skill-sharing or outdoor hobby content, thereby forming a preliminary understanding.

events.name: Difficulty in implementing ideas.
events.description: Yin Hao delved into the potential difficulties of turning ideas into reality, such as unfamiliar aspects like video shooting and editing techniques, writing graphic guides, and account operation and maintenance. He recognized the challenges, but at the same time, the idea of 'monetizing skills' became clearer and more concrete.

events.name: Work focuses on production.
events.description: During the daytime work, Yin Hao focused on operating CNC machine tools, handling the processing tasks of several complex parts to ensure production efficiency.

events.name: Indoor activities
events.description: Due to the light rain, Yin Hao did some light stretching at home and organized tools in preparation for moving.

events.name: Practice editing skills
events.description: Practice using the Jianying APP to edit a simple running video in the evening.

起始状态.心情: Explore and Plan

结束状态.所处地点: Rental Residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Preliminary Planning

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao checked the training mileage for the charity run, mentioned his side business idea to his mentor during the lunch break and received feedback, completed packing after work, followed his comrade's self-media account, prepared for his side business attempt, and continued learning video editing (Day 3).

events.name: Verify training mileage
events.description: After completing a moderate-intensity running training, Yin Hao stretched and relaxed at home, then logged into the charity run event page to verify whether the total training mileage synchronized by the APP was accurate.

events.name: Packaging small household appliances
events.description: Yin Hao began packing the small household appliances he used for amateur repairs and daily needs, such as the rice cooker, speakers, and toolbox. He carefully wrapped the fragile items with bubble wrap and cleaned the pots, pans, and dishes from the kitchen before placing them into cardboard boxes.

events.name: Consult the master's opinion
events.description: During lunch breaks or work intervals, Yin Hao mentioned to his mentor Sun Jianguo his idea of sharing CNC operation techniques, seeking his views and suggestions on sharing professional content, and received preliminary approval.

events.name: Follow comrade-in-arms account
events.description: Yin Hao pays special attention to his comrade-in-arms Zhang Jianguo's social media account on WeChat, browsing the fitness coach-related content and interactions posted by him, to gain a preliminary understanding of the side business operation model.

events.name: Review theoretical knowledge points
events.description: Yin Hao systematically organized the theoretical knowledge points reviewed in the previous weeks, compiled them into structured notes, and summarized the incorrectly answered practice questions in an error log. He analyzed the reasons for the mistakes to prepare for the senior technician examination.

events.name: Intermittent running training
events.description: According to the training plan, Yin Hao conducted his first formal interval running training (400-meter fast run + 200-meter slow walk, repeated multiple sets) on the track near Songjiang University Town. He used a sports watch to record his pace and heart rate, experiencing different intensities.

events.name: Video Editing Practice Project
events.description: Try editing a video of the process of repairing a radio, applying the skills you have learned.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental Residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Actively prepare

结束状态.所处地点: Rental residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Encouraged to enrich

2025-06.daily_overview: All packing work is completed, moving company has been contacted. After work, went shopping for housewarming party ingredients with Chen Jie, and officially decided to try the side hustle of short videos titled "Practical Life Sharing for Tech Youth." Slightly stayed up late due to excitement.

events.name: Packaging completed
events.description: Yin Hao packed up the remaining miscellaneous items, such as toiletries, bedding, and personal collections (fishing gear, gaming consoles). He cleared out the unnecessary clutter and contacted waste collectors to handle the disposal. All the packed boxes were neatly stacked in the living room.

events.name: Contact a moving company
events.description: Yin Hao contacted the moving company via phone and WeChat to confirm the moving time, vehicle size, cost, as well as the specific address and floor of the new home.

events.name: Determine the direction of a side business.
events.description: After receiving initial approval from his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleague Wang Lei, Yin Hao made up his mind to try a side hustle in short videos. After work, he carefully thought it over at home and, combining his interests and professional skills, initially positioned his content in the field of "practical life sharing for tech-savvy youth."

events.name: Schedule a gym trial experience
events.description: Yin Hao arranged a weekend gym time with Chen Jie via WeChat. He prepared his workout clothes and water bottle in advance and looked up some basic knowledge about strength training for runners.

events.name: Purchase party ingredients
events.description: After work, Yin Hao and Chen Jie went together to a large supermarket in Songjiang District to purchase ingredients such as hotpot base, meat, vegetables, and bean products, as well as disposable utensils, beverages, and snacks, in preparation for the gathering the next day.

events.name: Morning runs maintain fitness.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao went for a 5-kilometer easy run to maintain training consistency and alleviate the stress from the busy preparations before moving.

events.name: Register a self-media account
events.description: I registered accounts on Douyin and Bilibili in advance in the evening to prepare for launching my side business.

起始状态.所处地点: Rental residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Decide on an action

结束状态.所处地点: Rental residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Looking forward to the excitement.

2025-06.daily_overview: With the help of my colleague Wang Lei, I moved to my new home in Jiuting. In the afternoon, I registered accounts on Douyin and Bilibili and learned mobile video editing. In the evening, I conducted my first systematic cross-training strength session. I celebrated with my roommate Chen Jie by ordering takeout and prepared for the housewarming party the next day.

events.name: Moving process
events.description: With the help of his colleague Wang Lei, Yin Hao worked together with the moving company workers to transport all the packed items from the old residence to the new home, and directed the workers to position the large furniture pieces in place.

events.name: Check into a new home
events.description: After moving in, Yin Hao and his roommate Chen Jie unpacked a few essentials together, setting up their beds and toiletries. In the evening, they ordered takeout as their first meal in the new home, celebrating their move.

events.name: Register a self-media account
events.description: Yin Hao took advantage of Saturday morning to register new personal accounts on both Douyin and Bilibili, deciding to use "Life Notes of Xiao Yin from Songjiang" as a unified name, with the profile highlighting "former soldier, current technician, sharing practical life skills."

events.name: Learn video editing
events.description: After registering his account, Yin Hao searched for beginner-friendly mobile video editing tutorials on Bilibili and Douyin, focusing on learning the basic operations of the Jianying app. He followed the tutorials and practiced by filming a clip of himself repairing an old desk lamp with his phone.

events.name: Cleaning the new home
events.description: On the morning of the gathering, Yin Hao and Chen Jie worked together to give their new home a final cleaning, tidying up the living room and dining area to create a neat and comfortable environment for receiving guests.

events.name: Organize moving items
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao continued organizing the items that had not been put away, placing tools, fishing gear, and other equipment in their proper spots, gradually acclimating to the new environment.

events.name: First Cross Power Training
events.description: Under the guidance of Chen Jie, Yin Hao conducted his first systematic cross-training session at Songjiang Vitality Fitness Center, focusing on squats and core stability exercises in preparation for the half marathon.

起始状态.所处地点: The former rental residence on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Busy and tense

结束状态.所处地点: New Shared Apartment near Jiuting Subway Station in Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied

2025-06.daily_overview: Create a cohabitation agreement with roommate Chen Jie, review and adjust the financial plan for the past half-month in the afternoon, then consult with a maintenance technician, clean and organize in the evening, adapt to the new cohabitation life, and strictly enforce the end of the health status.

events.name: Establish a Shared Housing Agreement
events.description: Yin Hao and Chen Jie sat down in the living room to discuss and jointly establish a set of living conventions, including a public health duty roster, rules for sharing water and electricity bills, and visitor reception guidelines, ensuring an orderly and harmonious shared living environment.

events.name: Review Half-Month Income and Expenses
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao opened the accounting app, carefully reviewed and summarized all income and expenditure records from June 1st to 15th, specifically marking the large expenses such as the shared apartment deposit and rent payments.

events.name: Adjust the financial plan.
events.description: Based on the income and expenditure analysis, Yin Hao searched for and researched low-risk bond fund products on the financial management platform. He made a decision: starting from July, he will slightly increase the monthly fixed investment amount in funds and plans to allocate a portion of the funds to bond funds.

events.name: Please consult the maintenance technician.
events.description: Yin Hao took the repaired radio and the difficult problems he encountered during the repair process to Chen Jianguo's repair shop for advice. Master Chen inspected his work, offering praise and more in-depth guidance.

events.name: Cleaning and organizing the new home.
events.description: The day after the party, Yin Hao and Chen Jie thoroughly cleaned the house together, washing pots and dishes, tidying up the living room, and disposing of leftover ingredients and trash, restoring the new home to its neat and tidy state.

events.name: Take a leisurely stroll
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took a leisurely stroll along the greenway in the residential area near Jiuting to familiarize himself with the surroundings and relax.

events.name: Discussing a health plan with roommates.
events.description: In the evening, I discussed a healthy and balanced co-living plan with Chen Jie, setting boundaries for daily routines.

起始状态.所处地点: New shared apartment near Jiuting Metro Station, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Relax and adapt

结束状态.所处地点: New Shared Apartment near Jiuting Subway Station in Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Plan Satisfaction

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao concluded his Dragon Boat Festival holiday and returned to Shanghai from his parents' home in Nantong early in the morning. In the morning, he handled the procedures for terminating the lease on his old residence. In the afternoon, he worked at the company and consulted about his parents' insurance matters. In the evening, he organized and planned at his temporary accommodation, adjusting his schedule due to travel fatigue.

events.name: Returning to Shanghai from Nantong.
events.description: At 6 a.m., Yin Hao departed from his parents' home in Nantong and took the high-speed train back to Shanghai. Upon arriving at Shanghai Hongqiao Station, he transferred to the subway to head to Songjiang District, where he temporarily booked a budget hotel near his company to store his luggage.

events.name: Check the results of the online charity run.
events.description: After settling in at the hotel, Yin Hao logged into the online charity run event page on his phone. He checked his total running distance for the month, which had reached 128 kilometers. According to the event rules, the corresponding list of corporate donation items included basketballs, jump ropes, and books. He felt a sense of satisfaction and pride in having persisted with his exercise while contributing to a public cause.

events.name: Handover for the termination of the old residence lease.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao went to his former residence at No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road for a final inspection. He meticulously cleaned each room to ensure everything was tidy, then completed the check-out procedures with the landlord, Li Xiuying, successfully retrieving his security deposit. The two had a brief conversation in the living room, during which Yin Hao thanked Sister Li for her care over the years.

events.name: Consultation on purchasing insurance for parents.
events.description: After returning to the company, Yin Hao took advantage of his work breaks to ask his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleague Wang Lei for advice on purchasing medical insurance for his parents. Master Sun shared key points for choosing consumption-based medical insurance, while Wang Lei recommended several cost-effective products. Yin Hao carefully noted down their suggestions.

events.name: Accept the task of mentoring interns.
events.description: At the pre-shift meeting, Master Sun Jianguo assigned Yin Hao to assist in guiding the new intern over the next few days to familiarize them with the basic operations of the CNC machine. After accepting the task, Yin Hao immediately reviewed the equipment operation manual and safety regulations, considered the key teaching points and sequence, and prepared to begin the next day.

events.name: Evening Organization and Planning
events.description: In the hotel room that evening, Yin Hao organized the lease termination documents and checked the deposit receipt. Afterwards, he planned the moving arrangements and work schedule for the next few days. Feeling fatigued, he decided to rest early and relaxed by listening to music.

起始状态.所处地点: At the parents' home in Rudong County, Nantong City, Jiangsu Province.
起始状态.心情: Nostalgic yet goal-oriented.

结束状态.所处地点: A budget hotel in Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Tired but satisfied with the completion of tasks.

2025-06.daily_overview: After morning jogging near his temporary residence, Yin Hao went to work. In the morning, he guided interns on safety protocols, shared the results of a charity run at noon, worked in the afternoon and posted about fixing a radio, and reviewed exam knowledge in the evening, feeling slightly anxious due to the pressure of preparing for the exam.

events.name: Morning Running Experience and Plan Adjustment
events.description: At 6 a.m., Yin Hao went for a morning run in the park near the hotel. He felt that his body stability and ground-pushing efficiency seemed to have improved. After the run, he communicated with his running partner Chen Jie via WeChat and decided to formally incorporate a weekly strength training session into his half-marathon preparation plan. He also started considering purchasing a fitness pass for individual sessions.

events.name: Commuting to work
events.description: After his morning run, Yin Hao returned to the hotel to freshen up, then took the subway to the company. During his commute, he wore headphones and listened to his favorite music to relax.

events.name: Guiding Interns: Safety and Environmental Introduction
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao provided a comprehensive introduction to the interns about the workshop environment, the basic structure of CNC machine tools, their main functions, and, most importantly, the safety operating procedures. Drawing from his own experience, he emphasized the potential hazards of the equipment and the methods for handling emergencies, ensuring that the interns developed a strong sense of safety awareness.

events.name: Share the results of the charity run on social media.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao shared a screenshot of the charity run event results on his social media feed and running group, thanking Chen Jie for the recommendation and calling on more friends to pay attention to and participate in similar public welfare activities. The post received many likes and comments, including encouragement from colleagues and comrades.

events.name: Release a technical post on fixing the radio.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao compiled the complete process of repairing the old radio (including problem diagnosis, repair steps, and before-and-after comparisons) into a post with images and text. He then shared it on the retro electronics forum he frequents and on his WeChat Moments. The post received numerous likes and comments, with fellow enthusiasts on the forum discussing technical details with him, while his friends dubbed him the [Tech Geek Master].

events.name: Evening Review and Planning
events.description: In the hotel at night, Yin Hao reviewed the theoretical knowledge points for the senior technician exam and planned the training content for the next day. He also searched online for information about gyms in Songjiang District, comparing the prices of single-visit passes. He felt a slight pressure due to the slow progress of his review.

起始状态.所处地点: A budget hotel in Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Fresh and energetic

结束状态.所处地点: Same hotel
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly anxious

2025-06.daily_overview: On weekdays, Yin Hao continued to guide the interns through operational procedures. During the lunch break, he chatted with colleagues about self-media topics. In the afternoon, he worked overtime unexpectedly to handle urgent orders, and due to fatigue, he went to bed early in the evening.

events.name: Morning Reading and Commuting
events.description: Yin Hao didn't go for a morning run today. Instead, he got up early and read the theoretical materials for the senior technician exam in his hotel room. After that, he took the subway to work, contemplating the day's teaching arrangements on the way.

events.name: Guiding Interns: Demonstrating Basic Operations
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao systematically demonstrated the complete basic operation process of the CNC machine tool to the interns, covering key steps such as power-on self-check, workpiece clamping, tool installation and alignment, and calling preset machining programs. While operating, he explained the purpose and precautions for each step, and the interns took careful notes.

events.name: Casual Chat About Self-Media Topics During Lunch Break
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao shared a table with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang in the cafeteria. He tentatively brought up the topic of skilled workers engaging in self-media, seeking their opinions and sharing some cases he had observed. Wang Lei thought it was worth a try, while Liu Zhiqiang suggested starting from personal interests.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle urgent orders
events.description: In the afternoon, the company received an urgent order, and Yin Hao was asked to work overtime to assist with CNC programming and preliminary processing. He focused on his work until 7 p.m., causing the originally scheduled moving preparations to be postponed.

events.name: Handling moving arrangements during work breaks.
events.description: During a work break, Yin Hao confirmed the specific time for moving over the weekend with his roommate Chen Jie via WeChat and contacted a moving company to schedule the service. He also checked the property fee payment status for his new apartment.

events.name: Organizing personal items in the evening.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao returned to the hotel. Fatigued from overtime, he only briefly organized his luggage, sorting and packing items in preparation for moving into his new apartment in a few days. As he tidied up, he listened to music, feeling calm but exhausted.

起始状态.所处地点: A budget hotel in Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Focus

结束状态.所处地点: Same hotel
结束状态.心情: Fatigued but orderly progress

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao officially moved into the Jiuting apartment he shares with his running partner Chen Jie. In the morning, he reviewed competition matters; in the afternoon, he guided interns in practical work; and in the evening, he cleaned and adjusted to the new environment with his roommate. Due to the exhaustion of moving, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Check the schedule for the senior technician competition.
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao made a phone call to his mentor, Sun Jianguo, at the hotel. They conducted a final review of the theoretical knowledge points and tool list required for the competition, and confirmed the transportation and accommodation arrangements to the venue, ensuring everything was foolproof.

events.name: Officially moved into the shared apartment.
events.description: After taking leave in the morning, Yin Hao took a moving company vehicle to transport his luggage from the hotel to the new shared apartment near Jiuting Metro Station. Chen Jie took leave to help at home, and together they moved the items into the room. Yin Hao then organized his personal belongings and familiarized himself with the new living environment.

events.name: First Major Cleanup of Shared Areas with Roommates
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao and Chen Jie carried out their first major cleaning of the shared areas after moving in together, tidying up the living room, kitchen, and bathroom. They worked together in a harmonious atmosphere, dividing the tasks and chatting about each other’s work and daily routines.

events.name: Guiding Interns: Supervising Practical Operations
events.description: Yin Hao returned to the company in the afternoon and supervised the interns in the workshop as they attempted to independently complete the basic operational procedures. He observed and guided them from the side, promptly correcting any mistakes and patiently answering the various questions raised by the interns. Through this interaction, Yin Hao also reflected on and reinforced his own knowledge system.

events.name: Pay Attention to Minor Frictions in Shared Living
events.description: Returning to the apartment in the evening, Yin Hao noticed some minor differences with Chen Jie regarding the cleaning schedule for public areas and daily routines. Instead of bringing it up immediately, he began to think about how to communicate effectively to resolve the issue and prevent any potential conflicts from building up.

events.name: Evening adaptation to the new environment.
events.description: After tidying up his own room, Yin Hao had a brief conversation with Chen Jie in the living room, agreeing to have breakfast together the next day. He then relaxed by listening to music and planned his morning jogging route for the following day, as his appetite had increased due to the exhaustion from moving.

起始状态.所处地点: A budget hotel in Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Anticipating and slightly busy

结束状态.所处地点: Shared apartment near Jiuting Metro Station, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A touch of contemplation amidst the freshness.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao experienced his first morning jog friction in the new apartment. During the day, he excelled at work by resolving a machine tool malfunction and completing his parents' insurance enrollment. After work, he invited his roommate for a conversation, reported on the guidance of interns in the evening, and felt relaxed due to the successful insurance enrollment.

events.name: Morning Jog Warm-up Leads to Minor Conflict
events.description: At 5:30 in the morning, Yin Hao was doing pre-run warm-up exercises in the living room, making some noise. Chen Jie, who had stayed up late playing games the night before, was awakened and expressed dissatisfaction from the bedroom (complaining through the door). Upon hearing this, Yin Hao felt embarrassed and stopped the warm-up, switching to simple stretching on the balcony instead.

events.name: Indoor Commuting on Rainy Days
events.description: Due to the rain, Yin Hao drove his family car to the company, and the traffic was slightly slower on the way. He listened to the radio news.

events.name: Repair machine tool failures promptly.
events.description: During the morning production process, a key CNC machine suddenly triggered an alarm and shut down. Drawing on his accumulated experience, Yin Hao quickly identified that the issue was caused by a loose sensor signal cable. He promptly repaired it, preventing a prolonged production halt and earning praise from the team leader.

events.name: Complete Parental Insurance Application Online
events.description: During the lunch break, after a comprehensive comparison, Yin Hao finally selected a consumer-type medical insurance product that covers hospitalization and specific outpatient services. He completed the online application for both of his parents through the insurance app, including filling out the insurance information and health declarations, and paid the annual premium.

events.name: Explain insurance details to parents.
events.description: After successfully purchasing the insurance, Yin Hao immediately sent the electronic policy to his parents via WeChat and proactively initiated a video call. He patiently explained the coverage, claims process, and important considerations of the insurance to ensure they understood the significance of this protection. His parents felt reassured.

events.name: Invite roommates for an honest conversation.
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao sent an invitation to his roommate Chen Jie via WeChat, suggesting that they have an open conversation about some details of their shared living arrangement in the living room after work the next evening. Chen Jie replied agreeing to the proposal.

events.name: Reporting on Internship Mentoring Situation
events.description: After the guidance period ended, Yin Hao reported the learning progress and development of the intern to his mentor, Sun Jianguo, and shared his own insights and experiences from the mentoring process. Sun Jianguo acknowledged Yin Hao's guidance efforts and encouraged him to continue refining his technical skills.

events.name: Evening Review and Relaxation
events.description: Returning to his apartment in the evening, Yin Hao reviewed the theoretical questions for the senior technician exam, and then teamed up online with his colleague Wang Lei to play a round of "Honor of Kings" to unwind.

起始状态.所处地点: Shared apartment near Jiuting Subway Station, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Slightly awkward but positive

结束状态.所处地点: Same apartment
结束状态.心情: The relief after resolving a matter.

state.今日运动: None (no morning run due to rain)

2025-06.daily_overview: On the weekend, Yin Hao and his fishing friend Wu Zhiqiang enjoyed fishing at Dianshan Lake. After returning in the afternoon, he successfully communicated with his roommate Chen Jie to resolve their shared rental friction. In the evening, he adjusted his training plan and enjoyed a dinner made from his catch, but his weight increased due to the picnic-style meal.

events.name: Confirm the weekend fishing plan.
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao contacted his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang via WeChat to confirm the weekend fishing plan, agreeing to meet near Dianshan Lake at 8 a.m. He then checked and organized his fishing gear, including fishing rods, lines, bait, fishing chairs, and more, ensuring everything was ready.

events.name: Drive to Dianshan Lake for fishing.
events.description: Yin Hao drove his personal family car to the agreed meeting point with Wu Zhiqiang. After meeting up, they headed together to the pre-selected secluded fishing spot, exchanging their recent fishing experiences along the way.

events.name: Morning Fishing and Communication
events.description: Upon arriving at the fishing spot, Yin Hao and Wu Zhiqiang selected suitable positions, set up their fishing chairs, and prepared their gear. Yin Hao attempted to apply the float adjustment techniques that Brother Wu had previously shared while fishing. Throughout the process, the two chatted as they fished, exchanging fishing tips, recent work updates, and daily life anecdotes. Yin Hao successfully caught several crucian carp and bream.

events.name: Simple lakeside picnic
events.description: By afternoon, Yin Hao and Wu Zhiqiang paused their fishing and found a clean spot by the lake for a simple picnic. They shared the food and water they had brought, including some high-energy snacks, and continued chatting casually, enjoying the tranquil scenery and leisurely time by the lake.

events.name: Continue fishing and reel in the rods in the afternoon.
events.description: After the lunch break, the two continued their afternoon fishing activities. As the sun began to set, they started to reel in their lines, releasing most of their catch back into the lake while carefully selecting two fish in good condition to take home. They cleaned up the fishing spot, packing all their equipment and any trash.

events.name: Drive back and bid farewell
events.description: Yin Hao and Wu Zhiqiang loaded all their equipment into the car and, with a relaxed mood and two fish catches, drove away from Dianshan Lake. On the way back, they continued chatting casually. Upon reaching the city, they bid each other farewell and agreed to meet up again next time.

events.name: Communicate openly with roommates to resolve conflicts.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao and Chen Jie had an honest conversation in the shared living room. Yin Hao took the initiative to address the occasional interruptions in the public hygiene rotation and the possibility that his morning activities might disturb the other's rest. Chen Jie also admitted that he sometimes forgot and explained the reasons for occasionally staying up late. There was no blame from either side, and the atmosphere remained calm.

events.name: Jointly discuss and devise a shared rental solution.
events.description: Based on open communication, Yin Hao and Chen Jie jointly discussed and determined a solution: print out the duty roster and post it on the refrigerator as a reminder, and agree that if one forgets, the other can kindly remind them. Additionally, Yin Hao agreed to move his morning warm-up exercises to his own room or balcony, while Chen Jie also expressed willingness to try adjusting his schedule.

events.name: Cook and enjoy the catch of the day for dinner.
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao processed the two fish he had brought back, cooking them in his preferred steamed style to enjoy the fruits of his labor. During dinner, he shared the day's fishing anecdotes and photos of his catch with his family via WeChat.

events.name: Clean fishing gear and adjust the training plan.
events.description: After dinner, Yin Hao carefully cleaned the fishing gear he had used, such as the fishing rod and fishing line, and stored them properly after they dried. He then reviewed his training records and physical sensations from the past three weeks and found that the completion rate of his tempo runs needed improvement. Consequently, he made slight adjustments to his plan for the next three weeks, appropriately reducing the intensity of one training session to ensure sustainability.

2025-06.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yin Hao went to the training center to collect exam materials and review, while also handling minor cleaning issues in the shared apartment. In the evening, he organized his self-media notes and intensified his review. His weight decreased due to morning runs.

events.name: Morning Run and Breakfast
events.description: As usual, Yin Hao went for a 6-kilometer morning run near the residential area to build up energy for the day’s activities. After the run, he had breakfast with Chen Jie in the apartment, casually discussing their feelings about implementing the new co-living arrangement.

events.name: Claim the Advanced Technician Examination Materials
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao went to the Shanghai Vocational Skills Training Center to collect the simulated test question bank for the advanced CNC machine tool operator technician exam. He also had a brief exchange with the training instructor, Liu Jianjun, to obtain key suggestions for his review.

events.name: Develop a detailed review plan
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao created a detailed daily review plan based on the remaining time, allocating it between theoretical review and practical simulations. He wrote the plan in his notebook and set milestone goals.

events.name: A Small Cleaning Incident in a Shared Apartment
events.description: This week, it was Chen Jie's turn to be responsible for kitchen cleaning, but he forgot due to unexpected overtime work, resulting in a pile of unwashed dishes in the sink. Yin Hao was somewhat displeased upon discovering this, but chose to wash some of them himself first instead of addressing the issue immediately. He planned to remind Chen Jie about it later.

events.name: Organize notes on the self-media direction.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao compiled the characteristics, advantages, disadvantages, and potential entry points of various self-media accounts he had recently observed into electronic notes. He also began brainstorming ideas for a side business that would combine his technical skills (CNC/machinery repair) with his hobbies (fishing/camping).

events.name: Second Round of Intensive Review
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a second round of intensive review based on the notes and error corrections compiled during the first round, focusing on strengthening weak areas. He concentrated on tackling challenging topics such as the principles of numerical control systems and complex process calculations, and completed numerous practice exercises.

events.name: Relax before bed.
events.description: After finishing his review, Yin Hao listened to some music and briefly chatted with his comrade Zhang Jianguo on WeChat about recent updates before getting ready to rest.

2025-06.daily_overview: On weekdays, Yin Hao implemented a new co-living arrangement by posting a duty roster and adjusting the morning exercise location. During the day, he worked and reviewed his studies, and in the evenings, he continued preparing for exams. Thanks to regular exercise, his weight remained stable.

events.name: Adjust the morning warm-up activities.
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao began to adjust his pre-run warm-up routine to his own room to minimize the potential impact on his roommates. He performed stretching and dynamic warm-up exercises in his room before heading out for his run.

events.name: Create and post the public health duty roster.
events.description: Before going to work, Yin Hao created a clear public health duty roster on the computer based on the discussion results, printed it out, and posted it on the refrigerator door as a reminder for both parties to follow. Chen Jie expressed his approval upon seeing it.

events.name: Commuting and Work
events.description: Yin Hao drove to work, contemplating the day's review content along the way. In the morning, he completed the daily maintenance tasks for the machine tools and discussed programming issues with his colleague Liu Zhiqiang.

events.name: Reviewing theories during the lunch break
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao quickly finished his meal in the cafeteria and returned to the rest area to review the theoretical knowledge for the senior technician exam, focusing specifically on the section about material mechanics.

events.name: Please ask the master during work breaks.
events.description: In the afternoon, before getting off work, Yin Hao consulted his mentor, Sun Jianguo, about a technical issue regarding the optimization of CNC system parameters. Master Sun provided a detailed explanation and encouraged him to prepare for the exam.

events.name: Evening Review and Interaction with Roommates
events.description: Returning to the apartment in the evening, Yin Hao continued reviewing for the exam. Chen Jie also began trying to adjust his evening routine, going to bed earlier. The two had a brief exchange in the living room, and their relationship grew even more harmonious.

events.name: Online games for relaxation.
events.description: During a study break, Yin Hao teamed up with his gaming friend Zhang Fei to play a round of "Honor of Kings" to relieve stress.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao conducted his first practical simulation exam at the training center. Although he was nervous and exceeded the time limit, he calmly reviewed the process afterward. He then proceeded with a theoretical self-assessment and practiced impeller processing. In the evening, he summarized his improvements and stayed up late due to his focused review.

events.name: Morning Run and Commuting
events.description: After running 5 kilometers in the neighborhood in the morning, Yin Hao returned home to freshen up and then drove to the training center. On the way, he listened to exam preparation audio to reinforce his memory.

events.name: First Full-Process Practical Simulation Exam
events.description: In the training workshop of the training center, Yin Hao underwent his first full-process, time-limited practical simulation exam. Due to nervousness, he exceeded the time limit, but the processing quality met the standards. After the simulation, he calmly reviewed the entire operation process.

events.name: Review Analysis and Review with the Master
events.description: Yin Hao recorded parts of the operation with his mobile phone and reviewed the video together with Master Sun Jianguo. They jointly identified that the main issues were insufficient programming efficiency and poor coordination between processes. Master Sun provided targeted suggestions.

events.name: Theoretical Self-Assessment and Knowledge Integration
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took a set of past-year mock exams under timed conditions to assess his review progress. Afterward, he integrated knowledge from numerical control principles, programming, techniques, and materials into a cohesive system, while also compiling a collection of his incorrect answers.

events.name: Practice Four-Axis Linkage Impeller Machining
events.description: Using the training center's equipment, Yin Hao practiced four-axis linkage machining to produce an impeller model. He focused on tackling toolpath planning, collision checking, and post-processing code generation. Master Sun conducted precision testing and surface quality evaluation of the completed impeller, pointing out areas for improvement.

events.name: Evening Summary and Planning
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao summarized the day's simulation experience and recorded improvement measures in his notebook. He planned specialized practice sessions for the next few days to enhance programming efficiency and operational fluency, staying up late due to deep contemplation.

events.name: Simple communication with roommates.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao and Chen Jie chatted about the weather and work in the living room, creating a relaxed atmosphere.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao achieved a breakthrough in running, made smooth progress in reviewing, improved harmony with roommates, deepened his interest in restoration, and abandoned unsuitable time management apps while reducing exercise intensity due to a mild cold.

events.name: High-Quality 10-Kilometer Running Breakthrough
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a high-quality 10-kilometer training session at the outdoor track of Songjiang Sports Center. His average pace improved by about 15 seconds compared to the beginning of the month, and he felt relaxed after the run, with a significantly shorter recovery time. Excitedly, he recorded this breakthrough data on the trend chart in his notebook.

events.name: Systematic review and filling in the gaps
events.description: During the morning work break and lunchtime, Yin Hao systematically reviewed the first half of the learning content, organized study notes, and completed a set of comprehensive practice exercises to assess learning outcomes and identify areas for improvement.

events.name: Abandon Time Block App
events.description: After a period of internal struggle, Yin Hao ultimately decided to abandon the time-blocking app. He realized that while the tool had offered fresh insights during specific periods of pressure, it had failed to integrate into his deeply ingrained work style, which relied more on physical records and his internal rhythm. He cleared the data within the app, removed it from his phone's home screen, and eventually uninstalled it.

events.name: Please ask the master about knowledge sharing.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao consulted his mentor Sun Jianguo, asking whether it was valuable to share or document the experience of operating CNC machine tools and troubleshooting techniques. Master Sun affirmed this and shared some industry insights, encouraging him to give it a try.

events.name: Communicating with Roommates During Breakfast
events.description: After their morning run, Yin Hao and Chen Jie had breakfast together at the breakfast shop in the neighborhood. They chatted casually about their feelings regarding the implementation of the new plan over the past few days, and both felt that communication had become smoother, making the shared living atmosphere more harmonious.

events.name: Repairing the shift of interest towards collectibles.
events.description: With the improvement of his repair skills and deeper community interactions, Yin Hao’s understanding of [repair] shifted from simply [fixing it to make it work] to [restoring its original appearance and preserving its historical feel]. He began consciously searching for vintage electronic products with specific era characteristics or design aesthetics on platforms like Xianyu and in second-hand markets, sparking the idea of building a collection of such items as a series.

events.name: Adjusting Exercise for a Mild Cold
events.description: Yin Hao is experiencing slight nasal congestion and fatigue, likely due to a cold caused by the change in weather. He has decided to reduce the intensity of his exercise for the day, opting only for light stretching, and to drink more water and rest.

events.name: Evening Relaxation and Planning
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao listened to some music and browsed information about retro electronics online. He planned a weekend escape room activity and confirmed the details with friends in a WeChat group.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao focused on practicing programming efficiency to prepare for the exam, while also proposing a weekend escape room activity and completing the reservation. In the evening, he reviewed theoretical knowledge, and his cold condition improved.

events.name: Morning Run and Commuting

events.name: Concentrated practice programming efficiency
events.description: In response to the identified programming efficiency issues, Yin Hao concentrated on practicing the programming of typical part processing during work breaks and lunch hours. He utilized simulation software for offline programming, repeatedly optimized tool paths and parameter settings, and sought programming tips from his colleague Liu Zhiqiang, aiming to reduce programming time.

events.name: Propose a weekend escape room activity.
events.description: To celebrate moving into a new home and relieve the stress of exam preparation, Yin Hao suggested to his roommate Chen Jie and colleague Wang Lei in the WeChat group that they go play an escape room together over the weekend, to which both responded enthusiastically.

events.name: Book an Escape Room Session
events.description: Yin Hao searched online for escape room shops near Songjiang University Town and found a newly opened one with good reviews. After discussing with Chen Jie and Wang Lei in the group chat, they decided to book a session for Saturday afternoon and chose the "Mechanical Maze" theme, which required hands-on and logical skills. Yin Hao completed the payment and reservation online.

events.name: Review theoretical knowledge in the evening.
events.description: Returning to the apartment in the evening, Yin Hao reviewed the theoretical part of the senior technician exam, focusing on the principles of CNC systems and process calculations. He took notes and planned specialized practice for the next day.

events.name: Video call with family
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao had a brief video call with his parents, updating them on his recent situation and exam preparation progress. His parents reminded him to take care and get enough rest.

events.name: Indoor Warm-up and Commuting
events.description: Due to the rain, Yin Hao did his morning warm-up in his room and then drove to work. The road was slippery, so he drove carefully.

events.name: Specialized Practice Process Connection
events.description: Yin Hao returned to the training workshop for a specialized practice session focused on the coordination of processes and the smoothness of machine tool operations. He repeatedly rehearsed the entire workflow, from clamping and tool setting to executing the machining process, emphasizing the standardization and continuity of his movements. He also invited Master Sun Jianguo to observe and provide guidance, helping him correct subtle operational habits.

events.name: Planning a Nostalgic Trip for the Fifth Anniversary of Relocation
events.description: During the lunch break, while reflecting on the fifth anniversary of his move to Shanghai, Yin Hao decided to take a nostalgic trip over the weekend to revisit the memories from his early days in the city. He roughly planned the route: taking the subway from Songjiang to Jing'an District to visit his old residence and the Suzhou River.

events.name: Prepare a complete machining process card.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao completed the processing process card based on the previously practiced parts, including the procedures, tools, cutting parameters, and so on. Sun Jianguo reviewed the process documents, pointing out details that could optimize production efficiency and safety. Yin Hao made revisions and improvements accordingly.

events.name: Evening Organization and Relaxation
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao organized his review notes for the week and prepared casual clothes for tomorrow’s escape room activity. He watched TV for a while in the living room with Chen Jie and chatted about their weekend plans.

events.name: Online games and communication with comrades-in-arms.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao chatted briefly with his comrades Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng in a WeChat group, sharing their exam preparation progress and setting a time for their next gathering.

2025-06.daily_overview: On the weekend, Yin Hao took the final pre-exam simulation. In the afternoon, he enjoyed team fun with friends by playing an escape room game. In the evening, he dealt with minor cleaning issues in the shared apartment and consulted a mentor on difficult problems. Due to social gatherings and eating out, his weight increased slightly.

events.name: Morning runs help reserve energy for activities.
events.description: According to his routine, Yin Hao went for a 5-kilometer run on the weekend morning to build up energy for the day's activities. After the run, he had a simple breakfast at home.

events.name: Final High-Fidelity Simulation Examination
events.description: On the last day before the exam, Yin Hao conducted a comprehensive and highly realistic final simulation, covering both theoretical and practical aspects. He successfully completed the simulation within the allotted time while meeting the required quality standards. After the simulation, he refrained from engaging in high-intensity practice and instead focused on organizing his exam materials.

events.name: Relax and prepare for the exam.
events.description: After the simulation, Yin Hao relaxed by listening to music and chatting online with friends, making final mental preparations for the official exam. He checked his exam documents and tools to ensure everything was in order.

events.name: Difficulties in Enforcing Shared Apartment Cleaning Rules
events.description: It was Yin Hao's turn to clean the living room, but he was delayed due to a last-minute weekend overtime arrangement at his company, leaving the floor dusty and uncleaned. Although Chen Jie didn’t say anything when he saw it, Yin Hao felt guilty inside and also found the rule difficult to follow.

events.name: Meet up with friends and head to the escape room.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao, Chen Jie, and Wang Lei met at the Songjiang University Town subway station and walked together to the booked escape room shop. Along the way, the three chatted about their recent work and life, filled with anticipation.

events.name: Play the "Machinarium" Escape Room
events.description: In the escape room shop, the three entered the theme room [Mechanical City]. Within the one-hour game time, they needed to collaborate to solve a series of puzzles related to gears, circuits, and codes. Yin Hao, leveraging his ISTJ traits of meticulous observation and hands-on skills, played a key role in cracking a mechanism resembling a CNC control panel. Ultimately, the team successfully escaped.

events.name: Party Review and Sharing
events.description: After successfully escaping, the three of them ordered drinks and snacks at a beverage shop outside the store. They enthusiastically reviewed the entire decryption process, discussing their respective highlights and mistakes, with laughter echoing throughout. Yin Hao felt an unprecedented sense of relaxation and enjoyed the joy of teamwork.

events.name: Return to share with Moments
events.description: After the gathering, Yin Hao and Chen Jie returned together to their shared home. Yin Hao shared his experience and photos from the escape room on his WeChat Moments, receiving numerous likes and comments, including inquiries from other friends.

events.name: Seek guidance from the master on theoretical difficulties.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao noted down several theoretical challenges encountered during his review (such as the analysis of the causes of specific processing errors) and consulted his mentor, Sun Jianguo, via WeChat, gaining deeper explanations and practical insights.

2025-06.daily_overview: Yin Hao embarked on a five-year nostalgia trip, strolling through old places to reflect on personal growth. In the evening, he shared his feelings and reviewed for the end-of-month mock exam. His weight decreased due to exercise.

events.name: Morning Run and Departure
events.description: Following his usual routine, Yin Hao went for a morning run on the weekend to build up energy for the day's activities. After the run, he freshened up and got ready to head out.

events.name: Take the subway to Jing'an District.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took the subway from Songjiang to the old Zhabei District (now Jing'an District) where he had rented a place when he first arrived in Shanghai in early 2020. Along the way, he observed the changes in the city and reminisced about his initial experiences upon arrival.

events.name: Strolling along familiar streets, observing the changes.
events.description: Yin Hao strolled along the familiar streets of Jing'an District, observing the changes over the past five years and sensing an atmosphere that felt both familiar and strange. He noticed that some old shops were still there, while new buildings had also risen.

events.name: Recalling the breakfast stalls when I first arrived in Shanghai.
events.description: Yin Hao found the breakfast stall he used to frequent (now a fixed storefront), had a bowl of small wontons, savored the taste of his early days in Shanghai, and reflected on the passage of time.

events.name: Standing under the old residential building, reminiscing.
events.description: Standing in front of the residential building where he once rented an apartment, Yin Hao recalled the scene when he first arrived with his luggage in 2020. Reflecting on his current life, he felt a surge of emotions and took several photos with his phone.

events.name: Take a stroll along Suzhou Creek to enjoy the sunset.
events.description: Yin Hao strolled along the Suzhou River, admiring the city skyline under the sunset, and used his phone to take photos, engaging in active urban exploration. He felt a deeper connection with Shanghai.

events.name: Returning home to Songjiang.
events.description: After the nostalgic journey, Yin Hao took the subway back to his home in Songjiang District, concluding his day's itinerary. Along the way, he organized his photos and thoughts.

events.name: Sharing nostalgic feelings on Moments
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao selected a few sunset photos taken at Suzhou Creek, added captions, and shared them on his social media feed to express his feelings about this nostalgic five-year anniversary trip, which resonated with his friends and sparked their comments.

events.name: End-of-Month Mock Exam and Review
events.description: Yin Hao conducted a comprehensive mock exam at the end of the month. Based on the results, he analyzed his weak areas and focused on reviewing incorrect questions and key challenging topics, making final preparations for the upcoming exam next month.

His condition remained stable, meeting the criteria for ending the health status.

events.name: Summarize the Experience of Using Time Management Apps
events.description: While organizing his desk over the weekend, Yin Hao reflected on his experience with the time management app. He likened the attempt to a brief "external tool," confirming that he was not suited to relying heavily on digital tools for micromanagement. He concluded that, for him, clear long-term goals, a regular routine, and the immediate recording of thoughts with pen and paper were more effective and sustainable methods of self-management.

events.name: Internalization of Vehicle Self-Inspection Habits
events.description: After nearly a month of practice and sharing, Yin Hao has initially internalized the habit of seasonal vehicle self-inspection and has established a more knowledgeable and reliable personal image among his colleagues and friends. Before going to work today, he briefly checked the tire pressure and engine oil.

events.name: Develop a preliminary plan for trying out a side business.
events.description: Based on recent observations and learning, Yin Hao has formulated a simple follow-up plan, which includes learning basic video editing, determining a specific direction for experimentation (such as filming a short video on CNC operation tips), and setting preliminary time milestones.

events.name: Summarize the training progress in June and plan for July.
events.description: Yin Hao reviewed the training data for the entire month of June, comparing the progress from the beginning to the end of the month, and felt a significant boost in confidence about achieving his half-marathon goal. He wrote a summary in his notebook, fine-tuned his July training plan based on his current condition, and decided to appropriately increase the distance of his weekend long runs.

events.name: Develop a plan for vintage restoration hobbies.
events.description: Yin Hao summarized the explorations and practices of this month and formulated a preliminary plan for his new deep interest: 1. Complete at least one moderately challenging retro product restoration project per quarter; 2. Systematically learn the fundamentals of analog circuits; 3. Attempt to restore an old item with mechanical transmission structures; 4. Plan a small display shelf. He officially incorporated this hobby as an important part of his personal life.

events.name: Review and consolidate before the exam.
events.description: On the final day of the review plan, Yin Hao stopped learning new content and instead quickly skimmed through all his notes and error logs to reinforce his memory. At the same time, he adjusted his mindset to prepare for the upcoming hands-on practice phase.

events.name: Plan the detailed training content for July.
events.description: Before the official start of July, Yin Hao reviewed the training data from June and, in line with his half-marathon goal, meticulously planned the weekly training content, mileage, and intensity for July on a running app. He also set specific targets for cumulative monthly mileage and completing a long-distance run of 15 kilometers.

events.name: Evening Relaxation and Preparation
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao briefly discussed the week's plans with his roommate Chen Jie, then relaxed by listening to music. He organized his work and training items for the next day, ready to welcome the new month.

2025-07.daily_overview: On the first working day of July, Yin Hao continued to maintain the good health he had enjoyed since the end of June. However, minor frictions in his shared living situation began to irritate him. His ISTJ personality, with its emphasis on order and rules, made him particularly uncomfortable with the disorder in the shared space. Internally, he found himself torn between maintaining harmony and addressing the issues at hand.

events.name: Handling daily work tasks
events.description: Yin Hao commuted to work from the shared apartment in the morning, performing routine CNC machine operations, but his mind was preoccupied with issues related to the shared living arrangement. During the lunch break, he ate alone, quietly contemplating communication strategies.

events.name: Inner Struggle and Observation
events.description: After work, Yin Hao noticed the water stains on the sink and the dust in the living room. Following his usual routine, he cleaned them but felt exhausted. He hesitated about whether to initiate a conversation, fearing it might lead to conflict, yet he also felt that enduring in silence was not a long-term solution.

events.name: Seeking external opinions
events.description: In the evening, I subtly inquired about the shared apartment issue in the WeChat group 'Songjiang Three Brothers.' Gao Zhiyuan shared his experience in establishing a convention, which inspired Yin Hao, but he hasn't made up his mind yet. Before bed, I listened to music to relax.

events.name: Added: Temporary overtime to handle machine tool malfunctions.

The repair took an additional half hour, resulting in a slightly later departure from work and an increased sense of fatigue.

He took the initiative to discuss shared living arrangements with his roommate and began handling vehicle maintenance tasks, shifting from internal conflict to practical problem-solving.

events.name: Make up your mind to take the initiative to communicate.

2025-09.daily_overview: The new week and new month began in tranquility. After reducing his morning run, Yin Hao felt physically relaxed. As the first day of the month, he efficiently handled his monthly financial planning, completed savings and investments, and began contemplating future living arrangements, reflecting the planning and pragmatic aspects of his ISTJ personality.

events.name: Morning Jog Recovery with Reduced Intensity
events.description: Considering the half marathon is approaching, Yin Hao followed the principle of tapering before the race and went for a 20-minute easy jog in a nearby park. The main purpose was to loosen up his joints and maintain his fitness level. He felt good physically and experienced no fatigue.

events.name: Develop a detailed diet and training plan.
events.description: During his lunch break, Yin Hao meticulously planned out his daily meals and training schedule for the next two weeks (the week before the competition and the recovery week after) in his notebook. Drawing on the nutrition knowledge he had recently acquired, he specifically noted the timing and portions for protein intake (such as chicken breast and eggs) and complex carbohydrates (such as brown rice and whole wheat bread) to prepare for the competition and recovery.

events.name: Confirming Salary Receipt and Planning Allocation
events.description: Yin Hao received a text message notification from Shanghai Jinggong Machinery Manufacturing Co., Ltd. regarding the deposit of his September salary. After opening his mobile banking app to confirm the amount was correct, he planned to transfer 3,000 yuan into a dedicated fixed-term savings account for his home purchase fund and allocate 2,000 yuan to purchase a low-risk money market fund, in accordance with his established monthly budget.

events.name: Execute Monthly Savings
events.description: After work, Yin Hao used his mobile banking app to transfer 3,000 yuan from his salary card to a dedicated home purchase fund account, selecting an appropriate deposit term. After completing the transaction, he recorded this savings entry in his accounting software. Seeing his savings steadily increase, he felt even more confident about achieving his goal of buying a home.

events.name: Execute Monthly Investment
events.description: Subsequently, Yin Hao logged into the commonly used financial management platform app, located the previously researched and added money market fund product in his watchlist, and used his bank card to pay 2,000 yuan for the purchase. After completing the operation, he similarly updated the record in his bookkeeping software.

events.name: Financial Review and Cash Flow Projection
events.description: After completing all financial operations, Yin Hao briefly reviewed the expenses incurred and planned for this month in the accounting software, paying special attention to the potential costs that might arise during the upcoming National Day holiday. He made a preliminary estimate of the cash flow for the next month to ensure that the expenditures remained within a manageable range.

events.name: Received a renewal inquiry and gave it preliminary thought.
events.description: While listening to music at home in the evening, Yin Hao received a WeChat message from his landlord, Li Xiuying, reminding him that the housing lease contract for October was about to expire and inquiring about his intention to renew the lease. Yin Hao read the message at his home on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District and began calmly reflecting on his living experience over the past year, including the convenience of commuting, the neighborhood environment, and relationships with neighbors.

events.name: Routine call with family.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao had a brief WeChat voice call with his mother, Wang Xiuying, informing her that his salary had been paid and everything was fine. His mother reminded him to rest before the competition and not to push himself too hard.

2025-09.daily_overview: Workdays returned to normal. During his lunch break, Yin Hao efficiently completed the purchase of healthy ingredients, preparing to implement his dietary plan. In the afternoon, a new challenge arose at work—he was assigned to mentor a new apprentice. Driven by a sense of responsibility, he meticulously crafted a training plan in the evening, gradually transitioning into the role of a "mentor."

events.name: Regular Morning Running Training
events.description: Yin Hao conducted a rhythm run training at the Songjiang Sports Center, focusing on maintaining a steady pace and breathing rhythm in preparation for the weekend's pace run, with a stable physical condition.

events.name: Purchase healthy ingredients
events.description: During his lunch break, Yin Hao went to a large supermarket near the company. Following the meal plan he had prepared the night before, he purchased ingredients such as chicken breast, eggs, milk, whole wheat bread, broccoli, and bananas. He also specifically selected sports drinks and a small can of protein powder as training supplements.

events.name: Accept the teaching assignment.
events.description: During a break in the afternoon work, team leader Wang Lei officially assigned a newly recruited apprentice to Yin Hao for a three-week on-the-job training. Wang Lei patted Yin Hao on the shoulder, expressing trust in his skills and sense of responsibility. Yin Hao felt the weight of the responsibility and solemnly accepted the task.

events.name: Carefully formulate a teaching plan.
events.description: After finishing work for the day, Yin Hao sat at his desk at home and, drawing on the company's training outline and his years of hands-on experience, developed a detailed three-week teaching plan for the apprentices. He outlined the weekly teaching priorities, practical projects, safety assessment goals, and theoretical review checkpoints, creating a rigorous and clear plan.

events.name: Exchanging teaching experiences with my elder brother.
events.description: After making the plan, Yin Hao mentioned the task of mentoring the newcomer to his older brother Yin Tao, who works in sales in Suzhou, via WeChat. His brother shared some experiences in team management and communication, encouraging him to be patient and meticulous. The conversation between the brothers gave Yin Hao more confidence for the mentoring work the next day.

events.name: Resting a bit later due to contemplating plans.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao stayed up a bit later than usual, repeatedly refining the details of the teaching plan, but felt well-prepared.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to start a day of work and training.

结束状态.所处地点: Study Room, Apartment 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly stressful, I approach my new job responsibilities with both seriousness and anticipation.

2025-09.daily_overview: A light drizzle drifted across the sky, adding a different hue to both training and teaching. Yin Hao tested running shoes on the slippery road and meticulously recorded the effects of nutritional supplements. At work, he formally began his first teaching session, systematically and rigorously imparting safety regulations and foundational knowledge of machine tools, laying the initial framework for the mentor-apprentice relationship.

events.name: Rainy Day Road Running Adaptability Training
events.description: In the early morning drizzle, Yin Hao still insisted on going out for an 8-kilometer run on the slippery sidewalks around the neighborhood. He specifically tested the grip of his running shoes on the wet surface and adjusted his running posture to maintain stability, preparing for the possible weather conditions on race day.

events.name: Record post-training nutritional supplementation experience
events.description: After finishing his morning run, Yin Hao immediately followed his plan by drinking a protein powder shake and eating a banana. He took out his phone's memo app and carefully recorded his physical sensations for the day, including the recovery speed of muscle fatigue, changes in hunger levels in the afternoon, and energy levels, as a reference for adjusting his diet.

events.name: First Teaching Session: General Safety Rules and Machine Tool Overview
events.description: On the workshop floor, Yin Hao, with a serious and patient demeanor, systematically introduced the new apprentices to the overall structure of the CNC machine tool, its key components, and their functions. He emphasized the general safety rules that must be followed upon entering the workshop and personally demonstrated the correct way to wear and inspect personal protective equipment (safety shoes, goggles, and earplugs), stressing that safety is the top priority.

events.name: Check the apprentice's safety equipment.
events.description: After the explanation, Yin Hao instructed the apprentice to independently put on all the labor protection equipment. He then conducted a thorough inspection and made corrections to ensure there were no oversights before allowing the apprentice to approach the machine tool area.

events.name: Trying a new recipe for dinner.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao attempted to make a simple healthy dinner using the purchased chicken breast and broccoli, paired with brown rice. He reduced the portion of braised pork and increased the proportion of vegetables, beginning to implement his new diet plan.

events.name: Received the local specialties sent by my mother.
events.description: Yin Hao received a package of clams and homemade pickles sent by his mother from Nantong, feeling a sense of warmth, and decided to cook and enjoy them over the weekend.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm and composed, fully prepared for training in the rain and new teaching tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Rigorous and responsible, after completing the first teaching session, I feel the weight on my shoulders has become more tangible, but the process went smoothly.

state.今日运动: 8-kilometer road run on a rainy day

2025-09.daily_overview: An exhilarating morning! Yin Hao clearly felt an improvement in his condition during his morning run, and the exercise data confirmed this, which gave him a strong boost in his pursuit of the half-marathon goal. At work, he continued to patiently teach knowledge about the operation panel. After work, weekend gathering plans with friends were also enthusiastically finalized in the WeChat group.

events.name: Second Teaching Session: Control Panel and Basic Procedures
