events.description: Yin Hao combined the actual machine tool to explain in detail the functions of each button, knob, and display screen on the operation panel. He slowly demonstrated basic operational procedures such as powering on, shutting down, and returning to the reference point. He instructed the apprentices to record the steps and repeatedly emphasized the safety precautions for each operational stage.

events.name: Fully warm up and prepare for morning running.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao arrived at the Songjiang Sports Center. Before starting his morning run, he performed a thorough warm-up routine, including joint rotations, dynamic stretches, and a 5-minute slow walk, allowing his body to warm up slightly and prepare for the upcoming training session.

events.name: A regular morning run in excellent condition.
events.description: After warming up, Yin Hao began his regular training on the track. During the run, he clearly felt that his breathing was smoother than usual, his strides were lighter and more powerful, his overall coordination was excellent, and his physical condition was at its best in recent times.

events.name: View data to confirm progress.
events.description: After finishing his morning run, Yin Hao stopped in the rest area and checked the detailed data of this run through his sports watch. He found that the average pace had improved by about 15 seconds compared to the same period last month, and both the average heart rate and maximum heart rate remained within an ideal range. The data strongly confirmed the positive changes in his physical condition.

events.name: Reflecting on training outcomes to boost confidence.
events.description: On his way home, Yin Hao savored the pleasant physical sensations and impressive exercise data from his run, reflecting positively on the long-term effects of his consistent training. This tangible progress filled him with unprecedented confidence in achieving his goal of completing his first half marathon this Sunday.

events.name: Share the joy with running buddies and arrange a run together.
events.description: That evening, Yin Hao shared the good news of his improved condition and pace progress with Chen Jie, a fellow runner he often went morning jogging with, via WeChat. Chen Jie was also happy for him. The two exchanged insights on training and diet during the final days before the race and agreed to pick up their competition materials together on Saturday morning.

events.name: Propose and plan a weekend KTV gathering.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao suggested in the WeChat group "Songjiang Three Brothers" that they should relax over the weekend by going to a KTV to sing. Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng responded enthusiastically. They initially discussed the timing (set for Saturday evening), the general location (near the university town in Songjiang District), and decided that Yin Hao would be responsible for making the reservation.

events.name: Simple Dinner and Rest
events.description: In a cheerful mood, Yin Hao cooked a bowl of noodles for dinner, simply pairing them with eggs and vegetables. Afterward, he spent some time on his phone, arranging to play a couple of games with his gaming friend Zhang Fei on Friday night to unwind, and they briefly caught up on each other's recent lives.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, I have a feeling that my training state will be good today.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, at home
结束状态.心情: Excited and confident, breakthroughs in training and positive responses from friends filled him with immense joy.

state.今日运动: Morning run of 10 kilometers, with a significant improvement in pace.

2025-09.daily_overview: The Friday workday was spent in busyness and collaboration. Yin Hao successfully completed a high-precision machining task in the morning, earning recognition. In the afternoon, he continued to guide apprentices in theoretical learning. After work, the project celebration dinner with colleagues was filled with laughter and joy, and plans for weekend gaming sessions and KTV outings were also arranged. Meanwhile, after careful consideration, he decided to renew the lease on his current residence.

events.name: Try adjusting your lunch diet
events.description: During lunch, Yin Hao tried replacing white rice with brown rice as the staple, increased the portions of steamed sea bass and broccoli, and reduced the amount of braised pork. He ate slowly and mindfully, paying attention to changes in his energy levels and satiety during work in the afternoon, making final adjustments to his pre-competition diet.

events.name: Third Teaching Session: Image Recognition and Fundamentals of Craftsmanship
events.description: Yin Hao used a typical part drawing to explain to the apprentices how to interpret three-view drawings, dimensioning, tolerance symbols, and surface roughness requirements. By combining the drawing with simple language, he provided a preliminary explanation of the basic concepts and processes of machining, helping the apprentices establish a theoretical framework.

events.name: Explain Emergency Response Procedures
events.description: In the latter half of the course, Yin Hao focused on explaining the methods for identifying various emergency situations that may arise during machine tool operation (such as program errors, tool breakage, abnormal noises, etc.), and strictly demonstrated the standard handling procedures in accordance with operational regulations. He also guided the apprentices in familiarizing themselves with the locations and usage methods of emergency stop buttons, fire extinguishers, and first aid kits within the workshop.

events.name: Confirm the dinner gathering arrangement for the evening.
events.description: During a break in the morning, Yin Hao confirmed the specific time and location for the evening project celebration dinner with Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang via WeChat, and reserved a small private room at a well-reviewed local cuisine restaurant near the company.

events.name: Collaborate to complete high-precision machining projects
events.description: Yin Hao worked closely with programmer Liu Zhiqiang to process a batch of high-precision irregular parts for a precision instrument company. Yin Hao was responsible for operation and online monitoring, while Liu Zhiqiang debugged the program. Through repeated communication between the two, the first batch of sample parts was successfully processed. After being sent for inspection, the good news came that all indicators met the required standards.

events.name: Project Success Receives Recognition
events.description: After the quality inspection report was returned, Yin Hao reported the results to team leader Wang Lei and his mentor Sun Jianguo. Master Sun patted him on the shoulder in approval, while Wang Lei directly suggested a small gathering in the evening to celebrate. This success made Yin Hao more confident in his technical abilities.

events.name: Colleagues' celebration dinner
events.description: After work, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang headed to the pre-booked restaurant. They ordered dishes such as braised pork, steamed sea bass, and stir-fried seasonal vegetables. As they ate, they chatted about the details of the day's project, the challenges they encountered, and interesting anecdotes from the industry. The atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant, reflecting their strong camaraderie.

events.name: Agreed to a weekend gaming session.
events.description: As the dinner was drawing to a close, Wang Lei suggested forming a team to play "Honor of Kings" over the weekend and planned to invite Gao Zhiyuan to join them for a five-player match. Yin Hao and Liu Zhiqiang happily agreed, and everyone confirmed the game time for Saturday evening through the WeChat group.

events.name: Notify Friends of Game Arrangements
events.description: After the dinner, Yin Hao informed Gao Zhiyuan about the weekend gaming session via WeChat on his way home. Gao Zhiyuan responded immediately and expressed his anticipation.

events.name: Book a KTV private room for Saturday.
events.description: After returning home, Yin Hao used a mobile app to book a medium-sized private room at a familiar chain KTV (such as Star Party KTV) near the university town in Songjiang District. He secured the time slot for 7:30 PM on Saturday evening and shared the booking information in the "Songjiang Three Brothers" group chat.

events.name: After careful consideration, I have decided to renew the lease.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao carefully reviewed his living experience in the Guangfulin Road community over the past year: the commute to work was convenient, his neighbor Aunt Chen took good care of him, and the community environment was quiet. Considering factors such as stability, cost, and familiarity with the surroundings, he decided to renew the lease.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Steady, facing the wrap-up work on Friday and weekend plans.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed, work brings a sense of achievement, social calendar is fully packed, and looking forward to the weekend.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the last weekend before the race, the schedule was packed. In the morning, I completed a crucial half-marathon pace run and picked up my race kit. In the afternoon, I enjoyed a peaceful fishing session with fellow anglers. In the evening, I relaxed with friends through online gaming and offline karaoke, releasing pre-race stress. Socializing and hobbies filled this fulfilling day off.

events.name: Half Marathon Pace Running and Electrolyte Management
events.description: On a hot Saturday morning, Yin Hao completed his final long-distance pace run (approximately 15 kilometers) before the race. He strictly adhered to his target race pace and took salt tablets before and during the run to prevent electrolyte imbalance caused by excessive sweating. The training session proceeded smoothly overall.

events.name: Collect the race packet with fellow runners.
events.description: After the training session, Yin Hao and his running partner Chen Jie went together to the designated location by the event organizing committee to collect their race kits. The two carefully checked their bib numbers, timing chips, and other supplies, and discussed strategies for the race the next day, the distribution of aid stations, and the best transportation route to the starting point (they decided to take a taxi).

events.name: Drive to Dianshan Lake for fishing.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove his personal car to a subway station in Songjiang to pick up his fishing friend Wu Zhiqiang. Together, they then drove to Dianshan Lake in Qingpu District. Along the way, the two chatted about their recent work situations, and Brother Wu shared a new fishing spot he had recently discovered.

events.name: Finding Fishing Spots and Enjoying Angling
events.description: After arriving at Dianshan Lake, they found a relatively quiet and shady fishing spot based on Wu Zhiqiang's experience. The two skillfully set up their fishing gear, baited the hooks, and cast their lines. In the tranquil moments of fishing, they chatted while keeping an eye on the float. Yin Hao successfully caught several crucian carp and a small bream.

events.name: A simple meal in the wilderness and continuing to fish.
events.description: As noon approached, the two of them shared the bread, cooked food, and fruit they had brought with them in the shade near the fishing spot, having a simple lunch and replenishing their fluids. After a short rest, they continued fishing in the afternoon, enjoying the leisurely escape from the hustle and bustle of the city.

events.name: Reeling In and Heading Back, Sharing the Catch
events.description: Later in the afternoon, the two packed up all the fishing gear and carefully cleaned up the trash near the fishing spot. Yin Hao drove Wu Zhiqiang back to the gathering point in Songjiang first, then returned home himself. After preparing the crucian carp he had caught, he invited his neighbor and running partner, Chen Jie, to come over in the evening for some fish soup.

events.name: Evening Online Game Five-Player Team
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, Liu Zhiqiang, and Gao Zhiyuan logged in on time and formed a team for a five-player match in "Honor of Kings" using in-game voice chat. They coordinated seamlessly, winning several games in a row and enjoying hours of gaming fun and the thrill of teamwork.

events.name: Drive to the KTV gathering.
events.description: After the game ended, Yin Hao took a short break before driving his own car from home to the pre-booked KTV location.

events.name: KTV Singing Night
events.description: Yin Hao met up with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng in a KTV private room. They ordered beer and snacks, taking turns to sing classic oldies and popular songs. Yin Hao performed several of his signature songs and joined his friends in singing tracks like "Friends." They also played dice games, creating a lively atmosphere filled with laughter and joy, which effectively helped them release the stress from work and competition preparations.

events.name: Drive home safely.
events.description: After several hours of singing, the party came to an end. The three settled their bill and said their goodbyes at the entrance of the KTV. Yin Hao had consumed a small amount of beer and, after resting for half an hour, drove safely back to his home on Guangfulin Road in Songjiang District.

events.name: Preliminary Response to Landlord's Renewal Intention
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao replied to the landlord Li Xiuying via WeChat, clearly expressing his willingness to renew the lease. He politely inquired about the rental rate for the new year and whether there were any adjustments to other contract terms. Li Jie responded that the rent would be slightly increased, but they could meet to discuss the details.

events.name: After the match, it was slightly difficult to fall asleep due to excitement.
events.description: Due to pre-game excitement and the lingering effects of KTV, Yin Hao stayed up a bit later than planned, but he was in a cheerful mood.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Excited and slightly nervous, looking forward to tomorrow's competition and today's rich schedule.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fully satisfied yet weary, social needs thoroughly met, body and mind completely relaxed, ready to embrace tomorrow's challenges.

state.今日运动: Half marathon pace run for 15 kilometers

2025-09.daily_overview: Race day! Setting off in the early morning and giving it his all, Yin Hao completed his first half marathon with an outstanding performance, overwhelmed by a tremendous sense of achievement. After sharing the joy with friends post-race, he spent the afternoon immersed in the focus and satisfaction of repairing an old speaker, celebrating this milestone day in a different way.

events.name: Pre-race Preparation and Arrival at the Starting Point
events.description: At 4:30 in the morning, Yin Hao got up and had a pre-prepared breakfast of whole wheat bread and bananas. At 5 o'clock, he met up with Chen Jie, and they took a taxi to the starting point of the half marathon. There wasn't much conversation between them on the way, as they were both mentally preparing and making final adjustments.

events.name: Completed the first half marathon
events.description: After the starting gun fired, Yin Hao strictly followed the predetermined pace agreed upon with Chen Jie. He managed his physical energy reasonably during the race, replenished in a timely manner, and experienced no "hitting the wall" throughout the entire course. In the end, he crossed the finish line with an outstanding personal record of 2 hours and 1 minute, feeling physically exhausted but filled with immense excitement, satisfaction, and pride.

events.name: Post-match Recovery and Sharing the Joy
events.description: After crossing the finish line, Yin Hao collected his finisher medal and supplies, and carefully stretched to relax. He then took a photo with Chen Jie at the finish line. Immediately, he shared his finisher certificate, photos of the medal, and the group photo with his parents, his older brother Yin Tao, and friends such as Zhang Wei and Li Qiang via his phone, spreading the immense joy as soon as possible.

events.name: Having breakfast and exchanging ideas with running buddies.
events.description: After the race, Yin Hao and Chen Jie found a breakfast shop near the starting point. While having breakfast, they reviewed the race process in detail, sharing their respective feelings and interesting stories. As a fitness coach, Chen Jie also gave Yin Hao some post-race recovery advice.

events.name: Return home to catch up on sleep and rest.
events.description: After returning home, a strong sense of exhaustion washed over him. Yin Hao took a hot shower and then fell asleep right away, making up for the sleep he had lost due to waking up early and intense exertion.

events.name: Discovering a faulty old speaker and disassembling it.
events.description: After waking up in the afternoon, while listening to music at home, Yin Hao discovered that an old Bluetooth speaker wouldn't turn on. Out of an interest in repairs, he decided to try fixing it. He gathered his tools, carefully opened the speaker's casing, and began inspecting the internal circuitry.

events.name: Diagnose and repair the virtual soldering of the power supply.
events.description: Yin Hao used a multimeter to measure the voltage at key nodes. Drawing on his experience from repairing small household appliances as a hobby, he eventually discovered that a cold solder joint in the connection line from the power module to the motherboard was causing poor contact. He then used a soldering iron to re-solder the faulty joint.

events.name: Cleaning, assembly, and testing completed successfully.
events.description: After completing the soldering, he carefully cleaned the dust off the circuit board using a brush and an air blower. Once the circuit board was reinstalled and the casing was closed, he connected the power, and the indicator light turned on normally. Bluetooth was connected to a mobile phone to play music, and the sound was clear and normal, indicating a successful repair.

events.name: Share maintenance results to receive likes.
events.description: After the successful repair, Yin Hao felt a great sense of accomplishment. He took a photo of the repaired speaker and shared it in a small WeChat group with his running friend Chen Jie, colleague Wang Lei, and others, briefly explaining the repair process. His friends all gave him likes, calling him a tech geek.

events.name: Organizing Tools and Workbench
events.description: After the repair was completed, his ISTJ personality drove him to carefully put away tools like the soldering iron and multimeter, and he used a cloth to clean the solder fragments and dust off the workbench, restoring its tidiness.

events.name: Reliving the KTV gathering in the group chat.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao shared short videos and photos taken during last night's gathering in the "Songjiang Trio" WeChat group. Together with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng, they reminisced about the joyful moments and made plans to meet up again next time.

events.name: Video call parents to report safe arrival and share the completion of the race.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao took the initiative to video call his parents, describing the competition process and his excitement in detail. Although his mother, Wang Xiuying, felt sorry for his exhaustion, she was even prouder of him; his father, Yin Jianguo, rarely praised him, calling him a good job.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Nervous, focused, fully immersed in the upcoming competition.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely satisfied, proud, and at peace, the joy of achieving a major goal intertwines with the sense of accomplishment from hands-on success. Though physically and mentally exhausted, there is an extraordinary sense of fulfillment.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the first workday after the marathon, his body was immersed in delayed onset muscle soreness. Yin Hao focused mainly on static recovery and theoretical teaching. He helped his apprentices consolidate their knowledge and, due to physical discomfort, postponed the originally scheduled face-to-face lease renewal signing, reflecting his pragmatism and planning skills.

events.name: The body experiences intense soreness.
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Yin Hao felt a strong delayed onset muscle soreness (DOMS) in his thigh and gluteal muscles, which is a normal reaction after a half marathon race. He canceled his morning run and instead opted for simple stretching and foam roller relaxation at home.

events.name: Fourth Teaching Session: Theory Review and Q&A
events.description: In the workshop, Yin Hao systematically reviewed and organized the foundational theories, safety regulations, and other content explained over the past few days. He encouraged the apprentices to ask questions and patiently addressed all their doubts, ensuring they had a clear and solid understanding of the key points. This laid a strong foundation for the practical operations scheduled for the following week.

events.name: Choose easily digestible foods for lunch.
events.description: As his body is still in the recovery phase, Yin Hao opted for a light lunch of tomato and egg noodles along with steamed fish, avoiding greasy foods to aid in his physical recuperation.

events.name: Negotiate with the landlord to reschedule the interview.
events.description: Considering physical discomfort and the inconvenience of sitting for long periods, Yin Hao communicated with the landlord Li Xiuying via WeChat to reschedule the originally planned face-to-face signing of the lease renewal contract from that evening to September 15th (after work next Monday). Both parties amicably confirmed the new time and location (a café near the residential area).

events.name: Rest completely and recover in the evening.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao hardly had any extra activities. He simply cooked some porridge, soaked his feet in hot water after the meal, continued to relax his muscles with a foam roller, and went to bed early, allowing his body to focus on recovery.

events.name: Cancelling light activities due to muscle soreness.
events.description: Originally planning to take a light walk in the evening, but due to intense soreness, Yin Hao decided to rest completely to speed up recovery.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calmly accept the soreness of the body and plan to spend the day at a low intensity.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, bedroom in the home
结束状态.心情: Tired yet relaxed, allowing myself to rest completely, and feeling satisfied with the smooth contract amendment.

state.今日运动: None, active recovery day post-competition (stretching, foam rolling relaxation)

2025-09.daily_overview: His body gradually recovered from the post-race soreness. Yin Hao continued to adjust his diet to improve his sleep. At work, he faced his first theoretical assessment since starting his mentorship and independently took on a high-precision machining task. With his exceptional skills and close collaboration with colleagues, he successfully completed the challenge and earned recognition. In the evening, he celebrated with a small gathering of coworkers.

events.name: Adjusting Dinner to Improve Sleep
events.description: Yin Hao reflected and found that his sleep quality had been average after consuming more meat for dinner in the past few days. Tonight, he adjusted the protein source for dinner from braised pork to steamed eggs and mapo tofu, which are easier to digest, and significantly increased the proportion of vegetables to observe subsequent changes in sleep.

events.name: Organize apprentices for theoretical assessment.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao organized a closed-book written examination on safety regulations and basic theories for the new apprentices. He personally supervised the exam to assess the apprentices' learning outcomes from the first week. The overall results were positive, indicating that the apprentices had firmly grasped the necessary safety knowledge and theoretical foundations.

events.name: Take over the task of processing high-precision special-shaped parts.
events.description: In the morning, team leader Wang Lei assigned the task of processing high-precision irregular parts for a precision instrument company to Yin Hao. Yin Hao carefully reviewed the complex process drawings and strict technical requirement documents, made key notes in his work log, and felt both challenged and excited.

events.name: Collaborate with programmers to optimize the program.
events.description: Yin Hao took the drawings to the programmer Liu Zhiqiang, and the two of them sat in front of the computer to discuss the machining path, tool selection, and cutting parameters. Based on his practical experience, Yin Hao raised questions about the feasibility and safety of several key steps. In response, Liu Zhiqiang optimized the machining program and conducted simulation verifications accordingly.

events.name: Precision Preparation and Equipment Inspection
events.description: Back at his workstation, Yin Hao conducted a comprehensive inspection of the CNC machine according to the highest standards, including spindle accuracy, guide rail lubrication, air pressure, and tool magazine status. He carefully installed the specialized alloy tool specified by the program and repeatedly calibrated the measuring probe.

events.name: First Trial Processing and Online Monitoring
events.description: After securing the specially treated aluminum alloy blank in place, Yin Hao loaded the machining program and initiated the first trial processing. He remained by the machine throughout the entire process, closely monitoring the cutting conditions through the observation window, listening to the sound of the tool, and adjusting the coolant flow. The machining was paused twice midway, during which he used the machine probe to perform online measurements of critical dimensions and made fine adjustments to the tool compensation parameters.

events.name: Completion of processing and preliminary self-inspection.
events.description: Several hours later, the first three special-shaped parts were completed. Yin Hao put on fine yarn gloves, carefully removed the workpieces, used a high-pressure air gun to thoroughly blow away the chips from every corner, and conducted preliminary visual and caliper inspections to confirm there were no obvious tool marks, deformations, or damages.

events.name: Submit for quality inspection and await the report.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao delivered the processed sample to the company's precision quality inspection room, filled out a detailed inspection submission form, and specifically explained the critical dimensions and tolerance requirements of the workpiece to the quality inspector. He then returned to his workstation, feeling slightly uneasy as he continued with other routine tasks.

events.name: Obtain a high-quality inspection report
events.description: As the workday neared its end, the formal laser scanning and three-coordinate inspection reports came back, showing that all dimensional tolerances, geometric tolerances, and surface roughness indicators met or even exceeded the requirements specified in the client's drawings. Yin Hao let out a long sigh of relief, feeling a profound sense of professional accomplishment.

events.name: The reported results have been affirmed.
events.description: Yin Hao presented the inspection report and samples to the team leader Wang Lei and his mentor Sun Jianguo. Master Sun carefully examined the workpiece and nodded in approval, while Wang Lei directly praised with a smile, saying, "Well done, I knew you could do it!"

events.name: Colleagues gathering to celebrate the success of the task.
events.description: After work, Wang Lei suggested getting together. Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang went to a small restaurant near the company that they often visited and ordered a few dishes. During the meal, they once again discussed the processing details from the day, sharing the technical challenges they had encountered and their solutions. The atmosphere was relaxed and pleasant.

events.name: Feeling good after a small gathering with colleagues in the evening.
events.description: After the small gathering, Yin Hao returned home in high spirits, feeling that the work pressure and post-competition recovery were both progressing smoothly.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: The soreness in the body has lessened, spirits have recovered, and I am ready to face the challenges at work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Confident and full of a sense of accomplishment, technical abilities have been validated, relationships with colleagues are harmonious, and there is a strong passion for work.

2025-09.daily_overview: A day of returning to daily planning and social connections. Yin Hao rationally optimized his phone plan to save on expenses. At work, he began teaching practical skills. The class group chat buzzed with excitement over Zhao Lei's wedding news, and he actively participated, sending his blessings. Meanwhile, he started planning the next camping trip with friends, filling life with various connections and anticipation.

events.name: Analyzing communication expenses to decide on changing the plan.
events.description: After getting off work in the evening, Yin Hao opened his mobile carrier's app and his personal expense-tracking software at home, cross-checking the call duration and data usage details from the past 12 months. He noticed that he always had leftover data each month, but occasionally ran short on call time. Based on this data analysis, he decided to switch his phone plan.

events.name: Research and select a new package.
events.description: During his lunch break, Yin Hao used his phone to browse the internet and carefully compared the different tiers of plans offered by telecom operators such as China Mobile, China Unicom, and China Telecom. In the end, he selected a plan with 20GB of data and 500 minutes of talk time, which had a similar monthly fee but offered less data and more talk time, better aligning with his actual needs.

events.name: Online processing for plan change
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao submitted an online application to change his mobile plan through the carrier's app. The process went smoothly, and the new plan will take effect next month. He felt satisfied with this data-driven optimization decision.

events.name: Teaching Session Five: Workpiece Clamping and Tool Setting
events.description: In the workshop, Yin Hao demonstrated in detail the correct clamping methods for workpieces on CNC machine tools for the new apprentices, explaining the selection scenarios for different fixtures (such as bench vices and three-jaw chucks). He step-by-step demonstrated the procedures and techniques for precise tool alignment, emphasizing safety precautions and key points for precision control while operating, allowing the apprentices to observe closely and take notes.

events.name: Seeing the discussion about classmates' wedding announcements and crowdfunding for gift money
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao saw Chen Ming, Zhao Lei, and others discussing in the WeChat group of their technical secondary school classmates that classmate Zhao Lei (who is developing in Shenzhen) is about to get married. Chen Ming is initiating an online gift money crowdfunding because many classmates cannot attend. Yin Hao browsed through everyone's blessings, pondering how he should express his own.

events.name: Propose the next camping activity
events.description: During a break in the afternoon, Yin Hao suggested in the Songjiang Three Brothers WeChat group that, before the weather turns cold, they could go camping at Dianshan Lake from September 20th to 21st and try kayaking. Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng immediately responded enthusiastically, and everyone began preliminary discussions about the location, time, and specific activities.

events.name: Received the electronic invitation and sent my blessings.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao received an electronic wedding invitation sent by his classmate Zhao Lei in the WeChat class group. He clicked to view it and sent a congratulatory message in the group: "Congratulations, Old Zhao! May you have a happy union that lasts a hundred years!" to express his well-wishes. After that, the group became even livelier as everyone began sending their blessings.

events.name: Inform family members to change the phone plan.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao told his mother Wang Xiuying via WeChat that he had changed his phone plan, so he would have more call minutes and could chat longer. His mother was very happy and reminded him about some daily matters.

events.name: Try new sleeping positions to improve rest.
events.description: Yin Hao attempted to adjust his sleeping position, using extra pillows to support his legs in order to alleviate the slight discomfort that remained after the competition.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, at home
起始状态.心情: Smooth, planning to handle some daily tasks and planning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A strong sense of connection, interactions with classmates and friends, and completing small tasks that bring improvement make life feel fulfilling and orderly.

2025-09.daily_overview: The body and training are gradually getting back on track. Yin Hao is trying new training supplementation strategies and has received confirmation of successful package changes. At work, he has started guiding apprentices in processing procedures and parameter settings, moving the teaching into a more core stage. The rhythm of life is steadily moving forward.

events.name: Try a new training supply strategy
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao went for a moderate-intensity recovery run. In addition to consuming protein powder and a banana after the run, he tried eating a small slice of whole wheat bread half an hour before the training to compare the effects of different energy supplementation strategies on training performance and recovery, and he recorded his feelings.

events.name: Confirm successful package change.
events.description: Yin Hao received a confirmation text message from the operator indicating that his plan change was successful. He briefly replied to his mother's WeChat message, reassuring her once again that everything had been taken care of.

events.name: Teaching Session Six: Program Invocation and Parameter Configuration
events.description: Yin Hao demonstrated to the apprentices how to retrieve existing machining programs from the machine tool control system and explained the basic structure of the programs, such as the program header, tool calls, cutting instructions, and program footer. He emphasized demonstrating how to safely and appropriately set key machining parameters, such as spindle speed, feed rate, and cutting depth, based on the material being processed (e.g., steel, aluminum) and the process requirements. He also explained the direct impact of parameter settings on machining quality, efficiency, and tool life.

events.name: Continue with a light diet for dinner.
events.description: To continue observing the impact of diet on sleep, Yin Hao had a dinner primarily consisting of vegetables and tofu, accompanied by a small amount of rice, and felt that his digestive system was under minimal burden.

events.name: Playing online games with friends.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao played several rounds of "Honor of Kings" online with his gaming friend Zhang Fei and colleague Wang Lei, chatting casually in the game voice chat to relax.

events.name: Feeling slightly anxious due to work pressure, I relax by listening to music.
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao encountered some technical challenges at work, which caused him a bit of stress. In the evening, he listened to light music to alleviate his anxiety, and it proved to be quite effective.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, focusing on daily training and work teaching.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Calm with a slight sense of progress, both training and teaching are steadily advancing.

2025-09.daily_overview: Friday is a day for emotional connections and task completion. Yin Hao actively participated in a crowdfunding effort for a classmate's gift, offering heartfelt wishes and blessings. At work, he carefully guided an apprentice through their first practical operation. He also finalized camping plans with friends. After work, he prepared for the weekend fishing trip and helped a new colleague settle into the environment, showcasing his helpful nature.

events.name: Decide and pay the classmate's gift money
events.description: In the morning, seeing that the discussion in the class group about pooling money for a gift had reached a consensus (500 yuan per person), Yin Hao, valuing his friendship with his classmates, decided to participate. He clicked on the group payment link initiated by Liu Fang, who was in charge of collecting the money, and paid the 500 yuan gift contribution.

events.name: Send wedding blessings in the group.
events.description: After completing the payment, Yin Hao sent another congratulatory message in the class WeChat group: "Congratulations, Lao Zhao! May you have a happy union for a hundred years! The gift money has been handed over to Sister Fang along with the group, and my heartfelt wishes are with you!" He also included a celebratory emoji.

events.name: Participate in group blessing interactions
events.description: After Yin Hao sent his blessings, other classmates in the group also followed with their own wishes or discussions about the wedding details. Yin Hao briefly joined in the casual conversation, and the warm and harmonious atmosphere made him feel the warmth of their camaraderie.

events.name: Respond to and support the gift money proposal
events.description: Around 10 a.m., Zhao Lei posted his marriage certificate in the group chat. After Chen Ming suggested pooling money for a gift, Yin Hao and several online classmates (such as Liu Fang) responded in the group, expressing agreement and support for the proposal.

events.name: Participate in discussing specific operational plans
events.description: After the initial discussion, Yin Hao further communicated with several active classmates including Chen Ming and Liu Fang in the group chat. Everyone agreed on the amount and nominated Liu Fang, who is in Shanghai, as the payee. Yin Hao confirmed the plan and stated that he would transfer the money on time.

events.name: Privately extend congratulations to the groom.
events.description: After responding in the group chat, Yin Hao privately sent Zhao Lei a wedding congratulation message via WeChat, expressing regret for not being able to attend due to distance and informing him of the collective gift money contributed by the classmates. Zhao Lei was deeply moved and expressed his gratitude.

events.name: Assist in promoting the implementation
events.description: To ensure all classmates are informed, Yin Hao proactively tagged the few classmates who had not yet replied in the group chat (such as Li Qiang), conveying the proposal for pooling money and the confirmed plan, and inquired about their intentions.

events.name: Complete the transfer of the gift money.
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao transferred the gift money of 500 yuan to Liu Fang, who was in charge of collecting the funds, via WeChat. Once the transfer was completed, he informed Liu Fang in the group chat that the transfer had been made.

events.name: Teaching Session Seven: Apprentice's First Hands-on Practice (Under Supervision)
events.description: Under Yin Hao's close supervision and guidance, the apprentice attempted for the first time to independently complete the clamping and tool setting operations for a simple standard part. Yin Hao stood by throughout the entire process, closely following the apprentice's every move, promptly pointing out any irregularities in the operation (such as the angle of wrench usage and the force applied when touching the tool setting device). He provided hands-on guidance for corrections, patiently answered every question, and ensured that the first practical operation was both safe and accurate.

events.name: Finalize the camping itinerary.
events.description: After several days of online discussions, Yin Hao, Gao Zhiyuan, and Ma Xiaofeng finalized the camping details: Yin Hao would be responsible for the main camping equipment (tent, sleeping bags, etc.), Gao Zhiyuan would handle the barbecue ingredients and cooking utensils, and Ma Xiaofeng would take charge of emergency medicine and contacting the kayak rental service. They agreed to meet at the entrance of Yin Hao’s residential community on Saturday morning.

events.name: Check and organize fishing gear.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao checked and organized his fishing gear, including the fishing rod, fishing line, various types of hooks and bait, tackle box, folding chair, etc., to ensure everything would go smoothly for the fishing trip with Wu Zhiqiang the next day. He also confirmed the meeting time and location for the next morning with Wu Zhiqiang via WeChat.

events.name: Help new colleagues familiarize themselves with the environment.
events.description: A newly hired operator was assigned to the adjacent workstation. Before the end of the shift, team leader Wang Lei asked Yin Hao to help guide the new colleague. Yin Hao used the last half hour to briefly introduce the workshop layout, basic operational procedures, and safety regulations, while also sharing some tips for getting up to speed quickly. The new colleague repeatedly expressed gratitude.

events.name: Check the weather forecast to ensure a smooth camping trip.
events.description: Yin Hao checked the weekend weather forecast, confirmed it would be sunny with no rain, and became even more excited about the camping trip.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Positive, ready to handle social affairs and wrap up the week's work.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, I have completed social interactions, helped colleagues, and am looking forward to outdoor activities over the weekend.

2025-09.daily_overview: A perfect day for outdoor leisure. In the morning, I enjoyed a tranquil fishing session by Dianshan Lake with seasoned angling friends, reaping a bountiful harvest. In the afternoon, I joined friends for a camping trip, setting up the campsite and preparing a barbecue. Under the starry sky, we engaged in heartfelt conversations, where friendship and nature intertwined to paint a relaxed and joyful weekend scene.

events.name: Drive to Dianshan Lake for fishing.
events.description: On Saturday morning, Yin Hao drove his own car to the agreed meeting point to pick up Wu Zhiqiang, and then they headed together to Dianshan Lake in Qingpu District. Along the way, the two listened to the radio and discussed the fishing conditions they might encounter that day and the ideal fishing spots.

events.name: Finding Fishing Spots and Starting to Fish
events.description: After arriving at Dianshan Lake, they chose a quiet fishing spot with suitable water depth and aquatic vegetation along the edge, based on Wu Zhiqiang's experience. The two of them skillfully prepared the bait, adjusted the float, and cast their fishing rods, quickly settling into the rhythm and enjoying the tranquility of fishing and the pleasure of waiting.

events.name: Successful Fishing and Experience Exchange
events.description: During the fishing process, Yin Hao successfully caught several decent-sized crucian carp and a mandarin fish that unexpectedly took the bait, which delighted him immensely. As they kept an eye on the float, the two chatted about each other's recent work updates and family matters. Brother Wu also shared more tips on selecting fishing spots and bait for autumn fishing.

events.name: Lakeside Snack and Continued Fishing
events.description: As noon approached, the two spread out a picnic mat by the fishing spot, sharing the sandwiches, braised dishes, and fruit they had brought along. They brewed tea with lake water, enjoying a simple and pleasant lunch. After a short rest, they resumed their afternoon fishing.

events.name: Reel in the fishing rod and bid farewell to fellow anglers.
events.description: Around three in the afternoon, the two men contentedly packed up their fishing rods. Yin Hao drove Wu Zhiqiang back to Songjiang first and gave him a portion of the catch. They agreed to meet again when the weather was good.

events.name: Gather and set off with camping buddies.
events.description: After Yin Hao returned home, took a quick shower, and packed his camping gear, Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng arrived on time at the entrance of his residential complex. The three of them loaded Yin Hao’s equipment into the car and drove together to the pre-booked Dianshan Lake camping site.

events.name: Setting up the campsite and preparing dinner.
events.description: After arriving at the camping base, the three of them divided the tasks and worked together. Yin Hao and Gao Zhiyuan were responsible for setting up the tent and canopy, while Ma Xiaofeng organized the ingredients and cooking equipment. Under the sunset, they quickly built a cozy temporary home.

events.name: Outdoor Barbecue and Starlit Night Conversations
events.description: In the evening, Chef Gao Zhiyuan began the barbecue. Skewers of meat, chicken wings, and vegetables sizzled on the grill, filling the air with a tantalizing aroma. The three of them drank beer, enjoyed the barbecue, and chatted freely about work, life, future plans, and amusing stories from their time in the military (Yin Hao and Gao Zhiyuan). As the stars gradually became clearer, far from the city's light pollution, the atmosphere grew relaxed and joyful.

events.name: Camping to bed
events.description: After night fell, the three of them tidied up the leftover trash and extinguished the fire. Each crawled into their tent, gradually falling asleep to the gentle lapping of the lake waves and the chirping of insects.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Excited and looking forward to a whole day of outdoor activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Inside the tent at the Dianshan Lake camping base in Qingpu District
结束状态.心情: Comfortable, content, and relaxed, the day's fishing harvest and the heartfelt conversations with friends at night allowed both body and mind to fully unwind and delight.

2025-09.daily_overview: The next day of camping, we woke up to the joys of morning light, lake water, and kayaking. In the morning, we experienced thrilling water sports, and at noon, we packed our belongings and returned home fully loaded. In the afternoon, we processed the catch at home, shared it with the neighbors, and thoroughly relaxed to recharge for the upcoming new week.

events.name: Camping Morning Activities
events.description: Waking up to the sound of birdsong, Yin Hao and his friends cooked a simple breakfast (noodles and eggs) using a portable stove. After the meal, they took a walk around the campsite, admiring the lake and mountain scenery while breathing in the fresh air.

events.name: Experience Kayaking
events.description: In the morning, as planned, the kayaking coach arranged by Ma Xiaofeng arrived at the camp. Under the coach's guidance, the three of them put on their life jackets, learned basic paddling techniques, and then, in pairs, experienced kayaking in the calm waters of Dianshan Lake. Yin Hao found the sport both fun and a great way to exercise the upper body, and considered taking it up regularly in the future.

events.name: Pack up the camp and head back.
events.description: After finishing the kayaking experience, the three of them began carefully packing up all the camping gear, ensuring no trash was left behind and restoring the campsite to its original state. At noon, they drove back to the urban area of Shanghai.

events.name: Process the catch and share it with the neighbors.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Yin Hao sorted through the fish he had caught yesterday and today. He set aside some fresh crucian carp and invited his neighbor, Aunt Chen, to come over in the evening to enjoy fish soup. Aunt Chen was delighted and even brought some pickled vegetables from her own home.

events.name: Clean and air-dry camping gear.
events.description: Yin Hao washed and dried the used camping equipment such as tents and moisture-proof pads, and also cleaned and organized the fishing gear before storing them away, preparing for the next activity.

events.name: Briefly review with fellow anglers.
events.description: Yin Hao briefly reviewed yesterday's fishing activity with Wu Zhiqiang via WeChat, sharing the surprise of catching a mandarin fish and expressing gratitude for his guidance. The two agreed to make plans for another outing next time.

events.name: Completely relax and rest.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao did not schedule any activities. He watched a movie, listened to some music, and went to bed early, allowing his body and mind to fully relax after the weekend festivities.

events.name: After returning home, I rested early due to exhaustion.
events.description: Due to the high energy expenditure from outdoor activities, Yin Hao felt exhausted and decided to go to bed earlier than usual to regain his strength.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the tent at the Dianshan Lake camping base in Qingpu District
起始状态.心情: Leisurely, enjoying the tranquility of the camping morning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and lazy, the weekend's outdoor energy is fully charged, ready to face Monday with a calm mind.

state.今日运动: The kayaking experience lasts approximately 1 hour.

2025-09.daily_overview: The start of a new week brought life back to a stable rhythm. Yin Hao felt fully recovered during his morning run. At work, he reviewed theories with his apprentices and participated in a skills competition, delivering a steady performance. After work, he efficiently signed the lease renewal contract with his landlord, securing his living arrangements for the next year. In the evening, he began making preliminary preparations for the next family gathering and exploring new directions for learning.

events.name: Morning run, feeling the body recover.
events.description: Yin Hao resumed his regular morning runs. During his jog, he was delighted to find that the muscle soreness after the competition had completely disappeared. His cardiovascular function and leg strength seemed to have improved even more than before the competition, and his physical condition felt refreshed. This gave him even more motivation to stick with his exercise routine.

events.name: Teaching Session Eight: Comprehensive Review of Stage Theory
events.description: Yin Hao conducted a systematic review and comprehensive explanation of all the theoretical knowledge the apprentice had learned over the past two weeks, helping the apprentice build a complete knowledge framework and addressing any remaining questions in preparation for the final practical assessment next week.

events.name: Participate in the Manufacturing Skills Competition
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took leave to go to the designated venue for the competition and participated in the CNC milling group of the Shanghai Manufacturing Industry Vocational Skills Competition. He remained calm and composed, successfully completing both the theoretical assessment and practical operation tasks within the allotted time. He felt that he had performed at his usual level.

events.name: Summarize the experience of dietary adjustments
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao reviewed his dietary records and notes on physical sensations from the past two weeks, particularly before and after the competition. He summarized several dietary plans that suited his training rhythm and taste preferences, clarifying which adjustments—such as increasing carbohydrate intake before the competition and opting for lighter dinners afterward—were beneficial for energy and recovery. This process provided him with valuable experience for future health management.

events.name: Check and organize camping gear.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao carefully folded and stored the camping equipment, such as the completely dried tent and sleeping bag, checking for any damage that needed repair to ensure the gear was ready for use at any time.

events.name: Formally sign the lease renewal contract with the landlord
events.description: After work, Yin Hao went to the café as agreed with the landlord. After a friendly exchange of greetings, Li Xiuying presented the prepared lease contract for the new year. Yin Hao carefully reviewed all the terms, confirmed the rent, lease period (one year), and the rights and obligations of both parties. Once everything was verified, both parties signed the contract and exchanged copies. The entire process was efficient and smooth, resolving any lingering concerns.

events.name: Call parents to inform them about renewing the lease.
events.description: After signing the contract, Yin Hao called his mother on his way home, informing her that he had successfully renewed the lease for another year and reassuring his parents not to worry. His mother, in turn, began to talk again about what she would bring for him when she came to Shanghai during the National Day holiday.

events.name: Preliminary Browsing of Industrial Internet of Things Information
events.description: In the evening, while relaxing and listening to music, Yin Hao suddenly recalled his father’s recent complaint about the difficulty of repairing agricultural machinery in their hometown. A thought struck him, and he quickly searched on his phone for keywords like "CNC machine remote monitoring" and "industrial Internet of Things." After browsing a few popular science articles, he found the field quite intriguing and somewhat related to his current work. Quietly, he noted down the names of several professional public accounts.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Stable, carrying the lingering essence of the weekend and the composure to begin a new week.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Stable yet with a hint of curiosity, the resolution of housing issues brings a sense of security, while the occasional exposure to new fields of knowledge plants a small seed of wonder in the heart.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a gentle breeze, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today marks a significant milestone for Yin Hao in achieving his personal health goal—participating in and completing his first half marathon. The race began early in the morning, and he strictly adhered to his pre-race plan, successfully finishing the event. After a brief post-race stretching session and rest, he returned home in the afternoon to handle follow-up matters related to his lease renewal contract. He meticulously organized important documents and set reminders, reflecting his consistent and rigorous approach.

events.name: Participate in and complete the first half marathon
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao and his running partner Chen Jie arrived at the starting point of the race. He strictly followed his own pacing and nutrition strategy, consuming energy gels and sports drinks at designated supply points, and focused entirely on maintaining his rhythm and managing his physical stamina throughout the race. In the end, he crossed the finish line with a personal record of 2 hours and 1 minute, successfully achieving the health goal he had pursued for two years. After the race, he performed systematic stretching and relaxation exercises with the help of Chen Jie.

events.name: Properly handle the follow-up matters of the lease renewal contract.
events.description: After returning home in the afternoon, Yin Hao brought the new lease agreement he had signed with the landlord, Li Xiuying, in the morning. He carefully stored it in a document folder. He then opened the memo app on his phone and recorded in detail the first rent payment date as stipulated in the new contract (expected to be in early October). He also set a reminder to transfer the payment three days in advance, ensuring he could pay the landlord on time via online banking. After handling these matters, he felt that another aspect of his life had been settled.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Excited yet a bit nervous, I am full of anticipation for the upcoming challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and relaxation, the body is tired but the spirit is exhilarated.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the first day after the half marathon, Yin Hao listened to his body and proactively scheduled a day of rest. He carefully observed and recorded the recovery progress of various parts of his body, exchanged experiences with fellow runners, and prepared for subsequent recovery and strength training. In the evening, following his newly developed habit, he briefly documented his three daily meals using his phone, consciously adjusting his nutrition for the next fitness cycle.

events.name: Post-match Active Rest and Physical Assessment
events.description: Yin Hao took a day off from work today and rested at home. He carefully observed his body's reactions, noting the expected delayed soreness in his calves and quadriceps, but overall, the fatigue was lighter than anticipated. He recorded these observations in his phone's memo app and compared them with his recovery speed after previous long-distance training sessions. To his delight, he found that his recovery ability seemed to have improved.

events.name: Discuss post-race recovery plans with fellow runners.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao communicated with Chen Jie via WeChat about their post-race physical feelings. They shared their respective sore areas and recovery methods. Yin Hao also proactively consulted Chen Jie, who is a fitness coach, on how to start some basic strength training without affecting muscle recovery, in preparation for his first gym experience next week. Chen Jie gave him some simple suggestions for static stretching and core activation.

events.name: Start recording your diet to optimize nutrition.
events.description: In the evening, following Chen Jie's suggestion, Yin Hao downloaded a food diary app. He tried entering the contents of his three meals for the day (oatmeal with milk for breakfast, steamed perch and rice for lunch, and tomato egg noodles for dinner) to analyze his daily nutritional structure. This would provide data to help him increase protein intake and optimize carbohydrate ratios in the future.

events.name: Temporarily received a work notice requiring an early return to duty.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao suddenly received a WeChat message from his team leader, Wang Lei, stating that there was an urgent order that needed to be prepared in advance and hoping he could arrive at work early the next day. Yin Hao adjusted his rest plan and decided to go to bed early that night to ensure he was in good condition.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and content, with body aches but a cheerful mood.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Calm, full of curiosity and planning desire for the new phase of the fitness plan.

2025-09.daily_overview: After a day of rest, Yin Hao returned to work. He continued to patiently guide his apprentices, focusing on developing their awareness of quality self-inspection. During the lunch break, he learned from his classmates' group chat that his old classmate Zhao Lei had encountered setbacks in his entrepreneurial venture, which weighed on his mind. After work, he checked his vehicle for the upcoming weekend camping trip to ensure a safe journey.

events.name: Guide apprentices in conducting quality self-inspection training.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao explained in detail to the new apprentice in the workshop the core training objective for this week: independently completing the processing flow of standard parts. He emphasized demonstrating how to conduct self-inspection of quality between different processes, personally guided him in using measuring tools such as vernier calipers and micrometers to accurately measure key dimensions, and patiently explained the possible causes and preliminary judgment methods for common dimensional errors (such as tolerance deviations and roundness errors).

events.name: Arrange for the apprentice's first independent practical exercise.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao assigned the apprentices to independently process a batch of simple standard shaft components. He took a step back and stood in a safe observation position, refraining from direct intervention throughout the process. He only stepped forward to offer verbal reminders and corrections when the apprentices hesitated in their operations, made obvious procedural errors, or used incorrect measurement methods. He focused particularly on the apprentices' workpiece clamping, tool alignment, program invocation, and the execution of their initial self-inspections, ensuring that all operations complied with safety regulations.

events.name: Upon hearing about the recent situation of an old classmate, I felt a sense of concern.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao saw his classmates discussing Zhao Lei's recent situation in the WeChat group, and only then did he learn that this old classmate, who had gone south to Shenzhen to start a business, had recently encountered setbacks and was feeling down. Seeing the concern from everyone in the group and Zhao Lei's brief responses, Yin Hao felt uneasy and decided to take the initiative to reach out to this old classmate with whom he had once had a good relationship.

events.name: Check the vehicle for the weekend camping trip.
events.description: After work, thinking about the camping trip he had planned with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng for the weekend, Yin Hao performed a simple pre-departure check on his family car. He checked the tire pressure, oil dipstick, brake fluid reservoir level, and all the lights to ensure a safe long-distance drive. Once the inspection was complete, he sent a message in their three-person WeChat group: "Car condition is OK. We'll set off on time this Saturday."

events.name: A minor malfunction in the machine tool requires overtime to address.
events.description: As evening approached and it was nearly time to get off work, the CNC machine operated by Yin Hao suddenly alarmed, indicating an abnormal spindle temperature. He immediately shut down the machine for inspection and, together with his mentor Sun Jianguo, began troubleshooting the issue. They discovered a slight blockage in the coolant pipeline. After clearing it, they restarted the machine and tested it, confirming that it was functioning normally. However, this process delayed their departure from work by half an hour.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a slight sense of work focus and lingering muscle soreness.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: With a slight concern for old friends, and some anticipation for the upcoming weekend activities, I feel a bit tired due to overtime work.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a gentle breeze in the evening.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today's work continued to revolve around mentoring the apprentice, with targeted reinforcement training based on analyzing the machining errors from the previous day. Before leaving work, the final purchases for camping supplies were completed. In the evening, he did something important: he proactively called his old classmate Zhao Lei, who was going through a difficult time, offering patient listening and practical support.

events.name: Review processing errors with apprentices and develop improvement plans.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and his apprentice measured and evaluated the workpieces processed the previous day. They checked the dimensions one by one to identify any deviations. Instead of providing direct answers, Yin Hao guided the apprentice to analyze the causes of the errors themselves: Was it due to tool wear, inaccurate tool setting, or issues with cutting parameter settings? Based on their joint analysis, Yin Hao developed a targeted corrective practice plan for the apprentice for the afternoon, such as repeatedly practicing tool setting accuracy or adjusting specific cutting parameters.

events.name: Complete the final purchase of camping supplies.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao followed the division of labor list for the three of them and went to an outdoor supplies store in Songjiang District to purchase additional headlamps and portable folding chairs. He then bought enough mosquito repellent and some snacks and drinks at the supermarket to ensure that all camping supplies were fully stocked.

events.name: Proactively reach out and deeply listen to old classmates in distress.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao took the initiative to call Zhao Lei. Zhao Lei’s voice on the other end of the line sounded somewhat weary. Without much small talk, Yin Hao got straight to the point: "I heard a bit about what happened from the group chat. How are you doing? Is it a good time to talk?" For nearly an hour that followed, he patiently listened as Zhao Lei detailed the process of his failed business venture, the pressure of losing his savings, and his current confusion and distress. Throughout the conversation, Yin Hao never interrupted, only occasionally uttering an "mm-hmm" to show he was listening, offering full emotional acceptance.

events.name: Provide practical advice and a commitment of support to old classmates.
events.description: After Zhao Lei finished pouring out his heart, Yin Hao didn’t offer empty platitudes about "pulling yourself together." Drawing from his own experience of starting from scratch and working steadily in Shanghai, he gave very practical advice: "I think the most important thing right now is to stabilize the basics. How about finding a stable job first and settling your life? As for the debt, you can make a plan and pay it off gradually—don’t let it crush you." Finally, he added sincerely, "If you really have an urgent need during this transition period and are short on cash, let me know. I’ll help as much as I can."

events.name: Temporarily decided to adjust the dinner plan.
events.description: Due to the lengthy phone call, Yin Hao's originally planned dinner was postponed. He simply cooked a bowl of noodles to settle the matter, giving up on the idea of dining out.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, with a sense of relief after completing the procurement task.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling a mix of emotions, I am both saddened by my friend's predicament and somewhat comforted by the fact that I can offer a little support.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and crisp autumn weather, perfect for outdoor activities.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the weekend, Yin Hao went camping by Dianshan Lake with his friends Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng. They worked together to set up the campsite, enjoying barbecues, campfires, and the starry sky, allowing themselves to unwind completely. Before the camping trip, he made sure to send another message to encourage his old classmate Zhao Lei.

events.name: Encouraging a friend in distress once again
events.description: Waking up in the morning, Yin Hao recalled the phone call with Zhao Lei from the previous night, still feeling a bit unsettled. He sent a brief message to Zhao Lei on WeChat: "I remember everything we talked about yesterday. Don’t carry it all alone; reach out anytime you need. Take it slow, things will get better." He hoped this message would bring a little warmth to the other person.

events.name: Go camping by Dianshan Lake with friends.
events.description: On Saturday morning, Yin Hao drove to pick up Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng, and the three of them headed to the reserved campsite by Dianshan Lake in Qingpu District. Along the way, the car was filled with their favorite music, laughter, and cheerful conversations. Upon arrival, they efficiently collaborated according to their pre-arranged division of tasks: Yin Hao and Ma Xiaofeng were responsible for setting up the tent and canopy, while Gao Zhiyuan organized the cooking utensils, tables, and chairs. Soon, a comfortable camping area was all set up.

events.name: Enjoy a night of camping barbecue and bonfire.
events.description: In the evening, the three of them worked together to prepare a barbecue dinner. Yin Hao showcased the secret barbecue sauce he had brought. They grilled, ate, drank beer, and chatted about work, games, and their own amusing stories. After night fell, they lit a bonfire (within the designated safe area) and sat around it, gazing up at the clear starry sky—a rare sight in the city. They enjoyed the tranquility away from the hustle and bustle and the warmth of friendship, staying up late into the night before finally returning to their tents to rest.

events.name: Temporarily joining the night hike for stargazing.
events.description: After the bonfire, the three of them were still eager for more and made a spontaneous decision to go on a short night hike near the campsite in search of a better stargazing spot, adding variety to the activities.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to the upcoming weekend camping.

结束状态.所处地点: Inside the tent at Dianshan Lake Camping Ground in Qingpu District
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and relaxed, the body and mind connect with nature, feeling incredibly pleasant.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a gentle breeze over the lake, suitable for water activities.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the second day of camping, Yin Hao tried a brand-new sports experience—learning kayaking under the guidance of a coach. Overcoming his initial nervousness, he thoroughly enjoyed the activity. After packing up the campsite and returning in the afternoon, he reviewed his diet records for the week and summarized his first strength training experience. Feeling that his body had recovered well, he planned to make strength training a regular part of his routine.

events.name: First experience with kayaking
events.description: On Sunday morning, the camp organized a kayaking experience activity. After a professional coach explained safety knowledge and basic paddling techniques, Yin Hao and two friends put on their life jackets, gathered their courage, and got into the water. Initially, he felt a bit nervous and struggled to maintain balance, but with the coach's guidance and several attempts, he gradually found his rhythm and was able to paddle smoothly on the lake, enjoying the unique sense of freedom and fun that water sports offer.

events.name: Pack up the campsite and end the camping trip.
events.description: After the kayaking experience, the three returned to the campsite and began systematically packing and organizing all the equipment. They carefully cleaned up the trash, ensuring the campsite was restored to its original state, embodying the principle of "leave no trace" camping. They then loaded the gear into the car and drove back to the urban area of Shanghai, concluding this fulfilling and enjoyable weekend camping trip.

events.name: Reviewing Dietary Records and Training Experiences
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao felt physically tired but mentally refreshed. He opened his diet-tracking app and reviewed the data from the past week, noticing that his carbohydrate intake had indeed been low on training days. At the same time, he briefly recorded his first kayaking experience and the muscle sensations after his first strength training session at the gym last week. He believed that such cross-training was highly beneficial for running and decided to incorporate it into his regular routine in the future.

events.name: Temporarily decided not to go for an evening run.
events.description: Feeling quite tired after camping, Yin Hao decided to skip his originally planned evening jog and instead opted to rest at home and organize his photos.

起始状态.所处地点: Qingpu District Dianshan Lake Campground
起始状态.心情: Refreshed and invigorated, with a slight anticipation for water sports.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai City
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet slightly weary, filled with plans for the upcoming week's work and life.

2025-09.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yin Hao carefully stored away the commemorative souvenir from his half marathon, marking the successful completion and archiving of this goal. At work, he guided his apprentice through their first practical cutting and final inspection and organization, taking on the role of a "quality inspector." After work, he cleaned his camping gear and began preparing the home for his parents' visit during the National Day holiday. Driven by an internal motivation for career development, he started systematically organizing materials from industrial expositions and began to consider learning new technologies.

events.name: Collect half marathon souvenirs and plan for the next goal.
events.description: Before heading out in the morning, Yin Hao placed his half marathon medal, bib with his name and number, and finisher certificate into a dedicated keepsake box. This simple ritual marked the successful completion and formal "archiving" of a significant health goal in his life. He began browsing the race calendar on his running app, contemplating whether his next challenge should be a full marathon or improving his half marathon performance, and incorporated this into his updated health goal system.

events.name: Guide the apprentice to complete the first actual cutting process.
events.description: In the workshop, after several days of practice, Yin Hao believed that the apprentice was ready to perform their first actual cutting of simple parts. Under Yin Hao's continuous supervision and guidance, the apprentice operated the machine, completing the entire process from startup and feeding to the end of machining. Yin Hao closely monitored every step, promptly correcting any minor deviations. After the machining was completed, they inspected the workpiece together. Yin Hao summarized the experiences and shortcomings of this practical session and encouraged the apprentice's progress.

events.name: Guide apprentices in conducting final inspections and completing reports.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao simulated the role of a workshop quality inspector, instructing the apprentices to conduct final organization and comprehensive inspection of all qualified workpieces processed during the week. He guided the apprentices on how to properly fill out a simple processing inspection report, including the workpiece number, actual measured dimensions, conclusions, and the operator's signature. He emphasized the importance of inspection records for quality traceability and production management, highlighting this as a crucial step in cultivating the apprentices' professional competence.

events.name: Clean and organize camping gear and share memories.
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao took out the camping gear used over the weekend, including the tent, canopy, and sleeping bag, and proceeded to clean and air them out. He carefully selected the photos and videos taken during the camping trip and shared them in the WeChat group "Songjiang Trio" with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng. Everyone reminisced about the joyful moments and began discussing whether to go hiking next time or try a different campsite.

events.name: Check and maintain household appliances for parents' visit.
events.description: Thinking about his parents coming to stay with him in Shanghai during the National Day holiday, Yin Hao carefully checked the operation status of household appliances such as the water heater, air conditioner, and washing machine. He performed simple cleaning and filter rinsing to ensure everything was functioning properly, guaranteeing comfort and convenience for his parents during their stay.

events.name: Systematically organize materials and foster interest in learning new technologies.
events.description: In the evening, driven by the continuous pursuit of precision and efficiency in recent work and the vaguely felt pressure of technological iteration, Yin Hao retrieved the brochures and technical manuals he had collected during his visit to the Industrial Expo in April. He focused on filtering out content related to equipment networking, data acquisition, and intelligent maintenance, categorizing them accordingly. He then created a folder on his computer titled "Industrial IoT Learning" and began gathering and bookmarking relevant electronic materials and web links, feeling that this was a direction worth paying attention to.

events.name: The morning run plan was canceled due to light rain.
events.description: When he stepped out in the morning and found it was raining, Yin Hao decided to cancel his morning run and instead did some brief stretching at home.
