起始状态.心情: Calm, imbued with the sense of order that marks the start of a new week.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Fulfillment encompasses both the solid sense of accomplishment from completing tasks and the satisfaction derived from preparing for family matters and exploring new knowledge.

2025-09.daily_overview: Today marks a significant turning point in Yin Hao's career reflection. During a routine video call with his father, his father's complaints about repairing new intelligent agricultural machinery unexpectedly struck a chord with him. This connected his previously vague technical focus (Industrial Internet of Things) with the challenges faced by his father's industry and his own work, igniting a strong motivation for him to delve deeper into learning.

events.name: Conduct this week's apprentice mentoring summary and outlook.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao conducted a summary of this week's training with the apprentice. He objectively evaluated the apprentice's progress in independent operation and quality self-inspection, while also pointing out areas that still need improvement, such as efficiency and dimensional stability. Additionally, he briefly introduced the plan for next week, which will involve exposure to more complex workpieces and foundational programming training. This was intended to help the apprentice prepare mentally in advance and maintain continuity in their learning.

events.name: Routine video call with father.
events.description: At 20:00 in the evening, Yin Hao, at his home in Songjiang District, promptly initiated a weekly video call via WeChat with his father, Yin Jianguo, who was far away in their hometown of Nantong. As usual, they chatted about each other's work and health, while his mother, Wang Xiuying, occasionally chimed in from the side, expressing concern about how her son was eating in Shanghai.

events.name: Father's Complaints Spark Technological Resonance and Deep Reflection
events.description: During the call, as a technician at an agricultural machinery repair station, the father couldn't help but complain to his son: "The new harvesters at the station now come with computer boards and remote diagnostic functions. When something goes wrong, us old-timers are left staring blankly at the codes on the screen, waiting for the manufacturer's people to come. It delays the farming season!" The father lamented how fast technology was advancing, leaving old experience lagging behind. These words acted like a key, instantly unlocking Yin Hao's train of thought.

events.name: Clear motivation for triggering Industrial Internet of Things learning
events.description: After hanging up the phone, the words his father mentioned—"remote diagnosis," "data," "code"—echoed repeatedly in Yin Hao's mind. He thought about the CNC system he operated, the smart factory demonstrations he had seen at the expo, and the "Industrial Internet of Things" materials he had started organizing just two days earlier. A clear connection formed: the traditional maintenance challenges his father faced were precisely the problems that technologies like the Industrial Internet of Things and predictive maintenance aimed to solve. This was not just a "new thing" worth learning but also a potential bridge to address practical issues and connect the careers of two generations. He immediately took out his notebook and jotted down this key insight along with a series of specific questions.

events.name: Adjusting daily routine due to a mild cold.
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao felt a slight discomfort in his throat, likely due to catching a cold after camping. He decided to rest early in the evening and canceled his originally planned gaming time.

起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a slight sense of routine as the workweek reaches its midpoint.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Excited and full of curiosity for exploration, feeling like I've found a highly valuable and personally relevant direction for learning.

2025-09.daily_overview: Inspired by yesterday's events, Yin Hao's learning journey shifted from spontaneous curiosity to proactive engagement. During the day, he seized work breaks to consult his mentors and colleagues about industry trends, while in the evenings, he embarked on a systematic online learning journey, officially stepping onto the path of exploring Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) knowledge. At the same time, the three-week mentoring task also came to a successful conclusion.

events.name: Discussing technology development trends with master colleagues
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao took the initiative to sit next to his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang in the cafeteria. He shared the challenges his father had encountered and his own reflections on equipment intelligence and data collection, sincerely seeking their views on the trends in industry technology development. Drawing from years of experience, Master Sun affirmed Yin Hao’s ideas and pointed out the difficulties in implementing data collection in actual production, suggesting that he start by understanding the control systems and PLC basics of the company’s existing equipment. Wang Lei and Engineer Liu also shared information about relevant training programs they had heard of.

events.name: Complete the apprentice mentoring tasks and conduct the final assessment.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao assigned a simulated assessment task to the apprentice, requiring them to independently complete the machining of a specified standard component and pass a self-inspection. The apprentice successfully accomplished the task. Yin Hao conducted a comprehensive evaluation of the apprentice's learning outcomes over the past three weeks, drafted a teaching summary report, and submitted it to the team leader, Wang Lei, marking the successful completion of the first teaching assignment.

events.name: Begin systematic learning of introductory knowledge in Industrial Internet of Things.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao couldn’t wait to turn on his computer. Instead of browsing in a fragmented manner, he began purposefully searching for keywords like "basic concepts of Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT)" and reading more systematic introductory articles. He solemnly wrote down the learning topic and date in his new notebook, noting core concepts such as "IIoT architecture," "sensors," and "data communication protocols." After watching a few introductory videos, he felt as if a new world had opened up to him.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle urgent orders.
events.description: Before leaving work, the team received an urgent order. Yin Hao volunteered to stay behind to help debug the equipment, working an hour later than usual.

起始状态.心情: With clear goals and a thirst for exploring new knowledge.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai

2025-09.daily_overview: Yin Hao received positive feedback from the team regarding his mentoring work, completing the mindset shift from a skilled operator to a skill instructor. He continued to deepen his career planning, combining his newly discovered learning direction (Industrial Internet of Things) with his original goal (Senior Technician) to formulate a preliminary long-term learning plan. At the same time, he booked a homestay in Suzhou for a family trip during the National Day holiday.

events.name: Receive positive feedback on mentoring work and conduct self-reflection.
events.description: Team leader Wang Lei gave feedback to Yin Hao, stating that the apprentices and the team had high praise for his mentoring work, considering him patient, rigorous, and effective in his methods. After work, Yin Hao reflected on the entire mentoring process and summarized his gains and shortcomings in teaching methods and communication skills in his notebook. He clearly felt his growth and transformation from a skilled operator to a skilled instructor.

events.name: Develop a long-term learning plan that incorporates new directions.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao carefully planned in his notebook, combining the technical bottlenecks he had recently encountered at work (such as unfamiliarity with equipment data), industry trends, and his newly established interest in the Industrial Internet of Things. He listed "Equipment Data Interconnection (PLC Basics)," "Basic Programming (Python Introduction)," and "Industrial Network Fundamentals" as the three main learning directions he needed to tackle in the future. He also considered how to integrate this new knowledge with the review content for obtaining the senior technician certificate and drafted a phased long-term learning plan.

events.name: Book accommodation for a family trip during the National Day holiday.
events.description: After completing the travel itinerary planning for the Taihu Lake trip and discussing it with his parents, Yin Hao carefully compared the reviews, facilities, and prices of several homestays in Dongshan, Suzhou, through an online travel platform. He ultimately booked a homestay suitable for family stays, featuring a kitchen and a courtyard, and promptly shared the booking information with his parents and his older brother, Yin Tao.

events.name: Begin the three-day preparation for the technical report.
events.description: Yin Hao decided to compile a suggestion report on equipment maintenance for the team, based on newly acquired industrial IoT knowledge, and planned to complete the first draft within three days.

events.name: Staying up late due to academic commitments.
events.description: When formulating a study plan in the evening, Yin Hao became overly engrossed, researching materials late into the night and going to bed later than usual.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Friday evening, Yin Hao transformed his exploration into formal action. While browsing industry forums, he discovered a systematic online course. After careful evaluation, he decisively enrolled and paid the fee, marking the transition of his industrial IoT learning from self-guided exploration to a structured phase. At the same time, he also began consciously and consistently following industry trends.

events.name: Discover and Evaluate Industrial IoT Online Courses
events.description: While browsing a familiar mechanical industry technical forum at home in the evening, Yin Hao came across a promotional post for the online course "Fundamentals and Applications of Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT)." He carefully reviewed the course outline, the instructor's background, and student feedback, evaluating whether the curriculum was systematic, suitable for a beginner like himself, and whether the nearly thousand-yuan tuition fee was worth the investment. After some thought, he concluded that it was a great way to quickly build a foundational knowledge framework.

events.name: Register and pay for the online course fees
events.description: After confirming that the course met his needs, Yin Hao completed the online registration via the link provided by the course, filled in his personal information, and paid the registration fee using Alipay. Upon successful payment, he immediately downloaded the initial learning materials package provided by the course, which included courseware PPTs and a list of recommended software tools.

events.name: Preliminary planning of the course study schedule
events.description: Based on the course schedule and his own work hours, Yin Hao initially marked the upcoming live class times in his calendar app. He also planned how to utilize fragmented time in the evenings and on weekends for previewing, reviewing, and completing assignments, determined to follow through with the course diligently.

events.name: Follow industry technology information channels
events.description: After enrolling in the course, Yin Hao felt even more motivated to delve deeper into this field. Through search engines and forum recommendations, he filtered and followed several technical public accounts and Zhihu columns with good reputations in the fields of industrial internet and smart manufacturing. He marked them as favorites, intending to use them as supplementary channels for daily industry updates and in-depth knowledge.

events.name: Continue preparing the technical report.
events.description: During breaks in the daytime, Yin Hao took the opportunity to collect more equipment data cases, adding a practical application section to the report.

events.name: Temporary friends gathering and returning home late.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao was pulled by his colleague Wang Lei to attend a small gathering to celebrate the successful completion of the project, returning home later than usual.

2025-09.daily_overview: On the weekend, Yin Hao went out to purchase household items for his parents, turning his care into tangible actions. After returning home, he drew on his physical experience following the half marathon to create a more detailed long-term health management plan. At the same time, inspired by his father's interests, he began proactively and deeply researching more specialized technical information, such as "predictive maintenance of equipment," making his learning more targeted and purposeful.

events.name: Purchasing household items for parents
events.description: Considering his parents' preference for sleeping on a firm bed, Yin Hao went to a furniture store in Songjiang District in the morning to purchase a moderately firm, thin mattress for the second bedroom. At the same time, he also bought new towels, slippers, toothbrushes, and other personal items specifically for his parents, thoughtfully creating a sense of "home" for them.

events.name: Develop a detailed long-term health management plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, drawing on the positive recovery experience after the half marathon and data feedback from his dietary records, Yin Hao, taking into account his daily routine and work intensity, drafted a more detailed long-term health management plan in his notebook. He outlined a schedule of running at least three times a week (including one long-distance run) and two strength training sessions, along with nutritional principles such as increasing high-quality protein intake and ensuring adequate carbohydrate replenishment, making his healthy lifestyle more actionable.

events.name: Deeply study predictive maintenance related technical information.
events.description: In the evening, focusing on the specific pain point of "fault diagnosis" encountered by his father, Yin Hao's learning and searching became more targeted. He began to concentrate on searching for more in-depth and practical technical articles and case studies related to "principles of equipment predictive maintenance," "application of vibration sensors on machine tools," and "data interfaces of CNC systems." He took detailed notes, attempting to understand how to implement the concept of IIoT in the industry where his father and he were situated.

events.name: Complete the first draft of the technical report.
events.description: Yin Hao utilized the weekend to complete the initial draft of the equipment maintenance proposal report, planning to submit it to the team for discussion next week.

events.name: Made a last-minute decision to go fishing to relax.
events.description: After the afternoon procurement, Yin Hao felt a bit tired and decided to go fishing at a nearby wild pond for two hours, abandoning his original plan of going for a run.

2025-09.daily_overview: On Sunday, Yin Hao conducted a thorough cleaning, especially in the secondary bedroom, to welcome his parents in the most tidy and warm environment. In the afternoon, he began his first formal course study after registration, focusing on understanding the principles of data collection and transmission at the bottom layer of the Industrial Internet of Things. He felt that although it was a bit challenging, it was very solid.

events.name: Deep clean the home to welcome the parents.
events.description: Yin Hao spent the whole morning doing a thorough cleaning. He focused on tidying up the secondary bedroom, laying out clean new bed sheets and duvet covers, arranging freshly purchased towels and slippers, and lighting a faintly scented incense in the room. He also deliberately placed a set of tea utensils and tea leaves brought from his hometown on the living room coffee table, carefully creating a warm and comfortable living atmosphere in anticipation of his parents' arrival.

events.name: Start learning the first chapter of the Industrial Internet of Things online course.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao began studying the first chapter of the online course "Fundamentals and Applications of Industrial Internet of Things." He focused intently on watching the instructional videos and reading the PDF materials, striving to understand foundational concepts such as the types of industrial sensors, the principles of data acquisition (analog-to-digital signal conversion), and common industrial communication protocols (such as Modbus). Some of these topics were rather abstract, so he reviewed them twice and took detailed notes.

events.name: Due to study commitments, dinner has been rescheduled.
events.description: During his evening study session, Yin Hao opted for takeout to save time, abandoning his original plan to cook.
