2025-09.daily_overview: On the eve of the Mid-Autumn Festival, although unable to return home, Yin Hao felt the warmth of his neighbors in Shanghai. Aunt Chen invited him to celebrate the festival together, which made him feel deeply touched. At work, he guided his apprentices through consolidation exercises. In the evening, he had another video call with his parents, where they finalized the detailed itinerary for their visit to Shanghai during the National Day holiday and booked high-speed train tickets for them. The anticipation of reunion grew stronger with each passing moment.

events.name: The neighbor invited us to celebrate the Mid-Autumn Festival together, allowing us to feel the warmth of the occasion.
events.description: Returning home after work, Aunt Chen from across the hallway warmly called out to Yin Hao, "Xiao Yin, you're alone for Mid-Autumn Festival tomorrow, right? Come over to my place for dinner. I've cooked a few dishes—let’s celebrate together and make it lively!" Although Mid-Autumn Festival (September 30) is tomorrow, Aunt Chen extended her invitation early. Yin Hao felt a warmth in his heart and readily agreed, experiencing a sense of family-like care in a city far from home.

events.name: Guide apprentices in consolidation exercises and random inspections.
events.description: Today, the apprentice conducted consolidation exercises according to the improved plan, processing another batch of similar workpieces. Yin Hao reduced continuous supervision, opting instead for intermittent inspections and random spot checks. He would suddenly walk up to the apprentice's workstation, asking them to measure a dimension of a workpiece currently being processed or already completed on the spot, and explain whether the result was acceptable and the basis for the judgment. This approach aimed to train the apprentice's immediacy and accuracy in quality assessment.

events.name: Confirm the National Day itinerary with parents and book tickets.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao once again communicated with his parents via video call and officially finalized the plan for them to visit and stay with him in Shanghai during the National Day holiday (October 2nd to 5th). They discussed in detail the date and train schedule of his parents' arrival, the activities planned for their stay in Shanghai (family dinner, exploring the city, and a trip to Taihu Lake), as well as the items they needed to bring. After the call, Yin Hao immediately booked round-trip high-speed train tickets from Nantong to Shanghai Hongqiao for his parents on the 12306 app.

events.name: Submit the technical report to the team.
events.description: Yin Hao submitted the initial draft of the completed technical report to the team leader Wang Lei, receiving preliminary positive feedback, with plans to discuss implementation next week.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Smooth, with a faint touch of holiday eve musings.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Warm and expectant, I am both touched by the neighbor's care and excited about the confirmed reunion with my parents.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain turning to overcast, Mid-Autumn Festival

2025-09.daily_overview: Today is the Mid-Autumn Festival. Yin Hao completed a summary of his learning in the basic electrical knowledge module during the day. In the evening, he brought mooncakes and fruits to his neighbor Aunt Chen's home, where he enjoyed a warm and hearty family dinner, making up for the regret of not being able to return to his hometown. Later, he gathered with his friends in Shanghai to celebrate his completion of a half marathon. Surrounded by friendship and neighborly warmth, he spent a fulfilling and joyful holiday.

events.name: Complete the Summary of Basic Electrical Knowledge Learning
events.description: During work breaks and lunch hours, Yin Hao completed the final review of the recently self-studied basic electrical knowledge module. He organized comprehensive notes and a collection of error-correction exercises, and provided a written summary of the entire learning process, laying a theoretical foundation for the next phase, which may involve hands-on learning related to electrical control.

events.name: Invited to a Mid-Autumn Festival family dinner with the neighbors.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao brought a box of mooncakes and some fruit to Aunt Chen’s house next door. Aunt Chen had prepared a sumptuous dinner, including braised pork, steamed fish, stir-fried seasonal vegetables, and steamed egg with clams, which Yin Hao loved. As they ate, they watched the Mid-Autumn Festival gala and chatted about everyday life. Aunt Chen kept serving him more food, making Yin Hao feel the strong festive atmosphere and the warmth of family even in his rented apartment in Shanghai.

events.name: Gathering with friends to celebrate the success of the half marathon.
events.description: Shortly after returning from Aunt Chen's home, Yin Hao went out again to meet with his friends in Shanghai—Gao Zhiyuan, Ma Xiaofeng, and his running buddy Chen Jie—for a meal at a local Shanghainese restaurant they often visited near the neighborhood. The gathering was in celebration of his successful completion of a half marathon. Everyone shared delicious food, chatted animatedly about amusing moments from the race, National Day plans, and recent gaming achievements. The atmosphere was lively and joyful, bringing a perfect end to the last day of September.

events.name: Adjust your daily routine to restore regularity.
events.description: Considering the need to return to normal work after the holiday, Yin Hao deliberately controlled the duration of the gathering to ensure he did not stay up too late.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: The faint sense of homesickness and peace brought by the festival.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfied, warm, and happy, we spent a meaningful Mid-Autumn Festival in the company of friends and neighbors, looking forward to the upcoming October.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the first day of the National Day holiday, Yin Hao did not choose to go out immediately. Instead, he used this uninterrupted personal time to systematically organize his personal development plan. He started from three aspects: career, health, and travel, preparing for the new month and even the longer-term future. The day was quiet, orderly, and full of planning.

events.name: Develop a study plan for the electrician certification.
events.description: At the desk, Yin Hao took out his notebook and the online course syllabus. Drawing on his foundational knowledge in electromechanics from vocational school, he carefully outlined the key theoretical points in electrical engineering that required focused review. He created a detailed study plan for October, clearly defining his weekly theoretical learning goals and scheduling practice observation sessions at Master Chen Jianguo’s repair shop every Saturday morning. His ISTJ personality made him accustomed to systematically breaking down long-term goals—such as obtaining an electrician’s certificate—into actionable short-term steps.

events.name: Review and Optimize the Monthly Diet Plan
events.description: Yin Hao opened the health app on his phone and pulled up his running mileage, pace curve, and dietary records for September. He noticed that he sometimes felt slower to recover after long-distance training. Combining his recent physical sensations with the nutritional knowledge he had learned from his running friend Chen Jie, he adjusted his dietary plan for October. He increased the proportion of protein intake on training days and planned pre- and post-training snacks (such as a banana or a cup of yogurt). He updated the optimized plan in his memo.

events.name: Pre-trip Vehicle Inspection and Material Preparation
events.description: Considering he would be driving his parents on a trip tomorrow, Yin Hao went to the underground parking lot of his residential complex in the afternoon to conduct a thorough pre-trip inspection of his family car. He checked the tire pressure and wear, examined the oil and windshield washer fluid levels, and gave the interior a quick clean. Afterward, he visited a nearby supermarket to purchase bottled water and individually packaged snacks (just in case they were needed on the road). He also replenished the car’s emergency supplies with items like band-aids and gastrointestinal medicine from the household first-aid kit.

events.name: Confirm the itinerary with parents.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao confirmed the arrival time of the high-speed train and the pick-up location with his parents again through the WeChat family group. He sent them the location and contact information of the homestay, reminding them to rest early. His mother, Wang Xiuying, sent a voice message, her tone filled with anticipation for the trip.

起始状态.所处地点: Study at Home
起始状态.心情: Calm and organized, with the relaxation of a vacation beginning and a focus on planning.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and reassuring, fully prepared for tomorrow's family gathering and upcoming personal plans.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today marks the first day of the National Day holiday family trip. Yin Hao picked up his parents, who had traveled all the way from Nantong, early in the morning and embarked on a carefully planned short trip to Taihu Lake. Throughout the journey, he took on the roles of driver, tour guide, and "little head of the family," demonstrating his ability to live independently in Shanghai through his actions. The family atmosphere was warm and joyful.

events.name: Pick up parents at Shanghai Railway Station
events.description: Yin Hao arrived at the South Square of Shanghai Railway Station half an hour before the high-speed train's scheduled arrival time. After parking his car, he waited at the exit. The moment he saw his parents walk out of the ticket gate, he waved and quickly stepped forward to take their luggage. During the brief greetings, his father, Yin Jianguo, patted him on the shoulder, while his mother, Wang Xiuying, looked him over carefully and said, "You seem to have lost a little weight." The family then got into the car and headed toward Taihu Lake.

events.name: Drive to the Taihu Lake homestay and check in.
events.description: After about a two-hour drive, they arrived at the homestay by the shore of Taihu Lake. Yin Hao skillfully checked in and moved the luggage into the reserved family suite. The room was spacious and bright, with a balcony overlooking the lake. The parents were very satisfied with the accommodation, and the mother especially loved the view from the balcony. Yin Hao introduced the homestay's facilities and the surrounding environment to his parents.

events.name: Enjoy the "Three Whites of Taihu Lake" Lunch
events.description: Lunch was at a locally renowned restaurant specializing in lake delicacies. Yin Hao ordered authentic "Three Whites of Taihu Lake," including steamed white fish, salted white shrimp, and scrambled eggs with silver fish. As he served dishes to his parents, he introduced the unique characteristics of each. His father praised the freshness and flavor of the dishes, while his mother was concerned about the prices. Yin Hao smiled and reassured her to simply enjoy the meal. During the meal, his father asked about mechanical issues related to his work, leading to an in-depth technical discussion between father and son.

events.name: Lakeside Self-driving and Scenic Viewing
events.description: After lunch, Yin Hao drove his parents slowly along the lakeside road. The autumn sun shimmered on the vast expanse of Taihu Lake, creating a breathtaking view. They stopped at several scenic spots to take photos. Wang Xiuying, his mother, was in high spirits, capturing numerous photos and short videos with her phone. Meanwhile, Yin Hao and his father pointed at the distant workboats and waterfront facilities on the lake, discussing the mechanical principles behind them—a unique way of communication between father and son.

events.name: Homestay Dinner and Family Night Chat
events.description: We chose to have dinner at the homestay, where the environment was more private and quiet. Although the meal was simple, the atmosphere was relaxed. After dinner, the family took a walk in the homestay's courtyard and then returned to the room's balcony to drink tea. The parents took the initiative to ask Yin Hao about the specifics of his work in Shanghai, his daily routine, and his social life. Yin Hao shared in detail and mentioned his goals of obtaining an electrician's certificate and running. Upon hearing this, the parents' faces showed expressions of relief and pride. Instead of just giving reminders, they engaged in more equal discussions and offered support.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to it, a bit nervous, hoping to make it a pleasant day for my parents.

结束状态.所处地点: Taihu Lake Homestay Room
结束状态.心情: Feeling satisfied and relaxed, experiencing a closer and more equal relationship with parents, and achieving a preliminary sense of responsibility as the "little head of the household."

2025-10.daily_overview: On the final half-day of the family trip, the atmosphere was warm yet fleeting. Yin Hao and his parents enjoyed a tranquil morning by the lake before driving them to the train station. The reluctance of parting and the affirmation in his parents' eyes intertwined, marking the successful conclusion of this family gathering and symbolizing the consolidation of Yin Hao's image as truly grown-up and independent in his parents' hearts.

events.name: Morning Walk and Breakfast by the Lakeside
events.description: After having a simple breakfast at the homestay, the family took advantage of the fine weather in the morning to take another walk by Lake Tai. Wang Xiuying, the mother, seized the last opportunity to take photos, while Yin Jianguo, the father, walked side by side with Yin Hao, chatting about the recent updates of their relatives back in their hometown. The air was fresh, the lake breeze gentle, and the moment felt exceptionally peaceful.

events.name: Check out and drive back to Shanghai.
events.description: After checking out of the homestay, Yin Hao drove his parents back to Shanghai. On the way home, his parents couldn't stop praising the short trip, especially commending Yin Hao's itinerary planning and driving skills. His mother started selecting photos in the car, preparing to post them on her social media. Listening to their compliments, Yin Hao felt both happy and a bit bittersweet, as the time for parting was drawing near.

events.name: Farewell at Shanghai Hongqiao Railway Station
events.description: After arriving at Hongqiao Railway Station, Yin Hao helped his parents collect their train tickets and escorted them to the security checkpoint. His mother repeatedly reminded him, "Make sure to eat on time and stay safe while you're alone in Shanghai." His father, on the other hand, said succinctly, "Work hard, but don’t overdo it." Yin Hao nodded in agreement, watching his parents pass through security until their figures disappeared into the crowd. He stood there, filled with reluctance, but more so with a sense of accomplishment for having successfully arranged a family gathering.

events.name: Driving alone back to Songjiang.
events.description: After seeing his parents off, Yin Hao drove back alone to his rented apartment in Songjiang. The car suddenly fell silent, a stark contrast to the hustle and bustle of yesterday and this morning. He turned on some music and began to reminisce about the events of the past two days, especially the trust and contentment his parents had shown in him. This further strengthened his sense of responsibility and motivation for the future.

起始状态.所处地点: Taihu Lake Homestay
起始状态.心情: Cherish the final moments with family, tinged with the prelude of parting sorrow.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Interwoven with a faint sense of longing and a strong feeling of accomplishment. The house has returned to the quiet of living alone, yet the heart feels deeply fulfilled.

2025-10.daily_overview: In the middle of the National Day holiday, Yin Hao shifted his life rhythm from family mode back to personal growth and exploration mode. He completed an important long-distance running training session and visited an industrial expo to broaden his career horizons. In the evening, online interactions with his parents continued the warmth of family ties and reinforced the positive impact of the trip.

events.name: Key Runs for Half Marathon Preparation
events.description: To test his recent training results, Yin Hao arrived early at the Guangfulin Cultural Site and completed a planned 15-kilometer long-distance run. He deliberately attempted to run at a pace close to his target half-marathon finish time and, for the first time during a long-distance training session, carried a water bottle and energy gels to simulate his race-day fueling strategy. Overall, he felt good, but experienced some muscle fatigue in the latter half of the run, which made him realize the need to strengthen his strength training.

events.name: Visit the Shanghai Industrial Expo
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took the subway to the National Exhibition and Convention Center to visit the Industrial Expo. He focused on exploring the smart manufacturing and Industrial Internet of Things exhibition areas, where he saw many advanced machine tools and production lines integrated with sensing, data acquisition, and remote control. While chatting with a technician from one of the exhibitors, the technician mentioned, "Understanding a bit about electrical engineering helps you better grasp the 'nervous' system of these smart devices." This statement deeply resonated with Yin Hao, reinforcing his belief that learning electrical knowledge is an essential path toward mastering future technologies.

events.name: Received a thank-you message from my mother.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao received a long WeChat message from his mother, Wang Xiuying. In heartfelt words, his mother recounted the details of their trip, specifically mentioning, "Seeing how you arranged everything so perfectly, your father and I are truly reassured and proud of you." This message moved Yin Hao deeply, and he replied with a hug emoji and the words, "As long as you are happy."

events.name: Father shares travel photos in the family group chat.
events.description: Soon, Yin Jianguo, who had always been a man of few words, shared over a dozen photos from his trip in the family WeChat group at once. There were scenic shots as well as group photos of the three of them, though he didn’t say much. Yin Hao knew this was his father’s unique way of expressing satisfaction and happiness. He immediately gave the photos a thumbs-up in the group and commented on a few amusing details in the pictures.

events.name: Initiate a family video call proactively.
events.description: Influenced by his parents' emotions, Yin Hao took the initiative to start a video call. During the conversation, the topics were not limited to daily concerns but extended to reminiscing and discussing the details of the trip. His parents even began asking questions like, "What if we go to the beach in Zhoushan next time?" or "This kind of homestay seems more comfortable than staying in a hotel." Yin Hao joined the discussion with a smile, feeling that the family interaction had become more equal and two-way.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of energy, planning to improve myself during the holiday.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and invigorating, it combines the exhilaration after exercise, the professional urgency from broadening horizons, and the warmth of being surrounded by family.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the last day of the holiday, Yin Hao focused on knowledge learning, neighborhood socializing, and preparing for the Mid-Autumn Festival the next day. As planned, he began reviewing electrical engineering theory and shared his long-term plans with Aunt Chen, a caring neighbor. He spent the entire afternoon preparing for the Mid-Autumn Festival video call with his family, enjoying a peaceful and heartwarming life.

events.name: Electrical Theory Review: Circuit Fundamentals and Safety
events.description: In the morning, following his study plan, Yin Hao began systematically reviewing the basic components of electrical circuits, Ohm's Law, and its application in calculations. He paid particular attention to the safety operating procedures for electrical work, using a red pen to highlight key points in his notebook, such as safe voltage levels, insulation requirements, and emergency response steps. His ISTJ personality, characterized by meticulousness, made him keenly aware that safety is the cornerstone of electrical work and must be firmly ingrained in his mind.

events.name: Chatting with Auntie Chen, our neighbor, about home-buying plans.
events.description: While taking out the trash downstairs, I ran into Aunt Chen, my neighbor from across the hall. Aunt Chen kindly asked about his parents' recent visit. As the conversation went on, Yin Hao candidly shared his goal of "buying a house in the Shanghai area within the next five years." Upon hearing this, Aunt Chen was very supportive. Drawing from her experience as a "long-time Shanghai resident" and her years of observations, she offered him some practical advice, such as which areas to focus on for development, how to keep an eye on policy trends, and roughly how much to prepare for a down payment. She encouraged him to stay committed to saving and planning.

events.name: Complete the exercises for Unit 1 of the Industrial Internet of Things course.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao sat at his desk, opened the online learning platform for Industrial Internet of Things, and completed the post-lesson exercises for the first unit, which covered an overview and fundamentals. The questions included multiple-choice questions testing conceptual understanding and some short-answer analytical questions. After carefully answering them, he submitted his responses to the system, reinforcing the knowledge points that had become clearer to him after visiting the Industrial Expo in recent days.

events.name: Purchase fresh meat mooncakes and inspect the equipment.
events.description: Thinking of tomorrow being the Mid-Autumn Festival, even though he couldn't return home for a reunion, he still wanted to maintain a sense of "ritual" during the video call. Yin Hao made a special trip to a well-regarded pastry shop in the old town of Songjiang, where he queued up to buy freshly baked savory mooncakes. After returning home, he checked his phone and the home Wi-Fi network to ensure a stable connection, and fully charged his phone, making all the technical preparations for the "virtual reunion" scheduled for tomorrow evening.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, a blend of relaxation and focused learning as the holiday draws to a close.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Steady and hopeful, I have completed my study tasks, felt the care from my neighbors, and prepared greetings for the Mid-Autumn Festival.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and bright, the moon is bright and the stars are sparse.

2025-10.daily_overview: Mid-Autumn Festival, a day that embodies the longing for reunion. Yin Hao spent the day handling personal matters, with the highlight being the video call with his parents back home in Nantong in the evening. Despite being far apart, the connection through technology and thoughtful preparations filled the night with a warm festive atmosphere and deep family affection.

events.name: Mid-Autumn Festival video reunion with parents
events.description: Around 8 p.m., Yin Hao made a WeChat video call to his parents. On the other end of the screen, his parents were seated at the dining table in their hometown, which was filled with his mother’s signature dishes and various types of mooncakes. Yin Hao showed his parents the Shanghai-style savory mooncakes he had bought, while they displayed the Suzhou-style mooncakes from their hometown. They chatted about the lingering excitement from the National Day holiday, the recent weather back home, and updates on their relatives. As usual, his mother reminded him to take care of his health, and his father asked if there were any new developments at work. The call lasted nearly an hour, filled with constant laughter.

events.name: Preserve the Reunion Moment and Follow-up Plans
events.description: After the video call ended, Yin Hao saved several "family photos" he had taken screenshots of during the call to his phone's album and shared them in the family WeChat group. As he ate the fresh meat mooncakes, he reflected on the conversation they had just had. Although he was far from home, he didn’t feel lonely. Instead, the successful family trip and smooth communication made him feel even closer to his family. He decided to send his parents some specialty pastries from Shanghai in a few days.

events.name: Savor and reflect alone.
events.description: In the quiet of the night, Yin Hao scrolled through photos from his National Day trip and screenshots of tonight’s chat on his phone, feeling a distinct sense of "adulthood" and "responsibility" welling up inside him. He realized he was no longer the child who needed his parents to worry about everything, but a family member capable of taking care of himself in a different place and even creating joyful memories for his parents. This awareness made him feel even more resolute.

events.name: Communicate family feelings with your brother.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao sent a message to his older brother, Yin Tao, on WeChat, briefly sharing his feelings after taking their parents on a trip and noting some changes in their parents. Soon, his brother replied, and the two brothers began exchanging their thoughts on shouldering family responsibilities through the screen. His brother encouraged him to keep up the good work while also reminding him to be mindful of the pressures he faces while striving to make a living in Shanghai.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the evening family call, feeling a bit homesick.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Warm, content, and filled with inner strength. Though far from home, the emotional bonds run deep, and there is greater confidence in the future family dynamics.

2025-10.daily_overview: On the workday adjusted for the National Day holiday, Yin Hao did not go to work. He used this full day to conduct a systematic monthly review and planning of his financial situation, staying up slightly later than usual due to his impromptu research on investment information. From organizing receipts and analyzing bills to setting a new budget, the entire process reflected his pragmatic and planning-oriented personality, clarifying the financial framework for his life in October and his long-term goal of saving for a home purchase.

events.name: Organize all income and expenditure vouchers for September.
events.description: Yin Hao sorted all the paper receipts, credit card purchase slips, and screenshots of electronic payment records from September into different categories. He specifically set aside the large expense receipts from the family's National Day trip for later analysis. The organizational skills of an ISTJ were on full display at this moment.

events.name: Conduct monthly review in the accounting app.
events.description: Opening the expense tracking app on his phone, Yin Hao meticulously reviewed the income and expenses recorded for September. He compared the actual data with the budget set at the beginning of the month. The results showed that daily expenses such as dining and transportation were largely in line with the budget, but the "entertainment and other" category was significantly overspent due to National Day travel. At the same time, as there were no major unexpected expenses this month, a small surplus remained from the daily expenditures. He made a note next to the overspent item, pondering the reasons.

events.name: Formulate the new budget for October
events.description: Based on the review in September and considering several known major expense plans for October (such as car maintenance costing approximately 800 yuan), as well as the need to reserve funds in advance for potential professional training enrollment at the end of the year, Yin Hao reset his budget for October in the app. He appropriately increased the savings ratio and specifically set up a "Training Fund" subcategory, depositing a small fixed amount each month. For controllable daily expenses, he maintained the original budget or slightly tightened it.

events.name: Set financial reminders and update goals.
events.description: After finalizing the budget, Yin Hao marked the car maintenance appointment date (October 14th) in his phone calendar and set a reminder for the day before. Meanwhile, in the "Goal Savings" module of his budgeting app, he updated the current amount and progress bar for the "Home Down Payment" savings goal. Watching the progress bar advance another small step, he felt a sense of solid achievement.

events.name: Research on Conservative Investment and Financial Products
events.description: In the evening, out of curiosity and planning needs, Yin Hao looked up information about bank wealth management products online, focusing on low-risk, capital-preserving options to match his conservative investment preferences. Although he did not make an immediate purchase in the end, the process gave him a more concrete understanding of asset allocation and also caused him to stay up later than usual.

起始状态.所处地点: Living room at home
起始状态.心情: Calm, planning to properly handle the backlog of "life management" tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room
结束状态.心情: Clear and organized, I have gained a more defined sense of control over my financial situation and expenses for the coming months, along with new reflections on investment.

2025-10.daily_overview: Today is the first workday after the National Day holiday. Yin Hao’s life has returned to its usual rhythm: he spends the morning observing and learning at the repair shop, and the afternoon handling work and social matters. He received some local specialties sent by his comrade-in-arms, a gift from afar that added a touch of warm surprise and a connection of friendship to an otherwise ordinary day.

events.name: Observe Master Chen Jianguo Repairing Electrical Appliances
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao arrived at Chen Jianguo's repair shop as planned. Today, Master Chen was repairing an old electric fan. Yin Hao quietly observed from the side, watching how Master Chen used a multimeter to test circuit continuity, determine the condition of the motor, and replace the capacitor. Master Chen explained key points while working, and Yin Hao listened attentively, occasionally asking questions.

events.name: Check industrial sensor information during the lunch break.
events.description: Back at the company during the lunch break, Yin Hao used the computer in the rest area to look up technical documents on displacement, pressure, and temperature sensors commonly used in industrial environments. He paid special attention to how these sensors convert physical signals into electrical signals and transmit them to PLCs or host computers through interfaces such as 4-20mA and RS-485. He gained a more concrete understanding of the chain of "how data is generated and enters the system" and noted down several questions he wanted to explore in greater depth.

events.name: Discussing influenza vaccination with colleagues.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao chatted with his colleague Wang Lei and mentioned his plan to get a flu vaccine. Wang Lei shared his own experience from last year and suggested choosing a community health service center, as it is convenient and cost-effective. Yin Hao took note of the advice and planned to make an appointment as soon as possible.

events.name: Pickup notification received
events.description: While working in the afternoon, my phone vibrated, and I received a text message from the parcel locker notifying me to pick up a package that had arrived at the community parcel locker. The package was sent from Huangshan City, Anhui Province. Yin Hao guessed it might have been sent by his comrade-in-arms, Zhang Jianguo.

events.name: After work, pick up the package from a comrade-in-arms.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao stopped by the community parcel locker on his way home, entered the pickup code, and retrieved a small cardboard box. The sender was indeed Zhang Jianguo.

events.name: Unpack and Share the Joy
events.description: Upon returning home, Yin Hao opened the package to find several vacuum-sealed packs of Huangshan sesame cakes and two boxes of pre-Qingming Mao Feng tea, along with a handwritten note from Zhang Jianguo that read, "Haozi, try some of our local specialties. The tea is great—have some when you’re tired from running. Come visit Hangzhou sometime!" A warm feeling washed over Yin Hao, and he immediately took out his phone, snapped a photo of the specialties, and posted it in their "Iron Triangle" comrades' group chat. He tagged Zhang Jianguo and added, "Got the package, thanks, bro! It looks delicious. Next time I’m back in Nantong, I’ll bring you some razor clam crackers!"

events.name: Talking with my mother about the next gathering.
events.description: During the routine evening call with his mother, she took the initiative to suggest, "Next time your dad and I come over, or when you come back, should we try something different? Maybe visit an ancient town?" Yin Hao picked up the conversation and proposed several options, such as visiting Zhujiajiao near Shanghai or waiting for warmer weather to go to the seaside. The mother and son began to explore the possibilities for their next family activity in a relaxed and pleasant atmosphere.

events.name: Receive Quarterly Performance Data Summary Notification
events.description: Before going to bed, I checked the work group and found that the Human Resources Department had issued a notice requiring each team to start compiling the basic performance data for employees in the third quarter (July–September), including attendance, working hours, task completion rates, and quality pass rates. Team leader Wang Lei tagged all members in the group, asking everyone to cooperate in providing the relevant data.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Transitioning from vacation mode to work mode, I'm feeling a slight adjustment in pace.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and heartwarming. The daytime was filled with learning gains, the evening brought the preciousness of friendship with gifts from comrades, and communication with family has entered a new stage.

2025-10.daily_overview: An ordinary Thursday workday. During the day, Yin Hao focused on production tasks in the workshop and began assisting the team leader in organizing performance data. After work, he engaged in strength training and stayed up late due to overtime work to handle urgent order data. It was a day that balanced work and leisure but came with additional pressure.

events.name: Daily Work and Assistance with Data Organization
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao methodically completed the programming and operation tasks for the CNC machine. Around the lunch break, as requested by Wang Lei, he organized his personal work hour records for the third quarter, along with the batch numbers and qualification rates of the main workpieces he was responsible for processing. He then sent the spreadsheet to Wang Lei. When Master Sun passed by, he briefly checked with Yin Hao about the start and end times of his involvement in the debugging of the new equipment.

events.name: Assist in handling urgent order data
events.description: In the afternoon, team leader Wang Lei received an urgent order and needed to quickly organize relevant production data. Yin Hao proactively offered assistance, working an extra hour to handle data entry and preliminary analysis, demonstrating his sense of responsibility and team spirit.

events.name: Proceed with strength training as planned.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao went to the gym near his company and followed a simple plan he had created, completing about 40 minutes of core and lower body strength training to improve his running stability and fatigue resistance. After the workout, he felt muscle soreness but also a sense of fulfillment.

events.name: Playing online games with gaming buddy Zhang Fei.
events.description: At home in the evening, Yin Hao logged into "Honor of Kings" as usual and teamed up with his gaming friend Zhang Fei, who was far away in Shenzhen, for ranked matches. The two of them cooperated seamlessly, winning two games in a row. In the game voice chat, aside from discussing tactics, they also briefly caught up on each other’s recent lives. Zhang Fei complained about the tight project schedule, while Yin Hao shared his plans to take his parents out during the National Day holiday.

events.name: Plan a weekend running friends gathering
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao sent a WeChat message to his running buddy and neighbor, Chen Jie: "Brother Jie, are you free this weekend? My comrade-in-arms sent some Huangshan sesame cakes and tea. Would you like to come over to my place and try them? We can also chat about training." Chen Jie quickly replied and agreed. Yin Hao planned to invite him over during the weekend, both to share the local specialties and to exchange experiences about running and diet.

起始状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for the routine workday, but with a slight stress due to the anticipation of overtime.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and satisfied, having completed work tasks and provided additional assistance, engaged in targeted exercise, and effectively relaxed through social gaming, though feeling slightly fatigued.

state.今日运动: 40 minutes of strength training at the gym

2025-10.daily_overview: Friday, the end of the workweek. Yin Hao handled a series of planning and management tasks: from reviewing personal expenses and contemplating work optimization to scheduling a health check-up, arranging vehicle maintenance appointments, and completing the quarterly work summary. In the evening, he spontaneously joined friends for dinner, enjoying the pleasure of socializing. This day reflected his pragmatic and forward-looking approach to life management.

events.name: Review of Mobile Plan Usage
events.description: At the beginning of the month, I switched to a new mobile phone plan. After using it for a full month, Yin Hao checked the detailed statement of this month's communication expenses in the accounting software and compared it with the cost of the old plan. He confirmed that the new plan indeed better suited his usage habits in terms of data and call duration, saving about 30 yuan per month and achieving the goal of optimizing fixed expenses.

events.name: Thinking about data relevance in work.
events.description: While replacing a batch of worn-out machine tool cutters, Yin Hao reviewed the replacement records of this model of cutter over the past month, along with the quantity and quality reports of the processed workpieces during the corresponding period. As he manually compared the data, he pondered: If there were a system that could automatically analyze the correlation model between cutter lifespan and factors such as material hardness and cutting parameters, it might be possible to more accurately predict the timing for cutter replacement and reduce the scrap rate caused by excessive wear. This idea stemmed from his recent interest in the application of Industrial Internet of Things (IIoT) data.

events.name: Schedule an Annual Comprehensive Physical Examination
events.description: Realizing that he had not undergone a systematic physical examination for three years and aiming to support his running training more scientifically, Yin Hao used the employee benefits link provided by his company to schedule a comprehensive health check-up at a designated medical center. He set the appointment for a Saturday morning in late October.

events.name: Observation of Family Communication Patterns
events.description: During a brief phone call with his parents today, he proactively shared about scheduling a health check-up and contemplating ways to optimize his work. His parents not only expressed concern for his well-being, but his father also briefly discussed the idea of "predicting the lifespan of cutting tools" that he had brought up. Yin Hao sensed that the one-sided reminders in family conversations had diminished, while mutual exchanges and joint discussions about future plans had increased.

events.name: Schedule an Autumn Maintenance for Your Vehicle
events.description: After work, Yin Hao contacted Brother Wu, the owner of a familiar car maintenance shop, via WeChat to schedule a basic autumn vehicle maintenance for this Saturday (October 14th) in the morning. They discussed the package content, which included replacing the engine oil, oil filter, air filter, and conducting a full vehicle safety inspection. Brother Wu quickly confirmed the appointment time.

events.name: Please fill out the quarterly work summary online.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into the company's performance system and carefully filled out his personal work summary for the third quarter as required. He emphasized his learning and contributions during the debugging of new equipment, the stability of his daily operations, and his efforts in expanding his knowledge through visits to the Industrial Expo and self-study. After completing the form, he submitted it. Subsequently, his direct supervisor, Master Sun Jianguo, reviewed his summary in the system and provided a preliminary score along with the comment, "Works diligently, learns proactively, and shows potential for development," based on his daily observations.

events.name: Temporary dinner gathering with friends
events.description: In the evening, colleague Wang Lei spontaneously suggested having dinner together after work, and Yin Hao readily agreed. They went to a local cuisine restaurant, ordering braised pork and steamed soup dumplings, chatting about work and daily life while they ate. This gathering helped Yin Hao relax and also strengthened the friendship among colleagues.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: The relaxed feeling of Friday, coupled with the organization of handling multiple planning tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Orderly and pleasant, feeling like I've handled several important but not urgent matters, enjoyed social time, and have a clear plan for the upcoming weekend.

2025-10.daily_overview: Saturday is a day for shopping, cooking, and socializing. Yin Hao strictly follows his new dietary plan for a big shopping trip and tries cooking new dishes. He invites his neighbor, a fellow runner, to his home to share specialty foods from his hometown and happily accepts his cousin's invitation to experience baking together. In the evening, he makes plans with a fishing buddy for a fishing trip. His life is filled with the joys of small, tangible practices and interpersonal interactions.

events.name: Conduct a large-scale purchase of ingredients according to the nutrition plan.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao took the shopping list and headed to a large supermarket and a fresh market, where he purchased healthy ingredients for the upcoming week in bulk: chicken breast, ground beef, sea bass, eggs, milk, broccoli, carrots, brown rice, oats, and more. He carefully compared prices and freshness to ensure that the ingredients he bought were both nutritious and cost-effective.

events.name: Try cooking a new dish: Steamed Sea Bass
events.description: To diversify his sources of high-quality protein, Yin Hao attempted to cook steamed sea bass for lunch, following a recipe he learned from a food app. He handled the fish, chopped scallions and ginger, and carefully monitored the steaming time. Though he was a bit flustered, he succeeded in the end. The fish was tender and delicious, paired with brown rice and stir-fried broccoli, making for a very satisfying lunch. He decided to add this relatively simple and healthy dish to his regular meal rotation.

events.name: Invite running friend Chen Jie to share local specialties
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao sent a WeChat message inviting his running buddy Chen Jie, who lives in the same neighborhood, to come over for a visit. Chen Jie accepted the invitation and arrived at Yin Hao's home. The two chatted while enjoying the Huangshan sesame cakes and Maofeng tea sent by Zhang Jianguo. Yin Hao shared his experiences from his National Day travels and his visit to the Industrial Expo, while Chen Jie talked about his fitness coaching and running insights, once again emphasizing the importance of timing for nutritional supplementation before and after training.

events.name: Plan to reciprocate with local specialties for comrades-in-arms.
events.description: After seeing Chen Jie off, Yin Hao looked at the remaining pancakes and thought to himself that the next time he returned to his hometown in Nantong, he must remember to buy some dried clams and Xiting crisp biscuits to send to Zhang Jianguo as a return gift, as a gesture of reciprocity.

events.name: Accepting the invitation to a baking experience with my cousin.
events.description: In the evening, my cousin Chen Xiaowen sent a WeChat message saying that she would be in Shanghai on a business trip tomorrow and had some free time in the afternoon. She wanted to invite Yin Hao to join her for a DIY baking experience class to relax. Yin Hao thought the idea was quite novel and happily agreed. Among the links to several workshops that his cousin had sent, he chose one near Songjiang University Town with good reviews and completed the booking and payment for both of them through a mobile app.

events.name: Going fishing with my fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang over the weekend.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao contacted his fishing friend Wu Zhiqiang on WeChat to discuss plans for fishing at Dianshan Lake over the weekend. They tentatively agreed to set off on the morning of the following Sunday (October 19th) and shared some recent fishing spots and experiences. Yin Hao looked forward to relaxing during this outdoor activity.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Weekend relaxation and the desire to execute plans.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Pleasant and fulfilling. Completed the replenishment of daily necessities, tried something new (cooking fish), had enjoyable conversations with friends, and felt a sense of freshness about tomorrow's activities. Social needs were satisfied.

2025-10.daily_overview: A rich and interesting Sunday. In the morning, I had a healthy morning run and exchange. In the afternoon, I experienced completely unfamiliar DIY baking with my cousin who came to Shanghai on a business trip. From operating the machine tools to handcrafting the cake, the process was filled with laughter, joy, and a sense of novelty. In the evening, I shared the fruits of our labor with the neighbors and spread the happiness to my circle of friends and family. Social interactions and family bonds were fully satisfied on this day.

events.name: Exchanging nutrition tips with running buddies after a morning run.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and Chen Jie, as usual, went for a 10-kilometer morning run near Guangfulin Road. After the run, while having breakfast at a diner, they naturally started discussing sports nutrition. Yin Hao shared his experience of adjusting his protein intake ratio, while Chen Jie, from a professional perspective, added insights on how consuming carbohydrates and protein within 30 minutes after training affects recovery efficiency. He also recommended a cost-effective whey protein powder.

events.name: Query information about influenza vaccination
events.description: On the way home, considering the cooling weather and the crowded work environment, Yin Hao used his phone to look up the notification from the Songjiang District Community Health Service Center about the autumn flu vaccination. He learned about the appointment process and vaccination schedule, and planned to find time to get vaccinated next week.

events.name: Experiencing DIY Baking with My Cousin
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao met his cousin Chen Xiaowen at the Songjiang University Town subway station, and together they headed to the pre-booked baking workshop. Under the guidance of the instructor, the two put on aprons and learned how to make a cream cake. From measuring flour and sugar, to separating egg yolks and whites, mixing the batter, and finally decorating the cake with a piping bag, Yin Hao handled each step with great care. Although his movements were a bit clumsy, he remained extremely focused. His cousin encouraged and assisted him along the way, filling the workshop with laughter.

events.name: Tasting the Fruits and Saying Goodbye
events.description: After baking and cooling, the cake they had made by hand was finally complete. Though its appearance was not particularly refined, it exuded a delightful aroma. Together with their teacher, they tasted the fruits of their labor. Yin Hao felt a simple sense of accomplishment in creating food, which was entirely different from operating precision machine tools. After the class ended, Yin Hao carefully packed the cake, had a simple dinner with his cousin nearby, and then accompanied her to the subway station, promising to meet again soon.

events.name: Invite neighbors to share their baking creations.
events.description: Returning to his residence on Guangfulin Road, Yin Hao remembered that his running partner and neighbor Chen Jie also lived in the same community, so he sent a message inviting him over to taste the cake he had made. Chen Jie arrived shortly, and as they enjoyed the cake and chatted, Yin Hao shared the amusing stories from his baking adventures during the day. Chen Jie praised him, saying, "You’re quite skilled with your hands."

events.name: Share happiness in your social circle.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao shared photos of the cake and his baking experience from the day in the family WeChat group and the "Iron Triangle" comrades-in-arms group. He quickly received likes from his family along with praise like "Hao Hao is amazing," as well as teasing from his comrades such as "Tough guy turning into a pastry chef?" The lively atmosphere in the groups added many joyful echoes to his weekend life.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the gathering with my cousin and the fresh experiences.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Extremely delightful and refreshing. Experienced brand-new activities, spent high-quality time with loved ones, and shared joy with friends, greatly fulfilling social needs, though weight slightly increased due to cake consumption.

2025-10.daily_overview: As the new week began, Yin Hao faced a fresh challenge in his work—he was assigned as the mentor for the new employee, Xiao Li. He gladly accepted the task and stayed up late studying to develop a mentoring plan. Meanwhile, his online course studies continued to progress steadily. Transitioning from being a mentee to a mentor, his professional role was quietly evolving, though the pressure led to a slight sense of anxiety.

events.name: Accept the task of mentoring new employees.
events.description: During the morning team meeting, team leader Wang Lei introduced the newly hired employee Xiao Li to everyone and officially designated Yin Hao as Xiao Li's mentor. Yin Hao will be responsible for helping him become familiar with CNC machine operation and safety regulations. Yin Hao was somewhat surprised but quickly accepted the role. After the meeting, he had a brief discussion with Wang Lei and Xiao Li to learn about Xiao Li's background in mechanical and electrical studies from a technical secondary school and his learning objectives.

events.name: Develop a mentoring plan for new employees.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao did not rest. Instead, he used this time to draft a detailed one-week training plan, drawing on his own experience when he first joined the company under the guidance of Master Sun, as well as the company's safety regulations. The plan included: a safety overview and theoretical explanation of equipment on the first day; practical observation and step-by-step practice from the second to the fourth day; and an independent operation assessment for simple workpieces on the fifth day. He also compiled electronic materials such as equipment operation manuals and safety regulation documents, which he planned to send to Xiao Li in advance for pre-study.

events.name: Exchange teaching experiences with Master Sun Jianguo
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao took the preliminary mentoring plan to Master Sun to seek his opinion. After reviewing it, Master Sun nodded and added, "The theory should be thoroughly explained, but more importantly, he must develop safe habits. Before every step of the operation, he must perform 'pointing and calling' to confirm. You did well back in the day." With his master's approval, Yin Hao felt more confident about completing the mentoring task, but he also felt the pressure.

events.name: Learn Industrial Internet of Things Network Technology
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued his online course on Industrial Internet of Things, with this week's topic focusing on network communication technologies. He studied the application scenarios, advantages and disadvantages, and selection considerations of common wired and wireless network technologies such as Ethernet, Wi-Fi, Zigbee, and LoRa in industrial environments. He deepened his understanding through technical demonstration videos. He noted that at the workshop level, where stability and real-time performance are emphasized, wired technologies are predominantly used, while wireless technologies are more widely applied in data acquisition and mobile devices.

events.name: Slightly late to bed due to stress and anxiety.
events.description: Due to his new teaching responsibilities and coursework, Yin Hao felt some pressure, which led him to stay up later than usual, burning the midnight oil to review teaching materials and course content to ensure everything was foolproof.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: The usual mindset on a Monday workday, with a hint of preparation for the tasks of the new week and a touch of mild anxiety.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home
结束状态.心情: A slight sense of challenging excitement and responsibility, but pressure leads to anxiety. The appointment to the new role made him feel trusted, while also prompting him to organize his knowledge and experience more systematically. Slight fatigue due to insufficient sleep.

2025-10.daily_overview: On Tuesday, Yin Hao managed multiple tasks in parallel across various fronts: he reviewed practical electrical engineering knowledge in the morning, performed vehicle maintenance in the afternoon, and officially began mentoring new employees at work. He also successfully scheduled a flu vaccination appointment at the community health service center. In the evening, he shared his progress with his mother. This day served as a typical reflection of balancing learning, life management, and work responsibilities.

events.name: Review the Use of Electronic Components and Instruments
events.description: Before going to work in the morning, Yin Hao took half an hour to review the graphical symbols and physical identification of common electronic components such as resistors, capacitors, and diodes, as well as the basic methods for using a multimeter to measure their condition, polarity, and capacitance/resistance values. He carefully identified each component in the entry-level toolkit he had purchased, ensuring that theory was connected with practice.

events.name: Practicing basic electrical operations at the repair shop.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao went to Chen Jianguo's repair shop. Today, Master Chen let him practice hands-on. Under Master Chen's supervision, Yin Hao carefully practiced stripping wires, twisting connections, and wrapping insulation tape on a safe workbench. Although his movements were a bit clumsy, the steps were meticulous and in line with safety regulations. Master Chen nodded in approval.

events.name: Successfully scheduled an appointment for the influenza vaccination.
events.description: During a work break in the afternoon, Yin Hao successfully booked a flu vaccination appointment for this Saturday morning (October 19th) through the WeChat public account of the community health service center. The system reminded him to bring his ID card and medical insurance card.

events.name: Vehicle Autumn Maintenance
events.description: After work, Yin Hao drove directly to Wu Ge's car maintenance shop for the scheduled autumn maintenance. He handed the car keys to Wu Ge and reconfirmed the details of the maintenance package (oil change, oil filter replacement, air filter replacement, and a full vehicle safety inspection).

events.name: Chatting with shop owner Brother Wu for advice.
events.description: During the more than an hour spent waiting for the maintenance, Yin Hao chatted with the shop owner, Brother Wu, in the lounge. Brother Wu mentioned that he had heard fuel prices might see a slight increase next month and suggested that Yin Hao could apply for a membership card at a gas station partnered with the maintenance shop, which could save him some money in the long run. Yin Hao took note of the suggestion.

events.name: Pay the maintenance fee and return home.
events.description: Maintenance completed, all vehicle checks are normal. After reviewing the maintenance checklist and confirming everything was correct, Yin Hao paid the 800 yuan fee via his phone. On the drive home, he felt the car ran more smoothly. At the same time, he was considering Brother Wu's suggestion about the fuel card and planned to look into it over the weekend.

events.name: Systematically explain the theory of machine tool safety and operation.
events.description: During the daytime work, Yin Hao officially began mentoring the new employee, Xiao Li. He first chose a relatively quiet corner of the workshop and, using the materials he had compiled, systematically explained to Xiao Li the basic structure of the CNC machine, its working principles, and the functions of each button/knob on the operation panel. He spent a significant amount of time emphasizing safety operating procedures, using examples to illustrate potential hazards.

events.name: Daily Inspection and Maintenance of Demonstration Equipment
events.description: After the theoretical explanation, Yin Hao led Xiao Li to the machine tool he usually operates and demonstrated the daily equipment inspection process that must be carried out before starting work. This included checking the lubricant oil level, the readings on the air pressure gauge, whether all moving parts were securely fastened, and if there were any abnormal noises, among other things. He also explained the purpose and standards for each inspection. Additionally, he demonstrated how to perform simple cleaning and maintenance on the equipment. Xiao Li observed and took notes attentively.

events.name: Calling mother to share progress.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao called his mother, Wang Xiuying, and shared the progress of mentoring new employees and scheduling a vaccine appointment today. His mother was delighted to hear this, encouraging him to keep up the good work and reminding him to rest and not overexert himself. This conversation made Yin Hao feel the warmth and support of his family.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: The plan is clear, knowing there are multiple tasks to handle today, feeling positive but slightly fatigued.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Efficient yet slightly weary. Accomplished two important life tasks: vehicle maintenance and vaccine appointment. The mentoring work has also started smoothly, making me feel capable of managing multiple aspects of both work and life. Family support brings comfort.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, with fog in the morning.

2025-10.daily_overview: A pivotal turning point occurred on this day. Yin Hao, during his morning run, neglected proper warm-up while pushing for intensity, resulting in an injury to his right ankle. This forced him to suspend his training plan and begin rehabilitation care. Meanwhile, other matters in work and life continued to progress: he received an inquiry from his landlord about lease renewal, contemplated upgrading his fishing gear, and participated in the company's quarterly performance review meeting as a key frontline contributor. A health warning and professional recognition arrived on the same day.

events.name: High-Intensity Interval Running Training and Ankle Injuries
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao was engaging in high-intensity interval running training around the Guangfulin Cultural Site, aiming to improve his speed endurance. Perhaps due to the invisible pressure from recently mentoring newcomers and handling multiple tasks, or perhaps driven by an eagerness to win, he shortened his warm-up time compared to usual. After several rapid acceleration sprints, he felt a slight pulling sensation in his right ankle. Initially dismissing it as a normal reaction, he did not stop. After the training session, the soreness in his right ankle significantly intensified, causing pain when bearing weight while walking. Upon returning home, he immediately applied an ice pack, but the pain did not subside right away.

events.name: Begin Rehabilitation Stretching and Care
events.description: After getting injured, Yin Hao consulted sports injury materials and realized it might be tendonitis. He decided to suspend all running training starting today and began ankle rehabilitation stretches and ice therapy. In the evening, he performed simple stretching exercises and planned to persist with them daily to promote recovery.

events.name: Received inquiry from landlord regarding lease renewal.
events.description: While heading to work in the morning, he received a WeChat message from his landlord, Li Xiuying (Sister Li), politely reminding him that the lease would expire at the end of the year. She inquired whether he intended to renew the lease and suggested scheduling a face-to-face meeting in the near future. Yin Hao replied, expressing his willingness to renew the lease, and proposed discussing the specific details after work on a weekday.

events.name: Browse fishing forums to research equipment.
events.description: During the lunch break, the discomfort in his ankle left him somewhat unsettled, so he opened his phone to browse forums like "Fishing Home" and WeChat groups, checking reviews and discussions from experienced anglers on high-end fishing rods, reels, and lines. He gained a preliminary understanding of the features and prices of some mainstream brands and models, building up knowledge for a potential future upgrade to his fishing gear. This also served as a way to relax and divert his attention.

events.name: Attend the company's quarterly performance review meeting
events.description: In the afternoon, the company held the third-quarter performance review meeting, with Yin Hao attending as a recommended frontline employee representative. The meeting reviewed the data submitted by each team. When discussing Yin Hao's team, his mentor, Sun Jianguo, spoke up during the meeting to affirm Yin Hao's proactive performance and learning ability during the new equipment debugging period, and suggested awarding additional "Learning and Contribution" points. This proposal received approval from the attendees.

events.name: Reflection Training and Adjustment Plan
events.description: After work, the pain in his ankle forced Yin Hao to cancel any evening activities. He once again applied ice and stretched, deeply reflecting on the necessity of prioritizing scientific training and injury-free running over the pursuit of speed. He updated his health goals, planning to focus on electrical engineering studies and teaching work during his recovery period, while also adjusting his exercise habits.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Looking forward to the morning run training, hoping to improve my condition, but with a slight sense of tension due to recent stress.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Complicated. The pain in the right ankle brings frustration and worry, but the recognition gained during the day's work offers some solace. Overall, the wake-up call regarding his health compels him to seriously adjust his attitude and approach toward exercise, and to begin rehabilitation care.

state.今日运动: Running (High-Intensity Interval Running, discontinued due to injury), rehabilitation stretching begins.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy with a slightly cool temperature and a noticeable autumn breeze.

2025-10.daily_overview: Yin Hao adjusted his life due to tendinitis in his right ankle, focusing on recovery and work, reflecting the cautious planning characteristic of an ISTJ personality.

events.name: Ankle Rehabilitation Care
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao performed ankle icing and rehabilitation stretches at home, following the doctor's advice to pause running and focus on rest.

events.name: Consider getting a flu vaccine.
events.description: During lunch, upon seeing news about flu cases, Yin Hao assessed the risks in the work environment and decided to get vaccinated over the weekend to prevent illness.

events.name: Develop a vaccination plan
events.description: After work, he planned to go to the community health service center for vaccination this weekend and recorded it in his phone's to-do list.

events.name: Persistent discomfort in the ankle
events.description: There is stiffness and a slight tingling sensation in the ankle throughout the day, with increased discomfort after prolonged standing, but he persists in working.

events.name: Consulting Fellow Runners About Injuries
events.description: I described the symptoms to my running buddy Chen Jie via WeChat, and he suggested taking a break from running, applying ice, and observing for a few days.

events.name: Decide to pause training and observe.
events.description: Yin Hao adopted the suggestion and set a three-day observation period, planning to seek medical attention if there was no improvement, reflecting a pragmatic decision-making approach.

events.name: Deciding to renew the lease for the current residence
events.description: The landlord inquired about renewing the lease. Considering convenience and cost, Yin Hao expressed willingness to renew and agreed to discuss the details over the weekend.

events.name: Guiding the Operational Procedures for New Employees
events.description: During work, I mentored the new employee Xiao Li, demonstrating operations such as clamping and tool setting, while emphasizing the key points of precision and safety.

events.name: Temporary overtime to handle minor equipment malfunctions.
events.description: Before leaving work, the machine tool experienced a minor malfunction. Yin Hao stayed overtime for half an hour to troubleshoot and repair it, ensuring normal production the following day.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Bedroom in the Home
起始状态.心情: Calm, with a slight concern for ankle discomfort and a determination to recover.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, Living Room
结束状态.心情: Prudent, a rehabilitation and vaccination plan has been formulated, but there is a slight sense of fatigue after working overtime.

state.今日运动: None, perform ankle ice application and rehabilitation stretching.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with a large temperature difference between morning and evening.

2025-10.daily_overview: Yin Hao sought medical treatment and was diagnosed with ankle tendinitis. A detailed recovery plan was formulated while simultaneously advancing career development and managing personal affairs.

events.name: Hospital Visits and Diagnosis
events.description: Requesting half-day leave for medical consultation. Diagnosed with mild tendinitis in the right ankle, with doctor's recommendation for strict rest for one week and ice application.

events.name: Develop a detailed recovery plan.
events.description: After returning home, create a daily rehabilitation plan that includes ice application times, stretching exercises, and rest requirements to demonstrate planning.

events.name: Query information on electrician training.
events.description: In the evening, I searched for electrician training courses, compared the syllabi and costs, and conducted preliminary screening for career development.

events.name: Negotiate the details of lease renewal with the landlord.
events.description: After work, I met with the landlord to negotiate a 5% rent increase. We reached a verbal agreement and scheduled to sign the contract over the weekend.

events.name: Guide new employees in program invocation and processing.
events.description: During work, the team leader Xiao Li retrieved the program, adjusted the parameters, and explained the status indicator lights of the machine tool.

events.name: Supervise the new employee's first independent operation.
events.description: Supervise Xiao Li in independently processing parts, promptly correct any errors, and review the process to emphasize standardization.

events.name: Provide recommendations for optimizing cutting parameters.
events.description: At the technical meeting, a suggestion to fine-tune the cutting parameters was proposed, which was adopted based on actual data, thereby improving efficiency.

events.name: Staying up late studying the basics of electrical engineering.
events.description: Driven by strong interest, I studied electrical engineering knowledge until 12:30 a.m., feeling slightly tired but fulfilled.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Decided to take action, carrying the tension of seeking medical treatment.

结束状态.所处地点: At home study, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Slightly reassured, there's a plan for the injury; professional learning brings excitement; a bit tired after staying up late.

date_attribute.weather: Clear and crisp autumn weather, perfect for outdoor activities.

2025-10.daily_overview: Enjoying the outdoors with a weekend camping trip, strengthening friendships, while also completing the registration for electrician training and receiving good news about performance.

events.name: Dining with friends while practicing healthy eating.
events.description: I had lunch with a good friend, opting for light dishes like steamed sea bass and limiting my intake of braised pork to balance socializing with health.

events.name: Procurement of Rehabilitation Assistive Tools
events.description: After the meal, purchase a fascia ball and foam roller to assist with ankle recovery.

2025-11.daily_overview: A fulfilling and well-organized weekend. Yin Hao engaged in a morning recovery run to heal from injuries, reflected and studied in the quiet of home, solemnly initiated a home-buying plan, and prepared for weekend activities through online social interactions. The weekend marked the temporary conclusion of systematic learning and a turning point for action.

events.name: Morning Run Recovery Training
events.description: According to the post-injury recovery plan, a low-intensity jog was conducted around the Guangfulin Cultural Site for 30 minutes, with a pace of approximately 6 minutes and 00 seconds per kilometer. Emphasis was placed on dynamic warm-ups and systematic stretching, with no pain felt in the ankle.

events.name: Review learning notes and draw a knowledge network.
events.description: Taking advantage of the quiet morning hours over the weekend, I spread out and reviewed my past online learning notes on industrial IoT and CNC machine tools. Using red and blue pens, I created a mind map to connect concepts and mark my level of understanding, establishing a knowledge index for future learning.

events.name: Determined to initiate a home purchase plan.
events.description: In the afternoon, I reviewed my savings and financial transactions from the past five years since arriving in Shanghai. I created a new Excel spreadsheet to input the data, used an online mortgage calculator to estimate monthly payments for properties in the surrounding areas of Shanghai under different down payment ratios, and entered the goal of officially launching my home purchase plan into my phone's memo app.

events.name: Familiar with online house-hunting tools.
events.description: After dinner, download the Beike Zhaofang and Lianjia apps, and immerse yourself in exploring the map mode to view housing price heat maps, filter by property age and area, and experience VR panoramic house tours to make your home-buying plan more concrete.

events.name: Preparing for the weekend camping activity
events.description: In the evening, in the 'Songjiang Three Brothers' WeChat group, we responded to the proposal for camping and barbecue at Dianshan Lake, tentatively scheduled for Saturday. Yin Hao took the initiative to be responsible for preparing lighting tools and emergency medicines.

events.name: Supplement: Payment for November rent
events.description: Transfer the monthly rent and property management fee to landlord Li Xiuying via WeChat. Sister Li confirms receipt and reminds to check window seals due to the cold weather.

events.name: Supplement: Evening Music Relaxation
events.description: Before going to bed, listen to the folk song playlist 'Midnight Study,' organize fishing gear, and let the mind unwind from information processing.

2025-11.daily_overview: A Sunday dedicated to personal hobbies. Yin Hao went alone to Dianshan Lake to test new fishing gear, enjoying ISTJ-style leisure: clear goals, meticulous execution, feedback on the experience, and an escape from the hustle and bustle of the city.

events.name: Practical Testing of the New Fishing Rod at Dianshan Lake
events.description: In the early morning, I drove to my old fishing spot at Dianshan Lake, assembled my newly purchased professional fishing rod and reel, practiced casting to feel its action, and switched to fine leaders and light lures for teasing winter crucian carp. Immersed in the feedback from my gear, although the catch was minimal, my confidence in handling the equipment greatly increased.

events.name: Simple Picnic at Noon
events.description: At noon, I had hot tea, bread, and braised beef on the fishing box for lunch, while observing other anglers enjoying their quiet and carefree moments.

events.name: Additional: Online exchange with fellow angler Brother Wu
events.description: Before packing up, take a photo of the new fishing rod and send it to Wu Zhiqiang to discuss the feel. Brother Wu shares nearby wild pond locations and arranges to go together.

events.name: Note: Try cross-training (swimming).
events.description: On the way home in the afternoon, I spontaneously decided to try swimming as cross-training at the community pool, alternating between freestyle and breaststroke for 200 meters, and my joints felt comfortable.

events.name: Supplementary: Organizing Equipment and Evening Games
events.description: In the evening, I wipe down the fishing rod and dry the fishing reel, putting everything back in its place; at night, I relax by playing "Honor of Kings" with my gaming friend Zhang Fei.
