2025-11.daily_overview: The work pace accelerated as urgent production tasks were assigned. Yin Hao took the initiative to work the night shift, transitioning from a day-shift operator to a key player on the night shift. This shift broke his recent routine and placed him in a state of heightened readiness.

events.name: Urgent Production Task Issued
events.description: In the morning, the workshop supervisor convened a meeting to announce an urgent order. Based on his experience serving night shifts, Yin Hao volunteered to take on the night shift task for the key machine tool, earning praise.

events.name: Preparation and Handover Before the Night Shift
events.description: In the afternoon, a mandatory two-hour nap is enforced. In the evening, arrive early at the workshop to meticulously review drawings, procedures, semi-finished product records, and equipment logs with Liu Zhiqiang, ensuring a rigorous handover to guarantee quality.

events.name: First Night Shift Activation and Monitoring
events.description: Start the machine tool at 8 PM, closely monitor its operating status, record the equipment as normal after continuously producing qualified parts, and focus on tackling the challenges.

events.name: Supplement: Handling Minor Equipment Malfunctions
events.description: During the night shift, an abnormal noise occurred in the machine tool. Yin Hao immediately stopped the machine for inspection, found that the tool was loose, quickly adjusted it, and restored operation, thereby avoiding a production interruption.

events.name: Addition: Brief phone call with family
events.description: Before catching up on sleep, I sent a message to my mother to inform her about my night shift schedule. She reminded me to have dinner and stay warm, and our brief exchange reflected our mutual understanding.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Feeling a bit pressured but prepared for the challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 666, Xinzhu Highway, Company Workshop, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Highly focused, calmly responding.

state.今日运动: Monitoring equipment for movement within the workshop, light physical labor.

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy, temperature 11-15°C, with a significant chill in the early morning.

2025-11.daily_overview: Maintaining life's anchor amidst reversed day-night cycles, adhering to morning runs showcases self-discipline, while night shifts demonstrate quality control capabilities, reflecting resilience under unconventional rhythms.

events.name: Sticking to morning runs after night shifts.
events.description: After finishing work at 8 a.m., I drove home. Despite feeling tired, I changed into my workout clothes and went for an 8-kilometer jog with my running partner, Chen Jie. Our pace was one minute slower than usual, but the sweat washed away the fatigue, helping me find my familiar rhythm.

events.name: Independent Night Shift and Quality Control
events.description: The second night shift operation went smoothly, with a scheduled random inspection process established. Components were randomly measured for dimensions and surface finish every hour, and the results were recorded on the inspection log. Team leader Wang Lei provided trust during his inspection rounds.

events.name: Supplementary: Received a package of local specialty products from my hometown.
events.description: Before my afternoon nap, I received a heartwarming surprise from my mother in Nantong—clams and braised pork seasoning. I plan to try cooking them this weekend.

events.name: Additional: Homemade Healthy Bento
events.description: Stir-frying green pepper with shredded pork and frying eggs to make a lunchbox before sleep, the homely taste warms up the late-night workshop during the night shift.

events.name: Supplement: Communication during work breaks
events.description: During the night shift in the early morning, I coordinated material flow with Wang Lei using a walkie-talkie to ensure smooth production line operations.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, bedroom in the home
起始状态.心情: Exhausted but forcing oneself to stay awake.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 666 Xinzhuang Road, Company Workshop, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Though tired, I feel grounded, for recognition brings contentment.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 10-17°C, large temperature difference between day and night.

2025-11.daily_overview: Maintaining balance in a multitasking environment, with work continuing through high-intensity night shifts, personal life interwoven with good news from friends, weekend activity preparations, and exploration of home-buying plans, demonstrates strong task management skills.

events.name: Make specific assignments for the weekend camping trip.
events.description: The 'Songjiang Trio' WeChat group initiated a sign-up chain: Gao Zhiyuan is in charge of meat, vegetables, and the barbecue grill; Ma Xiaofeng is responsible for tents and utensils; Yin Hao has claimed the procurement of tools, alcoholic beverages, drinks, and snacks.

events.name: I learned that my friend Zhao Lei has found a new job.
events.description: I was woken up by Zhao Lei's WeChat message during my afternoon nap, only to learn that he had found a job in cross-border e-commerce operations in Shenzhen. I immediately replied to congratulate and encourage him, and we agreed to have a detailed chat later.

events.name: Efficiently Complete Night Shift Quotas and Equipment Maintenance
events.description: Working the night shift to process high-precision core connectors, completed the quota half an hour ahead of schedule. Used the air gun to clean iron filings from the guide rails and replenished lubricating grease during intervals, reducing the risk of malfunctions.

events.name: Note: First-time browsing of the property app.
events.description: After a nap, I opened the Beike housing app, filtered for properties outside Shanghai's outer ring with a total price range of 2-3 million yuan, and briefly browsed listings in Jiading New City, Songjiang, and Sheshan to get a sense of floor plans and listing prices.

events.name: Addition: Attempt to try a new running route canceled due to rain.
events.description: Originally planned to try a new running route in the evening, but due to unexpected rain, I switched to doing stretching exercises at home to maintain my activity level.

events.name: Supplementary: Briefly sharing with mother
events.description: Before going to work, I sent a voice message to my mother sharing Zhao Lei’s good news and our weekend camping plans. My mother replied happily and reminded me to stay safe and keep warm.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Feeling drowsy from lack of sleep but uplifted by good news.

结束状态.所处地点: Company Workshop, No. 666, Xinzhuang Highway, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Enrichment, experiencing friendship and work achievements.

state.今日运动: 20 Minutes of Home Stretching, Nighttime Workshop Activities

2025-11.daily_overview: Last day of night shift, social and personal planning are active, organizing online celebrations for friends, completing night shift handover, persisting in training in the cold, transitioning from intense work to weekend leisure.

events.name: Organize classmates for an online celebration.
events.description: To celebrate for Zhao Lei, I proposed a video group chat for a cloud celebration in the technical secondary school classmates' group. We coordinated the time to be set at 9 p.m., and after work, I bought beer and peanuts to create the atmosphere.

events.name: Night Shift Wrap-up and Detailed Handover
events.description: After the final night shift processing, production records and quality data were organized. Suggestions were noted in the equipment logs. In the morning, each point of the night shift situation was explained to Liu Zhiqiang until everything was clear, reflecting the meticulousness of an ISTJ.

events.name: Morning run alone to fend off the cold.
events.description: After finishing work in the morning, I went to Songjiang Sports Center for a solo morning run of 8 kilometers. With a cap and gloves on in the north wind, I maintained my pace and completed the plan to enhance my sense of control.

events.name: Successfully held an online celebration
events.description: Video call with Zhao Lei and Chen Ming at 9 PM, raising beer cans for a toast, chatting about the cost of living in new jobs and embarrassing stories from student days, filled with intimacy and joy.

events.name: Note: Procuring supplies for camping.
events.description: Before taking an afternoon nap, I went to the supermarket to buy mineral water, Coca-Cola, beer, beef jerky, and chips. Additionally, I purchased practical items like disposable gloves and garbage bags.

events.name: Supplement: Inquire about the camping situation from fellow anglers.
events.description: WeChat inquired about Wu Zhiqiang's management of the camping lawn. Brother Wu replied that management is lax, suggesting to arrive early to secure a spot and take away trash. The information was forwarded to the group chat.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Tired but looking forward to the evening party.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, living room at home
结束状态.心情: Warm and joyful, friendship dispels the chill and weariness.

state.今日运动: Morning run 8 kilometers (slower pace due to headwind)

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with weakening winds and temperatures ranging from 8 to 16°C. The sun is bright, but the air is crisp and cool.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returning to the regular day shift, filled with a sense of ceremony and responsibility, I participated in a fire drill in the morning, completed the final touches on an urgent order in the afternoon, and had a serious discussion with my family about the major plan of purchasing a home in the evening, progressing from collective safety to the future of the family.

events.name: Participate in the company's fire evacuation drill
events.description: At 10 a.m., the fire alarm sounded. Yin Hao immediately stopped the machine tool, grabbed a wet towel to cover his mouth and nose, and bent down to evacuate along the evacuation signs in an orderly manner with Master Sun and Wang Lei to the assembly point. His emergency response skills, honed during his military service, naturally came into play.

events.name: The urgent production task has been successfully completed.
events.description: After the drill, the order entered the final stage of completion. The processed workpieces were coordinated with quality inspection for sampling checks, and the readings were qualified. They were packed and loaded with the team. The director praised the hard work and wished everyone a restful weekend.

events.name: Formally inform parents of the home purchase plan
events.description: In the evening, I had a video call with my parents, carefully explaining my plans to buy a house in the Shanghai area by sharing screenshots from a real estate app. My father asked about the loan and location, while my mother reminded me not to feel pressured and to examine everything carefully. The family came together in unity.

events.name: Final preparations before camping
events.description: After finishing the video, pack personal equipment such as sleeping bags, moisture-proof pads, and headlamps, organize tools, drinks, and snacks, and check the battery levels of the strong headlamps to ensure everything is in order.

events.name: Supplement: Due to relaxed dietary habits during gatherings.
events.description: After work, I gathered with colleagues for a hot pot meal, sharing amusing work stories. While indulging in high-calorie food, we enjoyed social relaxation and cherished moments of joy.

events.name: Supplement: Sharing safety insights with colleagues.
events.description: After the fire drill, I had a discussion with Master Sun and Wang Lei. Yin Hao mentioned the military's habit of emergency assembly, which deepened our understanding of safety.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relieved as the night shift ends and the weekend approaches.

结束状态.所处地点: In the living room of House 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Relieved yet expectant, having completed a major task.

state.今日运动: Fire drill: walk briskly, engage in light activities in the workshop.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, temperature 10-18°C, comfortable outdoor conditions.

2025-11.daily_overview: Unexpected Delight and Character Breakthrough: On Camping Day, the absence of the barbecue chef forced Yin Hao to temporarily transition from equipment supporter to team chef. With his hands-on skills and calm mindset, he successfully took on the role, earning praise and the title "Chef Yin," which enhanced his sense of social belonging.

events.name: First Scientific Recovery Run After Injury
events.description: In the early morning, a 15-minute dynamic warm-up is strictly followed according to the recovery plan on the greenway near home, followed by a 30-minute easy-paced jog focusing on joint sensations, and concluding with a 20-minute static stretching session, creating a strong sense of ritual.

events.name: Drive to the campsite
events.description: At ten in the morning, Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng drove to the shore of Dianshan Lake. They used the car radio intercom to communicate road conditions and share their anticipation. As the scenery shifted to the countryside, their mood broadened.

events.name: Emergency Situation: Barbecue Chef Absent
events.description: Upon arriving at the lawn to set up the tents, the designated chef was unable to attend due to family matters. Faced with skewers of meat, vegetables, and a charcoal grill, everyone exchanged glances, feeling disheartened.

events.name: Appointed in times of crisis, exploring the art of making fire.
events.description: Yin Hao stepped forward to give it a try, studying the electronic ignition of the oven structure, adjusting the ventilation of the charcoal blocks, and reigniting the fire. A few minutes later, the flames rose steadily.

events.name: Successfully transformed into 'Chef Yin'
events.description: After the fire is lit, arrange the skewers and observe the changes in color and oil. Turn them over at the right moment, brush with oil, and sprinkle with seasonings, focusing as intently as operating a machine tool. The first batch of lamb skewers emerges, filling the air with a mouthwatering aroma and earning cheers of delight.

events.name: Happy Camping Picnic and Account Ban
events.description: The Oven Becomes the Focus Yin Hao Busy and Popular, During the Gathering Gao Zhiyuan Proposes to Crown 'Chef Yin', Everyone Raises Their Glasses in Agreement Ma Xiaofeng Changes the Group Nickname, Yin Hao Feels Warm Inside.

events.name: Camping Ends with a Soothing Night Run
events.description: In the afternoon, I packed up the gear and trash for a leave-no-trace camping trip before returning. In the evening, I met up with Chen Jie for a relaxing 5-kilometer night run around the neighborhood to unwind, relieve stress, and share interesting stories.

起始状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Lighthearted and looking forward to camping.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Abnormally satisfied with pride, gaining a new sense of identity and value.

state.今日运动: Resume a 30-minute jog in the morning, enjoy a relaxing 5-kilometer night run in the evening, and engage in light activities such as setting up a tent throughout the day.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast, with brief light rain in the afternoon, temperature 9-15℃.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returning to Personal Rhythm Sunday, morning spent on technical exchanges with fishing buddies, afternoon handling home purchase study matters, evening relaxing with friends over dinner and singing, balancing deep hobbies, future planning, and immediate socializing—a typical weekend wrap-up.

events.name: Exchange fishing skills with fellow angler Brother Wu.
events.description: Invited Wu Zhiqiang to the wild pond in Songjiang, Yin Hao used new equipment while Wu Ge used traditional gear. Inquired about adjusting line setups and bait flavors for early winter, and Wu Ge shared his experience of fine-tuning the float. The exchange and learning were more rewarding than the catch itself.

events.name: Morning Jogging and Personal Reflection
events.description: Before fishing in the morning, I got up early for a 9-kilometer run at Guangfulin Archaeological Park. The air was crisp, and there were few visitors. During the run, I organized my thoughts on the key tasks for next week, focusing on new equipment training. Running has become a time for solitude and mental clarity.

events.name: Fishing ended early due to rain.
events.description: A brief afternoon drizzle prompted Yin Hao and Brother Wu to pack up their fishing rods early. They discussed strategies for fishing during the rainy season and agreed to meet again for another try on a sunny day.

events.name: Dining and singing KTV with friends to relax.
events.description: Dinner with Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng at a local cuisine restaurant in the evening. Yin Hao shared his experience of handling urgent orders during night shifts, and friends shared their troubles. After dinner, we went to KTV to sing old military songs and popular tunes, releasing stress.

events.name: Note: Preliminary compilation of home purchase information
events.description: In the afternoon, I went home and organized the property listings saved in the real estate app into a notebook, noting the area, total price, advantages, and disadvantages of each residential complex, thus creating a rough preliminary list of options.

events.name: Supplement: Review of Electrical Engineering Study Progress
events.description: Before going to bed, I looked at the computer and realized that I had become rusty on what I learned last time about AC circuits. I planned to resume my study plan for the electrician certification exam once the urgent tasks were completed.

起始状态.心情: Relax and enjoy the leisure of the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Pleasure after complete relaxation, satisfaction of social needs.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast day, north wind picks up again, temperature 7-12°C, chill is piercing.

2025-11.daily_overview: Returning to a regular routine marks the start of a new learning cycle, with work transitioning into preparations for new equipment. Personally, I have begun systematic studies for an electrician certification, while also addressing window sealing issues due to weather conditions. My focus has shifted from outdoor activities to handling indoor learning and tasks.

events.name: Begin systematic learning of electrical engineering fundamentals.
events.description: Sitting at the desk in the evening, I opened the online course "Fundamentals of Electrical Engineering." The first lecture covered the basic concepts of circuits, where I took notes on the definitions, units, and symbols of current, voltage, and resistance. I derived Ohm's Law and completed the calculation problems, feeling grounded in my studies.

events.name: Discovering window sealing issues
events.description: While reading at night, I felt a cold draft coming through the window and noticed unusual noises from the window frame. Upon inspection, I found that the sealing strip had aged, cracked, and fallen off. I decided to address the issue to improve comfort and reduce energy consumption.

events.name: Join the Home Buying Discussion Group
events.description: Through colleague recommendations, I searched and applied to join the 'Shanghai First-Time Homebuyer Mutual Assistance Group' and 'Songjiang Jiading Homebuying Discussion Group.' After joining, I changed my nickname to 'Songjiang-Yin-CNC,' introduced myself, and quietly observed discussions on policies, property listings, and negotiation experiences.

events.name: Receive new equipment technical documentation
events.description: In the morning, the technical department issued a new parameter manual and operation guide for the CNC machine tool. During the lunch break, Master Sun and I browsed through the complex parameter tables and the new control system interface. Master Sun pointed out that the intelligent compensation function improves precision, and Yin Hao noted down key sections for further study.

events.name: Addition: Try cross-training (cycling)
events.description: After work, I rode a shared bicycle along the greenway in Songjiang University City for an hour. The early winter evening was cold, but switching to this form of exercise brought different sensations to my leg muscles, kept my heart rate steady, and facilitated active recovery.

events.name: Additional: Discussing Winter Warmth with Running Partners
events.description: Before studying in the evening, I chatted with Chen Jie on WeChat about the drafty windows. Chen Jie shared his experience of layered dressing for winter running and recommended thermal athletic underwear, which is a common practice for exchanging practical information.

起始状态.心情: Calmly welcome the new week's routine work.

结束状态.所处地点: Study Room, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Enrichment initiates a new study plan, with ideas for solving window-related issues.

state.今日运动: One hour of greenway cycling after work.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, with weakening winds, temperature 6-13°C, abundant sunshine but low temperatures.

2025-11.daily_overview: The in-depth study plan advances, electricians learn safety knowledge, the home-buying plan shifts to financial calculations, running partners persist in morning runs in the cold, and execution is reflected in the specific steps of learning, health, and future planning.

events.name: Learn Safe Electricity Use and Low-Voltage Electrical Appliances
events.description: In the evening electrical course, we studied the safety regulations for electricity use, the steps for electric shock first aid, and the structural principles of circuit breakers, contactors, and relays. We carefully noted the meanings of wire colors and safety distances, as these are crucial for life safety and require full attention.

events.name: Preliminary Assessment of Home Purchase Loan Capacity
events.description: During the lunch break, I used a mortgage calculator mini-program for self-assessment. By inputting the down payment amount, selecting the loan term, and referencing the LPR for interest rates, I was able to determine the monthly payments for different total prices and down payment ratios, thereby clarifying the maximum housing price I can afford based on my financial capacity.

events.name: Morning Winter Run with Running Buddy Chen Jie
events.description: Meet up at Songjiang Sports Center at 6℃ in the early morning, wearing a fleece tracksuit and a thin down vest. Warm up longer and maintain a steady pace for an 8-kilometer run. The cold wind stings our faces, but we encourage each other to overcome the chill—feeling great.

events.name: Assess and plan for window repairs.
events.description: Before studying in the evening, I checked the window and searched online for a tutorial video on replacing the seal. It didn’t seem too difficult, so I messaged my roommate Chen Jie on WeChat, and we agreed to work on the repair together on Saturday afternoon to save on costs.

events.name: Additional: Online purchase of window sealing materials
events.description: After reaching an agreement with my roommate, I searched for D-shaped door and window sealing strips on Taobao. I compared the sales, reviews, and stores, and selected enough length of sealing strips according to the window profile size. I placed an order for cleaning agents and adhesive scraping tools, expecting them to arrive in two or three days.

events.name: Additional: Work pressure leads to emotional fluctuations.
events.description: During the day, I had a minor disagreement with a colleague due to the slow progress in preparing new equipment. After reflecting on it during my evening run, I decided to communicate more patiently. My traditional ISTJ personality prompted me to make this self-adjustment.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Determined to complete the morning run with a clear mind.

结束状态.所处地点: Study Room at Home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Steadfast, taking concrete steps in learning financial planning skills.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, with temperatures ranging from 5 to 11°C, continuing low temperatures.

2025-11.daily_overview: Learn to flexibly adjust before fatigue sets in; decisively cancel running plans when overly tired after work. Shift from rigid execution to listening to the body in health concepts. Pursue both depth and breadth in electrical engineering studies and home-buying research, with the addition of a strain incident.

events.name: Learning DC Circuit Analysis and Fundamentals of Three-Phase Electricity
events.description: In the evening electrical engineering class, we studied the analysis of series, parallel, and mixed DC circuits, solving multi-loop problems using Kirchhoff's laws, sketching circuit diagrams and formulas on draft paper. We then moved on to alternating current, covering three-phase power connections in star and delta configurations, the relationship between line voltage and phase voltage, and studied diligently the aspects related to the 380V power supply for machine tools.

events.name: Intermittent running training resulted in a minor strain of the right calf muscle.
events.description: In the afternoon, I attempted interval running training to enhance cardiovascular fitness, but due to insufficient warm-up, I experienced a minor strain in my right calf muscle, accompanied by localized soreness. I immediately rested and applied ice, with an expected recovery time of 3-5 days.

events.name: Training was voluntarily canceled due to a strain.
events.description: Feeling fatigued and dizzy after work, coupled with the impact of a muscle strain, I decisively canceled the evening training plan on my running app. I went home, brewed a cup of hot tea, listened to light music, and rested thoroughly. Taking the initiative to step back is a sign of progress.

events.name: Compile a list of home-buying questions and pay attention to the developer's reputation.
events.description: In the evening, I took out my notebook to list questions from the colleagues' chats in the home-buying group app, such as the process of combined loans and tax pitfalls. I also paid attention to the developer's reputation mentioned by group members, searched for their history of rights protection, and drew red lines for selection.

events.name: Supplementary: Attend the remote briefing on new equipment.
events.description: In the afternoon, I participated in a remote video conference organized by the Technical Department with Master Sun and Liu Zhiqiang, along with the new equipment supplier. The engineer discussed the core technological innovations, the timeline for on-site installation, and the preliminary preparations. Yin Hao took notes on key dates and technical terms.

events.name: Supplement: Purchase of window repair tools
events.description: During the lunch break, I went to the hardware store near the company to buy a utility knife, a rubber hammer, and a pressure roller to prepare for weekend repairs.

起始状态.心情: Calm

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, living room in the home
结束状态.心情: Relax without guilt, embrace your body's need for rest.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, temperature 4-12°C, with frost in the early morning.

2025-11.daily_overview: Enduring willpower in the persistent cold, braving the morning frost for a run, studying new equipment materials at work, and systematically organizing and reviewing fitness knowledge, home-buying processes, and electrical courses in the evening—focusing equally on execution, absorption, and internalization.

events.name: Morning Run of Willpower on a Frosty Dawn
events.description: The morning temperature was near freezing, with frost covering the grass. Yin Hao chose to run along Guangfulin Road, where pedestrians were sparse. His muscles felt stiff and it was difficult to start, but he adjusted his breathing, gradually picked up the pace, and focused on each step. After completing 8 kilometers, his hat and hair were damp, but a warm sense of accomplishment and renewed energy filled him.

events.name: Study the Operation Manual for New Equipment
events.description: Utilizing work breaks and after-hours time to study the thick operation manual, focusing on the programming interface differences from existing equipment, newly added intelligent machining cycles, and tool life management functions. Unclear points are marked with sticky notes for future inquiries.

events.name: Systematically organize fitness and home purchase notes.
events.description: Evening Knowledge Management: Transcribe scattered scientific training, warm-up stretches, nutrition recovery notes, article links from the phone into a 'Health Management' notebook to build a knowledge base; organize the processes and pitfalls learned from home-buying groups regarding viewing properties, signing contracts, obtaining loans, and taking possession into a 'Home Buying Pitfall Avoidance Guide' checklist, turning fragmented information into actionable references.

events.name: Review the electrical engineering course and ask questions.
events.description: Before going to bed, I reviewed the basic concepts of electrical engineering for this week, focusing on DC circuit analysis. I realized that I am still unclear about the distinction between potential and voltage, and I often make mistakes when calculating the equivalent resistance of complex series-parallel circuits. I have posted these questions in the online Q&A section, hoping for answers, as I do not want to leave any problems unresolved overnight.

events.name: Supplement: Received online purchased fishing accessories.
events.description: After work, I went home to collect the express delivery—a premium hook-specific leader line purchased to match my new fishing rod. I checked the craftsmanship, sorted it, and placed it into the compartments of my tackle box. The joy of having well-equipped gear is truly fulfilling.

events.name: Supplement: Check the express delivery of window sealing materials.
events.description: Check the logistics information: the door and window sealing strips have arrived at the Shanghai transit center and are expected to be delivered tomorrow. Confirm with roommate Chen Jie via WeChat regarding the repair plan for Saturday afternoon.

起始状态.心情: Clarity brings challenges, coldness fosters determination.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study Room, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and rewarding, organizing and consolidating knowledge to solve problems.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast turning to light rain, temperature 7-10°C, with a heightened sense of damp cold.

2025-11.daily_overview: Harvest and a sense of connection abound. The quarterly performance bonus has injected a strong boost into my savings for home purchase. Interactions with colleagues, fishing buddies, and gaming friends are frequent. Electrical engineering studies have entered the registration phase, with multifaceted progress in finance, social life, learning, and hobbies.

events.name: Received the third quarter performance bonus.
events.description: This morning, the mobile banking notification showed a deposit of a substantial third-quarter performance bonus in addition to the base salary, which is a recognition of the performance over the past few months, especially the urgent orders last month. I feel joyful and proud.

events.name: Plan bonus distribution and strengthen savings.
events.description: Lunch break planning for bonus allocation: 70% transferred to the home purchase savings account, 30% allocated to cover overspending on fishing gear and serve as flexible reserve funds. Watching the savings grow through mobile banking transfers brings a sense of satisfaction.

events.name: Discussing home-buying experiences with colleagues
events.description: During lunch, I sat at the same table with Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. When the topic of house hunting came up, Wang Lei shared his practical experience from buying a house in Songjiang last year, including dealing with agents, pitfalls in floor plans, and choosing banks for loans. Liu Zhiqiang offered insights and suggestions based on his experience with cross-city commuting. Their firsthand experiences were vivid and down-to-earth.

events.name: Contact fellow anglers to arrange weekend activities.
events.description: Before leaving work, message Wu Zhiqiang on WeChat: 'The weather this weekend is decent, how about going to our usual spot at Dianshan Lake? We can also check out the new fishing spots.' Brother Wu replies no problem, meeting at the usual time on Saturday morning to try out the new bait.

events.name: Coordinate the weekend online gaming session.
events.description: In the evening, a group chat of friends from the game "Honor of Kings" sent a message saying they would play together at the usual time tomorrow night. Zhang Fei, Wang Lei, and comrade Zhang Jianguo all responded. Zhang Fei suggested having a voice chat after the game to vent about life, maintaining their friendship through this regular online social ritual.

events.name: Additional: Registration for Electrician Certificate Examination
events.description: In the evening, while studying, I completed the registration for the Low Voltage Electrician Operation Certificate exam as notified by the training institution. I submitted personal information, academic certificates, photos, and paid the exam fee online. My studies have now entered the final sprint stage.

events.name: Supplement: Received the window sealing strip express delivery.
events.description: After getting off work and returning home, I received the D-shaped sealing strip for doors and windows. Upon unpacking, I checked that the materials and tools were complete and in good condition, then placed them in a conspicuous spot in the living room as a reminder for tomorrow's repair.

起始状态.心情: Steady

结束状态.所处地点: In the living room of House 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
结束状态.心情: Joy is filled with a sense of connection, as bonuses and colleagues' help in weekend arrangements make life feel rich and fulfilling.

date_attribute.weather: Partly cloudy, with temperatures ranging from 8 to 14°C. The weather is warming up, making it suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-11.daily_overview: Efficiently balanced weekend: enjoying outdoor time with fishing friends in the morning, collaborating with roommates on home renovation in the afternoon, and immersing in intense online gaming battles at night. Combining personal hobbies, practical skills, social interactions, and entertainment, the day concludes with planning the next phase of learning, reflecting the organized nature of an ISTJ personality.

events.name: Fishing at Dianshan Lake with Fishing Buddy Brother Wu
events.description: In the morning, I met up with Wu Zhiqiang at a secluded inlet of Dianshan Lake. Yin Hao used new equipment to cast his line, and the fishing conditions were good, catching crucian carp around half a catty in size. The new fishing rod provided clear signals and a steady, satisfying backbone. During breaks in fishing, Brother Wu used a simple circuit to demonstrate car electrical issues, making the learning process both educational and enjoyable.

events.name: Collaborate with roommates to repair the window.
events.description: In the afternoon, I went home and worked with my roommate Chen Jie to clean the old seals and wipe the grooves. We then cooperated to fit in the new D-shaped seals and used a rubber hammer and roller to secure them firmly. After two hours, we had replaced all the windows. We tested them by closing the windows, and the sound of wind and the feeling of drafts disappeared, making the room warm and quiet. We looked at each other and smiled at the fruits of our labor.

events.name: Gentle Stretching for Recovery from Strains
events.description: In the evening, perform 20 minutes of light stretching and foam roller massage at home, focusing on the strained area of the right calf to promote recovery and avoid secondary injuries. Exercising with caution reflects a health-conscious mindset.

events.name: Video consulting with my brother about the details of purchasing a house.
events.description: After dinner, I had a long video call with my elder brother Yin Tao in Suzhou. I sent him a list of home-buying questions and floor plans of the preferred area. My brother provided specific and practical suggestions point by point, such as loan repayment methods, contract addendums, and home inspection issues. Our brotherly bond was strengthened through this pragmatic exchange.

events.name: Exhilarating Online Gaming Gathering
events.description: Log in at 8 p.m. to team up with Zhang Fei, Wang Lei, and comrade Zhang Jianguo for a four-player match in "Honor of Kings," coordinating team fights through voice chat, cheering excitedly after turning the tables from a disadvantage; after the game, chat about amusing anecdotes in the WeChat group via voice until late at night.

events.name: Plan the next phase of electrical engineering studies.
events.description: After the online gathering, open the computer to review the progress of the electrician course over the past two weeks and develop a detailed plan for the next month: focus on mastering the motor control section of AC circuits, consolidate knowledge with practice questions, seek simple hands-on opportunities, and outline the plan in a schedule book for clear direction.

events.name: Supplement: In-depth Research on Home Purchase Areas (Huacao, Kunshan)
events.description: During the afternoon maintenance break, I focused on browsing real estate apps for properties in Huaqiao, Kunshan, paying special attention to developments near the extension of Shanghai Metro Line 11. I noted the average prices, apartment layouts, and commuting times to Songjiang, weighing the pros and cons of cross-province commuting.

2025-12.daily_overview: This is the first working day of December. Yin Hao woke up early and, as scheduled, went to the medical examination center on an empty stomach to complete a comprehensive annual health checkup, providing data to assess the progress of his health goals for the year. After work, he continued his end-of-month review habit and began a new study plan at his desk—mastering the foundational knowledge of electrical engineering required to obtain an advanced technician certificate. It was a fulfilling yet steady-paced day.

events.name: Annual Physical Examination
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao dressed lightly and drove his family car to a professional medical examination center near the Songjiang District Central Hospital on an empty stomach. Following his appointment schedule, he efficiently completed procedures such as blood drawing, abdominal ultrasound, electrocardiogram, chest X-ray, and internal and external medical examinations. During the cardiopulmonary function test, his regular running habit allowed his breathing and heart rate to recover quickly, earning praise from the doctor. The entire physical examination process lasted about two hours, and he felt in good physical condition.

events.name: Learn the basics of electrical engineering.
events.description: After returning home from work and having dinner, Yin Hao opened the online course on the vocational skills training platform in his study. He knew well that, as a CNC operator, mastering both mechanical and electrical knowledge was key to obtaining the senior technician certification and an inevitable direction for his career development. That evening, he focused on studying the fundamentals of electrical circuits, starting with basic concepts like current, voltage, and resistance, and carefully understanding Ohm's law. While listening to the lecture, he sketched circuit diagrams of series and parallel connections in his notebook and completed the post-lesson exercises. At the beginning of the study, he found some concepts abstract, but by relating them to the actual circuits of machine tools, he gradually found his way to understanding.

events.name: Slight headache discomfort
events.description: While studying in the evening, Yin Hao experienced a mild headache, likely due to the cooling weather and fasting for a medical check-up. He drank some warm water and felt better after a short rest, but his study efficiency was affected.

起始状态.心情: Calm and slightly expectant, but with a hint of discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet somewhat weary, determined to learn new knowledge.

state.今日运动: The cardiopulmonary function test included in the physical examination is equivalent to a moderate to low-intensity aerobic exercise.

2025-12.daily_overview: The focus of work shifted to the internal skill assessment within the company. Yin Hao completed the theoretical exam in the training room during the day, followed by practical assessments in the workshop in the afternoon. The entire process was intense yet orderly. Relying on his usual accumulation and meticulous attitude, he successfully completed the challenge, gaining greater confidence in his technical abilities.

events.name: Operate new equipment to complete the processing of practice pieces.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao conducted practical exercises using the newly installed advanced training machine tool. Following the drawings and machining procedures provided by the trainer, he independently completed the entire process, from workpiece clamping and tool setting to program invocation and machining initiation. Throughout the process, his movements were skillful, and he remained focused on observing the machining status. When a simple practice part meeting the dimensional requirements of the drawing was finally removed, a sense of accomplishment welled up in his heart, indicating that he had essentially mastered the preliminary operation of the new equipment.

events.name: Participate in the annual skills assessment theoretical examination
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took the theoretical exam for the annual skills assessment in the company's training room. The test covered various aspects, including the basics of CNC programming, principles of machine tool operation, materials science, and safety production regulations. Throughout the exam, he relied on the knowledge he had accumulated over the past year and his targeted pre-exam review, which made the process relatively smooth. For questions he was uncertain about, he used his practical experience to reason and make judgments, ultimately completing the test within the allotted time.

events.name: Temporarily work overtime to organize test data.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao had to work an extra hour to finish organizing the test data for the new equipment, which delayed his dinner.

起始状态.心情: Feeling slightly stressed due to an important skill assessment and overtime tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Relaxed and confident, but slightly fatigued.

2025-12.daily_overview: This is a day of transition. Yin Hao connected the concepts he learned in training with practical work, demonstrating his eagerness to learn. In the evening, he brought important life topics—such as home-buying plans and family care—to the forefront, engaging in in-depth communication with his family via video. The family support network continues to play a vital role on his journey of striving.

events.name: Ask the master for advice on industrial technology concepts.
events.description: During the lunch break, instead of resting as usual, Yin Hao took his notebook and went to find his mentor, Sun Jianguo. He brought up new concepts like 'sensor data' and 'predictive maintenance' that he had heard during the new equipment training. Combining these with the historical operation records of several key machine tools in the workshop, he asked Master Sun how these concepts were reflected and applied in practice. Master Sun praised his eagerness to learn and used several vivid troubleshooting cases to explain the concepts in a simple yet profound way, leaving Yin Hao feeling enlightened.

events.name: Video call with parents to discuss home purchase plans.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sat at his desk and connected with his parents in Nantong via a WeChat video call. He opened several property listings he had saved on his phone and shared with his father, Yin Jianguo, and mother, Wang Xiuying, the preliminary results of his online house-hunting around Shanghai's Songjiang district. He detailed the locations, apartment layouts, unit prices, as well as his budget and loan plan, which he had calculated based on his annual salary of 120,000 yuan and his current savings. His parents listened attentively, with his father focusing primarily on the structure and future development potential of the properties, while his mother was more concerned about the community environment and convenience of daily life. During the discussion, his parents expressed their willingness to provide as much financial support as possible, which gave Yin Hao great confidence and warmth.

events.name: Planning New Year's gifts
events.description: After the video call with his parents ended, Yin Hao began to think about what gifts to give them for the New Year. Considering that his father is a mechanical repair technician with a special fondness for tools, and his mother manages household chores, valuing practicality and warmth, he decided to purchase a set of high-quality, practical tools for his father, and prepare warm supplies along with some hometown-flavored food for his mother. He took out his phone’s memo app, set a reasonable budget range based on his annual salary of approximately 120,000 yuan, and preliminarily listed a few alternative brands and products. He plans to visit the mall over the weekend to make his selections in person.

events.name: Online Course Learning (Review of Electrical Engineering Fundamentals)
events.description: After finishing household chores, Yin Hao opened the online course again to review the chapter on circuit fundamentals from last night's study. He also dedicated time to practicing several complex series and parallel calculation problems to ensure a thorough understanding.

events.name: Mood swings due to work pressure.
events.description: During the day at work, Yin Hao encountered a technical issue that left him feeling slightly frustrated, but the situation eased after he sought advice from his mentor.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Peaceful, yet with work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Warm and full of motivation, the support from his family makes him feel grounded.

date_attribute.weather: Light rain, the weather is damp and cold.

2025-12.daily_overview: The training for the new equipment has entered the complex phase and fault simulation stage, with challenges escalating. Meanwhile, there have been new developments in health management and family planning matters—the health check report has been generated, and the selection of New Year gifts has begun with online research. Yin Hao maintains the characteristic orderliness of an ISTJ while juggling multiple tasks.

events.name: Attempt to run complex contour machining program
events.description: Under the guidance of the trainer, Yin Hao began to attempt running a machining program that included complex contours such as arcs and inclined surfaces. He focused intently on the toolpath simulation on the screen and, after confirming it was correct, initiated the machining process. During the operation, he focused on learning how to adjust the feed rate in real time based on the cutting sound and vibration to ensure machining quality, while continuously jotting down observed phenomena and arising questions in his notebook.

events.name: Simulated Alarm and Daily Inspection Practice
events.description: The trainer simulated several common fault scenarios, such as tool breakage alarms and abnormal coolant flow. Yin Hao checked the alarm codes on the touchscreen of the new equipment, then quickly flipped through the device manual beside him, attempting to conduct preliminary troubleshooting and reset operations based on the manual's instructions. Afterward, he also practiced the daily inspection process, including the lubrication and maintenance of various moving parts, performing each action meticulously.

events.name: Discussing the experience of operating new equipment with the master.
events.description: Taking advantage of the short afternoon break, Yin Hao once again sought out Master Sun to discuss his experiences operating the new equipment over the past few days. He compared the differences between the new equipment and the old machines currently in the workshop in terms of response speed of the operation interface, stability of machining accuracy, and other aspects, and raised the operational questions he had recorded one by one. Drawing on his years of experience, Master Sun provided many practical tips and precautions not found in textbooks.

events.name: Received notification of physical examination report generation
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao's phone vibrated with a notification from the health check-up center's official account, informing him that his electronic medical report had been generated and could be viewed in detail through the online platform. His heart stirred slightly, a mix of anticipation and nervousness, and he decided to carefully review it after returning home that night.

events.name: Learn Electrical Safety Operation Regulations
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued his online electrical course, with tonight's focus on safety operation standards. He carefully studied common knowledge of electrical safety, the correct usage of personal protective equipment (such as insulated gloves and safety goggles), as well as emergency response procedures for common accidents like electric shocks and electrical fires. Safety is no trivial matter, so he took notes while learning, committing the key steps to memory.

events.name: Search for New Year gifts online
events.description: During his study break, Yin Hao followed last night's plan and opened the JD.com and Taobao apps to search for "German imported screwdriver sets," "women's cashmere scarves," and "Shanghai time-honored pastry gift boxes." He carefully compared the reviews, prices, and user photos of different brands, adding several well-reviewed, cost-effective items to his shopping cart or favorites as references and price comparisons for his weekend offline shopping.

events.name: Temporarily change dinner plans.
events.description: Due to the inconvenience of going out in the rain, Yin Hao temporarily canceled his original takeout order and opted to cook noodles at home for a simple meal.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, ready to tackle training challenges.

结束状态.所处地点: Study at Home
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but mentally active, looking forward to the physical examination results and weekend shopping.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, windy, cold wave warning in effect.

2025-12.daily_overview: The new equipment training has reached its final assessment, and Yin Hao passed smoothly. After work, he checked his annual health examination report, which was generally good but included a small reminder, prompting him to immediately adjust his health plan. Meanwhile, his social life also brought invitations—a colleague's wedding invitation and adjustments to his training schedule with running partners to cope with the cold wave. A fulfilling and information-packed day.

events.name: Develop a practical training plan for electricians.
events.description: During a work break in the morning, Yin Hao followed the guidance of an online course and began searching for and contacting offline electrical training institutions in Songjiang District, Shanghai. Through phone calls and WeChat, he inquired about the start dates, training fees, exam schedules, and pass rates for several institutions' spring classes next year. With a preliminary plan in mind, he decided to discuss it with his mentor before making a final decision.

events.name: Final Assessment for New Equipment Operation
events.description: The afternoon was the final assessment session of the training. Under the trainer's supervision, Yin Hao independently completed the entire processing procedure for a designated part, from blueprint analysis and program confirmation to clamping, machining, and dimensional measurement. After the assessment, the trainer commended him for his standardization, efficiency, and problem-solving awareness throughout the process, while also pointing out a few details that could be further optimized. The trainer also addressed all the questions Yin Hao had compiled. Yin Hao felt that he had gained a great deal from this training.

events.name: Noticing an improvement in dust prevention at home.
events.description: Upon returning home from work and preparing for weekend cleaning, Yin Hao noticed that the dust on the desk and floor was significantly less than in previous years during the same period. He recalled the sealing strips he had installed on the windows and the new screens he had replaced before winter, realizing that these small modifications had effectively blocked outdoor dust. This brought him a sense of small satisfaction.

events.name: View Annual Physical Examination Report
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into the health checkup platform on his computer in the study, opening the electronic report with a hint of unease. He carefully read through each item: the cardiopulmonary function indicators showed "excellent," and both blood lipids and blood glucose were within the normal range, which eased his mind. However, the report also indicated a "tendency toward mild fatty liver" and recommended controlling alcohol consumption and increasing exercise variety. He took these suggestions seriously and made a note of them.

events.name: Informing Mother of Physical Examination Results
events.description: After reading the report, Yin Hao immediately contacted his mother, Wang Xiuying, via WeChat video. He first reassured her that the overall results were good, then proactively brought up the doctor’s advice about limiting alcohol consumption. On the other end of the video, his mother nodded repeatedly, reminding him to drink less, eat more vegetables, and pay attention to his routine while socializing outside.

events.name: Review and Practice of Electrical Engineering Courses
events.description: To consolidate the learning outcomes, Yin Hao reviewed the core chapters of circuit fundamentals studied over the past few days and once again tackled those complex circuit calculation problems until he fully grasped the problem-solving approach.

events.name: Adjusting Running Plans Due to Cold Wave
events.description: Considering the cold wave warning and significant temperature drop, Yin Hao contacted his running partner Chen Jie via WeChat. After discussing, they decided to move their originally scheduled weekend outdoor morning run to the indoor track at Songjiang Sports Center and agreed on a specific meeting time and pace goal.

events.name: Received a wedding invitation from a colleague and prepared a gift.
events.description: In the workshop that afternoon, team leader Wang Lei personally handed a beautifully crafted wedding invitation to Yin Hao, inviting him to attend his sister's wedding ceremony the following weekend. After work, Yin Hao stopped by a shopping mall on his way home, carefully selected a practical and aesthetically pleasing wedding gift (a set of brand-name dinnerware), and prepared a red envelope.

events.name: Company Annual Skills Assessment Practical Examination
events.description: Today, the workshop also conducted the practical assessment portion of the annual skills evaluation. Yin Hao independently completed the programming and machining of a complex workpiece on the designated CNC machine, strictly adhering to the drawing requirements and finishing within the allotted time. His operation was steady, and the finished workpiece fully met the precision standards upon inspection, bringing his annual evaluation to a successful conclusion.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calmness, welcoming the conclusion of training and the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Complex, encompassing both the joy of passing the training and receiving the invitation, as well as reflections on the health check-up reminders and new plans for well-being.

state.今日运动: No specialized sports, standing and operating within the workshop.

date_attribute.weather: Clear, but the temperature is very low, with a biting cold wind.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Saturday, Yin Hao shifted his pace of life from work to personal matters and socializing. He executed a plan that had been brewing for several days: selecting New Year gifts for his parents and trying indoor running for the first time during the cold wave. A dinner with friends also turned into an informal home-buying consultation session.

events.name: Adjust the health plan based on the medical examination report.
events.description: After getting up, Yin Hao looked at the medical examination report once again. He decided to take the hint of "a slight tendency toward fatty liver" seriously and planned to reduce the frequency and amount of alcohol consumption during gatherings with friends. At the same time, he realized that relying solely on aerobic running might not be enough. He planned to incorporate some core strength training into his upcoming morning runs to better improve his body fat condition.

events.name: Dining with friends and seeking advice on home-buying experience
events.description: At noon, Yin Hao arranged a gathering with his colleague Wang Lei and his running friend Chen Jie at a local Shanghainese restaurant. During the meal, as they chatted about their recent lives, Yin Hao naturally mentioned that he was currently looking at properties in Songjiang. He asked them, as locals or long-term residents, if they were familiar with the development of the area, the reputation of the housing projects, as well as firsthand experiences regarding the specific procedures, taxes, and fees involved in buying a home in Shanghai. Wang Lei and Chen Jie enthusiastically shared the information they knew and the "pitfalls" they had heard about, offering Yin Hao a lot of practical advice. During the gathering, Yin Hao drank a few more glasses of wine, feeling slightly indulgent.

events.name: First Indoor Morning Run
events.description: Although it was Saturday, Yin Hao still maintained his habit of morning running. Due to the extremely low outdoor temperature, he drove to the indoor track at Songjiang Sports Center as planned. Wearing his newly purchased professional thermal compression gear and running shoes, he completed a 5-kilometer jog on the standard 200-meter synthetic track. The constant temperature and wind-free indoor environment made his run comfortable, though he felt it lacked the fresh air of the outdoors. After finishing, he performed a thorough stretching routine.

events.name: Selecting a screwdriver set for my father.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove to Songjiang Wanda Plaza. He went straight to a large tool specialty store and, based on his previous online research, carefully examined several German-brand screwdriver sets. He repeatedly tested the grip, compared the materials and the completeness of the accessories, and finally selected a set that offered high cost-effectiveness, excellent craftsmanship, and was suitable for his father's daily repair needs. He then decisively made the purchase.

events.name: Selecting a scarf and pastries for mother.
events.description: After buying his father's gift, Yin Hao lingered in the women's clothing section of the mall. He tried and felt several cashmere scarves at different counters, eventually selecting one in a soft beige-gray shade with an exceptionally gentle and skin-friendly texture. Next, he found a counter for Shanghai's time-honored food brands and carefully chose a gift box containing a variety of classic treats, such as fresh meat mooncakes, butterfly pastries, and mung bean cakes. He imagined his mother's smile when she received these snacks, which blended flavors from Shanghai and their hometown.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Relaxed and happy, looking forward to a day of shopping and socializing.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and warm, but feeling slightly overindulged in food.

state.今日运动: Indoor running 5 kilometers, with a steady pace.

2025-12.daily_overview: This Sunday was filled with a contrast of unexpected events and heartwarming moments. In the morning, Yin Hao encountered his first tire emergency on the highway and successfully resolved it independently, putting his practical skills to the test. In the afternoon, he returned to a peaceful routine, completing an indoor training session with his running friends and packing gifts filled with filial devotion to send to his hometown.

events.name: Encountering a flat tire while driving.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao was driving to the suburbs. While traveling on the road outside Songjiang, he suddenly heard a rhythmic "clicking" sound coming from the right front of the vehicle and felt the steering wheel slightly pulling to the right. He immediately became alert, slowed down, and turned on the hazard lights. After confirming it was safe behind him, he smoothly pulled over to the emergency lane. Upon getting out to inspect, he discovered a sharp piece of metal debris lodged in the right front tire, which was slowly leaking air.

events.name: Safety Settings and Preparation for Tire Change
events.description: Yin Hao turned on the hazard lights, retrieved the warning triangle from the trunk, and placed it properly about 50 meters behind the car. He then took out the spare tire, jack, socket wrench, and other tools from the vehicle. After quickly recalling the tire-changing tutorial he had watched earlier and the key points mentioned by his friends, he took a deep breath and began the operation.

events.name: Jack up the vehicle and remove the tire.
events.description: He first used a socket wrench to loosen (but not completely remove) the five bolts of the leaking tire by turning them counterclockwise. Then, locating the designated support point on the vehicle's chassis, he securely placed the jack underneath it. Carefully, he cranked the handle to slowly lift the front right side of the vehicle until the leaking tire was completely off the ground.

events.name: Install the spare tire
events.description: After completely unscrewing all the bolts, Yin Hao struggled to remove the deflated tire and rolled it aside. Then he lifted the spare tire, aligned it with the wheel hub bolt holes, and with even greater effort, reinstalled it into place, manually tightening all the bolts initially.

events.name: Lowering the vehicle and tightening the bolts
events.description: He slowly operated the jack to lower the vehicle back to the ground. Then, using a socket wrench, he tightened the five bolts in a crisscross diagonal sequence, ensuring the spare tire was securely installed. The entire process took about 40 minutes and, while somewhat laborious, the steps were clear.

events.name: Pack up the tools and head to the repair shop.
events.description: Yin Hao put away all the tools, including the replaced tire, jack, wrench, and the triangular warning sign, back into the trunk. He checked the tire pressure of the spare tire and, after confirming it was correct, drove at a low speed (not exceeding 80 km/h) to the nearest auto repair shop he often visited. (He recalled that his fishing friend Wu Zhiqiang also ran a repair shop, but it was a bit farther away, so he chose the Tuhu Car Maintenance Workshop instead.)

events.name: Repair shop replaces new tires
events.description: Upon arriving at the repair shop, Yin Hao explained the situation to the mechanic. After inspecting the tire, the mechanic confirmed that the puncture caused by the metal shard was too large to be safely repaired and recommended replacing it with a new tire for better safety. Yin Hao agreed and opted for an economical tire of the same specifications as the original one to complete the replacement.

events.name: Share Tire Replacement Experience in Childhood Friends Group
events.description: After returning home from the repair shop, Yin Hao shared his experience of changing the tire by himself and several key step photos in the childhood friend group chat with Zhang Wei and Li Qiang. Zhang Wei, a professional automotive repair technician, quickly replied, affirming Yin Hao's operation process and reminding him of some follow-up precautions. Li Qiang also sent a thumbs-up emoji. Everyone's encouragement made Yin Hao feel a great sense of accomplishment.

events.name: Indoor Tempo Run with Running Buddies
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao met Chen Jie as scheduled on the indoor track of Songjiang Sports Center. The two engaged in a rhythm running session together, alternating between fast and slow paces. As they ran, they discussed how to better warm up and prevent sports injuries in cold weather. Chen Jie, being a fitness coach, also offered Yin Hao some specific suggestions on incorporating strength training.

events.name: Pack and send the gifts to parents.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao carefully packed the gifts for his parents at home. He wrapped the screwdriver set in bubble wrap, placed the cashmere scarf and pastry gift box neatly into the cardboard box, and filled the gaps with old newspapers for cushioning. He then placed an order through the courier app, filled in his parents' address in their hometown in Rudong County, Nantong, Jiangsu Province, opted for insurance coverage, and paid the shipping fee.

events.name: Inform parents that the gift has been sent.
events.description: After sending the express delivery, Yin Hao immediately contacted his parents via WeChat video. He told them that he had chosen New Year gifts for them, which had already been sent and would arrive in about two or three days. He described the contents of the gifts—his father’s eyes lit up upon hearing about the German tools, while his mother beamed with joy over the scarf and pastries. In the video, his parents were overjoyed and repeatedly reminded him to stay safe in Shanghai (just as they were discussing the tire change from earlier in the day) and to take good care of himself.

events.name: A little wine was consumed at the dinner gathering.
events.description: In the evening, I had a small gathering with friends. Yin Hao drank a little beer, but controlled the amount in response to the advice from the medical check-up.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Leisurely, planning the day's outing and training.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Filled with a sense of accomplishment and warmth, having experienced small adventures and completed the important transmission of family emotions.

state.今日运动: Indoor tempo run training for about 40 minutes, plus the physical exertion from changing tires in the morning.

date_attribute.weather: Overcast day with a slight rise in temperature.

2025-12.daily_overview: A new week begins, with the work focus shifting to the formal testing and acceptance of new equipment. Meanwhile, Yin Hao's electrical training has entered the hands-on simulation phase for tools and instruments. The tire-changing experience over the weekend sparked his interest in learning about car maintenance, and in the evening, he started searching for related tutorials online. Urgent orders at the company have led to increased overtime pressure.

events.name: Receive and conduct preliminary inspection of new equipment.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao and his colleague Liu Zhiqiang received a new CNC machine tool delivered by a supplier at the company workshop. Under the on-site guidance of the supplier's technical personnel, they assisted in unloading, positioning, performing preliminary level adjustments, and securing the equipment. Afterward, they connected the power supply to conduct basic functional tests, confirming that the equipment was in proper working condition with no damage after transportation.

events.name: Learn the Use of Electrical Tools and Instruments
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued his online electrical course, studying the proper usage, precautions, and maintenance knowledge of common tools (screwdrivers, pliers, wire strippers) and instruments (multimeters, voltage testers). Following the operation demonstration videos provided by the platform, he took out a simple multimeter he had previously purchased for amateur repairs and learned how to switch gears and read data along with the video.

events.name: Start searching for car maintenance knowledge.
events.description: Inspired by his experience of changing a tire by himself on Sunday, Yin Hao developed a stronger interest in car maintenance. He used his time before bed to search for keywords such as "DIY basic car maintenance" and "tutorials for beginners doing their own maintenance" on Bilibili and Zhihu. He selected several series of videos with high view counts and clear explanations, saved them to his personal collection, and planned to study them systematically later.

events.name: Urgent Order Overtime
events.description: Due to an urgent order received by the company, Yin Hao worked overtime for two hours in the evening to assist in testing new equipment, which resulted in a delayed dinner and fatigue.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Energy restored, but with slight work pressure.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling yet exhausting, feeling excited about exploring automotive knowledge.

state.今日运动: No specialized sports, mainly involving material handling within the workshop and assisting in equipment installation.

2025-12.daily_overview: On weekdays, Yin Hao independently conducted basic tests on the new equipment and meticulously recorded the data, demonstrating his rigorous work style. In terms of personal learning, he began delving into the first specific project of car maintenance—changing the engine oil—and started preparing for tomorrow's company technical lecture. In the evening, he spontaneously celebrated the skill assessment with colleagues.

events.name: Independently operate new equipment to conduct basic tests.
events.description: Today, Yin Hao independently operated the newly arrived CNC machine tool according to the standard testing procedures provided by the technical department, performing a series of basic machining tasks such as drilling and face milling. While operating, he used a decibel meter to measure the operating noise up close, observed whether the equipment exhibited any abnormal vibrations, and carefully measured the precision of the machined workpiece with a micrometer. All these key data were meticulously recorded in the test report form.

events.name: Learn the knowledge of changing engine oil and oil filter.
events.description: In the evening, while studying car maintenance knowledge, Yin Hao focused on watching a detailed video tutorial on how to change the engine oil and oil filter for a household car. He noted the criteria for selecting the oil type (such as API rating and viscosity), the standards for determining the replacement cycle, as well as the tools required for the actual operation (wrench, filter wrench, oil drain pan), specific steps, and safety precautions.

events.name: Prepare for tomorrow's new technology lecture.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao received a company email notification that there would be an internal technical lecture on "Processing Techniques for New Alloy Materials" tomorrow afternoon. He quickly used his phone to look up the basic characteristics and common processing challenges of new alloy materials in advance. He also prepared a notebook and two pens of different colors, intending to listen attentively and take thorough notes.

events.name: Having a casual drink with colleagues to celebrate.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao, Wang Lei, and Liu Zhiqiang made a spontaneous decision to have a small drink to celebrate their excellent skill assessment, consuming a moderate amount of alcohol while keeping it under control.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Focus, planning today's data testing tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Slightly looking forward to it, feeling rewarded by tomorrow's lecture and continuous learning.
