2025-12.daily_overview: This was an information-packed and highly rewarding day. Professionally, Yin Hao attended a high-quality technical lecture and received the exciting news of an excellent annual skill assessment, marking a dual affirmation of his career development. On personal matters, he proactively began optimizing his health management based on his medical examination report, advanced his home purchase plan to the organization stage, and received positive signals regarding his year-end bonus in financial matters.

events.name: Search for courses related to Industrial Internet of Things
events.description: During the morning break, Yin Hao developed a further interest in the concept of "Industrial Internet of Things" mentioned in the previous training. He searched for relevant introductory courses on platforms such as China University MOOC and Tencent Classroom, including "Fundamentals of Industrial Internet of Things" and "Introduction to Python Data Analysis." He bookmarked several highly-rated courses, planning to use them as potential learning materials to broaden his technical horizons next year.

events.name: Practice Multimeter Practical Operations
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao continued his hands-on electrical practice. He took out his multimeter, several batteries of different models, and a few old resistors, strictly following the procedures he had learned the previous night. He practiced measuring the DC voltage of the batteries and the resistance values of the resistors. He repeatedly switched the settings and practiced how to read the measurements accurately until his operations became smooth and fluent.

events.name: Compile a comparison table of home purchase information
events.description: He systematically compiled the information (including location, layout, unit price, total price, pros and cons, commute time, and surrounding planning) of several target properties collected through online research and weekend dinner consultations over the past few weeks into an Excel spreadsheet. He also added his preliminary analysis and unresolved questions, thoroughly preparing for this Saturday's on-site property viewing.

events.name: Learn knowledge about automotive brake system inspection.
events.description: Continuing with car maintenance learning, tonight's topic is the braking system. He learned how to visually inspect the remaining thickness of brake pads, determine whether the wear on brake discs is normal, and understand the replacement cycle and importance of brake fluid. He also focused on understanding the safety warning signals that require immediate repair.

events.name: Plan to send hometown specialties.
events.description: Considering that work might get busier towards the end of the year and his return home for the Spring Festival remains uncertain, Yin Hao decided to send some Shanghai specialties in advance to his uncle Chen Zhigang and several close relatives in his hometown of Nantong as a token of his affection. He began listing the items to purchase (such as Shanghai pastries, cured meats, etc.) and the delivery addresses of the elders on his phone.

events.name: Notification of Year-End Bonus Received
events.description: In the afternoon, the company officially released the annual performance and year-end bonus notice. Yin Hao logged into the internal system to check and confirmed that, due to his excellent annual skill evaluation, he had received a year-end bonus of approximately 20,000 yuan. Additionally, starting from January next year, his monthly salary would be increased by 8%. This news gave him greater confidence in his future savings plan for purchasing a home.

events.name: Consult fellow runners about increasing strength training.
events.description: Thinking of the suggestions from the medical report, Yin Hao contacted his running buddy and fitness coach Chen Jie via WeChat to seek advice on adding some core strength training alongside his morning runs. Chen Jie quickly replied, asking about his training background and the equipment available at home.

events.name: Attend the company's new technology lecture
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao attended the company's internal lecture on "Processing Techniques for New Alloy Materials" as scheduled. The externally hired senior engineer delivered an in-depth yet accessible presentation, covering material properties, processing challenges, and the latest cutting tool technologies. Yin Hao listened attentively throughout the session and took detailed notes on key points regarding the use of "damping vibration reduction" technology to address machining chatter marks. This reminded him of similar issues that occasionally arise in the workshop.

events.name: Discussing lecture insights with colleagues.
events.description: After the lecture, Yin Hao, his mentor Sun Jianguo, and colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang walked back to the workshop while discussing. They combined the issues they had encountered in their respective work, such as excessive vibration and substandard surface finish when processing high-hardness materials, to explore the feasibility of applying the new technologies mentioned in the lecture in practice. The discussion was lively and engaging.

events.name: Achieved an "Excellent" result in the annual skills assessment.
events.description: As the workday was nearing its end, the department supervisor called Yin Hao into the office for a brief conversation, formally informing him that he had received an "excellent" rating in this year's skills assessment. The supervisor acknowledged his technical performance and learning attitude over the past year, explaining that this result would directly impact his year-end bonus and serve as an important basis for applying for senior technician qualifications in the future. Hearing this, Yin Hao felt a surge of excitement inside, but outwardly, he remained composed, expressing gratitude for the company's recognition and his mentor's guidance.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Full of anticipation, due to the lecture and potential good news.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Excited and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the dual benefits of career development and financial stability have filled him with confidence for the future.

2025-12.daily_overview: The testing of new equipment at work has entered the pressure testing phase, and Yin Hao identified potential issues. On the personal learning front, he completed the summary of the first phase of his electrician studies and successfully scheduled a weekend house viewing. More importantly, he began putting his health plan into action and received a customized basic strength training program from his running partner.

events.name: Conduct complex working condition tests on new equipment.
events.description: Today, Yin Hao operated the new equipment under a more complex test program written by his colleague Liu Zhiqiang, conducting extreme parameter tests such as multi-axis linkage and high-speed cutting. He focused intently on monitoring the equipment's operating status and keenly observed that when the spindle ran continuously at high speeds, the temperature rose slightly faster than expected. Additionally, during a complex interface operation, there was a brief lag. He preliminarily recorded these two issues in the problem section of the test report.

events.name: Summary of the First Phase of Electrician Training
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a comprehensive review of the core chapters he had studied over the past two weeks, including circuit fundamentals, safety regulations, and the use of tools and instruments. He organized the knowledge framework, compiled scattered notes into more systematic documents, and felt that he had gained a clearer understanding of the introductory knowledge of electrical work. This prepared him well for the next stage of more specialized learning in circuit diagram interpretation.

events.name: Schedule an on-site property viewing for the weekend.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao called the sales offices of his two favorite properties in Songjiang New Town, based on the organized table, and successfully scheduled an on-site viewing for Saturday afternoon. The sales consultant briefly explained the viewing process and the required materials (ID card) over the phone, and sent the location details.

events.name: Learn to replace the air and air conditioning filter elements.
events.description: Continuing the study of car maintenance. Tonight, he learned how to locate and replace the engine air filter and cabin air filter on his own, understood the differences in filters for various car models and the recommended replacement intervals, and noted down the specific filter model for his own car in his notebook.

events.name: Received a customized strength training program from a running friend.
events.description: Based on Yin Hao's situation (a beginner, training at home, with the goal of improving core strength and aiding fat loss), Chen Jie designed a simple and practical core strength training plan for him. The plan includes several classic exercises such as the plank, crunches, and Russian twists. Chen Jie also sent detailed graphic instructions and instructional videos via WeChat. Yin Hao carefully studied and learned the content at home in the evening.

events.name: Organize technical lecture notes
events.description: Yin Hao systematically organized the notes from yesterday's lecture and categorized the company-issued electronic handouts for storage. He specifically highlighted technical points such as 'damping vibration reduction' with a highlighter, pondering whether these ideas could be applied if vibration issues arise in the workshop.

events.name: Share the joy with the master and seek advice on future plans.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao specifically invited his mentor Sun Jianguo to a small restaurant near the company for a meal. On one hand, it was to express gratitude for his mentor’s consistent guidance, and on the other hand, to share the joy of receiving an excellent rating. During the meal, he asked his mentor for advice on how to leverage this favorable condition to more effectively prepare the application materials and study plan for the senior technician certification. Master Sun offered him many insightful suggestions.

events.name: Mild cold symptoms
events.description: Yin Hao is experiencing slight nasal congestion, likely due to weather changes, but it has not affected his main activities.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Steady, with the tasks of testing and learning, feeling slightly uncomfortable.

结束状态.所处地点: Home Study
结束状态.心情: Steady and well-planned, having completed a summary of the learning phase, with specific progress made in both house viewing and training plans.

2025-12.daily_overview: On Friday, the work primarily involved simulating real production processes, with Yin Hao meticulously documenting the operational experience of the new equipment. In terms of learning, he passed the electrician’s stage test. Personal matters progressed comprehensively: he identified the first batch of housing viewing targets, advanced his car maintenance knowledge to tires, sent specialty products to relatives in his hometown, and prepared for tomorrow’s wedding. In the evening, he attempted core strength training for the first time.

events.name: Simulate real production process operations
events.description: Yin Hao used new equipment to process a complex part that closely met actual production requirements, simulating the entire workflow from receiving drawings and confirming programming to workpiece clamping, processing completion, and self-inspection. He focused on experiencing the smoothness of the human-machine interface, the convenience of the automatic tool-changing mechanism, and the feel of opening and closing the safety protection door. Additionally, he meticulously noted down in his notebook the details that felt inconvenient or could be optimized during the operation.

events.name: Complete the Electrical Phase Comprehensive Test
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao completed the comprehensive test questions for the two chapters, "Safety Regulations" and "Use of Tools and Instruments," in the electrician course online. He answered the questions carefully and achieved a good score. For the few questions he got wrong, he carefully analyzed the reasons and recorded them in his error notebook for focused review later on.

events.name: Determine the first batch of on-site house viewing targets.
events.description: Based on detailed online research and multiple consultations, Yin Hao ultimately selected two housing projects in Songjiang New Town from the table that best met his requirements (total price, layout, and commute) as the first batch of targets for on-site visits this Saturday. He planned the order of the property viewings in advance.

events.name: Learn tire inspection and maintenance knowledge
events.description: Learning about car maintenance has progressed to the tire section. He studied how to check the tire wear limit indicators, use a tread depth gauge for measurement, correctly use a tire pressure gauge to check and adjust tire pressure to the standard value, and gained an understanding of the basic differences and suitable scenarios between all-season tires and snow tires.

events.name: Organize car maintenance notes and collect tools.
events.description: Yin Hao compiled the key points of car maintenance knowledge he had learned over the past week into electronic notes. At the same time, based on what he had studied, he browsed and bookmarked a basic car maintenance tool kit on JD.com, which included commonly used wrenches, screwdrivers, filter wrenches, and oil drain pans. He plans to consider purchasing it once his knowledge is more solid.

events.name: Place an order to send Shanghai specialties to relatives in the hometown.
events.description: Yin Hao selected fresh meat mooncakes from a time-honored Shanghai brand, Shenda Cheng’s rice cakes, and some local brand cured sausages and meats on a fresh produce e-commerce platform on his phone. He filled in the addresses of his uncle Chen Zhigang and several other uncles in Nantong, completed the online payment, and added New Year’s greetings in the remarks.

events.name: Confirm wedding details and prepare attire.
events.description: Yin Hao reconfirmed the specific time, location, and process of his sister's wedding tomorrow with Wang Lei via WeChat. After returning home from work, he took out his most formal dark blue suit from the wardrobe, along with a matching white shirt and tie. Noticing some wrinkles on the shirt cuffs, he decided to take it to the dry cleaner at the entrance of his residential community early the next morning for a quick ironing.

events.name: First-time core strength training
events.description: In the evening, following the plan provided by Chen Jie, Yin Hao attempted his first core strength training session on the yoga mat in the living room, lasting about 20 minutes. He carefully followed the video demonstrations, completing exercises such as planks (30 seconds × 3 sets), crunches (15 reps × 3 sets), and Russian twists (20 reps × 3 sets). He distinctly felt the soreness and exertion in his abdominal muscles. Although it was somewhat tiring, he felt great after finishing.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Busy yet orderly, Fridays are always filled with anticipation for the weekend.

结束状态.所处地点: Living room at home
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and well-prepared, all plans have progressed to the execution stage.

state.今日运动: First Core Strength Training Session 20 Minutes

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning to clear, suitable for outdoor activities.

2025-12.daily_overview: Saturday's theme was exploration and family. In the morning, Yin Hao went alone to Zhejiang to explore new fishing spots, successfully testing the fishing skills he had recently honed. In the afternoon, he carried out an important life plan—visiting two desirable real estate developments in person and promptly sharing his observations and feelings with his parents. The dream of buying a home felt within reach.

events.name: Exploring Unfamiliar Wild Ponds in Jiaxing
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao drove alone for over an hour to an unfamiliar wild pond at the border between Shanghai and Jiaxing, Zhejiang. Faced with completely unknown water conditions and fish activity, he did not rush in. He first observed the water color and wind direction, walked halfway around the pond to select a suitable fishing spot, and then fine-tuned the bait's condition based on the water temperature. After patient waiting and several precise adjustments, he successfully caught several target crucian carp and a small mandarin fish. This exploratory fishing trip successfully unlocked a new fishing spot and boosted his confidence in the comprehensive wild fishing skills he had honed over the past two months.

events.name: On-site Property Viewing (Property A)
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao arrived punctually at the sales office of the first property development in Songjiang New City. The sales consultant warmly greeted him and took him on a tour of the model apartment, which was an 89-square-meter three-bedroom unit. Yin Hao paid close attention to the separation of active and quiet zones in the layout, the natural lighting and ventilation in each room, as well as the materials and brands used in the decoration. He also inquired in detail about the shared area, the actual usable space ratio, the specific down payment percentage, loan policies, interest rates, and the delivery date, which was his primary concern. As he listened, he quickly took notes on his phone's memo app.

events.name: Initial Impressions from House Viewing Comparison
events.description: After viewing the first property, while driving to the second one, Yin Hao quickly noted down the key data of the previous property in his phone memo, including its advantages and disadvantages, unit price, total price, as well as his intuitive impressions (such as the neighborhood environment and the quality of the model unit).

events.name: Video call with parents to share the house viewing experience.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao eagerly contacted his parents via WeChat video call. He recounted in detail his experience of viewing the apartment that afternoon, using his phone to show and explain the notes he had taken, as well as photos of the model unit and the surrounding environment. His parents listened attentively—his father offered insights from the perspectives of construction quality and space utilization, while his mother was more concerned about whether there were grocery markets and parks nearby. The conversation was exceptionally thorough.

events.name: Learn Car Battery and Light Inspection
events.description: Before going to bed, he continued studying car maintenance knowledge, learning about the basic maintenance methods for car batteries, how to assess battery health through observation holes or voltage readings, and how to check all external vehicle lights (headlights, high beams, turn signals, brake lights, fog lights) one by one to ensure they are functioning properly.

events.name: Confirm the delivery status of specialty products.
events.description: Yin Hao checked the logistics status of the specialty orders shipped to Nantong yesterday through the e-commerce platform. He confirmed that several packages had been packed and dispatched, and were currently in transit, with an estimated delivery time of tomorrow. He sent separate WeChat messages to his uncle and parents, reminding them to keep an eye out for the deliveries.

events.name: Outdoor Low-Temperature Adaptive Morning Run
events.description: There was no scheduled run today, so Yin Hao decided to go for a short outdoor morning run in low temperatures before his fishing trip. He put on a full set of warm gear and jogged for 3 kilometers around Guangfulin Road near his home. He strictly controlled the duration and intensity of the run, mainly to test how his body would react to the cold morning. He felt okay overall, but the cold air slightly irritated his throat while breathing.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Excited and full of curiosity, preparing for a day of outdoor activities and house viewing.

结束状态.所处地点: At home
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and thought-provoking, the excitement of a new fishing spot intertwines with the tangible reality brought by house hunting.

state.今日运动: Outdoor morning jog of 3 kilometers (low intensity), morning fishing exploration with prolonged standing and walking.

2025-12.daily_overview: Sunday was a day woven with emotions and reflections. In the morning, Yin Hao immersed himself in organizing and sharing his growth and thoughts on his fishing hobby. In the afternoon, he attended the warm wedding of his colleague’s younger sister, soaking in the atmosphere of starting a family and building a career. Returning home in the evening, he conducted a profound personal review of his annual achievements, looking toward the future with a sense of steadiness.

events.name: Write and share a long article about fishing experiences.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao spent over two hours systematically organizing his fishing notes from the past two months, along with photos of his catches and reflections stored on his phone. With a calm mind, he wrote a lengthy article titled "Winter Wild Fishing Fine-Tuning in Practice: From Gear Adaptation to Mindset Upgrade," detailing his journey from a novice to a gradually proficient angler. The article focused on sharing core techniques such as bait selection and fishing spot choices tailored to winter fishing conditions. After posting the article on his regular fishing forum, he quickly received numerous likes and in-depth responses from fellow anglers, which made him feel that his experience had been recognized.

events.name: Compile Personal Annual Achievement Materials
events.description: Before attending the wedding in the afternoon, Yin Hao began gathering key information for 2025 from various sources in his home study, including his phone photo album, notes, and banking app. This included screenshots of his advanced technician training transcripts, a photo of him crossing the finish line at his first half marathon, a group photo from camping in Anji, screenshots of records documenting the installation of safety facilities at his parents' hometown home, and screenshots from his banking app showing growth in his savings.

events.name: Review and Summarize Personal Annual Progress
events.description: Looking over the organized materials, Yin Hao began to review and record his progress in various aspects step by step: professionally advancing toward becoming a senior technician; health-wise, completing a half-marathon goal; fulfilling family responsibilities by doing practical things for his parents; financially, maintaining steady growth in savings; and personally, developing a camping hobby. He wrote down his overall assessment for 2025 in his notebook, feeling a strong sense of fulfillment and accomplishment welling up inside him, and made preliminary plans for the upcoming year of 2026.

events.name: On-site Property Viewing (Property B) and Comparison
events.description: After finishing the article in the morning, Yin Hao went to visit the second target property. The 95-square-meter unit in this development offered a better sense of space and a slightly higher usable area ratio. He specifically inquired with the salesperson about the expected completion times for the planned subway extension line, a large commercial complex, and a newly built school in the surrounding area. On the balcony of the showroom, he carefully observed the views from different orientations and assessed the natural lighting conditions during the afternoon. After the visit, he conducted a clearer side-by-side comparison of the advantages and disadvantages of the two properties in his mind.

events.name: Check the delivery status of specialty products logistics.
events.description: At noon, Yin Hao checked the logistics information again and confirmed that several packages of local specialties sent to his hometown in Nantong were marked as "delivered." He guessed that his uncles and other relatives should have already received this heartfelt gift from Shanghai.

events.name: Attending the wedding of a colleague's younger sister
events.description: In the afternoon, dressed in a freshly ironed suit, Yin Hao arrived punctually at a well-established hotel in Songjiang to attend the wedding of Wang Lei's sister. The ceremony was warm and romantic, blending Chinese and Western traditions. The moment when the newlyweds exchanged rings and vows left a deep impression on him.

events.name: Wedding banquet dinner
events.description: At the wedding banquet following the ceremony, Yin Hao was seated at a table with his company colleagues and some of Wang Lei’s relatives. The table was filled with a lavish spread of Shanghai-style cuisine. He chatted with Master Sun, Engineer Liu, and other colleagues at the table, and the conversation flowed smoothly from the wedding to topics like family and work. The atmosphere was warm and friendly. Yin Hao drank a little more than usual to celebrate the occasion.

events.name: A small gathering with colleagues after the wedding.
events.description: After the wedding banquet, Wang Lei, Master Sun, and a few other close colleagues were still in the mood to continue and suggested going to a quiet bar nearby for a while. Yin Hao also joined them. As they sipped their drinks, they chatted more freely, sharing their thoughts about the day's wedding and discussing their future plans and aspirations.

起始状态.所处地点: At home
起始状态.心情: Calm, ready for some personal reflection and social activities.

结束状态.所处地点: Bedroom at home
结束状态.心情: Warm, sentimental, and filled with a sense of accomplishment, the warmth of the wedding intertwines with the grounded feeling of personal reflection.

2025-12.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, Yin Hao wrapped up some tasks and embarked on new beginnings across multiple areas: he took the electrician theory exam, shared insights on improving daily life with his neighbors, and completed an online electrician course. He continued seeking advice on automotive knowledge from his fishing friends, reflected on the warmth of the weekend wedding, and began planning for his vehicle insurance renewal at the end of the year. Life is steadily moving forward, setting the stage for the year-end summary.

events.name: Participate in the low-voltage electrician theory examination.
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao took leave and went to the designated examination center to take the computer-based theoretical knowledge test for the low-voltage electrical work operation certificate. The exam covered topics such as safety regulations, electrical engineering expertise, and first aid for electric shock. Thanks to his systematic study and diligent review over the past few weeks, he found the answering process relatively smooth and felt confident about passing.

events.name: Share the window renovation results with neighbors.
events.description: On the way home from work in the afternoon, I ran into Aunt Chen, my neighbor, in the hallway. Yin Hao took the initiative to talk about the window sealing renovation he had done before winter, sharing how it had noticeably reduced dust in his home and improved insulation. Aunt Chen was very interested and asked in detail about the materials used for the renovation and the approximate cost, which Yin Hao explained one by one.

events.name: Complete the online electrician course and obtain a certificate.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao logged into the vocational skills training platform, completed all the online electrician courses, and participated in the final online test organized by the platform. He answered the questions carefully and ultimately passed successfully, with the system automatically generating an electronic certificate of course completion. He downloaded and saved it, marking the first tangible achievement on his path toward becoming a senior technician.

events.name: Seeking advice from fishing buddy Brother Wu regarding car maintenance questions.
events.description: He sent a few practical questions he had accumulated over the past week while learning about car maintenance (such as the differences between engine oils of different brands and common misconceptions about changing oil on one's own) via WeChat to Wu Zhiqiang (Brother Wu), who is both a fishing buddy and the owner of an auto repair shop. Brother Wu provided him with very practical and down-to-earth answers through voice messages.

events.name: Savor the wedding memories and share reflections with friends.
events.description: During his break, Yin Hao recalled the heartwarming scenes from yesterday's wedding and sent his blessings once again to Wang Lei via WeChat. At the same time, he also shared his experiences attending a local wedding in Shanghai in the WeChat group with his childhood friends Zhang Wei and Li Qiang, discussing some new feelings and thoughts he had about settling down and building a career in Shanghai in the future.

events.name: Check the vehicle insurance expiration status.
events.description: While organizing his documents in the evening, Yin Hao checked the vehicle registration certificate and the insurance policy from the previous year for his car. He confirmed that both the commercial insurance and compulsory traffic insurance would expire at the end of December. He began considering whether he needed to adjust his insurance plan based on his driving situation this year, including last week's flat tire incident. He also planned to use the upcoming weekend to compare prices on the official websites or apps of various insurance companies.

events.name: Core strength training
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao followed the plan and performed 20 minutes of core strength training, including planks and crunches, to maintain his health.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday, Army Day, Yin Hao not only followed his regular training routine but was also deeply moved by the significance of the day, leading him to reflect on profound memories. He started the day with a morning run, planned an important pre-competition training session with his mentor during work hours, and sent greetings to his comrades far away. During his quiet evening alone, he compared his military life with his current circumstances, completing an important moment of self-reflection.

events.name: Morning Run and Self-Reflection on Army Day
events.description: At six in the morning, Yin Hao followed his usual routine and went for a morning run around the Guangfulin Cultural Heritage Site. After finishing his training, he walked to a secluded bench in the park, sat down, and browsed through the cherished old photos from his military service stored on his phone, reminiscing about his enlistment in 2014. He compared his younger, obedient self in the barracks with his current state in Shanghai, where he independently plans his career and pursues health goals, realizing that discipline and resilience had become an integral part of his character. After his moment of reflection, he sent greetings for Army Day via WeChat to his comrades-in-arms, Zhang Jianguo in Hangzhou and Zhou Xiaofeng in Shenzhen, shared updates about his life, and received their blessings and playful teasing in return.

events.name: Discuss the training plan for the skills competition with the master.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao met with his mentor, Sun Jianguo, in the company's training workshop. Based on the technical documents for the upcoming municipal CNC skills competition, the two jointly discussed and formulated a three-week intensive pre-competition training plan. They clarified the daily training focus, simulation test arrangements, and areas that needed strengthening. Both mentor and apprentice held high hopes for this competition.

events.name: High-precision parts processing task
events.description: In his work position, Yin Hao independently took charge of and completed a complex part processing task with extremely high precision requirements. He strictly controlled the machine tool parameters and conducted repeated measurements to ensure that the finished product fully met the standards. The successful completion of this task gave him greater confidence in the technical demands of his new role.

events.name: Concerned about the recent situation of old classmates.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao remembered Zhao Lei, his secondary school classmate who had been unreachable for a while. He privately contacted another member of their "iron triangle," Chen Ming, to inform him about Zhao Lei's situation and ask if he had any information. The two agreed to maintain their concern for Zhao Lei without being overly intrusive, offering support in a relaxed manner.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Fulfilling and steadfast, with a clearer understanding of oneself.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday, a day off. Yin Hao's day revolved around his half-marathon preparation plan. He started with a high-intensity interval running session in the early morning, followed by an online review of July's training data with his running buddies. In the afternoon, as thunderstorms rolled in, he shifted to indoor activities, beginning a systematic study of sports nutrition to prepare for the upcoming peak training period.

events.name: High-Intensity Interval Running Training
events.description: To improve his cardiopulmonary function and speed endurance, Yin Hao arrived early at the track and field stadium in Songjiang University Town for high-intensity interval running training. The session included multiple sets of alternating 800-meter sprints and 400-meter jogs. Despite the muggy weather and muscle soreness after the workout, he strictly adhered to his training plan.

events.name: Conduct a July Training Review with Running Buddies
events.description: After the training session, Yin Hao compiled data such as the total running distance and average pace for July using a running app and conducted an online review with his running partner, Chen Jie. He summarized his progress, including improved endurance and completing a 15-kilometer long-distance run, while also reflecting on areas for improvement, such as injury management. This laid the groundwork for developing his August training plan.

events.name: Learn sports nutrition knowledge
events.description: In the afternoon, a sudden thunderstorm broke out, leading to the cancellation of outdoor activities. Yin Hao stayed in his home study and began reading the book "Fundamentals of Sports Nutrition" borrowed from the library. He focused on understanding the roles of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats before and after exercise, marking the first step in his systematic effort to improve the quality of his training.

events.name: Research on Energy Supplement Strategies for Long-Distance Running
events.description: Combining book knowledge with online searches, Yin Hao focused on researching energy replenishment strategies for long-distance running. He thoroughly read analyses of the ingredients and personal experience sharing related to different brands of energy gels and salt pills, and made preliminary notes on the key points of a replenishment plan suitable for his own digestive system and training intensity.

events.name: Programming Skills Enhancement Exercises
events.description: Taking advantage of his free time in the evening, Yin Hao reviewed CNC programming knowledge on his home computer. He practiced simulating programming for complex curved parts with multi-axis linkage, as required for the skills competition, optimized the machining paths, and prepared for the hands-on training next week.

起始状态.心情: Focus, get ready to embrace the training challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling a bit tired but with a full sense of achievement, I have gained a more scientific understanding of the training.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday, another day off. Yin Hao divided the day into two parts: in the morning, he continued practicing his skills, processing high-precision competition samples; in the afternoon, he relaxed completely, heading to a paid fishing pond with his colleague and friend Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang. They enjoyed leisure time away from work, strengthening the bonds of their small circle of friendship.

events.name: High-precision competition sample processing practice
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao arrived at the company's training workshop (having applied for entry on his day off) and independently operated a CNC machine to process a batch of competition samples with extremely tight tolerance requirements. He focused on fine-tuning the machine, adjusting tool compensation, and controlling cutting parameters, repeatedly measuring and recording data to enhance machining accuracy and stability.

events.name: Guide new colleagues in solving problems.
events.description: During a break in practice, a new operator in the same workshop encountered a technical issue while processing. Yin Hao proactively stepped forward to examine the situation. Drawing on his experience, he quickly analyzed the cause of the problem and guided the operator in adjusting the operational steps and parameters, successfully resolving the issue. The new colleague repeatedly expressed their gratitude.

events.name: Leisure fishing with colleagues
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao drove with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang to a well-maintained fee-based fishing pond in Songjiang District. In the relatively controlled environment, Yin Hao experimented with different fishing techniques and bait combinations. As they fished, they chatted about everything from work-related matters to amusing anecdotes from daily life, creating a relaxed and enjoyable atmosphere.

events.name: Develop a dietary framework for the training period.
events.description: After returning from fishing, Yin Hao combined the nutritional knowledge he had learned the previous day with the collected information to create a daily dietary framework for himself during the training period. This included the approximate proportions of carbohydrates and protein intake, as well as suggestions for post-training recovery supplements. He then organized the key points into a memo on his phone.

2025-08.daily_overview: This is a significant milestone in Yin Hao's career development. In the morning, he officially received the notification of his salary raise and promotion. In the afternoon, he efficiently handled the card replacement reminder and work reimbursement application. In the evening, he shared the good news with his family, receiving blessings and pride from afar. This series of events made him feel that his efforts had paid off.

events.name: Formally obtaining a promotion and salary increase
events.description: In the morning, department supervisor Sun Jianguo formally met with Yin Hao in the workshop office, informing him that due to his successful acquisition of the senior technician qualification certificate, the company had decided to promote his job level and increase his monthly base salary by 1,200 yuan starting this month. The supervisor elaborated on the details of the salary increase and expressed recognition of Yin Hao's professional capabilities.

events.name: Sign the salary adjustment document.
events.description: After the supervisor's conversation, Yin Hao went to the company's Human Resources Department. Under the guidance of an HR specialist, he carefully read and signed the official job promotion and salary adjustment confirmation documents, completing all the necessary procedures.

events.name: Received a reminder to replace the expired bank card.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao received a text message from his account-opening bank, reminding him that his commonly used salary savings card would expire this month and that he needed to apply for a card replacement as soon as possible. Realizing that this card was linked to his salary payments and multiple automatic deductions, making it highly important, he planned to take time off in the near future to handle the matter.

events.name: Submit skill training expense reimbursement
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao organized the payment invoice and certificate copies from his previous advanced technician training. Following the company's procedures, he submitted a reimbursement application for these expenses through the internal system.

events.name: Video call with family to share the joy.
events.description: Returning home in the evening, Yin Hao shared the good news of his salary raise and promotion with his parents, Yin Jianguo and Wang Xiuying, who live in Nantong, via a WeChat video call. His parents were immensely proud and happy for him. His mother reminded him to take care of his health, while his father encouraged him to continue delving into technology. The warm conversation lasted nearly an hour.

events.name: Once again showing concern for classmate Zhao Lei.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao thought of Zhao Lei and took the initiative to send him a WeChat message. It wasn’t to press him about the previous loan, but simply to ask how he was doing lately, whether his situation had improved, and if he needed any other help, continuing the support between friends.

2025-08.daily_overview: The first workday after the pay raise. Yin Hao's pragmatic side was fully on display: he used his break time to meticulously plan how to allocate the additional income. In the afternoon, he took time off to efficiently handle the replacement of his bank card. In the evening, instead of going out to celebrate, he chose to cook and have a meal at home with his roommate Chen Jie. Together, they discussed how to use the increased income to enhance their shared living experience, strengthening their bond in the process.

events.name: Plan for Income Allocation After a Salary Increase
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao carefully calculated his new monthly income on his phone and updated his budget sheet. He decided to allocate the additional 1,200 yuan per month as follows: 800 yuan would be deposited into the home purchase special fund, 200 yuan would be set aside as a sports nutrition and equipment fund, and the remaining 200 yuan would be used as flexible pocket money.

events.name: Requesting leave to go to the bank for a card replacement.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took half a day off for personal matters and drove to the Songjiang District branch of his account-opening bank, bringing his ID card and old bank card. At the smart counter machine, he smoothly completed procedures such as identity verification, old card retrieval, and new card application, opting to keep his original card number. The staff informed him that the production of the new card would take three working days.

events.name: Check and record the automatic deduction agreement.
events.description: While waiting at the bank, Yin Hao carefully checked all the automatic debit agreements associated with the old card (such as rent, utilities, and phone bills) through the mobile banking app and recorded them one by one in a memo, preparing to update each one after activating the new card.

Yin Hao took charge of cooking his signature Shanghai-style braised pork, while Chen Jie assisted. As they ate and chatted, Yin Hao shared details about his salary raise and savings plan. They discussed how to use the additional income to improve their shared living situation, such as purchasing small appliances to cope with the humid summer weather, and preliminarily discussed how to split the budget.

events.name: Missed exercise due to busy schedule.

In the afternoon and evening, he returned to his personal life: attempting to log his diet, having a warm video call with family, and updating his monthly financial statement. Balancing work and rest, knowing when to push and when to relax.

events.name: Skills Competition Simulation Contest
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao conducted his first complete simulated competition in the training workshop. He strictly adhered to the competition time limits and independently completed the entire process, from reading the drawings, programming, clamping, and machining to self-inspection. His mentor, Sun Jianguo, observed and recorded several detailed issues that emerged during his operation, which will be addressed for future improvement.

events.name: Try using a diet tracking app.
events.description: During lunch, Yin Hao used a newly downloaded app to record the food he ate and reviewed the preliminary nutritional analysis report provided by the app. He found this tool very helpful for managing his dietary structure.

events.name: Have regular video calls with parents.
events.description: At 8 p.m., Yin Hao had a video call with his parents in his hometown of Nantong as scheduled. He shared his life plans after the salary raise, the progress of his running routine, and his weekend arrangements. His parents were delighted. His mother, Wang Xiuying, as always, reminded him to stay cool and hydrated in the heat, while his father advised him to remain humble and diligent at work. The call was warm and pleasant.

events.name: Update Monthly Income and Expense Statement
events.description: After the video call, Yin Hao opened the Excel spreadsheet on his computer, entered the new salary income data for August, and updated his savings and spending budget based on the plan from a few days ago. Seeing the increase in his home purchase savings, he felt very reassured.

events.name: In-depth discussion with the master after the mock competition.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao proactively contacted his mentor, Sun Jianguo, to review the mistakes made during the simulation competition and received more specific suggestions for improvement.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Warm and fulfilling, feeling the support of family and the orderliness of life.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday was a fulfilling and productive day. In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a crucial 18-kilometer long-distance training session and tried energy replenishment during the run for the first time. In the morning, he collected the company's high-temperature benefits. In the afternoon, he executed his first targeted savings after receiving a salary increase, depositing 800 yuan into his home purchase account. In the evening, he enjoyed a peaceful lakeside time with his fishing friends.

events.name: Key Long-Distance Training for Half Marathon
events.description: At five in the morning, Yin Hao set off. He completed an 18-kilometer long-distance run along the planned route, focusing on simulating the physical sensations of the latter half of a half marathon. For the first time, he tried consuming energy gels and sports drinks during the run to test gastrointestinal adaptability and the effectiveness of replenishment, and the overall experience was positive.

events.name: Claim Summer High-Temperature Benefits
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao went to the company's logistics department with his colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang to collect this year's summer heat relief supplies, which included a case of salt soda, a towel, and a box of Huoxiang Zhengqi Shui. During the lunch break, the group opened the soda in the rest area, chatting as they drank.

events.name: First Targeted Savings After Salary Increase
events.description: In the afternoon at home, Yin Hao used his mobile banking app to transfer the planned 800 yuan from his salary card into a pre-established special savings account for home purchase, completing his first targeted savings after the salary increase. At the same time, he also set up a "Half Marathon Nutrition" label in his expense tracking software and allocated a budget of 200 yuan.

events.name: Fishing with fellow anglers at Dianshan Lake
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao and his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang made plans to go to Dianshan Lake. The two selected their fishing spots, chatting about work and life as they fished. In the end, they kept two of the larger fish, had them prepared at a nearby farmhouse restaurant, and enjoyed a meal together, savoring the last leisurely moments of the weekend.

events.name: Received the task of guiding new colleagues.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao received a notification from his team leader, Wang Lei, that the department had arranged for him to start mentoring a newly hired CNC machine operator next week. After learning about the basic situation of his new colleague, he began to think about how to organize the mentoring content.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China

2025-08.daily_overview: On Monday, Yin Hao proactively adjusted his training plan based on how his body felt, switching a running session to indoor strength training to prevent injuries. At work, he submitted a reimbursement for his training expenses. After work, he and his roommate Chen Jie discussed and finalized the model of a small household appliance online before placing the order, marking the implementation phase of their plan to improve the quality of their shared living space.

events.name: Proactively adjust training to prevent injuries.
events.description: During his morning run, Yin Hao felt some fatigue in his calves and worried about hitting a plateau or getting injured. Following the advice his running friend Chen Jie had given him earlier, he decisively changed one of his running sessions for the week to a core and lower-body strength training session at home. Using resistance bands and bodyweight exercises, he aimed to improve his running economy while allowing his muscles to recover.

events.name: Communicating Nutritional Knowledge with Running Buddies
events.description: After strength training, Yin Hao exchanged with Chen Jie on WeChat about the sports nutrition knowledge he had recently learned, consulting the fitness coach on his views about supplements such as protein powder. The two discussed how to apply the theory more practically to daily diets.

events.name: Confirm and place an order for household appliances with the roommate.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao and Chen Jie compared several models of air circulator fans and dehumidifiers on an e-commerce platform, taking into account performance, price, and reviews. After careful consideration, the two jointly decided on the model. Yin Hao handled the ordering and payment, while Chen Jie promptly transferred his share of the payment via WeChat.

events.name: Help roommates deal with minor illnesses.
events.description: Chen Jie had a slight cold, and after work, Yin Hao stopped by the pharmacy on his way to buy cold medicine, reminding him to rest more, which reflects the care between roommates.

起始状态.心情: Be cautious and pay attention to the body's feedback.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai

2025-08.daily_overview: Tuesday's workday was filled with challenges and new roles. Yin Hao, for the first time, took on the role of a "mentor," guiding new colleagues through their work. In the process, he not only reinforced his own skills but also encountered questions that required seeking advice from his senior colleagues. In the afternoon, he braved the rain to go to the bank to collect and activate his new bank card. In the evening, he prepared a follow-up learning plan for the new colleagues.

events.name: First-time guidance for newly hired colleagues
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao led the new colleagues into the workshop, starting with the most basic tasks such as turning equipment on and off, safety regulations, and daily inspections. He provided hands-on demonstrations and explanations on-site. Drawing from his own practical experiences, he shared useful tips for improving machining precision.

events.name: Answering questions for new colleagues and self-improvement.
events.description: Regarding a complex question about specific material processing parameters raised by a new colleague, Yin Hao himself was not entirely sure. During his lunch break, he took the question to consult his mentor, Sun Jianguo, and obtained an authoritative answer. This not only helped the new colleague but also expanded his own knowledge.

events.name: Go to the bank to activate the new bank card.
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao took leave again and went to the bank branch, where he successfully picked up his newly made bank card. He set up the password and activated the card on the spot, then began updating the card numbers linked to his automatic payment agreements for rent, utilities, and other bills, following his previous records step by step.

events.name: Develop a follow-up guidance plan and conduct a review.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao spent time organizing the content he had taught and the issues encountered during the day. Based on the learning progress of the new colleague, he developed a one-week on-the-job training plan. Reflecting on his communication methods during the guidance process, he felt that his own expression and knowledge framework had also been clarified and reinforced.

events.name: Start participating in short-term projects (Day 1)
events.description: The department initiated a three-day emergency small project, and Yin Hao was assigned to participate in data organization and preliminary analysis, requiring additional time commitment.

起始状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
起始状态.心情: Full of responsibility, with a hint of nervousness.

结束状态.所处地点: No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai, China
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but with a strong sense of accomplishment, having adapted to the new role.

2025-08.daily_overview: An interesting little episode occurred on Wednesday: Yin Hao unexpectedly discovered that the lottery ticket he casually bought last week had won him 200 yuan. This stroke of luck brightened his mood, and he generously treated his running friends to drinks. At the same time, the home appliances he purchased online arrived, and together with his roommate, they assembled and tested them, instantly enhancing the comfort of their shared apartment.

events.name: Winning a small lottery prize unexpectedly
events.description: On his way home from work, passing by a convenience store, Yin Hao noticed the lottery draw announcement at the entrance and remembered that he had bought a lottery ticket. He took out his wallet to check and was surprised to find that one of his tickets had won the fifth prize, with a reward of 200 yuan. He completed the redemption at the self-service terminal in the store, and the prize money was directly deposited into his WeChat balance.

events.name: Use the bonus to treat running friends to drinks and share the joy.
events.description: The unexpected windfall put Yin Hao in a good mood. He invited his running buddy Chen Jie, who lived nearby, to meet at the beverage shop near the entrance of their residential community. Using the 200 yuan, he treated Chen Jie and shared the amusing experience. The two of them enjoyed their drinks while chatting about training and life, feeling thoroughly relaxed.

events.name: Receive and assemble new household appliances
events.description: In the morning, the air circulator and dehumidifier ordered online were delivered. In the evening, after Chen Jie returned home, the two of them unpacked the boxes together, successfully assembled both machines according to the instructions, and connected them to power for testing to ensure they were functioning properly.

events.name: Debug new home appliances and experience the improvements.
events.description: After assembly, they discussed and determined the optimal placement based on the layout of the living room and bedroom. After running the air circulator and dehumidifier for a while, they noticeably felt better indoor air circulation and a reduction in stuffiness and humidity. Both were very satisfied with their purchase decision.

events.name: Continue short-term project (Day 2)
events.description: Yin Hao utilized work breaks to advance the project, completed the data cleaning portion, and collaborated with colleagues to resolve a technical challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: At home, No. 15, Lane 123, Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai

2025-08.daily_overview: On Thursday, Yin Hao conducted an important half-marathon simulation run, wearing the full set of equipment planned for the race. He completed 15 kilometers at his target pace, aiming to test his physical sensations and the adaptability of his gear. The training results were positive, boosting his confidence for the upcoming competition. The rest of his time was focused on routine daily tasks.

events.name: Half Marathon Target Pace Simulation Run
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao completed a 15-kilometer simulated run. He deliberately wore the running shoes, socks, and sportswear he plans to use for the race and carried a water bottle throughout the entire session. This training was strictly conducted at his target half-marathon pace, aiming to assess how his body felt at this speed, the adaptability of his gear, and his hydration rhythm. In the end, he finished smoothly and felt good.

events.name: Complete short-term project (Day 3)
events.description: Yin Hao completed the final report of the project and submitted it to the supervisor. Through this project, he enhanced his data analysis and teamwork skills.

events.name: Mood swings due to work pressure
events.description: In the afternoon, feeling some pressure due to the approaching project deadline, Yin Hao adjusted his mindset by taking deep breaths and going for a short walk.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Friday, Yin Hao began preparing for the weekend camping trip with his comrades. He checked the route and inspected the camping gear. At work, he applied the newly learned nutritional knowledge by intentionally increasing his carbohydrate intake after training. At the same time, he also started thinking about the upcoming expiration of his rental contract and planned to contact the landlord soon.

events.name: Preparing for the weekend camping with comrades.
events.description: Yin Hao confirmed the final plan for a weekend camping trip to Anji, Zhejiang with his comrades Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng in their "Iron Triangle" group chat. After work, he checked his equipment such as the tent, sleeping bag, and cooking utensils, and began preparing the personal items he needed to bring along with the shared food supplies list.

events.name: Post-training Nutritional Supplementation Practice
events.description: After a moderate-intensity running session that day, Yin Hao intentionally increased his portion of rice for dinner and consumed more lean meat and vegetables, putting into practice the knowledge he had learned about "timely replenishment of carbohydrates and protein after training." He felt that his body's recovery speed seemed to have accelerated.

events.name: Consider the renewal of the lease contract.
events.description: While reviewing the contract in the evening, Yin Hao noticed that the current lease would expire at the end of August. After a brief discussion with his roommate Chen Jie, he decided to take the lead and proactively contact the landlord Li Xiuying early next week to discuss the terms and price of the lease renewal, ensuring ample time for decision-making.

events.name: Evening Endurance Run Training
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a 10-kilometer endurance run along the Chenshan Tang River, focusing on pace control and long-distance adaptation as part of his peak training for the half marathon.
