2025-08.daily_overview: It was a Sunday filled with camaraderie and outdoor fun. Yin Hao reunited with his long-time comrades Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng in Anji, Zhejiang, for a two-day short camping trip. On the first day, they challenged themselves with a hike through the bamboo forest, enjoyed authentic local farmhouse cuisine, and extended their online friendship through games on a tranquil night, allowing both body and mind to fully relax and find joy.

events.name: Hiking in Anji Bamboo Sea
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao met up with his comrades Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng, and together they headed to the famous bamboo sea scenic area in Anji for a hike. They walked along the winding mountain trails, surrounded by lush bamboo groves, with the air fresh and moist. During a break along the way, the three took photos to commemorate the moment and naturally reminisced about the amusing stories from their physical training days in the military. They also exchanged insights on fitness routines and outdoor activity experiences since their discharge from service. Zhang Jianguo, who works as a fitness coach, shared some practical relaxation techniques for after hiking.

events.name: Farmhouse Dinner Chat
events.description: After the hike, it was already evening. The three of them found a well-reviewed authentic farmhouse restaurant near the scenic area to have dinner together. They ordered local specialties such as steamed free-range chicken and braised pork with dried bamboo shoots. As they ate and chatted, the conversation gradually shifted from reminiscing about military life to discussing their current career plans and future goals. Yin Hao mentioned his recent work situation after obtaining his senior technician certification and his plan to buy a house in the Shanghai area. Zhang Jianguo talked about his idea to expand the scale of his gym. Zhou Xiaofeng shared the challenges he faced as a cybersecurity engineer in Shenzhen and his plans for further technical studies. The atmosphere was relaxed and in-depth.

events.name: Camp Battles and Night Talks
events.description: After dinner, they returned to the campsite as night had completely fallen. The mountain night was exceptionally quiet and cool. The three of them sat outside their respective tents, enjoying the tranquility while playing *Honor of Kings* together on their phones. This was not only an offline continuation of their usual online friendship but also reminiscent of the times they had fun together during breaks in the military, cooperating seamlessly and laughing constantly. During breaks in the game, they gazed at the starry sky, occasionally sharing a few thoughts about life and the future.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside a tent at a campsite in Anji, Zhejiang.
起始状态.心情: Anticipating and Relaxed

结束状态.所处地点: Inside a tent at a campsite in Anji, Zhejiang
结束状态.心情: Satisfaction, joy, and the camaraderie of comrades are rekindled.

state.今日运动: Moderate intensity hiking for approximately 3 hours.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy, cool in the early morning, turning hot in the afternoon.

2025-08.daily_overview: The day after briefly reuniting with his comrades, the three of them packed their belongings and headed back home in the morning after enjoying one last peaceful fishing session. Yin Hao drove from Anji back to Songjiang, Shanghai, reminiscing about the moments from the gathering along the way. Upon arriving home, he took care of the follow-up matters regarding his bank card replacement and prepared for the crucial 30-kilometer long-distance training session the next day, shifting his life rhythm from a relaxed mode back to a disciplined state of preparation.

events.name: Fishing by the Stream in the Early Morning
events.description: Yin Hao and Zhang Jianguo (Zhou Xiaofeng chose to stay in the camp to read and rest) got up early and went fishing by a clear stream near the camp. The streamside was exceptionally tranquil in the morning, with only the sounds of birdsong and flowing water. Yin Hao shared the baiting techniques for stream fish that he had learned from his fishing friend Brother Wu in Shanghai. The two chatted while fishing, enjoying this rare moment of peace. In the end, they caught several small crucian carp and released them on the spot.

events.name: Packing up the campsite and saying goodbye.
events.description: After fishing, the three of them worked together to pack up the tent, clean up all the trash from the campsite, ensuring no trace was left, and loaded all their belongings into the car. They bid farewell to each other, agreeing to try organizing another camping or fishing trip in the winter. Afterward, Zhang Jianguo drove back to Hangzhou, Zhou Xiaofeng headed to the high-speed rail station to return to Shenzhen, while Yin Hao embarked on the journey back to Shanghai alone by car.

events.name: Driving back to Shanghai and reminiscing.
events.description: Yin Hao drove alone from Anji back to Songjiang District in Shanghai. During the nearly three-hour journey, he listened to his favorite music while reminiscing about the joyful moments of the short gathering. Using the car's Bluetooth, he shared photos of the scenery he captured along the way and his current mood via voice messages in the [Iron Triangle] WeChat group. Zhang Jianguo and Zhou Xiaofeng responded one after another, and their online conversation continued throughout the trip.

events.name: Handling the follow-up procedures for bank card replacement.
events.description: After returning home on Guangfulin Road in the evening, Yin Hao remembered the card replacement application he had submitted at the bank last Friday (August 15th). Following the checklist he had previously prepared, he first updated the bank card number linked to his automatic rent deduction agreement via the mobile banking app and informed his landlord, Sister Li, through WeChat. Next, he began checking the automatic deduction arrangements for utilities, mobile phone bills, and other regular expenses one by one.

events.name: Preparing for a 30-kilometer training run
events.description: After handling miscellaneous tasks, Yin Hao prepared for the most important 30-kilometer long-distance training run the next morning. He carefully checked the condition of his running shoes, sportswear, waist pack, and sports watch to ensure they were fully charged. Next, he prepared ample electrolyte sports drinks, energy gels, and salt tablets, and planned a detailed running route (starting from Songjiang University Town and circling the greenway around the Guangfulin Cultural Site). Finally, he set the alarm for 5:00 a.m. and prepared a simple breakfast (bananas and whole wheat bread) in advance.

起始状态.所处地点: Inside the tent at the Zhejiang Anji campsite
起始状态.心情: Calm, tinged with a hint of reluctance at the impending separation.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Slightly tired but fulfilled, my mind has already switched to training mode, feeling both nervous and excited about tomorrow's training session.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny, cool in the early morning with temperatures rising rapidly in the forenoon.

2025-08.daily_overview: This is a crucial day in the training plan. In the early morning, Yin Hao completed his final 30-kilometer long-distance run during the half-marathon preparation period, performing excellently and gaining a significant boost in confidence. In the afternoon, he handled the matter of renewing the lease with his landlord, successfully signing a new contract to ensure stable housing for the coming year. Having efficiently managed both personal and professional matters during the day, he focused on training data analysis and recovery in the evening.

events.name: 30-kilometer long-distance training run
events.description: Yin Hao woke up at 5:30 in the morning, had a simple breakfast, and hydrated. He set off from home at 6:00 sharp and arrived at the designated starting point near Songjiang University Town. After a thorough 15-minute dynamic warm-up, he began running at the planned pace (approximately 5 minutes and 40 seconds per kilometer). Along the way, passing through the university town and the greenways around the Guangfulin Cultural Site, he strictly followed the plan by replenishing with sports drinks and energy gels at the 10-kilometer and 20-kilometer marks. Throughout the entire process, he focused on his physical sensations and rhythm, ultimately completing the 30-kilometer distance. Although he felt noticeably fatigued in the final few kilometers, his pace remained stable and well-controlled throughout the run.

events.name: Post-Training Recovery and Replenishment
events.description: After completing the training march, Yin Hao performed about 20 minutes of static stretching and relaxation at the finish line. He walked home and bought milk and bananas at a convenience store along the way. Upon returning home, he first took a warm shower, then immediately replenished protein and carbohydrates (a glass of milk and a banana), and performed a simple leg massage to promote muscle recovery.

events.name: Schedule a follow-up meeting with the landlord
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao met with his landlord, Li Xiuying, at a café near the residential community to discuss the lease renewal. Ms. Li brought the new rental contract for the upcoming year, which included a slight increase in rent. After carefully reviewing the terms, Yin Hao, satisfied with both the apartment and the landlord, politely expressed his understanding of the market conditions. The two parties quickly reached an agreement.

events.name: Sign a new lease contract
events.description: During the meeting at the café, after confirming that the contract terms were accurate, Yin Hao and Li Xiuying each signed the new one-year lease agreement. Yin Hao took photos of the key pages of the contract for his records and saved an electronic copy. He felt reassured about the stability of his living situation.

events.name: Analyze training data
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao synchronized the 30-kilometer running data recorded by his sports watch to the mobile app. He carefully analyzed the distance, average pace, heart rate zones, and changes in cadence, comparing them with his previous long-distance training data. The data showed that his pace was more stable during this training session, and his heart rate was better controlled. This convinced him that he had reached his training peak, with sufficient physical reserves to complete a half marathon. It provided solid justification for the upcoming two-week pre-race tapering period.

events.name: Share the joy with running buddies.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao shared his joy and a screenshot of key data from completing the 30-kilometer training run with his running buddy and roommate, Chen Jie, via WeChat. As a fitness coach, Chen Jie affirmed Yin Hao's performance and reminded him to strictly follow the tapering plan for the upcoming week, emphasizing the importance of sleep and nutrition to allow the body to fully recover and achieve supercompensation. The two exchanged their physical sensations and recovery techniques after long-distance training.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Focused, serious, with the determination to complete the challenge.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted yet filled with a sense of accomplishment and confidence, I am more determined about my half-marathon goal, while also feeling reassured by the successful renewal of my lease.

2025-08.daily_overview: On a weekday, the training entered an adjustment period. After handling work emails in the morning, Yin Hao had a valuable career development conversation with his mentor, Sun Jianguo, during the lunch break, gaining guidance on transitioning from technical operations to higher-level development. In the afternoon, he tried participating in a mindfulness meditation activity organized by the company's labor union but found himself not quite suited to this static relaxation method. In the evening, he gathered with colleagues to exchange work insights. An unexpected overtime event was added, leading to a late night.

events.name: Prepare to communicate with the master.
events.description: During a break in the morning, Yin Hao sat at his workstation, reflecting on his recent work performance and future career plans. He briefly sorted through his feelings after obtaining the senior technician qualification, the new challenges he currently faces at work (such as mentoring newcomers), and some vague ideas about participating in technical projects. He prepared a few specific questions for his discussion with his mentor, Sun Jianguo, during the lunch break.

events.name: Professional Development Exchange with the Master
events.description: During the lunch break, Master Sun Jianguo specifically invited Yin Hao to sit down with him in a quiet corner of the employee rest area. Master Sun first congratulated Yin Hao on recently passing the senior technician assessment and receiving a salary increase. Then, drawing from his own experience, he shared his journey of growing from an ordinary operator to a senior technician, even participating in technical improvement projects within the factory. He particularly emphasized the importance of not only delving into technology but also learning to communicate effectively with colleagues from different roles, such as programming and quality inspection. He encouraged Yin Hao to proactively pay attention to and try participating in small technical projects in the future. Yin Hao listened attentively and sought advice from his master on how to balance daily operations with technological innovation learning, as well as how to improve cross-departmental collaboration skills.

events.name: Participate in a mindfulness meditation experience
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao participated in a mindfulness meditation experience activity organized by the company's labor union. Under the guidance of a professional instructor, everyone tried to sit quietly with their eyes closed, observing their breath and bodily sensations. However, this highly static and inwardly focused approach made Yin Hao, who was accustomed to action and solving specific problems, feel extremely uncomfortable. He lost focus several times during the session, thinking about his conversation with his mentor in the morning, his weekend fishing plans, and even a specific parameter setting for a machine tool.

events.name: Record the Gains from Communication
events.description: After the lunch break conversation, Yin Hao returned to his workstation. Before starting his afternoon work, he took a moment to jot down a few key points shared by Master Sun in his phone’s memo: [1. Technical proficiency is fundamental, but a broader perspective is essential; 2. Take the initiative to communicate and understand the needs of both upstream and downstream processes; 3. Look for opportunities to participate in small projects to gain experience.] He felt that his future career path had become a little clearer.

events.name: Temporarily handle urgent tasks at work
events.description: Before leaving work, Yin Hao received a notification that he needed to work overtime to adjust the parameters of a CNC machine to resolve a minor production issue. He quickly collaborated with his colleagues and spent over an hour completing the debugging, ensuring the production line operated smoothly, but this caused his departure time to be delayed.

events.name: Dinner and conversation with colleagues
events.description: After work, Yin Hao went to a small restaurant near the company with his close colleagues Wang Lei and Liu Zhiqiang for dinner. During the meal, he briefly shared the insights he gained from his conversation with Master Sun earlier in the day and discussed the possibility of collaborating on small technical improvement projects for their team in the future. The conversation was relaxed yet practical.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: The body is slightly sore but the spirit is good, with clear expectations for the arrangements of the workday.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Feeling fulfilled and inspired in career development, but slightly fatigued due to overtime work, confirming that meditation is not a suitable relaxation method for me.

date_attribute.weather: Sunny with occasional clouds, with thundershowers in the evening.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Wednesday, Yin Hao officially entered the tapering week before the race. In the early morning, he went for a run with a shortened distance but maintained his pace. During the day, he worked as usual, and after work, he focused on handling a series of binding operations for his new bank card and completed the first month's rent payment after renewing the lease. His life management was orderly, laying the foundation for the upcoming race and a stable life in the future.

events.name: Pre-race taper run
events.description: Yin Hao began implementing a reduced training plan. In the early morning, he shortened his daily running distance from the previous 10 kilometers to 5 kilometers, but deliberately maintained a pace close to his race goal (approximately 5 minutes and 20 seconds per kilometer). After the run, he felt physically relaxed, without the heaviness that had followed the long-distance training sessions in previous days. After training, he spent 20 minutes at home using a foam roller for relaxation and performing systematic dynamic stretches, focusing on loosening his thigh and calf muscles.

events.name: Update Salary Card and Payment Binding
events.description: After returning home from work, Yin Hao focused on handling matters related to his bank card. First, he updated the new card number as the company’s salary payment account through the mobile banking app and contacted his finance colleague to confirm. Next, he logged into Alipay and WeChat Pay one by one, replacing the payment binding card with the new one. Finally, he checked all the bound automatic deduction items (such as water, electricity, gas, phone bills, and internet fees) to ensure that the deduction accounts had been successfully updated, avoiding any payment failures due to the card change.

events.name: Pay the first month's rent for lease renewal
events.description: After confirming that all functions of the new card were working properly, Yin Hao used his mobile banking app to transfer the first month's rent for the renewed lease, as stipulated in the new contract, to the account of his landlord, Li Xiuying. The original security deposit was automatically carried over to the new lease term. Once the payment was completed, he sent a message via WeChat to inform Sister Li.

events.name: Complete the card replacement process.
events.description: After confirming all financial operations were accurate, Yin Hao transferred the remaining few dozen yuan balance from his old card to the new one. Following the bank’s security guidelines, he then used scissors to cut up the magnetic stripe and chip of the old card and threw it into the trash bin, marking the complete resolution of the card replacement process.

events.name: Notify relatives and friends of stable residence.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sent messages in the family WeChat group and a few small friend groups, informing his parents and friends that he had successfully renewed his lease for another year and that his living situation in Shanghai was stable, putting his family at ease. His mother, Wang Xiuying, quickly replied, reminding him to take good care of himself even while living alone.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, focused on executing reduction plans and to-do tasks.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A sense of relief washed over me as both financial and residential matters were settled, making life feel well-organized.

date_attribute.weather: Cloudy turning overcast, the weather remains sultry.

2025-08.daily_overview: On a Thursday workday, part of Yin Hao's mind had already drifted toward his weekend relaxation plans. To celebrate his recent salary increase at work and relieve stress for the upcoming half marathon, he took the initiative to organize a Friday night KTV gathering, successfully inviting several friends through a WeChat group. The workday proceeded as usual, but it was now tinged with anticipation for the weekend entertainment. However, a sudden visit from a new friend altered his dinner plans.

events.name: Initiate a KTV gathering invitation
events.description: During the morning break, Yin Hao decided to organize a KTV gathering. He first mentioned it to his roommate Chen Jie over breakfast, and Chen Jie immediately said he was available. Afterward, Yin Hao contacted his colleague Wang Lei, as well as his local friends Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng through WeChat groups. He wrote in the [Songjiang Trio] group chat: [Are you free on Friday night? I just got a raise, and I’m about to run a half marathon, so I’d like to invite everyone to sing KTV and relax!] He quickly received enthusiastic responses from everyone.

events.name: Book a KTV private room
events.description: During a work break in the afternoon, Yin Hao used a mobile app to book a medium-sized private room at a KTV near Songjiang University Town, a place they often visited for its good value. The booking was for Friday night from 19:00 to 23:00. He also checked the store’s packages in advance and selected one that included beer, a fruit platter, and snacks. After successfully making the reservation, he took a screenshot of the confirmation and sent it to their small group chat for the gathering.

events.name: A friend suddenly came to visit.
events.description: After work, Yin Hao originally planned to go home for a simple meal, but his childhood friend Zhang Wei, who had come to Shanghai on a business trip from Nantong, contacted him unexpectedly. Yin Hao changed his plans and met up with Zhang Wei near the company for a casual dinner. They chatted about recent updates and games, after which Yin Hao accompanied Zhang Wei to his hotel.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Steady, with a bit of enthusiasm for planning social activities.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Joyful and expectant, pleasantly surprised by a friend's visit, and even happier at the thought of gathering with friends tomorrow evening.

state.今日运动: Core Strength Training 30 Minutes (Completed at Home)

date_attribute.weather: Overcast, with light rain in the afternoon, the weather has cooled down a bit.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday was a day that combined routine tasks with light experiences. During the day at work, Yin Hao received a new bank card mailed to his home and completed its activation. After work, he participated in a mindfulness meditation activity organized by the company's labor union but once again confirmed that it wasn’t suitable for him. In the evening, he returned home to make simple preparations for the weekend gathering and upcoming training. An additional event of chatting with a neighbor occurred by chance.

events.name: Received and activated a new bank card.
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao returned to his home on Guangfulin Road and received a new debit card mailed by the bank. He carefully checked the envelope and card information to ensure everything was correct. Following the instructions included with the card, he entered details such as the card number and ID number into the mobile banking app, completed the activation process for the new card, and set a more complex transaction password.

events.name: Experience Mindfulness Meditation Again
events.description: On Friday afternoon, Yin Hao, with the mindset of "since I signed up, I might as well give it a try," once again attended the mindfulness meditation session in the company's activity room. Guided by the instructor, he attempted to relax, but his thoughts kept drifting to the evening gathering and the unread training nutrition article. After the session, he left with his colleague Wang Lei, both of them laughing and saying, "Sweating it out with a run is still more stress-relieving."

events.name: Confirm Automatic Deduction
events.description: After work, Yin Hao logged into his mobile banking app and did a final check of all the automatic payment services he had set up. He confirmed that the payment accounts for his rent and various living expenses had been successfully updated to his new card number, finally putting his mind at ease.

events.name: Pre-match Maintenance Training
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao conducted a training session at the Songjiang Sports Center, primarily aimed at maintaining his form. The session included 15 minutes of core strength training (such as planks and crunches) and four sets of 200-meter short-distance sprints to stimulate muscle nerves and preserve a sense of explosiveness. The training volume was not heavy, but it was carried out with great focus.

events.name: Chatting with a neighbor by chance
events.description: On his way home, Yin Hao ran into his neighbor, Aunt Chen at the entrance of the residential area. Aunt Chen greeted him warmly and shared the braised pork she had just made, inviting Yin Hao to try it. After a brief chat, Yin Hao accepted the dish with gratitude, feeling the warmth of the neighborhood bond.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, the Friday atmosphere brings joy.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The relief of having bank card matters settled, along with a clear understanding that the meditation activity [was just an experience to have], makes me look forward even more to the upcoming weekend gathering.

2025-08.daily_overview: Saturday is a day dedicated to relaxation and gathering. During the day, Yin Hao stayed at home organizing his summer fishing records and learning more about sports nutrition, creating a preliminary meal plan for himself. In the evening, he met up with friends as planned at a KTV for a night of singing and fun. They relieved stress through songs and games, celebrated recent achievements, and strengthened their friendships in the joy of the moment.

events.name: Organize Summer Fishing Records
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao took out his fishing logbook at home and began organizing the records of his fishing trips throughout the summer. He compared and analyzed the catch data from different fishing spots (such as Dianshan Lake and Qingpu's wild ponds), under varying weather conditions and with different fishing techniques, using a red pen to highlight the combinations that yielded good results. Based on the summarized experiences, he cleaned and maintained some of his fishing gear, and specifically purchased several types of fish hooks and floats on Taobao to replenish his supplies.

events.name: Learn and plan sports nutrition
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao searched and watched several popular science videos on Bilibili, which were released by sports nutritionists and focused on pre- and post-race nutritional supplementation for endurance athletes. He took out his notebook and, combining the content from the videos with the advice from his running friend Chen Jie, made a preliminary plan for his three meals and snacks on training and non-training days. He specifically noted the approximate amounts of protein and carbohydrates to be consumed within the [30-minute golden replenishment window after training].

events.name: KTV Night of Joyful Gathering
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao set out with his roommate Chen Jie and met up with colleagues Wang Lei and friends Gao Zhiyuan and Ma Xiaofeng at the entrance of the booked KTV. After the five of them entered the private room, the atmosphere quickly became lively. Yin Hao took the initiative to sing a few of his signature military songs and classic oldies, and even performed a duet with Chen Jie on a popular track. Everyone took turns singing, playing dice, and drinking, with laughter and songs filling the air. Yin Hao was completely immersed in the joy of friendship, and the pressures of work and training were temporarily left far behind.

events.name: End of the Gathering and Returning Home
events.description: After nearly four hours of singing, the party was coming to an end. Everyone split the bill evenly, said their goodbyes at the entrance of the KTV, and expressed gratitude for the company that evening. Yin Hao and Chen Jie, who were heading in the same direction, shared a taxi back to their homes on Guangfulin Road.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Lazy, comfortable, enjoying a weekend morning.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Exhilarating and thoroughly relaxing and joyful, with social needs greatly satisfied.

2025-08.daily_overview: Sunday is a day for pre-race adjustments and reflection. Yin Hao slept in a little and spent the morning doing light stretching exercises at home. He used a running app to analyze his training data from August in detail, assessing his progress and recovery from fatigue. In the evening, he went for a very short, easy run, mainly to get his body moving, test his newly purchased running shoes, and receive guidance on his running form from a fellow runner. Additionally, he began studying materials to prepare for the low-voltage electrician certification exam.

events.name: Analyze monthly training data
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao opened his running app at home and carefully reviewed and analyzed the training data panel for the entire month of August. He examined the total running volume (which reached a record high of 220 kilometers), the steady improvement in average pace, changes in resting heart rate, and the recovery speed after several long-distance training sessions. The data clearly indicated his physical progress while also highlighting that fatigue levels peaked after the 30-kilometer training session, and he is currently in the recovery phase. This reinforced his determination to implement the pre-race tapering plan.

events.name: Share interesting stories from the gathering
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao shared some amusing anecdotes and photos/short video clips from last night's KTV gathering in WeChat groups like [Songjiang Trio]. Everyone reminisced about the joyful moments online and agreed to plan a barbecue outing in the suburbs next time. Yin Hao felt both physically and mentally relaxed.

events.name: Adaptive Jogging and Running Posture Analysis
events.description: In the cool evening, Yin Hao put on a pair of newly bought running shoes (purchased with part of his bonus) and the outfit he planned to wear for the competition. He went for an extremely relaxed and slow run of about 3 kilometers around the Guangfulin Cultural Site. The main purpose was to break in the new shoes, test the comfort and sweat-wicking effect of the outfit, and feel the lightness of his body after a few days of reduced training. After the run, he sent a video of his running form, recorded on his phone, to his running friend Chen Jie.

events.name: Accept professional guidance from fellow runners.
events.description: In the evening, after watching the video, Chen Jie called Yin Hao via WeChat voice message. He affirmed the overall stability of Yin Hao's running posture but also pointed out details such as the need for slightly larger arm swings and a gentler landing. He once again emphasized the importance of "watching your diet and keeping your legs moving (lightly)" during the final week before the race, ensuring a full eight hours of sleep each night. Yin Hao took note of each point.

events.name: Begin studying the preparation materials for the low-voltage electrician certification.
events.description: Before going to bed, Yin Hao remembered that he needed to resume preparing for the electrician certificate exam after the September competition. He downloaded some electronic materials, skimmed through the exam outline, and formulated a preliminary study plan, reflecting early engagement with his new goal.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Relaxed, with a hint of the weekend's end laziness.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Calm and focused, through data analysis and guidance from fellow runners, I have a clearer understanding of race preparation and have developed an interest in new learning goals.

2025-08.daily_overview: At the start of the new week, training entered its final preparation phase. In his spare time, Yin Hao went to a sports store and supermarket to purchase energy gels, salt tablets, and sports drinks needed for race day. After work, he completed a final 5-kilometer adaptive jog to further test his gear and maintain his physical readiness. The sense of the approaching event grew stronger. He also began participating in a cross-day workshop technical discussion project.

events.name: Procure competition supplies
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao drove to a large sports goods chain store in Songjiang New City. Based on his previous experience from long-distance training, he selected energy gels (4 packs) and salt tablets (a box) that suited his preferred brand and taste. Afterward, he went to a nearby supermarket and bought several bottles of the sports drink he usually drinks.

events.name: Organize competition equipment
events.description: After returning home in the evening, Yin Hao laid out all the equipment needed for the race on the bed and organized them: new running shoes, a running vest and shorts, sports socks, a visor, a waist pack (for carrying a phone and energy gels), and a sports watch. He checked each item for any damage or discomfort, confirmed that everything was in place, and pinned the bib number (which he had received in advance) onto his race attire.

events.name: Final adaptive run before the race.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao once again put on his full set of competition gear and went for an approximately 5-kilometer adaptive jog around the neighborhood. This time, he simulated the race day routine, including warm-up, starting, and taking small sips of water along the way. After finishing the run, he felt that the new shoes had completely broken in, and the clothing was comfortable, which gave him a greater sense of reassurance.

events.name: Participate in the initiation of workshop technical discussions.
events.description: During the daytime work hours, Yin Hao was invited to participate in a three-day workshop technical improvement discussion project aimed at optimizing the maintenance process of CNC machine tools. He proactively offered suggestions and had preliminary discussions with his mentor Sun Jianguo and colleague Wang Lei.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Methodical and focused on executing the pre-game checklist.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: A sense of readiness and calmness, looking forward to the competition day, and feeling excited about participating in technical projects.

2025-08.daily_overview: On Tuesday, the training volume was further reduced, focusing primarily on deep recovery. After completing a short-distance pace run, Yin Hao spent a considerable amount of time relaxing his muscles with a foam roller and a fascia gun. Meanwhile, he finished an online micro-course on sports nutrition and, based on suggestions from fellow runners, formulated a detailed plan for the final week before the race (including diet, rest, and activities). Everything entered a mode of meticulous control. Technical discussions in the workshop continued.

events.name: Pace Running and Deep Relaxation
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a 4-kilometer pace run, strictly simulating his target race pace (5 minutes and 30 seconds per kilometer). After the training, he spent twice as much time as usual (approximately 40 minutes) performing full-body foam rolling and deep massage with a fascia gun on his thighs and calves. He also took a hot shower to maximize muscle recovery and alleviate minor tension.

events.name: Learn Sports Nutrition Micro-Course
events.description: During a work break in the morning, Yin Hao completed a free micro-course on the [Nutritional Strategies for the General Fitness Population] via a mobile app. He systematically studied the roles of carbohydrates, proteins, and fats before and after exercise, as well as the principles of hydration. He took brief notes, particularly focusing on the key points of [carb-loading] before competitions and nutritional intake during events.

events.name: Develop the plan for the final week before the competition.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao synthesized his physical assessment, equipment test results, knowledge from nutrition courses, and advice from his running partner Chen Jie. He then created a detailed plan for the final five days before the race (from August 27th to September 1st, the race day) in his phone's memo app. The plan specified daily recommendations for three meals (focusing on light, high-carbohydrate foods), sleep schedules (early to bed, early to rise), activity arrangements (limited to walking and very light stretching), and key points for mental adjustment (avoiding anxiety and trusting the training).

events.name: Progress of Technical Discussions in the Workshop
events.description: During working hours, Yin Hao actively participated in technical discussions, put forward maintenance suggestions based on his operational experience, and engaged in in-depth exchanges with team members, thereby consolidating his professional skills.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Calm, feeling physically well.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: The sense of control and peace of mind brought by meticulous planning reduces anxiety about the unknown competition, and technical discussions bring a sense of achievement.

2025-08.daily_overview: In the middle of the final week before the race, Yin Hao almost completely stopped all active training. During the day, he worked as usual, and in the evenings, he used his free time to meticulously plan every detail of the race day itinerary, including transportation, bag storage, warm-up, starting procedures, and other aspects. He also prepared his race kit, reflecting the strong planning skills and rigorous attitude toward important events characteristic of his ISTJ personality. He completed the workshop technical discussion project.

events.name: Plan the detailed itinerary for match day.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao sat at his desk, using paper and pen along with his phone's map to meticulously plan every step for race day. He identified the best driving route and alternative routes from home to the starting point of the race (Shanghai Oriental Sports Center), calculated the departure time, and determined the parking location. Next, he outlined the schedule for race day: waking up, having breakfast, setting off, checking in bags, warming up, entering the assembly area, and starting the run. Each step was allocated ample time.

events.name: Prepare the competition kit
events.description: According to the itinerary, Yin Hao began preparing his race kit. He packed his running clothes, shoes, socks, cap, and waist pack into a backpack. Then, he placed his ID card, bib number, energy gels, salt tablets, sports drinks, a disposable raincoat, a small amount of cash, a power bank, and other miscellaneous items into a tote bag. Finally, he attached the checklist to his backpack to ensure everything was in order.

events.name: Extremely Light Activity
events.description: After getting off work in the evening, Yin Hao only took a 20-minute walk in the residential area and did some very gentle stretching. The main purpose was to maintain a sense of flexibility in the body and avoid the stiffness caused by prolonged sitting.

events.name: Summary of Technical Discussion in the Workshop
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao completed the technical discussion project. The team adopted some of his suggestions, which made him feel a sense of professional growth, and he documented the experience for future reference.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Slightly uncomfortable with a bit of idleness (because there's no training), but trying to stay calm.

end状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
end状态.心情: Feeling reassured due to the detailed plan, with full attention focused on the weekend competition, and a sense of satisfaction from completing the technical project.

2025-08.daily_overview: It was a double celebration on a workday. Yin Hao received his third-quarter performance bonus of 5,000 yuan and promptly made a practical allocation—most of it was deposited into his home purchase account, while a small portion was set aside for hobbies and social activities. Meanwhile, pre-race preparations entered the final inspection phase. He double-checked his equipment and exchanged updates on his condition with his running partners. The financial inflow and the approaching event left him feeling both grounded and excited. He also noted the onset of mild cold symptoms but remained committed to his training.

events.name: Performance bonus has been credited.
events.description: During a work break in the morning, Yin Hao received a text message from his bank on his phone, notifying him that 5,000 yuan had been deposited into his salary card, with a remark stating "[Third Quarter Performance Bonus]." He checked the details, confirmed the amount was correct, and his mood instantly brightened. This bonus was a recognition of his recent work performance, especially his proactive efforts after obtaining the senior technician qualification.

events.name: Plan bonus distribution
events.description: During the lunch break, Yin Hao opened the memo app on his phone and quickly planned how to use the bonus. Based on his pragmatic spending habits and clear goals, he decided: 4,000 yuan would be deposited into a dedicated savings account for purchasing a home; 600 yuan would be used to buy a pair of professional running shoes he had been eyeing for a long time (as a supplement to his training gear); and the remaining 400 yuan would serve as additional social funds for the month.

events.name: Execute Savings and Consumption
events.description: After work, Yin Hao quickly transferred his 4,000 yuan bonus from his salary card to his home purchase savings account via his mobile banking app at home. Seeing the total amount in his account increase once again, he felt one step closer to his goal. Shortly after, he opened Taobao and spent 598 yuan to order the professional running shoes he had been eyeing.

events.name: Reserve social funds and initiate an invitation.
events.description: After completing the transfer and shopping, Yin Hao regarded the remaining 402 yuan as his [extra social fund] for the month, which he could freely use. He sent a message in the [Songjiang Trio] and his colleagues' group chat: [The bonus has arrived. After the match this weekend, let’s find time to get together again next week?] He immediately received a flood of congratulations and agreements.

events.name: Final Pre-Game Check and Communication
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao once again checked all the equipment for the competition, confirming that everything was in order. Afterward, he only went for a 2-kilometer ultra-short, easy run, purely to maintain muscle memory and physical sensation. After the run, he exchanged a few words with his running buddy, Chen Jie, via WeChat about their pre-race condition, encouraging each other.

events.name: Mild cold symptoms
events.description: Yin Hao felt a bit congested and had a dry throat, likely due to the change in weather. He decided to drink more water and rest early to avoid affecting his performance in the competition.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: A calm mind, with a slight physical discomfort.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Double pleasure and satisfaction—the financial security brought by the bonus, and the excitement of the approaching competition, with physical discomfort somewhat alleviated.

2025-08.daily_overview: Friday, a workday and the last one before the competition. Yin Hao maintained his usual work routine, but his mind had already entered the countdown to the event. After work, to fully unwind, he arranged a final summer night fishing trip with his fishing buddy, Brother Wu. By the tranquil waterside, he let his thoughts settle, gathering mental energy for the big battle over the weekend. His cold symptoms had almost completely disappeared.

events.name: Handling Work Emails and Handovers
events.description: During the day, Yin Hao handled the last few tasks of the week, ensuring no urgent matters were left for the following week. He briefly informed his colleagues in the same team that he would be participating in a competition over the weekend and might arrive late or take a day off on Monday. Everyone expressed their best wishes.

events.name: The Last Fishing Date of Summer
events.description: After work, Yin Hao contacted his fishing buddy Wu Zhiqiang. The two arranged to meet at a quiet wild pond in Qingpu for a night fishing session. Yin Hao applied the techniques he had summarized throughout the summer, from selecting the spot and baiting to fishing, conducting a complete practice. The cool breeze by the water at night was very pleasant, and they chatted while fishing, rarely mentioning the competition. However, this tranquility itself was the best way to ease the pre-competition tension.

events.name: Confirm the match day alarm and itinerary.
events.description: After returning home from night fishing, although it was already late, Yin Hao double-checked the alarm settings on his phone for the next day (Saturday) and reviewed the detailed itinerary memo for the race day. He placed his race packet in the most visible spot by the door and then took a quick wash.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: The surface is calm, but inside there's a slight pre-race excitement starting to stir, and the body feels good.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: I felt thoroughly relaxed through night fishing, with clear thoughts and only pure anticipation for the competition left, as the cold symptoms have completely disappeared.

2025-08.daily_overview: Half Marathon Race Day. In the early morning, Yin Hao completed his first half marathon, successfully achieving his annual health goal with results meeting expectations. After the race, he celebrated with fellow runners, and in the afternoon, he returned home to rest and recover fully. In the evening, he handled personal matters briefly to prepare for the next day's adjustments.

events.name: Complete a half marathon race
events.description: Following the plan, Yin Hao arrived at the Shanghai Oriental Sports Center early in the morning. He smoothly stored his belongings, warmed up, and entered the starting area. After the starting gun fired, he began running steadily at his predetermined pace. Along the way, he strictly adhered to his nutrition plan, maintaining good physical condition. Although he felt extremely fatigued during the final three kilometers, he persevered with sheer willpower. Ultimately, he crossed the finish line in approximately 1 hour and 58 minutes, successfully completing his first half marathon!

events.name: Post-match Recovery and Celebration
events.description: After crossing the finish line, Yin Hao collected his finisher’s medal and supplies, followed by a thorough cool-down walk and stretching session. He met Chen Jie, a fellow runner who had also participated in the race, and the two took a photo together to commemorate the moment, congratulating each other on their achievement. Yin Hao promptly shared his joy of completing the race along with a photo of his medal on WeChat with his family, comrades, and friends, receiving countless likes and heartfelt congratulations in return.

events.name: Return home for deep rest.
events.description: Upon returning home in the afternoon, Yin Hao felt extremely exhausted yet filled with a sense of accomplishment. He took a hot shower, had a lunch rich in protein and carbohydrates (ordered takeout), and then slept through the entire afternoon, allowing his body to begin the lengthy recovery process.

events.name: Simple Organization and Planning
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao organized his competition gear and began contemplating his training and rest arrangements after the event, preparing for life after the tapering period.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
起始状态.心情: Nervous, excited, and eager to give it a try.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Extremely exhausted, yet filled with a great sense of accomplishment and satisfaction. Health goals achieved, brimming with confidence for the future.

2025-08.daily_overview: On the last day of August, Yin Hao completed a pre-race taper run, adjusting his condition to its peak. He conducted a monthly financial review and was pleased to see steady progress in his savings, bringing a satisfying conclusion to a fulfilling August. His health condition has fully met the requirements for concluding the health status assessment.

events.name: Pre-race taper run
events.description: In the early morning, Yin Hao completed a 3-kilometer easy run, maintaining a pace of 5 minutes and 40 seconds per kilometer, focusing on body awareness and rhythm. After the run, he performed thorough dynamic stretches, feeling light and energetic, and adjusted his condition to its peak before the race.

events.name: Monthly Financial Review
events.description: In the morning, Yin Hao opened his mobile phone accounting app in the study. He carefully reviewed his August income (salary, pay raise, quarterly bonus) and expenses (rent, living costs, training equipment, social spending), comparing them with the annual financial budget set at the beginning of the year. The results showed that, due to the pay raise and bonus, his monthly savings significantly exceeded the budget, and the total amount in his home purchase savings account had grown noticeably. This made him feel that all his efforts were worthwhile.

events.name: Rest and Status Assessment
events.description: In the afternoon, Yin Hao rested at home, performed some flexibility exercises, and reviewed his training data through an app. He confirmed that his body had recovered from the competition and was in optimal health, preparing for the upcoming end of the tapering period.

events.name: Call family to share progress.
events.description: In the evening, Yin Hao had a video call with his parents, sharing the joy of completing the competition and making financial progress, and receiving support and encouragement from his family.

起始状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai.
起始状态.心情: Calm, focused, and feeling physically well.

结束状态.所处地点: At home on Guangfulin Road, Songjiang District, Shanghai
结束状态.心情: Satisfied and at ease, with health adjusted to its peak pre-competition condition, filled with confidence for future career and life goals.
